87b7(rgyud 'grel): oM puShpe swAhA/ me tog gi'o/ de nyid bcings la bdug spos dbul/ /oM d+hU pe ma li ni hUM swAhA/ bdug pa'i 'o/ nyi ma'i khu tshur mthe bong brkyang/ /oM na di tI k+Sh+Na dAM pe hUM swAhA/ mar me'i 'o/ lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas kyang/ /dbus su mthe bong
88a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyod par bya/ /oM ku ru ku ru mahA b+hak+Sha sh+ri sh+ri hUM swAhA/ lha ba shos kyi'o/ /de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mchod pa rnaM pa nyi shu hUM dang sbyar bas/ lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing bstod bzhin pa'i bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs
88a2(rgyud 'grel): su bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bdag dang gzhan mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ /bdud rtsis bkang ba'i dung chos blangs la/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mdun du/ /sngags 'dis se gol gsum gtog par bya'o/ /oM ha ho h+rI swAhA/ bdud rtsi lnga sbyin pa'i sngags dang
88a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o/ /sngar bshad pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje dang dril bu blangs la/ yi ge hUM gi dbyangs dang bcas pa'i sngags 'di gdon par bya'o/ /oM hUM hUM/ oM pra dz+nyA hUM hUM hUM/ oM phaiM g+he/ phaiM g+he/ oM phaiM/ oM g+h+raM g+h+raM g+h+raM hUM swAhA/ mnyes pa chen por bya ba'i sngags so/ /
88a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje dril bu dkrol/ /'bad pa yis ni gsang sngags gngon/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /rgyab kyi rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /sa gdugs pad+ma bcings pa dang/ /oM badzra g+haN+Da ho/ oM badzra g+haN+Da ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta/ sarba bud d+ha k+She tra pra tsA li ti/ badz+nyA pa ra
88a5(rgyud 'grel): mi tA nA da swa b+hA be badzra d+harmA h+ri da ya saM to Sha ni hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ rdo rje dril bu'i sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rked pa'i mtshams su bzhag par bya/ /khro bo'i sgeg dang bzhad pa dang/ /lus ni dgugs gsum ltar bzhag ste/ /sgeg ma'i tshul gyis
88a6(rgyud 'grel): sgeg pa dang/ /pi waM tshul gyis pi waM dang/ /gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang/ sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang/ /brdeb pa'i tshul gyis brdebs pa dang/ /gar gyi tshul gyis yan lag bskyod/ /rlung yang tshul gyis g.yo ba dang/ /gyal? mtshan tshul
88a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsgreng ba dang/ /bla bre'i tshul gyis bre ba dang/ /ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang/ /gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgab pa dang/ /cang te'u tshul gyis brdeg? pa dang/ /rnga yi tshul gyis brdung ba dang/ /bzhad pa'i tshul du 'dzum pa dang/ /gar gyis tshul gyis gar
88b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa /khro po'i tshul gyis khro ba dang/ /sgeg pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang/ /'gying pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings pa dang/ /mda''dren num 'khyud pa dang/ /rdo rje gsor zhing phyag 'chal pa'i tshul gyis 'dud par byed pa ste/ mchod pa nyi shu de nyid kyis/ /hUM gis glu dang sbyar
88b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de nas bstod pas mchod bya ste/ /sems dpa' chen po dang po'i mchog /dgyes chen rnams kyi dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gzigs pa'i/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag /thugs kyi sems dpa' ting 'dzin mchog /rdo rje chen po stobs
88b3(rgyud 'grel): po che/ /kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i mchog /snying por gyur cing bdud 'joms pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs pa'i mchog /hUM mdzad hUM de 'jig rten gyi/ /bdag po thugs kyi gtso bo nyid/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /
88b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod dang thar pa'i nor che ba/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste/ /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /mi rgyu ba na mchog tu gsal/ /shin tu phra dang sbom pa'i tshogs/ /rgyu ba rnams kyi rab mchog brnyes/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo sbyod
88b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /thog mdza' med cing gsal ba min/ /sngon du sngag pa rnam par gnas/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba che/ /dam tshig de nyid blo gros che/ /rdo rje khro bo khro bo che/ /'bar zhing 'jigs pa 'dul ba po/ /gdug pa mchog ni gdug pa che/ /drag cing khro la
88b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che/ /mchog gi las can las chen po/ /dam tshig las ni bzang po'i lam/ /byang chub sems ni rtogs mdzad pa/ /thams cad dag byas pad+ma che/ /shes rab thabs kyi nor che ba/ /'dod chags dag
88b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /sna tshogs chags pa'i dbang phyug che/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas rtag pa'i don/ /sems can kun gyi gnas chen po/ /dpal gyi 'byor pa 'byor ba'i rgyal/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal
89a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /dad pas khyod la 'jug bgyid pas/ /deng bdag rdo rje sems grub mdzod/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sgra dang ni/ /bstod pa 'di yis bstod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje glu la sogs pa blang bar bya ste/ hUM hUM hUM/ de pa'u pa'u na ra sa/ pa ru do na da ling+ga/
89a2(rgyud 'grel): na dzo ya ba yu/ ha batdza hUM te Na Na hUM/ te te hUM/ b+ha bA b+ha bA/ bi mu da de bi se su b+hu dza na/ ku ti ma ra ra ho/ bu dzi ni bo ti kadzdza ti ti/ de na Na hUM hUM/ te na na te te hUM/ a ma ti/ a na ga g+ha/ a sat+ti/ bi mut+ti/ sun+na bi sun+na/ naM sa na sa ra/ bI da bI/
89a3(rgyud 'grel): te na na/ hUM hUM te na na hUM/ te te hUM ma ra pa pany+tsA ba hUM ba ha de hUM/ su na sansa re kadzdzu tu hUM ha'u dza na pa te te na na hUM/ de nas phyi rol gyi rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pas kyang/ ba 'u na gonda ma hUM li ni Shin+na ma/ /d+ha pa la saM sa ga/ ka ma ni ti na ma/ a mo
89a4(rgyud 'grel): ta bi bi shud+hA si d+hi nu kany+tsa kany+tsa/ na ba ra ta d+ha Nu ka Na ti ma hUM/ a ti pa sa g+ho re maN ru Di na yi/ sadzdza ka pa le so ni bk+Sha khe/ dzA ya dzA ya/ ud d+ha ri ta b+ha ba hUm/ mar ga ya ra ya/ so su hi hUM/ kindu bar b+hi sa na g+ho ru daN+Da/ sa dza ba ka lam/
89a5(rgyud 'grel): ba sya mi ltos na mi pa hUM/ so hi li lu Ni tsha badzdza lu/ ha ri ha ra mu tra tri pa da pa hUM/ mA ra bi d+ha ra na ki ta yoM na ma hA mahA hUM/ rnga yi ni ba hUM/ rdo rje'i gru ni de nyid dang/ rdo rje dril bur rab mchod cing/ /pany+tsa ma dang ko shi ki/ bsres pa'i mtshan nyid
89a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos zlar/ /de nas rim pa gsum pa 'jig rten pa la sogs pa bstod par byed pa/ dpal ldan de nyid rgyal po'i dbang phyug dam pa cod pan mdzes/ /gsang ba'i gdan la sku mchog 'ong 'bar dang ldan zhing/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu bskyad sgras
89a7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor mnyes/ /dpal gyi ye shes dam pa'i dbang phyug longs spyod rnams la spyod/ /de la sogs pa'i bstong pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas bstong par bya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /oM shud+d+ha d+harmA hUM/ a a oM
89b1(rgyud 'grel): a swAhA/ de ltar mnyes par byas nas/ /ji skad bshad pa'i lha'i 'khor lo thun bzhi'i rim gyis/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrom par bya'o/ /bsgom pas skyo na gsang sngags bzlas bya ste/ /ha cang myur min dal ba min/ /gsal ba ma yin gsang sags ni/ /
89b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshangs pa yang ma yin pa/ /kun rtog thams cad spangs te bzla/ /de nas kyang ni skyo gyur na/ /bstod de rdo rje gzung nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bus rab bskul la/ /'khor lo can rnams glu yis bstod/ /gus pas legs par mchod nas ni/ /dge ba rnams ni yongs su bsngo/ /
89b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par byas nas gshegs su gsol/ /slar yang gshegs pa mdzad par gsol/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i sbyor ba yi/ /rdo rje thal mo snying gar bsdam/ /oM na ma ste hUM/ na ma mi hUM/ na mo na mo swAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /snying ga ru ni la ba
89b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdams/ /nyi ma sa la bzhag nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'bad de brjod par bya/ /oM gats+tsha gats+tsha swa b+ha ba ni hUM swAhA/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /oM gats+tsha gats+tsha pu na rA ga ma na ya hUM phaT swAhA/ se gol lan gsum brdab
89b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pa ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams gtang ba'i sngags/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol nas/ dam tshig gi lta rnams snying ga'i pad+ma dkar po la thim par gyur par bsams la/ go cha chen po dang/ dang
89b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gshog pa la sogs pa byas la/ yi ge brgya pas brtan pa nyid du bya'o/ /de la yi ge brgya pa ni 'di yin te/ oM dz+nyA na DU ki nI sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ dz+nyA nA DA ki nI twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/
89b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba sid+d+hi mme pra ya ts+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM sh+re ye(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ /ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga ba tI dz+nyA na DA ki nI/ mA me muny+tsa badzri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya stwa A(rgyud 'grel): zhes phyag rgya chen por dbang bskur la/ brka ba co na oM DhoM zhes bya ba dang/ sngar bshad pa nyid phyag
90a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya nyid kyi go cha bcings nas phyogs bcu na zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde bar mdzod cig /ces gsol ba btab ste ldang bar bya'o/ /rim pa 'dis lha'i yid la bya pa nyid kyis/ /ji
90a2(rgyud 'grel): srid mchog dam pa ma thob pa'i par du rtag tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i cho ga'i man ngag gis/ /nges par bdag gis bsgrub par bya/ /oM hUM hUM gti/ dzrIM miM gIM hUM/ khruM haM ho/ dam tshig bcu pa'i sa bon ni de dag go /
90a3(rgyud 'grel): spyang zhing rtogs dang de bzhin sbar/ /mi rtogs pa yi sems kyis ni/ /dga' ba'i sems dang bza' bya zhing/ /de bzhin gshegs kun tshim par bya/ /dpal gang na bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon rje
90a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsun Arya de ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA ma la gu pta dang/ zhu chen gyi 'o tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal rdo rje gang na bzhi'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so/
90a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra tsa tu rwe thi sA d+ha naM nA ma(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gdan bzhi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bla ma dang rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' mgon de nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi gtso/
90a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi sgrub thabs chen po brjod/ /chung dang bar ma la sogs dbye/ /yid dang rjes su mthun phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'khod nas ni/ /sngags pa rnal 'byor la gzhol bas/ lag pa dag pa la sogs bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
90a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snying gar hUM yig bsgoms nas ni/ /rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje mchog /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bye/ /zhes pas sems sbyang bar bya'o/ /mgrin par h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig las skyes pa'i/ /pad 'dab rtse mor zla dkyil 'khor/ /de yi dbus su
90b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig ste/ de las rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): ji hwa saM brta ni hUM phaT ces pas lce sbyad bar bya'o/ /g.yas pa a yig las skyes pa'i nyi mar rdo rje gzugs brnyan te/ /g.yon pa sam yig las skyes pa'i/ /zla ba pad+ma rnam par bsgom/ /dkar po du
90b2(rgyud 'grel): bdud pad+ma/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i khro bo sogs/ /gaM wang dri gsum 'jigs pa dang/ sa gdugs zla ba'i lag pa la/ /nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ang/ /mthe bong ye shes rnam shes so/ /de la suM yig la sogs pa'i/ /sa bon bcu rnams dgong par bya/ /de
90b3(rgyud 'grel): la yid kyis sa bon bcu po rnams ni/ /suM k+ShuM yuM hUM a smryuM hmryuM ymryuM/ k+Sh+mryuM saM(rgyud 'grel): zhes bas lag pa sbyang bar bya'o/ /pad+ma ye shes kyis ni mnan/ /sor mo lhag ma rtse gsum ste/ /'di yis yan lag brgyad phyogs su/ /ji bzhin rim par bsrung bar bya/ /sngon du
90b4(rgyud 'grel): lce la dgod pa ni/ /'di yi yi ge suM yig go /spyi bor k+ShuM yig dgong par bya/ /yuM yig rna ba sna dag la/ /mig gnyis la ni hUM yig go /mgrin par chu smryuM ni brtsegs pa'o/ /dbung pa gnyis la dgod pa ni/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i sa
90b5(rgyud 'grel): bon brtsegs/ /rlung hmryuM gi yi ge brtsegs pa yi/ /sa bon snying ga'i gnas su dgod/ /me ymryuM yi yi ge brtsegs pa yi/ /sa bon lte ba'i phyogs su dgod/ zhes pas yan lag brgyad bsrung bar bya'o/ /rnal 'byor ba yis ji bzhin rim/ /de nas sems
90b6(rgyud 'grel): ni byin gyis brlab/ /mnyam par gzhag pas sngags rnams kyis/ /dag dang lus kyang byin gyis brlubs/ oM badzra tsit+ta hUM oM badzra wA ka A(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra kA ya ho/ /zhes pas lus gsum gyin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings
90b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ dkar mo dang ni gi waM sbyar/ /dung dad nya phyis sogs snong edu/ /gsang gtor ched du bying yis brlab/ /smryaM sarbtha si d+ho d+hi na hUM phaT/ rdo rje bcing bar bstan byas nas dri gsum du bsgreng bar bya/ /sems la rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/ /mchod yon dung
91a1(rgyud 'grel): chos byin gyis brlab/ /oM bra tIts+tsha argaM hUM/ nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang nas ni/ /dkar po dang ni ye shes sbyar/ /sngags pas gsang sngags dang ldan pas/ /zhal bsil dung ni byin gyis brlab/ /oM pra wa ra satkA ra pA dyaM pra tI ts+tsha hUM swAhA/ zhes pas
91a2(rgyud 'grel): dung chos rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rang rang sngags rnams kho na dang/ /phyag rgya rnams kyis de bzhin duAng/ /dri la sogs pa de bzhin rim/ /sngags pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /'dir byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags rnams ni/ oM hUM swAhA/ dri'i 'o oM
91a3(rgyud 'grel): sh+ri swAhA/ mtog gi'o/ oM k+ShaM swAhA/ 'dug spos kyi'o/ oM k+ShuM swAhA/ mA me'i go/ oM iswAhA lha ba shos kyi'o/ /oM gud swAhA/ gtor ma'i nyer spyod kyi'o/ /oM sarba bi ma la saM sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ mchod pa'i yan lag bsang gtor bya ba'i sngags so/ /zla ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni/ /
91a4(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong gnyis ni dkri bar bya/ /'dab chags gshog pa'i rnam pa ltar/ /byas nas snying ga'i gnas su dgod/ /oM badzra ka wa tsa hUM phaT/ bdag bsrung ba'o/ /sems la rdo rje brtan byas nas/ /phyogs rnams kun ni bskor bar bya/ /ra ba dang ni phur bu yang/
91a5(rgyud 'grel): /sngags pas ji bzhin rim par bya/ /oM hUM swAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas nas/ /sa gdugs pad+ma sbrel bar bya/ /dkar po gi waM gyen du bsgreng/ /steng du bskor te gtsug tor bcing/ /oM hUM swAhA/ rdo rje bcings pa brtan
91a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas/ /dri gsum du ba gyen du bsgreng/ /dkar po'i gi waM gyen bsgreng ste/ rdo rje'i rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /spyi bo dpral ba rna ba dang/ /ltag pa rna ba g.yon par ni/ /rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams/ /'dir ni rnam snang la sogs pa'i/ /
91a7(rgyud 'grel): rang rang sa bon sngags rnams ni/ oM hUM AM swAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis ni gyen du sbyar/ /snying rgyab spyi bo ji bzhin rim/ /rnam pa gsum po bsgom par bya/ /oM Da Tu hUM swA hA/ dar dbyangs bcing ba byas nas
91b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /lag mthil mnyam pas mnye bar byas/ /badzra tu Sh+ya sngags kyis na/ /mthar ni ho yig sbyar bar bya/ /zhes pa bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /de nas sngags pas mnyam bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung du gnas pas/ /snying ga'i rang gi sa bon gnas/ /dbang po'i
91b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs bzhin 'od zer lngas/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /'od zer rnams kyis gang bar bsam/ /de yis nges par bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bkug ste nam mkhar bzhugs pa la/ /blo dang ldan pas bsang gtor dbul/ /rdo rje'i zhags
91b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /lha rnams kun nas gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags sgrogs phyag rgya yis/ /de rnams des par bcings par bya/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /blo dang ldan pas mnyes par bya/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /oM smryuM
91b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ bsang gtor ro/ /oM badzra pA sha hUM gzhug pa'i 'o/ /oM badzra spho Ta baM/ bcing ba'i 'o/ /oM badzra a be sha ho(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa'i 'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /sa gdugs dkar po sprel bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di/ /lha rnams 'gugs par
91b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i mchog /nyi ma'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas/ /dkar po ye shes sbyar bar bya/ /ku sha'i rtse mos chu mthong ba/ /gsang gtor gyi ni phyag rgyar bshad/ /phyag rgya de nyid brtan bcings la/ /dkar po dang ni gi wang sbrel/ /zhags pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya yis/
91b6(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kun nas gzhug par bya/ /khu tshur gnyis ni dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /gsang ba gsang ba'i lcags sgrogs gis/ /lha rnams kun nas bcings par bya/ /khu tshur gnyis ni dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang/ rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/
91b7(rgyud 'grel): sa gdugs dang ni pad+ma sprel/ /lha rnams kun nas mnyes par bya/ /nyi ma'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni ye shes sbyar/ /yongs skor lhag ma gyen du sgrang/ /zhabs bsil du ni yongs su grags/ /oM pra wa ra sah+kA raM pA dya pra tI ts+tsha swAhA/
92a1(rgyud 'grel): zhabs bsil ba'i chu dbul bar bya'o/ /sems ma rdo rje brtan bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni gi waM bskum/ /ye shes rnam shes dang ni sbyar/ /mchod yon phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /oM pra tIts+tsha arg+haM hUM swAhA/ /des mchod yon
92a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi chu dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor nam mkha' 'di/ /mgon po 'khor dang yang dag ldan/ /dri la sogs pa nyer spyod kyis/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /sgeg mo pi waM de bzhin glu/ /gar ma phyag rgya bzhi rnams dang/ /dri dang me tog de bzhin
92a3(rgyud 'grel): spos/ /mar me dang ni zhal zas mchog /zla ba nyi ma'i khu tshur gnyis/ /rked pa'i ngos su bzung nas ni/ /yan lag g.yon du 'gying bar bya/ /sgeg mo'i phyag rgya'i rnam pa'o/ /oM hUM swAhA/ g.yon pa gri gug ltar byas nas/ /pi waM gyen du rnam par
92a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /nyi ma'i lag pas cung zad gsor/ /pi waM phyag rgya'i rnam pa'o/ /oM hUM ho swAhA/ nyi ma'i khu tshur gyen du bzhag/ hUM gi yi ge sgrogs byed cing/ /kha yi rtse mor dkar po g.yo/ /glu ma'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /oM hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ g.yas pa'i
92a5(rgyud 'grel): rked pa'i phyogs su ni/ /lag pa g.yon pa 'phang bar bya/ /nyi ma'i lag pa gyen du ni/ /gar ma'i rnam par bzung bar bya/ /oM su nri te swAhA/ lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas ni/ /'jigs pa dang ni rnam shes sbyar/ /nyi ma'i lag pas bzung nas ni/ /
92a6(rgyud 'grel): dri yi phyag rgyas phyug par bya/ /oM hUM swAhA/ nyi ma'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni ye shes sbyar/ /sor mo lhag ma gyen du brkyang/ /me tog phyag rgya'i rnam par bya/ /oM sh+ri swAhA/ me tog phyag rgya de nying kyi/ /pad+ma dung dag bskum
92a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /bdag nyid chen po mchod pa'i dus/ /bdug spos phyag rgya'i rnam par bya/ /oM a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas/ /de yi mthe bong gyen du bsgreng/ /mar ma'i phyag rgyar shes bya ste/ /yes sgron me rab tu bzung/ /oM k+ShuM swAhA/
92b1(rgyud 'grel): thal mo gyon du gyis nas ni/ mthe bod gnyis ni dbus su bsten/ /tshigs bcad med pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /zhal zas dkyil 'khor mdun du'o/ /oM i swAhA/ de nyid mthe bong ngos su bzhag /gtor ma yi ni phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /oM guM swAhA/ oM hUM swAhA/
92b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gzung ba'i ?? so/ oM ho swAhA/ dril bu 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /nyi mas rdo rje cung zad gsor/ /zla bas dril bu bzung bar bya/ /bad kar sngon du byas nas ni/ /blo ldan tshigs bcad 'di brjod bya/ /rdo rje gsang ba mdzes pa yis/ /sems can rnam grol
92b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ste/ /snying po'i rdo rje bzung bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /sa gdugs pad+ma dkris nas ni/ /dkar po dang ni 'gi bad sgreng/ /hUM yig gis ni g.yo bar bya/ /oM badzra g+ha N+ter Ni ta pra ra Ni te/ saM pra ra ni ta sarba bud d+ha k+She tra pa ci
92b4(rgyud 'grel): la ti/ pradz+nya pA ra mi ta mA ?? swa b+hA wai badzra d+ha ra a ba ho Sha Ni hUM hUM hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /de nas dril bu dkrol bar bya'o/ /rnal 'byor mnga' bdag sems can sgrol mdzad phyag 'tshal bstong/ /thams cad bdag skyes gcig
92b5(rgyud 'grel): gi ngo bor phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rmongs pa gcod la phyag 'tshal bstong/ /de nyid gcig pur rtag tu bdag 'dud phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM gi yi ge lha yi mchog /hUM gi yi ge spro ba'i gnas/ /hUM gi yi ge stong pa'i dngos/ /hUM gi yi ger
92b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstong/ /mnyam par bzhag par byas nas ni/ /yan lag lnga yi phyag bya'o/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): te hUM/ na mA ma hUM na mo na ma(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM pany+tsa DA ki ni bU dza u pa s+tha nA ya/ A t+ma na/ nirya ta yA mi oM A tsA rya pU dza u pa s+thA nA ya/ A t+ma naM/ nir ya ta
92b7(rgyud 'grel): yA mi oM sa ka la satwa pa ri twa ?? ya a?? naM/ nIryA ta yA mi/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma ya ho(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag par skyab su mchi bar bgyi/ /theg pa gsum po thams cad dang/ rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma/
93a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /khyad par du ni slob dpon la/ /rtag par skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /rnam par snang mdzad mi bskyod pa/ /rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang/ /don yod grub pa la sogs
93a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni des mdzad ba'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par gyi/ /tshul khrims rnam gsum bslab pa ni/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims kyang/ /so sor brtan por bdag gis bzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang
93a3(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun te/ /bla med dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa did nas brtan por bzung/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la'ang/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /de kho nyid kyis so so bzung/ /slob dpon dag
93a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin dang nyin la dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/
93a5(rgyud 'grel): pa mchos so sor bzung bar bgyi/ las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med mchog/ dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/
93a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa ma lus bzung bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyung ba dbyugs nga byung zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas rang gi snying gar
93b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ hUM yig 'od ni 'bar ba bsam/ /khams gsum pa yi lus rnams ni/ /me yis bsregs par rnam phar bsgom/ /oM swA b+hA wa shud d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho haM/ blo dang ldan pas sngags tshig 'do'i/ /sngags kyi don la'ang rnam par dpyad/ /chos kyi
93b2(rgyud 'grel): sku yi ngo bo nyid/ /stong pa nyid du zhu ba ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bskyed la/ /dag dong yid kyis bsam par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi ji bzhin rim/ /glu rnams kyis ni bskul bar bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la nges par 'jug pa grub par mdzod
93b3(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ha ha/ hUM gi yi ge sgrogs pa'i dam tshig las byung bdag gi mgon/ /ba ba bo ba rdo rje gsal bar gsang ba las ni byung ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ /a a a a ngo mtshar ba shin tu mnyes pa'i a li gcig tu thim pa'i hUM/ /de nas glu ni 'gags rjes su/ /
93b4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /ka sogs las ni byung ba yi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dpe med g.yo ba med par brjod/ /ye shes nga rgyal brjod pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyang bsgrom par bya/
93b5(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA no haM/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /hUM yig las byung rdo rje ste/ /de yi dbus su 'ang hUM yi ge ni/ /bsams nas sku yi de rgyal bya/ /oM badzra shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho haM/ de ltar rdo rje de nyid kyi/ /hUM yi ga 'od zer 'phros pa las/ /sems can
93b6(rgyud 'grel): khams kyang yang dag sbyangs/ /slar yang de nyid du ni bsdu/ /sngags pas bsdus pa'i nge ma thag/ sngags 'di nyid ni brjod par bya/ /oM brtan no haM hi(rgyud 'grel): /de nas rnal 'byor nam mkha' i mgon/ /blo ldan yad kyis bsgom par bya/ /g.yon dang g.yas dang
93b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i zhal/ /dpa' bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spron 'khrigs pa yi 'od dang mtshungs/ /spyan gsum bzhad dang khro ba dang/ /sgreg pa yi ni nyams kyis spras/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung gdan la ni/ /shes rab yan lag 'khyud cing 'grogs/ /
94a1(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ni gyen du bkong pa ste/ /gnyis pa yi ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa yis ni rdo rjer bcas/ /g.yon gyi gyen du gzhu 'dzin cing/ /gnyis pa na ni thod pa ste/ /gsum pa yis ni dril bu dkrol/ /rgyan rnams kun nas yang
94a2(rgyud 'grel): dag rdzogs/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan/ /ral pa dar gyis dkris pa ste/ /thod pa'i cod pan shin tu brtsogs/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /shes rab bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin par 'khyud/ /ma mchu
94a3(rgyud 'grel): tshams kyis 'debs par mdzad/ /zhabs kyi tshig kyis dkris nas ni/ /rdo rje pad+mar tshim par mdzad/ /mdor bsdus cig pu bsgoms nas ni/ /sngags 'di nyid ni brjod par bya/ /oM u da b+ha bo haM/ oM yo ga shud d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA yo ga shud d+ho haM/ oM dz+nyA
94a4(rgyud 'grel): na kA yo haM(rgyud 'grel): ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /mkhas pas yan lag brgyad bsrung bya/ /lce la chu yi sa bon te/ /spyi bod me ni bzhag par bya/ /rna ba sna la de bzhin rlung/ /mig dag la nas ni sbyar/ /chu skyes sa bon yi ge ni/ /mgrin pa la ni nges
94a5(rgyud 'grel): par dgod/ /brtsegs pa'i sa bon shin tu mdzes/ /dbud pa gnyis la yang dag gnas/ /snying gang rlung ni brtsegs pa ste/ /mkhas pas rtag tu dgod par bya/ /bsdus te me brtsegs sa bon ni/ /lte ba'i phyogs su rnam par gnas/ /lus gsum byin
94a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab pa yi/ /sngags 'di nyid ni brjod par bya/ /oM badzra kA ya swa b+hA wa A t+ma ko haM/ oM badzra kA ya ho(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra wA ka a(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra tst+ta hUM/ pad+ma dang ni ye shes sbyar/ /sa gjugs dang ni rnam shes sbyar/ /gnyis po lcags sgrog ltar byas
94a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ lhag ma ba dan gsum brkyang nas/ /dri ma gsum dang dud pa sbyar/ /rdo rje rtse lnga zhes bya bas/ /lus kyi gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab/ /snying ga mdzod spu dag dang ni/ /mgrin pa spyi bo sngags dang bcas/ /sa ma ya ho he hUM hUM/ sa ma ya ste/
94b1(rgyud 'grel): a? ste ti k+Sha mAM/ /A A A aM chos dang las dang phyag rgya che/ /bdag nyid mngon par dbang bskur bya/ /phyi nas sgeg mo sogs kyis mchod/ /bdag nyid mchod pas mchod par bya/ /gtor ga a li'ang dbul bar bya/ /me tog bdug spos la sogs rim/ /
94b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas rdo rje cung zad gsor/ /g.yon las dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /yang dag phun sum chog gyur ba'i/ /mnyam par gzhag pas tshig 'dis bstod/ /'phrog byed gtsug gi cod pan thod kyi nor bum zhabs gnyis snang bar mdzad/ /skul shin
94b3(rgyud 'grel): tu dam du 'khyud pa'i dril bu las byung sku 'dzin pa/ /g.yo zhing spros bas bskyod pa'i gsang ba las byung ba dam ldan/ /de 'di rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dbang phyug gi gnas/ /zhes pa dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sngags pas stong pa nyid
94b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas/ /'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /yuM k+ShuM suM hUM las byung ba steng nas steng du yang dag gnas/ /gzhu dang zur gsum zlum po dang/ /de bzhin gru bzhi nyid dang ni/ /nam mkha' me dang kun da'i mdog gser gyi kha dog ji bzhin rim/ /de yi dbus su
94b5(rgyud 'grel): lhun po ste/ /sa bon hUM suM hUM las byung/ /lha rdzas rin chen kun rang bzhin/ /lcog brgyad kyis ni shin tu mdzes/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba ni/ /lhun po'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /oM hUM swAhA zhes sngags kyis/ /lan lngar byin gyis brlab par bya/ /de las
94b6(rgyud 'grel): 'de ba rtsegs bsam pa ni /rin po che ni kun gyis brgyan/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste/ /dra ba dra phyed sogs kyis mtshan/ /dril chung gi ni dra bas brgyan/ /sgo rang sgo khyud mtshams sma??? rdo rje bla ba la gnas pa'o/ /
94b7(rgyud 'grel): steng nas seng ge rma bya dang/ /dang pa'i rgyal po chu srin te/ /rgyal mtshan brgyad rnams kyis ni spras/ /dar gyi phreng ba'i lnga ldis brgyan/ /blo dang ldan pas gru bzhi ru/ /tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab par bya/ /zung gyi thig ni gdab bya zhing/ /de las gzhan/
95a1(rgyud 'grel): yang sgo thig gdab/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag nas/ /rtsa ba'i thig rnams gdab bar bya/ /'khor lo'i drug cha rnams kyis ni/ /sgo ni mdzes par 'gyur ba'o/ /sgo yi lnga cha rnams kyis ni/ /rdul tshon sa ni rab tu brtags/ /de
95a2(rgyud 'grel): yi tshad kyang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de yi nyis 'gyur ste stegs bur bya/ /bzhi pa stegs bu'i phyed kyis ni/ /rin chen snam bu'i thig tu 'gyur/ /lnga pa stegs bu dang ni mtshungs/ /drug pa bdun pa de yi phyed/ /sgo yi thig las phyi rol du/ /g.yon dang
95a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi ngos kyi char/ /tshad ni re res dor nas ni/ /snam bu drug gi thig rnams gdab/ bdun pa'i thig las phyi rol tu/ /tshad ni bcu drug dor bar bya/ /khor yug zlum po yi ni thig /lte ba'i don ni mngor bsdus pa'o/ /de nas tshad ni gsum dor nas
95a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i thig gis bskor bar bya/ /de nas tshad gnyis dor nas ni/ /rdo rje phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /de nas tshad bzhi dor nas ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /de yi phyi rol tshad lnga yis/ /dkar min yang lag la sogs pa/ /de yi phyi rol de tshad
95a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /dur khrod kyi ni sa bzhir 'dong/ /de yi phyi rol thod phred sa /tshod ni gsum du 'gyur ba'o/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor tshad rnams kyis/ /brgyad rnams snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /blo dang ldan pas gru bzhi ru/ /rtsa ba'i thig rnams gdab par bya/ /
95a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi cha lnga rnams kyis /sgo yi thig tu 'gyur ba'o/ /yang na sgo ni drug cha ru/ /de yi tshad du mdon par brjod/ /rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol tu/ /tshad gcig yongs su dor ba ni/ /re khA lnga yis ru bshad/ /mkhas pa yis ni thig gang ba bya/ /
95a7(rgyud 'grel): de yi phyi rol tshad gnyis dor/ /stegs bu'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /de yi phyi rol tshad cig ni/ /dor bar rin chen snam bu'i thig/ de yi phyi rol stegs bu'i tshad/ /do shal snam bu'i tshad du 'gyur/ /de yi phyi rol tshad gcig dang/ /tshad gcig
95b1(rgyud 'grel): dor bas mnga' yab gnyis /pu shu yi ni rnam bu'o/ /sgo yi thig las phyi rol char/ /tshad gcig nas bzung gcig gi mthar/ /blo dang ldan pas dos gnyis su/ /snam bu'i thig rnams gdab pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang brjod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi thig rnams
95b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du yang/ /zlum po'i thig gis bskor bar bya/ /tshad gsum yongs su dor nas ni/ /rtsa ba'i thig ni bskor bar bya/ /de nas chad gsum dor nas ni/ /zlum po'i thig ni bskor bar bya/ /khor yug gsum gyi thig rnams ni/ /nang du kun nas
95b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum rnams te/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i chon gyis/ /rdo rjes bskor te brgyan par bya/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus su ni/ /seng ge'i gdan gyi rnam par spras/ /shar dang byar sogs re mig la/ /glang po la sogs gdan rnams dgod/ dbang ldan me sogs re mig la/ /
95b4(rgyud 'grel): seng ge la sogs gdan rnams dgod/ /glang po rma bya mkha' ldid dang/ /mngag gzhug pa 'ang ji bzhin rim/ /seng ge phag dang ma he dang/ /ces spyad gi ni gdan rnams dgod/ /lha mo bzhi po rnams kyi ni/ /rog dan du ni brtag par bya/ /rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol tu/ /
95b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor khrag ltar dmar ba la/ /pad+ma rla ba nyi shu rnams/ /de yi gdan du bsam par bya/ /de yi phyi rol zlum po ste/ /khor yug gser mdog kun nas 'bar/ /keng rus 'jigs byed la sogs rnams/ /pad zla nyi shu rnams la'o/ /phyi rol sgo dang zur
95b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams su/ /dbugs las phyung ba rnam par bsgom /mkha' lding de bzhin dang pa dang/ /khyu mchog glad po ji bzhin rim/ /sa srungs bu dad mi dang rtag/ /chu srin nyid kyang bsgom par bya/ /sa bon mtshan ma las byung ba'i/ /dbus su rnal 'byor nam kha' gtso/ /dngos
95b7(rgyud 'grel): po thams cad bsgom par bya/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kyis mtshon pa'i/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo'i gtso/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs /mnyam par bzhag pas thugs gar bsam/ /rang rang sa bon ji
96a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rim/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni spro bar bya/ /rdo rje drag mo ro langs ma/ /gtum mo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyang/ /de rnams dbugs las phyung nas ni/ /'gro don byas nas bzhag par bya/ /ye shes gzigs pa rab sbyin pa'i/ /byang chub
96a2(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bskyed par bya/ /kun mkhyen lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /mdun dang g.yon pa nyid dang ni/ /rgyab dang de bzhin g.yas su ste/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang/ /nag po'i phyag gnyis drag shul gzugs/ /rol
96a3(rgyud 'grel): pa skyil krung phyed pa dang/ /cog pu pus mo gdan la'o/ /skra ni sil bur grol ba ste/ /rang rig mnyam par 'khyud cing gnas/ /g.yas pas pad+ma'i snod bsnams te/ /g.yon pas kha TwAM ga ni 'dzin/ /mi yi pags pas stod g.yogs te/ /glang po'i
96a4(rgyud 'grel): pags pas sham thabs can/ /sku la rgyan rnams thams cad de/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras/ /dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma/ /chu brtsegs la ni rnam par sprul/ /kha dog dkar dang ser ba ste/ /rol pa yi ni stabs kyis gnas/ /zhal ni mche
96a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gtsigs pa ste/ /spyan gsum khros pa'i gzugs can no/ /g.yas pas ral gri gyen du ste/ /g.yon pas sdigs mdzum zhags pa'o/ /na bza' dmar po legs par man pas/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni brgyan/ /'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs 'od
96a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /bdud rnams thams cad sreg par byed/ /mer ni lha mo stag mo ni/ /sa brtsegs la ni yang dag byung/ /kha dog dkar zhing sngo ba ste/ /zlum po'i stabs kyis yang dag gnas/ /phyag gnyis drag tu bzhad pa ste/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan
96a7(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste/ /na bza' dmar po yis ni brgyan/ /bden bral lha mo ce sbyang ma/ /rlung brtsegs la ni yang dag byung/ /kha dog sdo zhing dmar ba ste/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras/ /g.yas na dgra sta yang dag ldan/ /g.yon
96b1(rgyud 'grel): pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /skyil krung phyed pas yang dag bzhugs/ /na bza' dmar po yis ni brgyan/ /rlung gi mtshams su 'ug pa ma/ /me brtsegs la ni yang dag byung /kha dog dmar zhing ser ba ste/ /tsog pu'i gang na la yang dag gnas/ /dbyug
96b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ sku la'ang brgyan rnams thams cad dang/ /na bza' dmar po yis ni brgyan/ /shar gyi sgor ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /phum yig sa bon las byung ba/ /kha dog dkar po 'bar ba che/ /dbu skra sil
96b3(rgyud 'grel): bu yis ni brgyan/ /phyag gnyis kha ru bcug pa ste/ /spyan gsum gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /na bza' dmar po legs par man bas/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung yang dag gnas/ /byang du lha mo mar me ma/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung yang dag gnas/ /kha dog ser
96b4(rgyud 'grel): mo 'bar ba che/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni brgyan/ /na bza' dmar po legs par man bas/ /pheM yig sa bon las 'khrungs ma/ /thal spyar spyi bor bzhag pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor ni 'jig byed ma/ /kha dog dmar mo 'bar ba che/ /snyim pas khrag ni 'thung ba ste/
96b5(rgyud 'grel): phroM yig las ni rnam par sprul/ /lho yi sgor ni 'sro byed ma/ /kha dog nag mo 'bar ba che/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni gtun shing 'dzin/ /phreM yig las ni rnam par sprul/ /rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du/ /sa bon ha(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las sprul/ /spos ma 'jug byed gtum mo ni/ /
96b6(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi phyogs su bsgom par bya/ /dkar dang sngo dang gser gyi mdog /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spros/ /phyag gnyis thong par gnas pa yi/ /bdud rtsi'i btung ba 'dzin pa'o/ /drag mo khrag 'thung sha gsol ma/ /byang gi phyogs su gnas pa ste/ /kha
96b7(rgyud 'grel): dog ser dang dkar dang dmar/ /g+hi g+h+raM(rgyud 'grel): sa bon las byung ba/ /lcags kyu lnga yis gang ba yi/ /pad+ma'i snod ni mchog tu 'dzin/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gi gdan/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma/ /drag shung?
97a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ma mi sdug ma/ /phyag na 'jigs rung gtor ma'i snod/ /ku ru'i sa bon las byung ba/ /dmar dang ser dang nam mkha' i mdog /thod pa'i cod pan dag dang ldan/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung gi ni gdan/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam
97a2(rgyud 'grel): bar spras/ /thod ma rdo rje bum pa ma/ /lho yi phyogs su kun nas gnas/ /bat+tE li gsum las byung ba/ /thod par bza' dang btung ba bsnams/ /sngo dang dmar dang dkar po'i 'od/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gi gdan/ /dbang ldan du ni sgeg mo bzhag
97a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig sa bon las byung ba/ /kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes/ /dgu gnyis la ni yang dag brten/ /de yi g.yon gnas dri chab ma/ /dri yi dung dang yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dmar mo shin tu mdzes/ /hUM yig sa bon las byung ba'o/ /me ru gnas pa'i
97a4(rgyud 'grel): pi waM ma/ /pi waM de ni sgra yi mchog /hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i sa bon las byung ba/ kha dog dkar mo yid 'ong ma/ /de yi g.yon gnas me tog ma/ /thal mor me tog shin tu mdzes/ /sh+reM yig sa bon las ni 'khrungs/ /kha dog sngon mo kun nas 'bar/ /
97a5(rgyud 'grel): bden bral gnas pa'i klu ma ni/ /kha dog sngon mo kun nas 'bar/ /hUM hUM yi ge las byung ma/ /dkar po bskyod de glu len byed/ /de yi g.yon gnas bdug sbos ma/ /kha dog dmar mo yid 'ong ma/ /i yig sa bon las ni byung/ /phyag gis
97a6(rgyud 'grel): bdug spos snod ni 'dzin/ /rlung du gnas pa'i gar ma ni/ /kha dog dmar mo yid 'ong ma/ /hUM yig sa bon las byung ba/ /lag gnyis gar ni byed bzhin ma/ /de yi g.yon gnas mar me ma/ /kha dog ser mo kun tu 'bar/ /k+ShuM yig sa bon
97a7(rgyud 'grel): las 'khrungs ma/ /mar ma'i mchod sdod dang ni ldan/ /phyi rol zlum po'i gdan rnams la/ /keng rus la sogs dgod par bya/ /rang rang sa bon las byung ba/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung gis ni gnas/ /dpa' bo thams cad
97b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa yis ni thong du byas/ dbu skra ser po gyen du ldan/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na thod pa ste/ /g.yon pa yis ni lha mor 'khyud/ /phyag g.yas na ni kha TAM ga g.yon pas rtse gsum gyen du 'dzin/ /lha mo
97b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad phyag gnyis ma/ /kha dog sa bon 'od rnams mchungs/ /g.yas pa dpa' bo la 'khyud cing/ /lag pa g.yon na thong ba'o/ /shar du kaM yig las skyes pa/ /dkar min keng rus 'jigs byed de/ /kaM gi yi ge las byung ba/ /yum ni pad+ma'i dbyings
97b3(rgyud 'grel): can no/ /gnyis pa g.yas su pad dkar ma/ /kha TAM ga yi srin po ni/ /sa bon khaM yig las skyes pa'o/ /de yi 'phangs par sen rnon ma/ /khaM yig sa bon las byung ba'o/ /gsum pa g.yon gyis pad+ma la/ /gaM skyes sgra ni zab pa'o/ /de yi g.yon gyi bdag nas
97b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ kha dog dkar mo sgra zab ma/ /byang du dril bu'i rna ba can/ /gaM yig sa bon las skyes pa'o/ /de yi brla yi steng gnas pa/ /ser mo staM? skyes dril sgra ma/ /gnyis pa g.yas su dgod pa ni/ /tsam skyes gtum pa'i dbang phyug ser/ /de la 'khyud pa'i
97b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo yang/ /tsaM skyes pad+ma'i gdong pa ma/ /gsum pa g.yon gyi pad+ma la/ /ts+tshaM yig las ni ser ka'i gdong/ /de yi pad gnas ser mo ni/ /ts+tshiM skyes so yis 'dra la ba mo/ /nub tu kha dog dmar po ni/ /ming ni mdal skyes la dga' ba/ /dzaM yig sa bon
97b6(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa/ /de yi pang gnas dbyi mtho ma/ /gnyis pa g.yas kyi pad+ma la/ /dzhaM skyes dzhaM yig 'jigs par byed/ /de yi pad gnas dmar mo ste/ /ming ni dzha byed dga' ba mo/ /gsum pa g.yon gyi pad+ma la/ /sa bon Ti las chu skyar za/ /de yi 'phang
97b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas dmar mo ste/ /sa bon TiM las thor cog brgyan/ /lho yi dbus kyi pad+ma la/ /sa bon thi las bsgregs pa can/ /de yi pang gnas sngon mo ste/ /sa bon thams las dor stabs dga' / /gnyis pa g.yas kyi pad+ma la/ /sa bon DaM las cang te 'dul/ /
98a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi 'phad gnas yan lag sngo/ /rda yi sgra la dga' ba ma/ /gsum pa g.yon gyi pad+ma la/ /Dha skyes rnga chen ltad mo can/ /de yi 'phang gnas yan lag sngo/ /rnga bo che yi rol byed ma/ /dbang ldan g.yas kyi pad+ma la/ /taM skyes rtsod la
98a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dgad/ /de yi pad gnas ser mo ste/ /byin phra ma ste taM las byung/ /de yi g.yon gyi pad+ma la/ /sa bon tho las lag rings te/ /de yi pang du gnas pa ni/ /kha dog dkar mo g.yo sgrogs ma/ /me yis g.yas kyi pad+ma la/ /daM skyes mche ba gtsigs pa can
98a3(rgyud 'grel): de yi pang gnas dkar mo ni/ /daM las skyes pa'i 'od rno ma/ /de yi g.yon gyi pad+ma la/ /d+hi skyes brten pa 'jigs rung can/ /de yi pad par gnas pa ni/ /sngon mo'i 'od can dal smra ma/ /bden bral g.yas kyi pad+ma la/ /pi skyes zas la spyod byed ma/ /de yi pad par
98a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ni/ /'od sngon mig ni ser skya ma/ /de yi g.yon gyi pad+ma la/ /phuM skyes gdeng ni rgyas pa dgod/ /de yi pang par gnas pa ni/ /dmar mo'i 'od can mig rgyas ma/ /rlung gi g.yas kyi pad+ma la/ /paM skyes tshangs pa'i dbyangs can dgod/ /de yi spang
98a5(rgyud 'grel): du gnas pa ni/ /dmar mo gnyen gyi lus can ma/ /de yi g.yon gyi pad+ma la/ /b+hi ser 'jigs pa'i sgra can te/ /de yi spang na gnas pa ni/ /sa bon b+haM las bung sgra ma/ /sa bon haM skyes mkha' dbang ni/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba che/ /'khor lo ral gri
98a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa dung/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /ral pa'i cod pan yan lag mdzes/ /shar sgor khyab 'jug dgong par bya/ /de yi g.yas kyi ngos su ni/ /sa bon lam las dpal mo dgod/ /ser mo thod ni lhag par bcings/ /mi 'jigs pa
98a7(rgyud 'grel): dang chu skyes 'dzin/ /khyab 'jug g.yon du phag mo ste/ /baM yig las ni mngon par sprul/ /phag gi gdong can khros pa'i gzugs/ /thod pa'i cod pan gyis ni spras/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba tshe/ /ser bo'i gos ni 'dzin la dga' / /g.yon pa na
98b1(rgyud 'grel): ni thod khrag ste/ /g.yas pa yis ni mi mgo 'dzin/ /byang gi sgor ni tshangs pa ste/ /kha dog ser po 'bar ba che/ /oM yig sa bon las skyes pa/ /ral pa'i cod pan gyis ni brgyan/ /phyag bzhi ba la gdong bzhi pa/ /g.yon na pad+ma spyi blugs te/ /mchog sbyin dang ni bgrang
98b2(rgyud 'grel): phred yang/ /lag pa g.yas pa yis ni 'dzin/ /tshangs pa'i g.yas kyi ngos su ni/ /tshangs ma gser gyi mdog can te/ /sa bon baM yig las skyes pa/ /pad+ma dang ni rnga yab 'dzin/ /tshangs pa'i g.yon gyi ngos su ni/ /dbyangs can min sbyang khu'i 'od/ /sa bon sa yig
98b3(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa'i/ /g.yon gyi utpal gsar pa 'dzin/ /sa bon hUM daM shaM las byung/ /'byung po kha dog dkar zhing 'bar/ /dbang phyug nub kyi sgo ru ste/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /g.yas na ba dan cang te'u ste/ /g.yon na mdung dang thod pa'o/ /stag lpags
98b4(rgyud 'grel): ngos su ni/ /sa bon gaM byung gaM gA ma/ /dung dang kun da zla bar mtshungs/ /mchod sbyin dang ni chu skyed 'dzin/ /brgya byin lho yi sgo ru ste/ /sa bon shaM las yang dag byung/ /kha dog dkar po 'bar ba che/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas pa snying
98b5(rgyud 'grel): gar bkug pa yis/ /rdo rje rin chen gdugs 'dzin zhing/ /rin thang med pa'i cod pan mdzes/ /lag pa g.yon na utpa la/ /g.yon pas 'khyud de rol par byed/ /brgya byin gyi ni g.yas dngos su/ /dbang mo dkar mo maM las skyes/ /gdugs ni lag pa g.yas
98b6(rgyud 'grel): pa na/ /g.yon pas 'khyud de rdo rje 'dzin/ /brgya byin g.yon gyi ngos su ni/ /sa bon ti las thig le mchog /ser mo 'khril zhing mchod sdod g.yon/ /g.yas pa yis ni lcags kyu 'dzin/ /dbang ldan zur du dang po ste/ /ser po i las yang dag byung
99a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bkug snying gar rdo rje ste/ /g.yon bkug 'khyud cing rol par byed/ /bde byed ma ni bdag por mtshungs/ /dbang po'i g.yas su dgod par bya/ /de yi g.yon du raM las byung/ /rtsom pa mo ni sngo bsangs ma/ /skra ni man da ra ba 'phyad/ /
99a2(rgyud 'grel): lag pa na ni me long thogs/ /kum yig sa bon las skyes pa/ /me yi zur du lus ngan te/ /ser po 'khril shing ljon shing g.yas/ /g.yas na bi dza pU ra'o/ /lus ngan gyi ni g.yas ngos su/ /baM skyes nor gyi blo gros ser/ /g.yon pas 'bras kyi snye ma ste
99a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa yis ni mi 'jigs sbyin/ /lus dan gyi ni g.yon ngos su/ /'phrog ma ljang gu'i mdog can te/ /haM yig sa bon las skyes ma/ /mchog sbyin mya ngan med pa 'dzin/ /bden bral 'byung po'i rgyal po ni/ /sa bon khaM las yang dag byung/ /g.yon
99a4(rgyud 'grel): bas gi wang sdigs mdzub ste/ /g.yas pa yis ni dbyug pa 'dzin/ /zla phyed dang ni thong pas mtshan/ /spyan gsum gyi ni rnam par spras/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /khro bo yi ni tshogs dang ldan/ /'byung po'i g.yas kyi ngos su ni/ /
99a5(rgyud 'grel): lam skyes laM ka'i dbang phyug bkod/ /kha dog sngo bsangs 'bar ba che/ /thod pa'i cong pan gyen du brtsegs/ /lag pa g.yas na rtse gsum ste/ /g.yon pa na ni thong khrag go /khros pa'i gzugs can 'jigs pa che/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs
99a6(rgyud 'grel): can/ 'byung po yi ni g.yon ngos su/ /ram skyes khrag la dga' ba dgod/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar ba che/ /mtshan ma lang ka'i dbang phyug mtshungs/ /rlung du klu'i rgyal po ste/ /mgo bo rgya yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha dog dkar po 'bar ba che/ /?
99a7(rgyud 'grel): b+hu'i sa bon las sgrul zhing/ /lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin te/ /g.yon pas de bzhin zhags pa 'dzin/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rin po che'i thod kyis brgyan/ /de yi g.yas kyi ngos su ni/ /dpal ldan longs spyod ldan ma ni/ ?
99b1(rgyud 'grel): mo sa bon b+haM las byung/ /g.yas ba na ni rda yab ste/ /g.yon bkug 'khyud cing rol par byed/ /'o ma 'dzin la nges par blta/ /gdengs ka gsum gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi g.yon du u las byung/ /utpal dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /kha dog dmar mo 'bar
99b2(rgyud 'grel): ba che/ gdengs ka gsum gyis rnam par spras/ /lag ba g.yas na utpal te/ /g.yon pa pus mor 'phyang ba yi/ /de yi phyi rol zlum po'i zhing/ /dpa' bo bcu drug re mig ste/ /de la shar sogs re mig la/ /'jig byed dkar min yan lag sogs/ /thams cad
99b3(rgyud 'grel): ro gdan shes par bya/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /rtse gsum rnal 'byor snod dang ni/ /kha TwAM ga dang thig le'i lag /dkar min yan lag kha dog gnag /shar gyi re mig rnam par gnas/ /g.yon gyi ngos gnas mya ngan med/ /ser po'i 'od can rdo rje
99b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /dbang ldan 'jigs rung shes bya ste/ /kha dog ser po 'bar ba che/ /g.yon nas rna ba mthong ba can/ /dmar mo rtse gsum 'dzin par byed/ /gtum po byang gi re mig la/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar ba che/ /g.yon gyi ngos nas bde byed ma/ /ser mo'i 'od
99b5(rgyud 'grel): can rin chen 'dzin/ /sdud byed 'jigs byed dmar mo ste/ /rlung gi re mig la shes bya/ /rlung shugs ma ni g.yon du gnas/ /rgyal mtshan ljang gu 'dzin par byed/ /sgra sgrogs nub kyi re mig la/ /kha dog ser po 'bar ba che/ /g.yon gyi ngos su sgyu ma che/ /
99b6(rgyud 'grel): lag na zhags ba dkar po'i 'od/ /smyo byed bden bral re mig la/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba che/ /g.yon gyi ngos nas 'bar ma ni/ /du ba'i mdog can ral gri 'dzin/ /thong can lho yid mig la/ /kha dog ser po 'bar ba che/ /g.yon gyi ngos su dpal
99b7(rgyud 'grel): chen mo/ /nag mo dbyug pa 'dzin pa la/ /khro bo me yis re mig la/ /kha dog sngo bsangs 'bar ba che/ /g.yon gyi ngos gnas nag mo ni/ /sngon mo mdung thung 'dzin pa ma/ /stobs chen la sogs dpa' bo rnams/ /ro yi gdan la yang dag gnas/ /
100a1(rgyud 'grel): kha TAM ga dang rnal 'byor snad/ /kham phor dang ni gri gug 'dzin/ /shar gyi zur mdza' i re mig la/ /stobs chen kha dog dkar po'o/ /de yi g.yon du rab dang ma/ /ser mo zas ni 'dzin par byed/ /gshin rje'i ngos mdza' i re mig la/ /dril
100a2(rgyud 'grel): bu chen po'i dbang phyug gnag /de yis g.yon gnas aM pi ka/ g.yas pas kun nas gtor ma 'dzin/ /gshin rje bden bral dag gi dbus/ /sngon po ming ni tog gi rtse/ /de yi g.yon du ser skya ma/ /sngon mo til ni 'dzin pa can/ /nub kyi g.yas
100a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi re mig la/ /pi bi ta ka kha dog dmar/ /de g.yon lha mo rtsub mo ma/ /dmar ba'i 'od can chang ni 'dzin/ /nub kyi g.yon gyi re mig gnas/ /dmar mo gsang ni brtsegs pa yi/ /de g.yon rna par reg pa ma/ /dmar mo pa dan lnga ni 'dzin/ /
100a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi zur mdza' i re mig la/ /ser bo ming ni sgrogs pa can/ /g.yon gnas skra ni brtsegs pa mo/ /ser po'i 'od can khrag ni 'dzin/ /nor gyi phyogs mdza' i re mig la/ /ser po'i 'od can tshig legs brjod/ /g.yon gnas rig byed la 'jug
100a5(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /ser mo'i 'od can sha 'dzin ma/ /shar gyi zur mdza' i re mig la/ /dbang phyug rgyal mtshan ser po'i mdog /g.yon gnas dmar mo rgan byad ma/ til dang 'bras ni gsal bar 'dzin/ /de nas gzhan yang brjod par bgyi/ /bla ma rnams kyi man
100a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag las/ /rgyad chen po yi rjes 'brang nas/ /du khrod rnams ni ji bzhin rim/ /shar gyi gdan ni bum pa'i dbyibs/ /drag tu gzhad par gyur ba ste/ /thod pa nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams/ /de la shing ni tsam ba ka/ /sbrin ni nges par sgra sgrogs pa/ /rkang pa
100a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha ngan pa rgyu/ /de la nor rgyas bu ni ser/ /grub pa'i ral gri ce spyang ste/ /tshangs pa chen mo dang par gnas/ /thod pa'i thig le 'thung bar byed/ /g.yas pas bgrang phreng 'dzin pa ste/ /g.yon pa na ni po ti 'dzin/ /de la ro ni lhun po ste/ /kha
100b1(rgyud 'grel): dog sna tshogs 'bar ba che/ /mchod rten kun pa'i mdog tu 'gyur/ /chu klung rgya che yi ni tsha/ /bcud ldan dang ni rje rigs ma'o/ /byang du chu lha shes par bya/ /gang na ni gru bzhi pa rnams te/ /thod pa rnams ni nyi shu bzhi/ /ri bo ser po ma la ya/ /'ug pa ro dang stag dang
100b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'dab chags dang ni sgrub pa po/ /mchod rten dkar dang tsu ta'i shing/ /'jog bo dkar po char ba 'bebs/ /drag mo khyu mchog bzhon pa can/ /mdung thung dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /thig le'i snod ni gtsang ma 'dzin/ /chu klung bcud ldan gting mi rtogs/ /kha Sh+Tha ki
100b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nub kyi phyogs su nye rgyal ma/ /gdan ni gzhu yi dbyibs su'o/ /thod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/ /sprin ni a shot+tha 'joms pa/ /gsar ba'i ro dang phag pa dang/ /de la stobs rgyu bcud len grub/ /ke la sha dang mchod rten dkar/ /chu klung ming ni ne rany+dza/ /dkar mo glang
100b4(rgyud 'grel): po la zhon pa/ /g.yas pas rdo rje dkar po 'dzin/ /lha mo'i g.yon pas gdugs 'dzin cing/ /thod pa'i thig le ster zhing blta/ /ke wa Ta nI/ gshin rjer kaul+la gi ri shing/ /kar por ser po'i mdog /gdan ni zung gsum dbyibs su ste/ /thod pa rnams ni bco
100b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad do/ /steng du drag po'i tshogs rnams te/ /sa 'og pad+ma man dar/ /chu klung zla ba'i cha dang ni/ /seng ge phag dang ma he gnas/ /nya ni lcags kyus 'dzin pa'o/ /thod khrag bdud rtsi ster zhing blta/ /chang 'chod ma ni blta bar bya/ /dbang ldan de wi ko Ta ste/ /
100b6(rgyud 'grel): de la gdan ni zlum po'o/ /thod pa bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /bya rgod 'ol pa de bzhin phag /pad+ma chen po gang ba dang/ /ro langs 'byung po'i dngos grub ste/ /de la ri bo dbang chen po/ /mchod rten dkar pos nye bar mtshan/ /gtum mo gri gug mgo
100b7(rgyud 'grel): po 'dzin/ /ro langs kyang ni yongs su gnas/ /thod ba'i thig le ster zhing 'dzin/ /chu klung ming ni gang ldan no/ /d+ha nu ba ri dar sha naM/ /me yi mtshams su tsi ra twaM/ /gdan ni gru bzhi pa yin te/ /thod pa rnams ni bco lnga'o/ /ka rany+dza shing sgrog
101a1(rgyud 'grel): byed sbrin/ /khyi dang gcing byed gyen du 'bar/ /ril bu snod dang bcas pa ste/ /dung skyong chu klung drag shul can/ /ri bo spos kyi ngang ldang do/ /gzhon nu ma dang mchod rten dmar/ /rma bya yongs su gnas pa'o/ /thod pa nas ni thig le ster/ /lha
101a2(rgyud 'grel): mos mdung thung mda' chen 'dzin/ /bra hma tI'o/ /srin po'i zur du rgyal ba mo/ /'khyil pa dang ni ni mi pa'i shing/ /gdan ni dung gi rnam pa ste/ /de la thod pa drug ni sbyar/ /dom dang rkang mgyogs dngos grub po/ /rigs ldan dang ni mdung gis 'bigs/ /
101a3(rgyud 'grel): ri bo gangs ni brtsegs pa dang/ /chu klung ming ni stobs ldan no/ /gzigs gnas khyab 'jug sngo bsangs la/ /thod pa nas ni thig le ster/ /dbyug pa 'khor lo g.yon dang g.yas/ /mchod rten dmar pos rnam par sbras/ /d+ho bi nI da rsha naM/ rlung gi zur du
101a4(rgyud 'grel): rab sbyor ba/ /gtum po'i 'o ma 'thung bar byed/ /de la gdan ni pad+ma'i dbyibs/ /thod pa rnams ni bcu dgu ste/ /ro langs hu lu hu lu dang/ /bod bu byi la khung bur 'jug /mchod rten sngo bsangs mdog tu 'gyur/ /de la dpal gyi ri bo che/ /seng ge
101a5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas rgan byed ma/ /sngon mo thod pa'i bdud rtsi ster/ /lag na ral gri rtse gsum ste/ /chu rlung tsar man dang ni ldan/ /ma taM ga nI darsha ni/ /drag po nag po dkar min shar/ /rgan byas ma sogs 'khor gyis bskor/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar
101a6(rgyud 'grel): dang sngo/ /g.yon bskor gyis ni yang dag gnas/ /byang du drag po chen po ser/ /rgyal ma la sogs pa yi bskor/ /ser dang dmar dang sngo dang dkar/ /g.yon skor gyis ni yang dag gnas/ /nub tu lha byin mnyam du sten/ /nag mo bzang mo sogs
101a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskor/ /dmar dang gnag dang dkar dang ser/ /g.yon skor gyis ni yang dag gnas/ /lhor ni nag po dmar po'i mdog /dbang mo la sogs yongs su bskor/ /sngo dang dkar dang ser dang dmar/ /g.yon skor gyis ni yang dag gnas/ /dbang
101b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan gnas su bcigs pa ni/ /kha dog dkar dang seng ba can/ /sum cu dbang sogs lha mo ni/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang sngo/ /sreg za'i gnas su 'jig byed ni/ /kha dog dkar dang sngo ba can/ /lha mo drag mo'i gzugs can sogs/ /sngo dang dkar dang ser dang

101b4(rgyud 'grel): ni ldan/ /kun la ro dan shes par bya/ /mi yi dus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can gzi brjid can/ /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par sbras/ /tshig 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor
101b5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis ni/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor blta bar bya/ /sngar brjod kho na'i cho ga yis/ /thams cad du ni lha rnams dang/ /khyad par 'jig rten pa rnams la/ /dgug pa la sogs pa rnams bya/ /zla ba'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas/ /gi wang dri gsum gyen du sgreng?
101b6(rgyud 'grel): dri ma gsum pa'i chogs kyis ni/ /gsum par 'gi bang dgod par bya/ /oM A karSha ni hUM phaT/ 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang/ sngags so/ /lha rnams spyan drangs nas gdan dbul bar bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis ni sbyar byas nas/ /pad+ma'i rnam par
101b7(rgyud 'grel): dbye bar bya/ /oM ti Sh+Tha A sa ne hUM swAhA/ gdan gyi phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /snying gar rdo rje dkar po bsam/ /zla dkyil dbus su blta bar bya/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams/ /rdo rje bcing ba las 'byung ste/ /g.yon pa khu tshur snying gar bya/ /g.yas pa

104a2(rgyud 'grel): ra gA traM ye dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ oM b+hi ma nA da dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ oM b+h+ra ma ra ke shI ni dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM/ ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ rdo rje bsngams pa brtan bcings nas/ /'khor lo'i rnam par
104a3(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bya/ /oM badzra na rA ya na dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ oM badzra la k+Sh+mI ye dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ oM bA rA hI dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ thal mo sbyar ba bcings nas ni/ /mgo bo'i steng du bzung bar bya/ /
104a4(rgyud 'grel): oM prahma Na dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ oM brahma Ni ye dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ oM sa ra swa tI ye dri sh+ya ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ rdo rje thal mo snying gar bcings/ /pad+ma'i snong bzhin rab tu dbye/

107b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub ste/ /nyi ma'i lag pas dbyug pa 'dzin/ /oM khA dA ni hUM phaT swAhA/ nyi ma'i lag pas rtse gsum ste/ /g.yon pa na ni thod khrag go /oM lad+gA Sh+rye swAhA/ nyi ma'i lag pas thong pa'o/ /oM rk+Sha pra yA ya swAhA/ nyi ma'i lag pas mtshag sbyin

107b6(rgyud 'grel): par ? yan lag brgyad bsrung zhing/ /lus gsum byin gyis brlab par bya/ /mngon par dbang bskur cho ga ni/ /byas te dar gyi cod pan gyis/ /lag 'thil mnyam pas mnyes par bya/ /rnal 'byor la ni mnyam par bzhag /mchod yon le sogs
107b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du/ /blo ldan sgeg mo segs kyis mchod/ rdo rje de nyid kyis ni bzung/ /dril bu chos kyis bzung bar bya/ /snying po yi ni phyag rgya chen/ /de yi nga rgyal brjod par bya/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ku? che
108a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems ma so so'i ma/ /rdo rje'i de nyid do/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du
108a2(rgyud 'grel): gsal/ /oM badzra g+ha N+De ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ tsit+ta sny+tso dA ni badzra stwa h+ri da ya/ /ba ho sha re Ni pradz+nyA par mi ta nA da/ swa b+hA wi ta A/ hUM hUM hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): Takgi dza(rgyud 'grel): ho/ dril bu'i de nyid do/ /rdo rje de nyid cung zang gsor/ /snying gar bkug nas sbyar bar bya/
108a3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu bkur ni sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid bsgoms nas dkrol bar bya/ /dpal ldan sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /zhal gsum rnams so sgeg pa dang/ /khro dang bzhad pa spyan gsum rnams/ /nor mchog inda ni la'i 'ong/ /sku ni shin tu drag shul can/ /
108a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni bla med drug po yis/ /kha TwAM ga dang snod dang mnga' / /gzhu dang rdo rje dril bu ste/ /mtshan ma drug gis mtshan pa 'dzin/ /ha ha'i sgra sgrogs nyin byed ni/ /rna ba yi ni gcod par byed/ /srid pa las ni rnam grol yang/ /thar pa'i dngos po ster
108a5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed/ /khyod ni rdo rje ye shes mchog /mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs la 'ang du/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i sku lus ni/ /deng nas zhi ba'i kha dog 'dzin/ /kha TAM ga dang lhan cig mchog rnal 'byor thod pa 'dzin pa can/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgya mtsho rgya mtsho che'i/ /
108a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs des par 'phrog par byed/ /khyod ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ khyod kyi zhabs la phyag bya'o/ /dpal ldan rin po che'i sku/ /kha dog shin tu yid 'ong lus/ /kha TwAM ga ni 'dzin byed cing/ /bdud rtsi mchog gis gang ba'i snod/ /sems can sdug
108a7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal can gyi lus/ /mang po rnams ni dbugs dbung byed/ khyod ni mkha' 'gro drag mo ste/ /khyod kyi zhabs la phyag bya'o/ /dpal ldan chos kyi sku yi mchog /gzugs mdzes pad+ma rA ga'i sku/ /kha TwAM ga na gyen du ste/ /rnag gis gang ba'i
108b1(rgyud 'grel): thong pa 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun gyi sring pa yi/ /'ching ba rnams ni gcod par byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ro langs ma/ /khyod kyi zhabs la phyag bya'o/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i las kyi sku/ /don yong gzugs can mar gang mdog /drag po mi yi kha TwAM ga/ /
108b2(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig du ni thod pa 'dzin/ /srid pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs/ /'ching ba rnams ni gcod par byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni gtum mo ste/ /khyod kyi zhabs la phyag bya'o/ /dpal ldan seng ge stag mo mchog /ce spyang ma dang 'ug pa ma/ /kun
108b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang sdig mdzub zhabs pa ste/ /sdang ba rnam par 'joms par byed/ /kha TwAM ga dang lcags kyu ni/ /g.yas pa yi ni phyag gis 'dzin/ /dgra stas gdug pa can rnams gtubs/ /phyag gi dbyug ba mchog tu 'dzin/ /srid pa'i spyod ba thams cad dang/ /
108b4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal rnam par 'joms pa dbyed/ /khyod ni sgyu ma'i gzugs can te/ /khyod ni zhabs la phyag bya'o/ /khyod ni mam mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog /mar me ma dang 'jib byed ma/ /'phrog byed ma rnams sa gzhi skyong/ /drag shul gyi ni gzugs can ma/ /gdul
108b5(rgyud 'grel): dka' gdug pa can rnams dang/ /pha rol rigs sngags rnams 'joms byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs kun 'dud/ /sgeg mo yid 'phrog ma dang ni/ /yid 'ong phreng ba glu mas ni/ /legs sbyar glu ni sgrogs par byed/ /gar ma yan lag shin tu
108b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyen/ /me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /bdug spos gyen du 'thul bar byed/ /ye shes snang ba mdzes pa yi/ /mar me dang ni dri zhim dri/ /brtson 'grus dbang po gsang ba'i mchog /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo/ /rnal 'byor rjes su
108b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dang/ /shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /dam pa'i sku dang gsung thugs la/ /rtag tu gus shing rab dang bgying/ /dpal ldan gsang ba'i gdan mchog la/ /mtshod pa byas shing phyag bgyi'o/ /dpal ldan de nyid rgyal po
109a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog /dbang phyug la rol cod pan can/ /dpal ldan gsang ba'i gang na gyi mchog /sku ni sdug cing 'bar ba ste/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu'i sgra/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i bskyod/ /dpal ldan ye shes mnyes pa ste/ /mchog
109a2(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang phyug longs spyod sbyong/ /zhes pa dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin no// //de nas las kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /mnyam par gzhag pas sdags bzlas bya/ /snying gar sa bon yi ge bsam/ /srog dang rtsol ba yang dag ldan
109a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen por brjod pa yis/ /lha rnams thams cad ji gzhin rim/ /sdags kyi dngos grub thams cad byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yis ni gsungs/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor bla na med/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' i lus la gnas/ /rim pa ji bzhin sbyor
109a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /legs par mnyam par gzhag ste bskom/ /dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /dpal ldan drag mo mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /ro langs ma ni rna bar gnas/ /gtum mo mig gnyis dag la bzhag /mgrin par lha mo seng ge ma/ /stag mo dpung pa
109a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la gnas/ /snying gar lha mo ce sbyang ma/ /lte ba'i phyogs su 'ug pa ma/ /sen mar lha mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /lag pa'i dbus su mar me ma/ /lha mo 'jib byed so la'o/ /lha mo 'phrog byed gsang bar gnas/ /spos ma 'gro lding gtum mo rnams
109a6(rgyud 'grel): lus dag sems kyis thig le la/ /drag mo khrag 'thung sha za ma/ /spyi dang brla gnyis la ni dgong/ /drag shul 'bar ma mi sdug ma/ /rtsas pa d+hU tI'i rtsa gsum ma/ /thong can rdo rje bum pa ma/ /dung can la sogs rtsa gsum la/ /sgeg mo snying
109a7(rgyud 'grel): ga'i phyogs su gnas/ /dri yi lha mo nu ma'i bar/ /mgrin pa'i phyogs gnas pi wang ma/ /me tog ma ni spyi bor dgong/ /glu ma lce yi phyo gsu gnas/ /bdug spos ma ni gsang gnas dgong/ /gar ma lag gnyis shes par bya/ /mar
109b1(rgyud 'grel): me ma ni mig gnyis dgod/ /khyab 'jug tshangs pa la sogs rnams/ /rtsibs rus ba spu'i khung bur gnas/ /phyogs rnams su ni rlung bcu ste/ /bgrong pa yi ni ji bzhin rim/ /keng rus 'jigs byed la sogs rnams/ /de nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ste/ /dkyil
109b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yongs rdzogs thams cad kyi/ /lha rnams rang phyogs brtag par bya/ /sngar brjod kho na'i rim pa yis/ /mchod yon la sogs ji bzhin ram/ /sgeg mo sogs kyi rnam pas mchod/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bstod par bya/ /dga' ba'i mthu dag thugs
109b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje can/ /khyod kyi spyan gyis de gzigs so/ /yi ge dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/ /stong pas rol pa de yin no/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba'i/ /dbus ni rnam par shes bya ste/ /yi ge thams cad bcom byas nas/ /lhag ma med par rnam par bsam/
109b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i sbyar ba yis/ /rol pa dang ni bcas par bya/ /gnyis med chos ni brnyes 'gyur na/ /thar pa yang ni brnyes par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i bde bas ma rmongs shing/ /thar pa yang ni gtang bar mdzad/ /thams cad rang bzhin rnal
109b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma/ /sngags dang gar dang byed pa bzhin/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas te/ /de ni de bzhin nyid du mtshon/ /sna tshogs mang du gzugs sbrul pa/ /sems can rnam par smin byed la/ /rdo rje kun rtogs don byed de/ /chos nyid 'di la ma rmongs na/ /
109b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma yi thar pa 'di/ /chos kyi sing por phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin no/ /dngos kun rnam par dag don du/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM su bi shud+dtya d+ha rmA tA swa b+hA wo haM/ oM a A A swAhA/ de nas
109b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i las bya ste/ /lta rnams mchog tu mnyes par bya/ /pad+ma'i snong sogs dag pa ni/ /zas la sogs pas gang par bya/ /sdags ni yi yig las skyes rlung/ /sa bon raM las skyes pa me/ /yig gsum mi mgo'i sgyed bu gsum/ /a yig la
110a1(rgyud 'grel): ni pad+ma'i snod/ /zas la sogs pa der gnas pa/ /hUM buM AM nri(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin khaM/ suM k+ShuM yuM yi ger skyes/ /de yis byin gyis brlabs par bsam de'i rjes suAng ha(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dri dang nus pa'ang 'phrog /rlung gis me ni
110a2(rgyud 'grel): sbar ba yis/ /yi ge rnams ni zhu bar bsam/ /kun nas aM yig sa bon skyes/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan rnam par bsgom/ /de yi dbus gnas de nyid las/ /'od zer rgya cher spro bar bya/ /de yi bdud rtsi bkug nas ni/ /de nyid du 'ang ltung bar
110a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /yig gsum zla ba'i gzugs rnams kyang/ /de nyid du ni lhung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid hUM skyes kha TwAM ga /'og tu kha ni phyogs pa bsgom/ /lha rdzas mchog gi bcud ldan pa/ /'bar bzhin par ni yid kyis bsgom/ /nag po drag po la sogs
110a4(rgyud 'grel): kun/ rgan byad ma la sogs pas bskor/ /'jigs byed zhing skyong rnams dang ni/ /rab dang ma sogs yang dag ldan/ /sngar brjod pa yi rim pa yis/ /sngags pas mdun du gnas par bsam/ /sa bon 'od zer lcags kyu nag /sngags dang phyag rgyas
110a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyan drangs bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur brtag bcings te/ /rgyab dang rgyab kyis sbyar bar bya/ /sa gdugs pad+mar bkris nas ni/ /'gi bar gyen du bsgreng bar bya/ /dkar po bskum ste cung zad bskyod/ /lha rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /sngags
110a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang oM ku ru ku ru sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /zla ba'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas/ /gi baM dri gsum gyen du bsgreng/ /dri ma gsum pa'i chig rnams kyis/ /gsum bar 'gi baM dgong par bya/ /A krSha ni hUM phaT/ oM kakak nha na b?  d+ha na kha bdu
110a7(rgyud 'grel): da na sarba duSh+Ta na ha na ha na/ /g+hA ta ya g+ha ta ya/ /a mu ka sye/ i dam kA rya sA d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /mchog yon zhabs bsil la sogs dang/ dam tshig phyag rgya 'ang blta bar bya/ /rdo rje bcid ba nang byas nas/ /du ba dri gsum rtse mo
110b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /dkar po 'gi bar bskum pa ni/ /mdung gi rnam par bzung ba ni/ /dkar ma ni yan lag la sogs pa'i dam tshig phyag rgyar thub pas gsungs/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): b+he ra we b+hyo DaM sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sam sya stwaM sa ma yo haM rdo thal mo brtan byas nas/ /thod pa bzhin du
110b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dbya/ /zhi ba la sogs dam tshig brjod/ /phyag rgya 'di ni thub pas gsungs/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): pI tha a ba s+thi ta/ yo gi nI dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwA/ sa ma yo haM/ stobs chen la sgo phyag rgya 'di/ /sems ma rdo rje ma las byung/ /sa
110b3(rgyud 'grel): gdugs pad+ma gyen bsgreng ste/ /ye shes rnam shes gyen du bsgred/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): k+She tra pA le b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ rab dang ma sogs lha mo rnams/ /sems ma rdo rje'i cho gas bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): k+She tra a ba s+thi ta/ yo gi nI/ dri
110b4(rgyud 'grel): sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ nyi ma zla ba brkyang nas kyang/ /'jigs dang rnam shes yang dag sbyar/ /nag po drag po la sogs pa'i/ dam chig phyag rgyar 'di gsungs so/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): lo ka pA le b+hyo/ /dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwA/
110b5(rgyud 'grel): sa ma yo haM/ pad+ma dang ni ye shes sbyar/ /lhag ma gyen bzhag mdung tung ste/ /zla ba'i lag par thod pa gnas/ /rgan byad ma sogs rab tu grags/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): shama shA na a ba s+thi ta yo gi nI dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma yo haM/ de nas nyer
110b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod lnga rnams kyis/ /phyi rol lha rnams mchod par bya/ /sgeg mo la sogs rnams kyis kyang/ /de bzhin nyi shus mchod par bya/ /'di yi sdags kyang nyi shu ste/ /mchod pa'i rjes su rim pa bzhin/ /pi wang gling bu zangs dung dang/ /mkhar rda
110b7(rgyud 'grel): bsil yab rgyal mtshan dang/ /phaT ha dang rda rda dang/ /gdugs dang bla re bdan dang/ /gar dang bzhad dang sgegs pa dang/ /khro dang drag shul 'jigs rung dang/ /snying rje dang ni snying stobs rgyun/ /rmad byung chos ni brtan pa'o/ /sngags 'dis pi wang la
111a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs mtshon/ /zla ba gri gug ltar byas nas/ /pi wang gyen du rnam par bsgreng/ /nyi ma'i lag pas cung zad gsor/ /pi wang de ni sgra yi mchog /kha yi g.yas kyi ngos su ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i lag gnyis gnas/ /de dag dbyug
111a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyen du bzhag /gling bu ma yi mtshan nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje bcing ba brtan byas nas/ /sa gdugs pad+ma rtse mo sbyar/ /kha yi 'og tu bzhag par bya/ /'di ni zangs dung mtshan nyid do/ /zla ba yis ni 'khar rda bzung/ /nyi ma yis kyang dbyug pa ni/ /
111a3(rgyud 'grel): lag pas bzung nas brdung bar bya/ /'di ni 'khar rnga'i mtshan nyid bshad/ /nyi ma'i lag pas g.yob par bya/ /'di ni bsil yab du ni grags/ /rgyal mchen g.yas kyis ngos su ni/ /zla ba nyi mas gzung bar bya/ /zla ba nyi ma lag gnyis kyis/ /
111a4(rgyud 'grel): phaT ha ni brdung bar bya/ /zla nyi'i lag pas brdung bar bya/ /'di ni rdza rnga'i phyag rgyar bshad/ /zla ba'i khu tshur brtan byas nas/ /de nyid 'gi wang gyen du bzhag /nyi ma'i lag pas bkab pa ni/ /gdugs kyi phyag rgyar rgyal pas gsungs/ /gi baM
111a5(rgyud 'grel): dri ma gsum pa dang/ /du ba ma dang dkar po 'ang brkyang/ /de yis bla re'i rnam pa ni/ /bla re'i tshul du bre bar bya/ /zla ba'i khu tshur brtan bcings nas/ /dbyug pa bzhin du gi bang bsgreng/ /dkar po du ba dag gis bskor/ /ba dan du ni rgyal bas
111a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /g.yas pa'i rkang pa'i phyogs su ni/ /zla ba'i lag pa 'phang bar bya/ /nyi ma'i lag pa gyen du ste/ /gar ma'i rnam par rab tu gnas/ /nyi ma'i lag pas brkyang nas ni/ /dkar po ye shes phreng par bya/ /kha yi rtse mor legs par
111a7(rgyud 'grel): bzung/ /'di ni bzhad pa'i mtshan nyid brjod/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas ni/ /pus mo brla yi steng du bzhag /sgeg pa la sogs nyams kyis mdzes/ /g.yon gyi ngos su rol par bya/ /zla ba nyi ma'i lag gnyis ni/ /mda' ni 'phen par
111b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i mchog /khro ba'i phyag rgyar kun nas bshad/ /bla na med pa'i rgyal bas gsungs/ /rdo rje bcing ba brkyang nas ni/ /rtse mo sa la bzhag par bya/ /de yi nga rgyal yang dag ldan/ /drag shul phyag rgya'i rnam pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur brtan byas nas/ /
111b2(rgyud 'grel): gi wang kho na gyen du bsgreng/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas ni/ /thal lcag dang ni yang dag ldan/ /hUM gi yi ge mnyam par brjod/ /'di ni 'jigs rung phyag rgyar bshad/ /nu mal ni reg cing sbyar/ /snying rje'i phyag rgyar de bzhin no/ /kun nas 'khyud pa'i
111b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bya/ /snying stobs rgyun gyi ming can no/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo bcings pa ni/ /rmad du byung ba'i chos bstan pa'o/ /thog mar dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /lce la rtse mo gcig pa ste/ /bdud rtsi 'gugs pa yi ni rwa/ /hUM skyes rdo rjer bsgom par
111b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rdo rje khu tshur brten byas nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /sa gdugs pad+mas dkris nas ni/ /dkar po 'gi baM sbrel par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /lha rnams mnyes par byed pa'i mchog /oM bat+ta li bat+ta li sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti
111b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): oM b+hak+Sha bak+Sha sarba yo gi shwa ri hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas ni/ /pad+ma ye shes kyis ni mnan/ /gtor ma'i snod la reg nas ni/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub gyen du bsgreng/ /oM shing cig dang ni dur khrod dang/ /ri bo dang ni ri sul
111b6(rgyud 'grel): phub/ grong gi ngos dang lam dang zhing/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang/ /snod dang thad dang sa stongs dang/ /khyad par gdol ba'i khyim na gnas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lhas byin mnyam du brten pa dang/ /dang po gtsigs dang 'jigs byed dang
111b7(rgyud 'grel): dga' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byad ma dang drag mo dang/ /'jigs byed lha mo dbu mas bstod/ /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal nyid dang/ /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor
112a1(rgyud 'grel): ma/ dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag mo sdang mo 'chang ba mo/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug ma/ /g.yo ldan ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs
112a2(rgyud 'grel): ma thod chen mo/ /thod phreng phreng can kha TwAM ma/ /sprul che ral gri dgra sta ma/ /rdo rje'i lag can de bzhin gzhu/ /rdo rje chen po bde ba che/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po che/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin
112a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa po/ /rdo rje'i dbang mo bka' yis ni/ /thams cad kun nas 'dir byon cig /kha kh+khA da na sarba du Sh+Ta na ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+ha ta ya/ a mu ka se/ i daM ka rmaM sA d+ha ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ /
112a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas nyer spyod lnga rnams kyis/ /mnyam par bzhag ste mchod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung gyur pas/ /lha rnams thams cad mnyes par bya/ /deng bdag sems dpa' chen po mchog /dga' ba chen po mgu ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje
112a5(rgyud 'grel): snyems ma'i bdag po'i bdag /thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' stobs po che/ /kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i mchog /bdud ni gsod cing 'joms par byed/ /kun tu khros shing byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu 'khrungs/ /mchog
112a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes rdo rje hUM mdzad de/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor bu'i 'od/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'dod dang thar pa'i nor che ba/ /lus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste/ /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /brtan pa yi ni mchog tu gsal
112a7(rgyud 'grel): shin tu phra dang spom pa'i tshogs/ /g.yo ba yi ni rab mchog brnyes/ /srid pa 'khor ba sbyor mdzad pa/ /thog ma tha ma bar ma med/ /thams cad kyi ni thog mar gnas/ /snying po phyag rgya rnal 'byor dang/ /mchod chen de nyid dam tshig nyid/ /
112b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khro bo khro ba che/ /gsal bar smra ba ster ba po/ /gdug pa'i mchog ni 'dul ba che/ /drag shul gzugs can 'jigs par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che/ /chos dang las dang stobs che ba/ /dam tshig dam pa'i las kyi lam/ /byang chub
112b2(rgyud 'grel): sems ni rnam sbyor byed/ /thams cad dag pa'i pad+ma che/ /shes rab thabs kyi nor che ba/ /'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /sna tshogs chags pa'i dbang phyug che/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas rtag pa'i don/ /sems can kun gyi stobs chen po/ /dpal
112b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'byor pa 'byor pa'i rgyal/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal khyod la bstod cing 'dud/ /khyod ni bstod cing phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bdag nyid dad pas khyod la 'dud/ /deng bdag rdo rje sems 'grub mdzod/ /zhes pas dril bu
112b4(rgyud 'grel): dgrol par bya/ /zhes pa gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /sngar bzhin mchod pa thams cad kyis/ /khyad par du ni mchod par bya/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis kyang/ /lan gsum brjod par gsol/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma/ /khyad par du ni mkha' 'gro
112b5(rgyud 'grel): mas/ /sngags dman pa bya ba dman/ /de kun bzod par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa byas nas gdan rnams kyang/ /thams cad lus la gnas par bya/ /bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin du/ /gtum pa rnams kyang tshim par btung/ /bdud rtsi'i snod ni
112b6(rgyud 'grel): mas/ /sngags dman pa nga rang? bya ba dman/ /de kun bzod par mdzad du gsol/ /mchod pa byas nas gdan rnams kyang/ /thams cad lus la gnas par bya/ /bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin du/ /gtum pa rnams kyang tshim par btung/ /bdud rtsi bsdod ni
112b7(rgyud 'grel): bkang nas ni/ /nyi ma'i lag par bzhag par bya/ /rnam shes ming med dag gis ni/ /sngags pa yis ni bsrung bar bya/ /de la 'di ni gsang sngags te/ /oM ha(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI hUM A(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa rnams/ /bye brag du ni rnam pa lnga/ /zla
112b8(rgyud 'grel): bar snod ni yang dag bzhag /nyi ma'i lag pas sbyang bar bya/ /de la 'di ni gsang sngags te/ sh+riM hUM g+h+ruM AM(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ las kyi rdo rje cho ga shes/ /lcags kyu'i snod ni dbul bar bya/ /tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mdun 'gro bas/ /de nyid ldan pas
113a1(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya/ /pad+ma'i snod ni bzung nas ni/ /bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis rab tu dgang/ /tshigs bcad sngags dang phyag rgya brjod/ /ngo bor kun la dbul bar bya/ /'di rnams chos rnams bzang por ltos/ /'dus pa rnams la the tshom
113a2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /bram ze khyi dang gdol ba rnams/ /rang bzhin cig pa nyid du rol/ /de ltar rnam rig rnal 'byor pas/ /pad+ma'i skor ba sngon du bya/ /nyi ma yi ni pad+ma bzung/ /zla bas rdo rje sbyar bar bya/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas bzung ste/ /tshig bcad 'di ni brjod
113a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /bde gshegs chos la rin thang med/ /'dod chags la sogs dri ma spangs/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bral ba/ /de kho na nyid gus phyag 'tshal/ /deng nas bzung ste rnal 'byor bdag /legs par mnyam gzhag bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma'i lag
113a4(rgyud 'grel): par dgong pa ni/ /sa bon yum gcig 'ong 'phro ba/ /yi ge nyid 'gyur gsang sngags ni/ /thig le dang ldan kun nas 'bar/ /zla phyed dang mtshungs snod dbus su/ /zla ba'i dngos po dang 'dra bar/ /oM yig dbus su dgod par bya/ /rnam pa lnga yis rnaM par
113a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /ming med mthe bod rdo rje yis/ /yi ge rnams ni bsrub par bya/ /spos ma la sogs sngags gsum gyis/ /lha mo gsum rni rnam par bsgom/ /de yi lce yi rtse mo dang/ /snying ga spyi po dpral bar dbul/ /phyi nang ji ltar bde bar bya/ /gzhan
113a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan la'ang blta bya zhing/ /de ltar gzhan dang gzhan tshim bya/ /tha mal brgyal mi bya zhing/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /lha rnams dran par bya ba mchog /ji ltar 'dod bzhan gnas par bya/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams/ /
113a7(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe dus su gshogs gsol bya/ /spyang bar bya ba'i las gang zhig /gtor ma snod du bsams nas ni/ /nyer spyod lnga yis mchod par bya/ /dang po dri la sogs pas mchod/ /kha ni bdud rtsis bkang nas ni/ /snod kyi nang du blugs par bya/
113b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /dkar po gi bar bsgred bar bya/ /de yi rtse mo gnyis bskul nas/ /kha yi ngos su bzhag par bya/ /sa gdugs pad+ma'i sor mo gnyis/ /kha ru bcu ga ste bzhag par bya/ /dud sol ma yi phyag rgya che/ /sdang ba thams cad
113b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs par byed/ /oM ku ru ku ru pat+tA li/ /mahA bt+tA li/ sid+d+hi mu khaM sma shA ni ba si ni phre ta mu khe/ ru d+hi ra pri ye/ tsaN+DNa ka rA lI ni sa ma yo rak+Shi te/ yo ge oM par/ ki li ki li/ ki li rA be/ pri dri ba na/ ma d+hye b+ha nyja ha b+ha k+Sha ha/ sa ha ga na du ta/
113b3(rgyud 'grel): d+hu mI ga ri/ tiShtha swa ku ru ku ru/ grih+Na? hUM hUM hUM/ sarba du Sh+Te ni b+ha k+Sha b+ha Ta/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ phreM phreM/ phriM phaT swAhA/ /bzhi mdo dang ni gshin rje'i nags/ /ri dang shing gcig chu klung cher/ /nyer spyod lnga yis mchod nas ni/ /
113b4(rgyud 'grel): se gol gsum ni gdab par bya/ /oM khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /khyed cag bde dang ldan gyur
113b5(rgyud 'grel): cig /sems can thams cad nad me dang/ /gang gi lam gyis 'gro ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni myur thob shog /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis bgrol/ /de ltar rjes su brtse bzhin pas/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos
113b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bgyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag ste/ /nyi ma'i lag pa brkyad nas sa la bzhag par bya'o/ /oM gats+tsha gats+tsha/ /b+hur b+hu wa na spa(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes brjod nas 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jigs
113b7(rgyud 'grel): rten pa rnams ni/ /oM sarba du Sh+Ta na/ grih+Na grihta/ gats+tsha pu nA rA ga ma nA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes brjod de/ se gol gsum brdabs nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /zhes pa gdan bzhi chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las phyud ba/ /bdag gi gdan/ dpal
114a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor nam mkha' i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga /bla ma dam pa rnams kyi man ngag ltar shin tu rgyas par bkod cing/ /sgrub thabs 'bring po dang bsdus pa yang shugs la rtogs par 'gyur bas rmad du byung ba'i gdams pa 'di ni/
114a2(rgyud 'grel): bal po'i paN+Di ta chen po dza ga tA nan+ta dzI ba b+ha dras mjed pa rdzogs so// //sgrub thabs 'di nyid dang mthun pa'i bka' lung sngon chad bod du mi snang ba las/ dza ga tA na n+ta'i sras kyi thu bo/ paN+Di ta ma hA bo d+hi las legs par mnos shing/ /
114a3(rgyud 'grel): bka' lung mi 'chad par bya ba'i don du/ paN+Di ta'i phyag nas rgya dpe gdan drangs shing/ /bka' lung don du gnyer ba mang pos kyang gsol ba 'debs pa'i don/ /gsung rab dgongs 'gral dang bcas pa'i bka' lung man ngag du mas nye bar spras pa'i
114a4(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa bla ma 'phags pa'i bkas bkul ba la brten nas/ khams gsum gyi bla ma dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo chos gyi rje/ bod kyi paN+Di ta ma ti d+hwa dza sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i bka' 
114a5(rgyud 'grel): drin gyis bskyangs pa'i lo tsa ba'i ming tsam 'dzin pa dpal ldan smra ba'i seng ges tshig dang don gyi cha la legs par dpyad nas/ dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur pa'o// //ye shes dbang phyug mi bsgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /
114a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ dz+nya ne shwa ri sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ /ye shes dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid mchog /ye shes dbang phyug phyag 'tshal nas/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes
114a7(rgyud 'grel): 'drangs te/ /bdag gis de'i sgrubs thabs bshad/ de la thog mar gnang ba thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ g.yas pa'i lag mthil la a rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /sdigs 'dzub la sogs pa'i sor mo rnams la/ /suM k+ShuM yuM hUM a/ rim pa
114b1(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par byas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin du g.yon pa'i lag mthil du sa'i rnam pa/ /sdigs mdzub la sogs pa'i sor mo la/ /smryuM hmryuM ymryM k+Sh+mryuM saM/ zhes pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms la pad+ma bsam par bya'o/ /'di
114b2(rgyud 'grel): ni lag ba sbyang bar bya'o/ /de nas mgrin par h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom la/ lce'i 'dab mar hUM las rdo rje de'i dbus su oM a(rgyud 'grel): dza hwi saM brta ni hUM phaT zhes pas lce dag par bya'o/ /oM hUM swUhA(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas arg+haM dang gtor ma'i
114b3(rgyud 'grel): snod la phyag rgya dang bcas pas lan bdun mdon par sngags te/ g.yon phyogs su bzhag la/ de'i chus thams cad kun la gsang gtor bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings te dbu ma gnyis brkyang ba ste/ khab ltar byas la oM hUM phaT/ zhes
