114b4(rgyud 'grel): pas gnas srung bar bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/ mthe bong gnyis bcings la/ /gshog pa bzhin du byas la bskor nas snying gar bzlog te bkod pa ni bdag bsrung ba'o/ /oM hUM swAhA/ zhes pas so/ /rdo rje bcings nas dbu ma brkyang ba ni
114b5(rgyud 'grel): khab kyi phyag rgya bzhin du bcas nas bskor ba byas la dra ba dang ra ba la sogs par bya'o/ /oM Da Tu swAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi sdigs mdzub gnyis bzlog ste/ snyid ga dang rgyab dang mgo bo rnams kyi go cha ste lan gsum bya'o/ /oM badzra tu Sh+ya ho/ zhes
114b6(rgyud 'grel): pas mnyam pa'i thal mo dgyes par byas la/ de'i mdun du 'og nas 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom ste mchod par bya'o/ /oM sh+riM swAhA/ lag pa brkyang ste mthe bod dang mdzub mo sbyar bar byas pa ni me tog gi'o/ /oM hUM swAhA/
114b7(rgyud 'grel): lag pa brkyang ba ni dri'i 'o/ /oM kaM swAhA/ lag pa brkyang te dbu ma bsgreng ba 'dug pa'i 'o/ /oM k+ShuM swAhA/ /bu tshur bcings te mthe bong bsgreng ba ni mar me'i 'o/ /oM g+huM swAhA/ lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/ dbus su mthe bong rab tu bskyod pa ni
115a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dbul ba'o/ /de nas pad+ma bsgyur ba sdon du 'gro ba thal mo snying gar bzhag ste/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): te hUM na ma mi hUM/ na mo na ma(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pU jo pas+thA nA ya A t+ma NAM ni ryA ta ya mi/ oM A tsA rya pU jo pas+thA nA ya At+ma
115a2(rgyud 'grel): NAM ni ryA ta yA mi/ oM sa ka la satwa ba ri trA NA ya At+ma NAM nirya te yA mi/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma ya ho ho ho zhes so/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /thams cad theg pa gsum la yang/ /sbyor ba gsang ba
115a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro dang/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag chen dang/ /khyad par du ni slob dpon la/ /rtag tu skyabs su bdag mchi'o/ /bdag la dgongs shig thams cad kyis/ /rnam snang mi bskyod pa rin chen mchog /
115a4(rgyud 'grel): snang mdza' dang don yod gyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba bdag /dus 'di nye bar bzung nas su/ /byang chub chen po thob pa'i bar/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /mchog tu bdag gi bskyed par bgyi/ /ji ltar
115a5(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum mgon po yis/ /byang chub nyid du nges byas bzhin/ /tshul khrims rnam gsum bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang/ /sems can don bya tshul khrims gsum/ /so sor bdag gis brtan por bzung/ /sangs rgyas chos
115a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dge 'dun dang/ /bla med dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog /sdom pa sangs rgyas rnal 'byor skyes/ /dang po de ring gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /so sor de bzhin nyid du gzung/ /rdo rje chen po'i rigs mchog la/ /slob dpon
115a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid du gzur bar bgyi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba yi/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i rig mchog la/ /nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bgyi/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag la/ phyi nang gsang
115b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan pa la/ /ji ltar nus pa mchod pa'i las/ /las gyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /de bzhin nyid du so sor bzung/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /mchog tu bskyed pa byas nas
115b2(rgyud 'grel): su/ sems can thams cad don byed phyir/ /sdom pa ma lus bzung bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma byin pa dbugs byung ste/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la mgod/ /de nas
115b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying khar k+ShuM gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba bsgroms pas/ /rang gi lus la sogs pa 'jig rten stongs par bsgom par byas la/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med par bya'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ sarba d+ha rma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ zhes brjod do/ /de'i
115b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhis bskul ba'i bdag nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /dza dza dza dza rdo rje sems dpas gshegs pas bdag po la khyod kyis dngos grub ster ba/ ha ha ha ha hUM yig mgon po dam tshig bdag po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ba ba ba
115b5(rgyud 'grel): ba rdo rje gshegs pa'i gsang ba las/ byung sku 'dzin pa/ a a a a ho gu hya'i rdo rje A li gcig tu thim pa'i hUM/ de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te/ oM dz+nya na a haM zhes brjod par bya ste/ de'i steng du a la sogs pa'i yi ge las byung ba'i zla ba'i
115b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor yang mdun du blta bar bya'o/ /de'i dbus su hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje'i lta ba la sa bon de nying gnas pa bsgom mo/ /oM badzra shud+d+ha/ sarba d+ha rma badzra shud+d+ho haM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang ldan
115b7(rgyud 'grel): pa byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don byas te slar yang zhugs te sngags kyi nga rgyal bya'o/ /oM wa rta ma no a haM ho/ zhes pas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma bsgom par bya'o/ /rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ /zhal gsum pa dang/ phyag drug pa dang/ spyan gsum
116a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ seng ge'i gdan gyi steng na/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/ sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ sku mdog sngon po/ sbrul gyis brgyan gyis brgyan pa/ /'jigs par byed pa/ skra grol ba/ spyi bor thod pas
116a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ dbu la sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa/ bzhad pa dang/ khro ba dang/ sgeg pa'i zhal can/ na bza' dmar po bsnams pa/ gtsigs shing bzhad pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag na/ kha TwAM ga dang dgra sta dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dang dril bu dang
116a3(rgyud 'grel): lhung bzed dang/ ral gri 'dzin pa/ 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ rang bzhin gyi rdo rje sems dpa' la 'khyud par bsgom mo/ /de nas oM ud b+ha bo a haM A A aM hUM srA hA/ zhes brjod do/ /oM yo ga shud d+ha sarba b+harma yo ga shud+d+ho hoM/ rdo
116a4(rgyud 'grel): rje gsor la/ oM dz+nyA na ka yo haM zhes rgya la bya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung dang/ mthe bong sbyar te/ lhag ma brkyang la ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas/ suM k+ShuM yuM hUM lce dang spyi bo dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ mig tu'o/ smryuM hmryuM ymryuM k+Sh+mryuM mgrin
116a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dpung pa dang/ snying ga dang/ lte ba ru yi ge brjod cing byin gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /oM badzra ka ya ho/ /oM badzra b+ha k+She a(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra tsat+ti hUM zhes pas lus la sogs pa byin gyis brlab po/ /oM sa ma yo haM/ hUM hUM/ sa ma
116a6(rgyud 'grel): ya stwaM/ a d+hi ti Sh+Tha maM/ zhes pa lag pa gnyis ka'i mthe bod dang/ mthe'u chung sbyar la lcags sgrog ltar byas la/ lhag ma gsum brkyang ste gung mo khab ltar byas la/ snying ga dang/ mdzod spu dang spyi bo dang/ mgrin pa ru byin
116a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab po/ /oM hUM A(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ rdo rje bcings te/ mdzub mo dang gud mo gnyis ka brkyang ste/ gung mo khab ltar byas la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan te/ spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas lngar bzhag par bya'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad
116b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ las kyi mgon po rnams/ dkar po dang/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang gu'i sku mdog go/ byang chub mchog dang/ sa gnon dang/ mchog sbyin dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/
116b2(rgyud 'grel): skyabs sbyin gyi tshul gyis mngon du bzhugs pa ji lta bu bzhin du bsgom par byas la/ /oM hUM swAhA/ zhes pas rdo rje dang/ oM h+rI swAhA/ zhes pas dril bu bzung bas nga rgyal dang bcas pas dkrol bar bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od
116b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhabs gnyis snang bar mdzad/ sku la shin tu dam du 'khyud pa'i dril bu las byung sku 'dzin la/ g.yo zhing 'phros pas gsang ba'i gsang ba las byung pad+ma gnyis/ /de 'di rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dbang phyug daM pa'i chog gi gnas/ zhes brjod
116b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ mchod pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyis mdon par mchod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la/ yuM k+ShuM suM hUM gi sa bon las rlung dang/ me dang/ chu dang/ sa'i dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa dang/ gru gsum pa dang/ zlum po dang/ gru bzhi'i rnam pa rim bzhin
116b5(rgyud 'grel): du bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i steng du/ hUM suM hUM zhes pas ri rab bsam par byas la/ /oM hUM swAhA/ zhes pas rdo rje lag par brkyang ste/ gnas lngar brdabs rin chen bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su zla ba'i
116b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor seng ge'i gdan lngas nye bar spras pa/ gdugs dkar po dang yang dag par ldan par blta'o/ /dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan la pad+ma byin gyis brlabs pa lag /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM gi rnam pa/ de las rdo rje de la yang hUM gi rnam pa/
116b7(rgyud 'grel): ......de las gong du gsungs pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'og nas 'byung ba'i 'khor lo rim par bsam par byas la/ so sor dbugs las byung par bsaM
117a1(rgyud 'grel): mo/ hUM zhes pas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don byas nas slar 'ong ste/ dbus su gnas pa bsam par bya'o/ /suM gyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ k+ShuM gis drag mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /yuM gis ro langs
117a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma/ /hUM gis gsum mo'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /de rnams dbugs phyung ste/ sems can gyi don byas nas/ /ye shes dbang phyug ma'i mdun dang/ g.yon dang/ rgyab dang/ g.yas phyogs su rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /dkar po dang/ ser
117a3(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po'i dang sku mdog go /kha TwAM ga dang rnal 'byor gyi snod 'dzin pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang pad+ma'i gdan la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa'o/ /spyan gsum pa/ skra grol pa/ na bza' dmar po bsnams
117a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya'o/ /smryuM gis seng ge ma'o/ /hmryuM gis stag mo ma'o/ /ymryuM gis lce sbyang ma'o/ /k+Sh+mryuM zhes pas 'ug pa ma'o/ /rim pa bzhin du dbang ldan dang/ me dang/ bden bral dang/ rlung du glang po che'i gdan dang/ ma he'i
117a5(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang/ klu'i gang na la dkar zhing ser pa dang/ dkar zhing sngo ba dang/ sngo zhid dam ba dang/ dmar zhing ser pa'i sku mdog dang/ g.yon sdib mdzub dang/ zhags pa g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang lcags kyu/ sems dpa' i skyil
117a6(rgyud 'grel): mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma phuM/ 'bar byed ma pheM/ 'jigs byed ma phroM/ phrog byed ma phri zhes pa shar dang/ byang dang/ nub dang/ lto phyogs kyi sgo bzhir ro'i gdan la bzhugs so/ /lag pa gnyis khar bcug nas rab tu rgod pa
117a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ thal mo spyi bor 'dzin pa dang/ skud pa dmar po ltar snyim pas khrag 'thung ba dang/ snying gar gnas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang gtun shin 'dzin pa'o/ /thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba can dbu skra grol ba/ dkar po
117b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu'i mdog tu 'dug pa'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams bsgoms la/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ g.yon pa snying khar bzhag ste/ g.yas pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mchan khung du bcug ste/
117b2(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM swAhA/ zhes dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o/ /oM a swAhA/ oM A swAhA/ oM A swAhA/ oM aM swAhA/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ dbu ma brkyang nas rtse sprad par byas pa ni/ yais lha mo rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings nas sprad pa ni rdo lha mo'i
117b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe rol tu brkyang par byas pa ni/ drag mo lha mo'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe chung gnyis brkyang pa ni ro langs ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las dbu ma brkyang ba ni gtum mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /de rnams kyi sngags ni rim pa
117b4(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /oM ri swAhA/ oM rI swAhA/ oM li swAhA/ oM lI swAhA/ dbang ldan gyi seng ge ma la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ sdigs mdzub brkyang ba ni rtse mo sprad par byas pa ni/ mtshams kyi
117b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bzhi'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM phuM swAhA/ oM pheM swAhA/ oM phraM swAhA/ sgo skyong rnams kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /rim pa de bzhin du rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya ni/ lag pa gnyis khar bcug nas ha ha zhes rgod pa dang/ spyi bor thal mo sbyor
117b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ lag pa sbyar te kha dbye bar byas pa gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag pa ste/ hUM hUM zhes brjod pa dang/ lag pa bskor zhing sor mo sprad la gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag la/ sngon du gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i sngags dang/ phyag rgyas
117b7(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol tu mchod pa rgyas par mchod par bya ste/ gong nas gsungs pa'i sngags dang/ phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu blangs la/ rdo rje gsor zhing tshigs bcad 'di brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje gsor ba'i gzi brjid kyi/ /sems can thams cad rnam thar byed/ /
118a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi bye brag grol ba yis/ /rdo rje snying po gzung ba'o/ /zhes pas rdo rje blangs te/ mthe chung lcags sgrogs tu byas te/ rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar la sdigs mdzub gnyis bsgreng ste/ oM badzra g+haN+Da ra Ni ta drar Ni ta sarba bud+d+ha
118a2(rgyud 'grel): pra tsa li te pra dz+nyA pa ra ma hA nA nga swa b+ha be na/ sarba bud d+ha h+ri da yA a wa to Sha ni hUM hUM hUM ho ho ho swAhA/ zhes pas dril bu blangs te/ de nas dril bu bsil la/ hUM gi glu yi rnam pa yi/ /bde ba'i thugs ldan rdo rje can/ /bdag gis mig gis de mthong ngo
118a3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/ /stong pas rgyas pa de bzhin no/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba'i/ /dbus ni rnam par shes byas te/ /yi ge thams cad 'joms byas nas/ /'dis ni shin tu bsam pa ni/ /phan tshun 'khyung nas sbyor
118a4(rgyud 'grel): ba las/ /bgying bag tu ni 'di bya'o/ /gnyis med chos ni rnyed gyur na/ /mya ngan las 'das 'di thob po/ /'khor ba'i bde ba ma rmongs na/ /de ni mya ngan las 'das pa/ /rang bzhin kun gyi rnal 'byor ma/ /gar byed smyo ba bzhin du 'di/ /
118a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas te/ /de ni de bzhin nyid du brtag /sna tshogs mang du gzugs sprul pa/ /sems can rnam par smin byed des/ /'khor ba bde ba'i don byed de/ /chos nyid 'di la ma rmongs na/ /rnal 'byor ma
118a6(rgyud 'grel): yi thar pa 'di/ /chos kyi snying po phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can grol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /kun tu bdag nyid ngo bor gcig la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rmongs pa gcod la bstong phyag 'tshal/ /
118a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi rtag tu de bzhin nyid gcig bstong phyag 'tshal/ /de'i rjes la gtor ma'i snod bza' ba mdza' dag gis ldan par byas te/ nya sha rlon pa dang/ sha yang dag par ldan pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang lcags kyu lnga lhan cig pa mdun du bzhag ste/ rdo rje lag
118b1(rgyud 'grel): pas reg la/ /lha mo kun gyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyis so sor zhi ba'i las la sogs pa la brgya phrag gcig lhag pa'i grangs kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pas mchod par bya ste/ oM g+hu swAhA/ zhes pas rtsa ba'i sngags
118b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas gtor ma'i phyag rgyas gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas A li dbul bar byas te/ de las rim pa ni 'di'o/ /pad+ma'i lag skor sngon du 'gro bas g.yas par pad+ma la gnas pa'i snod bsam par bya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje phyar ba/ steng
118b3(rgyud 'grel): du bzung la/ oM ha ho ??(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pa sngon du phyag rgya chen po bstan par bya'o/ /g.yas par rnal 'byor gyi snod/ /A lis bkang ba bzung la/ /g.yon pa'i lag mthil la/ saM gi rnam par dkar po la/ /A li'i rnam pa bcu drug gis yongs
118b4(rgyud 'grel): su bskor ba bsam la/ /snod la dgab par byas la bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du/ A li blta bar bya'o/ /hUM gis rnam pas mthe bong sa gzhir byas la/ srin lag la suM gi rnam par ldan pas ri rab du bsams la/ bsrub par bya'o/ /mgrin
118b5(rgyud 'grel): par mchod rten rnam par bsgoms la/ thigs gtor gsum dbul lo/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs la gsum gsum dbul lo/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad la/ thigs gtor gsum dbul lo/ /pi tsi a so hi i/ d+harma mu na hi saM
118b6(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ba na me su/ bahma na kuk+ka ra tsiNSha khu e k+ku swAhA/ beh+kha ngchu zhes brjod nas/ oM ha ho h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas dbul bar bya'o/ /oM b+ha k+Sha b+hak+Sha sarba yo gi shwa ra hUM hUM hUM dzuM swAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas la/ /rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya
118b7(rgyud 'grel): srin lag gnyis dang khro bo gnyis/ /lcags sgrogs dag gis rnam par bya/ /gtor ma dang/ A li'i mchod pa gzung bar bya'o/ /ji ltar bde bzhes brjod par bya'o/ /mchod pa rab 'byam thams cad kyis mchod la/ bstod pa yang bya ste/
119a1(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ badzra shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho haM/ yo ga shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho haM/ zhes thal mo snying gar bzhag ste/ bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu gru gsum dkyil
119a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dmar po'i mthar/ lnga pa lnga'i phyi rol gyi lha nyid phyogs brgyad du bsgom par bya'o/ /ro'i gdan la gnas pa mkha' 'gro dang/ gtum mo lnga rtsegs gsum dang/ thod pa 'dzin pa nag po drag po drag chen po la sogs pa yang g.yas kyi phyag na
119a3(rgyud 'grel): thod pa bsgoms par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya/ /mthe chung gnyis ni dkri bar bya/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /sdigs mdzub g.yas par spyan drang ngo/ oM ku ru ku ru sa ma ya/ a d+hi pa ti
119a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pa 'dis dmar po nye bar spyod pas/ mchod par bya zhid mchod pa nyi shu pas mchod do/ /hUM gi glu'i rnam pa bya zhing pad+ma'i lag bskor bya zhing/ sgeg mo la sogs pa dang/ pi bang dang/ gling bu dang/ sil snyan dang/ dud
119a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bud pa'i tshul dang/ pa Ta ha'i tshul dang/ rdza rnga'i tshul dang/ sbrang yab kyi tshul dang ger gyi tshul dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi tshul dang/ bla re'i tshul dang ba dan gyi tshul dang/ gdugs kyi tshul dang/ khro ba dang/ 'gyur ba dang/ 'khyud pa dang/
119a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal ba dang/ de rnams kyi rnam pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu blangs la bstod pa yang bya'o/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad mtshams ci rigs par kun la bstan par bya'o/ /yon gyis glor gtor ma'i snod bzhag ste/
119a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas sdigs mdzub bsgrengs la/ g.yon pa ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas gtor ma'i tshigs bcad lan gsum brjod la brtan par bsngo bar bya'o/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang/ ri dang brag dang phyug gis/ yul gyi 'jab
119b1(rgyud 'grel): dang lam dang zhing/ /khyad par du ni khrim stong la/ /snod dang thang dang sa stong la/ /khyad par gdol ba'i khyim gnas pa/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lhas byin mnyam du bsten pa dang/ /nag po tsigs byed 'jigs byed pa/ /dga' ba 'das pa bgegs
119b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po/ /rgan byad ma dang drag mo dang/ /'jigs byed ma dang dbu mas bstod/ /rgyal mo rnam pa rgyal mo dang/ /thub chen gzhan gyi mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzad mo nag chen mo/ /nag spom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /nag mo
119b3(rgyud 'grel): sdang pa laM ba ki/ /'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed yul gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen ma/ /mche ba gtsigs ma thod can ma/ /thod phreng phreng ba kha TwAM ma/ /sprul gyi ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu
119b4(rgyud 'grel): lag dang/ /lha yi dbang phyug ma rnams ni/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi de nyid dang/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed pa'i/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen mo/ /gos med sbyor ba skyed byed
119b5(rgyud 'grel): ma/ rdo rje dbang phuyug ma bka' yi/ /thams cad thams cad 'dir spyon cig/ oM kak+ka Dha na/ ba bbnd+d+ha na/ kha kh+khA da na/ sarba duSh+Ta na ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka sa/ i daM ka ra ya/ sA d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes brjod pas
119b6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar las kyis rjes su 'brangs na bskul bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bdud rtsis kha bkang ste/ 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po yid la bya ste/ khyed kyis nges par sngon du dgos par gyis shig /ces sbyar bar bya'o/
119b7(rgyud 'grel): kha'i chu'i rnam pas rnal 'byor ma de rnams kyi kha bkang bar bsgom par bya'o/ /gong du gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzung bar bya ste/ oM swa b+hA ba bzhes pa la sogs pa brjod do/ /mgon po sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su chags pa'i/
120a1(rgyud 'grel): a li kA li'i sbyor ba byas te/ bde ba chen po'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i bdud rtsi lngas bdag nyid mchod par bya'o/ /phan tshun 'khyud pa'i sbyor ldan pa'i/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni brgyan pa 'di/ /mgon po'i lus la mdzes
120a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku/ /dngos las grol la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /hUM hUM hUM de ni dbyangs so/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu blangs te gsil la bstod pa bya'o/ /dpal ldan skal bzang kun tu bzang po chen po dang/ /mnyam med ye shes kyi gnas de bzhin gshegs
120a3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po/ /phyag mtshan drug gi brgyan pa'i phyag na dri med sems can dag/ dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+mar 'dud/ /de yi yan lag dang 'brel bde pa chen po'i byang chub brnyes/ /sgeg dang khro dang bzhad pa'i de kho
120a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyid sku/ /in+d+ra nI la dang mtshungs 'bar ba'i mdzes pa'i sku/ /dpal ldan ye shes mkha' 'gro khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+mar 'dud/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs nyid chu las byung ba dag pa'i sku/ /spyan dkyus ri rab gsal zhign snying rje rgyan
120a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan/ /kha TwA ga dang bdud rtsis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs kyi pad+mar 'dud/ /'od kyi rang bzhin sa bon nor bu'i rigs las byung ba'i dri med lus/ /phyag gis khu tshur gyis mi kha TwAM ga dang
120a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i snod/ /drag po'i char gyi rgyun dang bral bas sa steng tshim mdzad pa'i/ /dpal ldan drag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs kyi pad+mar 'dud/ /chu las skyes pa'i bzhin du de ni dbugs kyis thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /phyag mtshan kha TwAM gis mtshan
120a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dzin cing/ /skye bo rmongs pa'i the tshom jes par sel mdzad pa'i/ /ro langs mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs kyi pad+mar 'dud/ /las kyi rjes su byed pa'i me'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i lus/ /kha TwAM gas mtshan bde snod
120b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis mtshan/ /sha za gtum po'i tshogs kun phye mar rab tu rlogs/ /gtum mo'i mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs kyi pad+mar 'dud/ /dpal chen seng ge 'ug pa mo ni mang po'i hUi sgrogs nga ro can/ /dpal ldan stag mo ce sbyang mo yang skye ba'i rim
120b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'dug pa 'joms/ /zhags pa lcags kyu sdigs mdzub bsnams pa'i phyag /khyed kyis pad+ma'i zhabs la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpal ldan mkha' 'gro rab mchog 'bar byed 'jib byed ma/ /'phrog byed ma ni rtag tu mnyam med dngos
120b3(rgyud 'grel): grub ma la ster /gdul dkar 'dul bar mdzad pa'i sems kyis bdag nyid rgyal/ /khyed gyi pad+ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi/ /zhes so/ /de'i rjes la snying gar thal mo bzhag ste/ /smon lam gdab par bya ste/ /sems can thams
120b4(rgyud 'grel): cad skyon med cing/ /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /gang gis lam la 'gro ba yi/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur cig /ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir/ /rnal
120b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gtsug lag bdag gis bgyi/ /oM zhes brjod la/ oM ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can phan par mdzad pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang yul du gshegs su gsol/ /zhes brjod cing
120b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ snying gar bzhag la g.yas pa'i lag pa brkyang las la bzhag ste/ oM A t+ma tiSh+Tha swAhA/ zhes pa gshegs su gsol/ /rang gi dbus kyis rang gi lus la thim par bya'o/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
120b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mo ni/ /snying ga dang/ lce dang spyi bo dang/ rna ba dang/ mig tu rim pa ji lta pa bzhin du zhugs par bya'o/ /seng ge ma la sogs pa ni mgrin pa dang/ dpung pa dang/ snying ga dang/ lte bar ro/ /sgo bsrungs bzhi ni g.yas dang g.yon gyi
121a1(rgyud 'grel): bla dang rje ngar gnyis su rim pa bzhin du/ yi ge'i gzugs su ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya dgod par bya'o/ /oM sarba duSh+Ta gri h+Na? grih+na gats+tsha hUM phaT/ zhes pas se gol gsum gyis phyi'i lha gshegs su gsol/ /de nas phyi dang
121a2(rgyud 'grel): nang gi mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod pa rgyas pas bdag nyid mchod par bya ste/ lhag ma'i gtor ma nyid dbul bar bya'o/ /oM ku ru ku ru bat+ta li mhA bat+ta li/ dur khrod bdag mo dngos grub zhal/ /gtum mo gtsigs byed yi dags la/ /dam
121a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig dam tshig bsrung ma khrag dga' mo/ /kA li'i sgra sgrogs sbyor zin ma/ /dur khrod ro yi tshal dbus na/ /tshogs dang pho nyar bcas pa ru/ /gtsigs byed gtum mo dung sel ma/ /gsol cig bzhes cig dam tshig lha/ /gnas nas gnas su
121a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /bdag gi sems la ci 'dod pa/ /de ni khyod kyis grub par gyis/ /hUM grih+Na grih+Na sarba duSh+Ta nAM g+hak+Sha phroM phroM phriM phaT swA hA/ zhes pas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis mche ba'i tshul gyis kha'i grwar bzhag la gshegs su
121a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol lo/ /srang ka'i dbus su khas blugs par bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i gtor ma lho phyogs su bzhi mdor blugs par bya'o/ /lha'i nga rgyal gyi gzugs kyis gnas par bya'o/ /gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas bdag nyid sbyor ba
121a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdzogs par bya ste/ bdag nyid mchod par byas la/ /dang po bum pa'i lha gon du gnas pa'i rim pa bzhin du bya'o/ /bla ser la sogs pa'i bum par rim po che lnga dang/ sman dang 'o ma dang lha rten gyi chus bkang ba la/ /ba lak+Shas
121a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan par bya'o/ /las kyi rjes su 'brangs te gcig gam gsum 'am lnga'am/ dgu'i rim pas grangs bzhin du ku shi'i chun po la 'khor bzhin du byas pa'i steng/ mdun du bzhag par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi lha mo la sogs pa'i ming
121b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o/ /ji ltar ring gi phyag rgya dang sngags kyi mchod pa lngas nye bar mchod de/ /phyag byas la oM dUM swA hA/ zhes pa la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /ji ltar gnas par mdun du gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas oM hi li hi
121b2(rgyud 'grel): li ki la bet+tA li hUM phaT/ zhes pa'i chus kun nas bsar gter bya'o/ /oM sh+rI swA hA mar sbyang bar bya'o/ /oM oM swA hA/ /sna'i la snags ma spyad par bya'o/ /oM dzri swAhA/ 'bru sbyang ba'o/ /oM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ 'bru la sogs pa sbyangs pa'o/ /oM a
121b3(rgyud 'grel): swA hA yaM shing sbyang ba'o/ /so sor brgyad brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ dbu ma khab ltar byas pa'i phyag rgyas oM hUM swAhA/ zhes pas me tog blangs te dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas snod rnams su rdzas blugs te/ g.yas phyogs su
121b4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg rdzas/ /g.yon du rdo rje dang dril bu sngon bzhin du bsngags te/ gtor ma'i snod dang an+ta'i snod bzhag par bya'o/ /ku shi'i bdud pa dang lhan cig pa yis/ /bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i chu yis/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa
121b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas la bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas mdun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ sna tshogs pad+ma la gdugs dkar pos brgyan pa der hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i hUM de nyid blta'o/ /de nas las dpal ye shes mkha' 'gro ma bsgom par bya'o/ /seng ge'i
121b6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis pa las dang rjes su mthun par kha dog rgyan gyis brgyan pa g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon par dril bu blta bar bya'o/ /rang gi snying gar hUM bsams
121b7(rgyud 'grel): la rang gi dbugs las dz+nyA na DA ki hUM zhes pas byung ste gcig tu gyur nas/ oM hUM swAhA ces pas g.yas na byug pa g.yon na thong pa bsdaMs brtsa ba'i phyag rgya bstan par bya'o/ /oM badzra prA ka ra hUM phaT zhes pas lag pa g.yon pa kha phyir bstan/ g.yas pa kha nang
122a1(rgyud 'grel): du bstan te/ brkyang la dbang ldan nas bskor ba ni/ ra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM dzuM swAhA/ lag pa gnyis brkyang ste phan tshun bsnol ba ni dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM bruM swA hA/ zhes g.yon pa khu tshur bcas te mthe
122a2(rgyud 'grel): bong brkyang nas sa la btsugs pa ni phur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rim 'dis mchod par bya ste/ oM badzra gand+he swAhA/ /dri'i 'o/ oM pushpe ma le hUM swAhA/ me tog gi'o/ oM trI k+Sha Na dI pe hUM swA hA/ mar me'o/ /oM d+hu pe shwa ri hUM swA hA/ bdug
122a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dbul bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa phyed brkyang ba ni dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe bong dang mdzub mo ma sbyar ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur bcings la mthe bong bsgreng ba ni mar me'i 'o/ /de nyid la gung mo bsgreng ba 'dug pa'i 'o/ /de
122a4(rgyud 'grel): nas bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i mdun du 'bar ba'i snod kyi me bzhag la/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags khro bo dang bcas pas bzlas par bya'o/ /g.yas pas sdigs mdzub byas g.yon pas tsha ba'i mar khu byugs pa'i
122a5(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar sngas lag pa g.yas bsdigs mdzub bcas g.yon pas sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /oM gyis dbyung zhing bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i chus bsang gtor bya'o/ /sngon bzhin du
122a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa yang byas la/ /de'i rjes la khrus brtsams pa ni lha'i lus la dri zhim po'i bye brag gis khrus kyi cho ga bzhin du dri zhim po dbul bar bya'o/ /oM hUM suM k+ShuM yuM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bas lan bdun du ba dan gsum pa'i phyag
122a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya ma reg par bya'o/ /dung dang rnga'i sgra dang bkra shis kyis glu sna tshogs pa'i dbyangs blang zhing dril bu gsil bar bya'o/ /bkra shis kyi tshigs bcang brjod cing chu'i rgyun sgrang par bya'o/ /dri zhim po'i mar khu dang dri ma med pa'i chu dri zhim
122b1(rgyud 'grel): po/ sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma dang me tog gi chus rim pas khrus bya'o/ /khrus byas nas khrus rab bsal la las dang rjes su mthun pa'i ras zung zhig dbul bar bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /bzung ba ni chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM hUM swAhA/
122b2(rgyud 'grel): gos nye bar dbul ba dang/ rgyan la sogs pa dang/ mchod pa'i tshogs dang sgra yang rnam par dbul lo/ /de nas oM ha na ha na kro d+ha hUM phaT/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste sa la reg nas brtabs pas/ sa sbyar bar bya'o/ /thab khud gi byang dang shar du rtse mo
122b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan te bud shing brtsig par bya'o/ /oM badzra sa twa a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas lan bdun du ku sha'i chun po la bzlas pa thab khung nas rtse mo la rtsa ba sbyar te ku sha dgra ma par bya'o/ /de nas gtsub shing la sogs pa'i me sbar la ku sha'i chus lan gsum bsang
122b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor dang mtshon pa byas te/ thab khung du gzugs par bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes pas lan bdun bzlas pa'i mar gyis sbar bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ku sha'i chun pos dga' bar bya'o/ /de nas hUM gis thab khung bskyed la/ oM gyis pad+ma de'i steng du
122b5(rgyud 'grel): raM gyis rnam pa las me'i lha sgom pa ni pad+ma la gnas pa mdog ser skya/ ral pa dang bcas pa phyag gnyis nas bgrang phreng dang gund+he bsnams pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de nas me'i mtshams nas de bzhin du ye
122b6(rgyud 'grel): shes sems/ dpa' rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha Agnye dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA/ zhes pas so/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dang dbu ma bsgreng la dbu ma'i tshigs su sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis sor mos spyan drangs par bya'o/ /
122b7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sems dpa' la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya'o/ /oM dzuM hu dzU hu swAhA/ zhes pas dbu ma'i rtse mor 'brel bar byas/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /oM pra bar sat+tka ra swA hA/ oM zhes pas zhabs bsal dang zhal bsal
123a1(rgyud 'grel): phul bas/ 'dod pa'i dngos po mdza' dag gis la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ dril bu dkrol zhing bstod par bya'o/ /de nas oM in+d+rA ya swAhA/ oM ya mA yai swAhA/ oM ba ru NA ya swAhA/ oM agcA ye swAhA/ oM
123a2(rgyud 'grel): nrai te ye swAhA/ oM bA ya be swAhA/ oM a'i sha nA ya swAhA/ oM tsa n+d+ra a ti tA b+hya(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ suM b+haM na suM b+hyaM swAhA/ zhes pas lha shos la sogs pa'i chod pa raM ba 'byams gyis 'jig rten skyong ba mchod par bya'o/ /me la zhal bsil phul
123a3(rgyud 'grel): la me lha'i lce dang/ dgang gzar gyi khar hUM rnam par bsams la/ rang gi rdo rje dang dril bu blangs te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du chu byin la/ oM dzu hu dzu hu sa swAhA/ zhes pa'i rim pa 'dis bsreg par byas te/ yams shing gis ni rgyab rten gyi
123a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du'o/ /mar ni zhal du'o/ /'bru ni phyag phyag tu'o/ /'bras ni zhal du'o/ /zho zhal du'o/ /dur ba dang/ me tog gi spyi bor ro/ /zhabs bsil phul te mchod pa la sogs pa bar du byas te/ lan gsum du gsum du bsreg par bya'o/ /
123a5(rgyud 'grel): dgang blugs kyang 'bul lo/ /de nas ku sha'i chus lan gsum bsang gtor bya ste/ 'bar bar thim par bya'o/ /oM hUM Ta Ti Ta ta zhes pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i chus rdo rje'i lag pa dang bcas pas me'i thab khung kun nas bsam par
123a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ de nas gong du gsungs pa'i mdun du bsgoms la/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma me'i dbus su bsgom par bya'o/ /ston mo bya ste/ sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang mngon par mchod de/ zhal bsil ba dang/ zhabs bsil phul te oM hUM
123a7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pa gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas sbyin sreg tu dbul lo/ /dgang gzar mar gyis bkang ste rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags shing rdo rje dril bu'i lag par
123b1(rgyud 'grel): blugs gzar la hUM bsams la/ mngon par 'dod pa'i don sems par bya ste/ dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o/ /sngon du zhal bsil phul nas/ ku sha'i chus me la bsang gtor bya'o/ /ye shes kyi lha mo bris sku la soD pas shuD pas bya ste/ slar yar me'i
123b2(rgyud 'grel): lha gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas bsams la/ mchod pa sna tshogs pas mngon par mchod nas/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnam par rig par byas la/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /ci lta'i rjes su dngos grub gsol/ /sangs
123b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas yul du gshegs par mdzod/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /oM gats+tsha gats+tsha a gne swAhA/ zhes spyan drung ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo rgyab tu sbyar ba ni/ gshegs su gsol ba'o/ /de nas sngon du gsungs pa'i gtor ma'i chogs dkyil
123b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi 'khor lo bya ste/ ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya mdza' dag gis gtor mas dbul bar bya'o/ /oM ku ru ku ru mahA bt+tna la'i hUM swAhA/ zhes pas lag pa gnyis brkyang ste sor mo dbu ma gnyis sbyar ba ni sbyin sreg gi dus su gtor
123b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /me'i bdag nyid sbyin sreg gi dus su me brtags la gal te mtshan ma dan pa mthong na/ de nas oM badzra yak+Sha hUM swAhA/ zhes pa gang du mtshan ma ngan pa mthong ba'i phyogs der mar brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyin sreg dbul lo/ /
123b6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs nye gar zhi bar byed pa'i chus lan gsum du bsang gtor byas la/ sngon bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i sbyin sreg gis mchod nas/ gong du gsungs ba'i rnam pas rang gi dbugs kyi bkugs te/ rang gi lus la bzhag par bya'o/
123b7(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i lta gshegs su gsol la langs par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o/ /de nas mchod sbyin gyi cho ga brjod par bya'o/ /bla re bre ba dang/ na bza' sna tshogs 'phyang ba dang/ dri dkar la zhim pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas/ dkar pos
124a1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa pang? dbus kyi snod byug par bya'o/ /'o ma dang dri bzang po'i chus dbang bar byas la shing lo la sogs pas brgyan par bya'o/ /gos dkar pos dkris la 'dab ma la mig gi gzugs/ /sen rtsi dang ku shal
124a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /suM kAM yuM hUM/ smryuM hmryuM amryuM k+Sh+ryuM/ zhes pas dang por aM dang mthar swAhA/ re re la yang brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te/ gnas ji lta bar bum pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o/ /dbus su yang snod chen po bzhag
124a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /gong du gsungs pa'i rim pas bdag nyid rnal 'byor mdza' dag rdzogs par bya ste/ bdag nyid mchog la de nas sbyin sreg brtsam par bya'o/ /oM ka ma la garb+he swAhA/ zhes pas pad+ma'i rnam pa la lag pa'i
124a4(rgyud 'grel): thal mo dbye bas byas la de nas snod kyi dbus su pad+ma dgod par bya'o/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gdugs dkar pos g.yogs la/ /de nas hUM las rdo rje hUM gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de nas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma bsgom par
124a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rdo rje dang dbyig pa de g.yon pa dang g.yas par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i shar du rdo rje ma/ byang du drag mo/ nub du ro langs ma/ lhor gtum mo/ /
124a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du ser ge ma/ mer stag mo/ bden bral du ce sbyang ma/ rlung du 'ug pa ma/ gong du gsungs pa'i mtshan ma dang rgyan dang ldan pa'i sku mdog dkar mo bsam par bya'o/ /ji ltar rang rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas dam tshig
124a7(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya'o/ /oM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ rdo rje bcings pa byas nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste/ rtse mo bkug pa byas la di tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o/ /sngon ltar mchod pa hUM swAhA/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas nas g.yon pa snying gar bzha g.yas
124b1(rgyud 'grel): pa spyi bor bzhag pa ni/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ji ltar 'dod par chu dbul bar byas nas/ du rba 'am ku sha dang sbyar zhing kun da la sogs pa'i me tog dang/ sgom pa dang ldan pas sngags lan re re bzlas pas rdo rje lha mo'i
124b2(rgyud 'grel): cod pan du dbul bar bya'o/ /khri? phrag gcig tu spyi por dbul bar byas la yid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'phel zhing nad med par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg gi sngags gong du ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brengs nas/ gtor ma dbul bar
124b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /zhi ba bya ba la ni dkar po'i mchod pa dang/ kha shar phyogs su mngon par bltas pas mchod par bya'o/ /tshigs bcad kyi bar du ming sbyar zhing bskul bar bya'o/ /phreng ba'i grangs brgya phrag gcig gi mdzub mos bgrang zhing zhi ba'i yid
124b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhi bar bya'o/ /rgyas pa la yang mchod rdzas thams cad ser bo dang kha byang du blta bar bya'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgugs pa'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lhag pa'i phreng ba dbus nas grang zhing dga' ba'i nga rgyal gyis rgyas pa'o/ /dbang
124b5(rgyud 'grel): la ni mchod rdzas thams cad dmar po dang nub tu bltas pas bya'o/ /dbang gi yid phyogs nas 'gugs pa la sogs pas bskul bar byin sreg sogs/ /dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid 
124b6(rgyud 'grel): as srin lag la gn g par byas la dbang gi yid kyi dban/ mngon
124b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor la mchod rdzas thams cad nag po rdzas kha lhor bltas pas bgrong cig ces bskul zhing bgrang phreng drug cu'i grangs kyis mthe'u chung la gnas pa'i khro bo'i cha byang kyi padmo'i gang na la bzhugs pa'i mngon par spyod par bya'o// //
124b8(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dang sbyin sreg dang mchod sbyin mdor bsdus pa'i ga'o/ /dbal rdo rje gdan bzhi pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa/ dpal ye shes dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'phags pa lha yis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //?????
125a1(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na k+Sh+rnyis sgyur ba'o// //dpal gdan bzhi ba'i dkyil chog bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI tsa turbi thI tan+t+ra rA dzasya maN+Da lo ba yi ka bid+d+hi bzhin d+ha sa ra mu ts+tsha ya na ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi
125a2(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga snying po mdor bsags pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yi ge bzhi pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /klu sgrub la ni thog mar 'dud/ /shin tu gab
125a3(rgyud 'grel): cing gsang ba yi/ /sangs rgyas gsung la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gsang ba'i phyogs ni 'di dag las/ /sbrang rtsi gnas 'gyur pad+ma las/ /reg pa'i ye shes de kho na/ /dang po'i chos la bdag 'dud do/ /A li'i ye shes 'dam skyes su/ /
125a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems kyis gdams pa las/ /sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi'i ro myong ba/ /gsung gnyis pa la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khro dang nga rgyal la sogs med/ /kun tu ye shes kyis bskul ba/ /gsung gsum pa la bdag 'dud do/ /gang yang thob pa
125a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum mchog btsos/ /sems can mchi med nyid smon pa/ /sangs rgyas gsung la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /'bum phrag dag ni bcu dang brgyad/ /gcig nas gcig brgyud mthong ba las/ /rnAl 'byor bstan bcos dam pa ste/ /phyi rol
125a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan bcos sun 'byin yin/ /sdeb sbyor dang ni tshad ma med/ /sgra yi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ /ye shes can gyi rnal 'byor tshig /thams cad rnal 'byor bstan bcos yin/ /lus can rna lam chu bur dang/ /gar gyi gnas dang mtshungs
125a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba'i/ /rmongs dang gti mug 'phel byed pa/ /phyi rol bstan bcos ci zhig bya/ /snying po snying po zhes bya'i chos/ /dag pa'i lam ni nges par sbyar/ /dag pa'i chas ni dmigs pa las/ /dag pa'i lus 'gyur the tshom med/ /gnyis med
125b1(rgyud 'grel): shing ltar zhugs nas ni/ /thig le'i go chas go bgos nas/ de nyid mda' yis bsnun na ni/ /'khor ba'i yul ni 'joms par 'gyur/ /don la brten pa'i bstan bcos ni/ /gcig nas gcig tu bslabs pa ste/ /shin tu gab cing gsang ba'i don/ /
125b2(rgyud 'grel): brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin/ /gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis rab rgyas las/ /de nyid sbyor brnyed nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bstan pa yin/ /bcu dang brgyad du bye ba yis/ /las can 'khor bar rnam rol te/ /zhi dang
125b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /bskad pa dang ni bcings sogs kyi/ /sngags grub pa dang sbyin sreg sogs/ /dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /slob ma bzang la slob dpon ni/ /rnal 'byor gsang /la rab tu gus/ /dul bas legs par brtags
125b4(rgyud 'grel): la ni/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid bra bar bya/ /slob ma brtag pa la 'jug pa'i cho ga ste dang pa'o// //dang por re zhig slob dpon gyis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni//
125b5(rgyud 'grel): lag g.yas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dbus su dbyangs yig dang po bsam/ /g.yon du zla ba'i dbus gnas par/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ges mdzes par bya/ /dkar po dud pa dud dang ni/ /pad+ma g.yas kyi sor mo la'o/ /gi waM dri gsum
125b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa dang/ /sa yi gdugs ni g.yon la dgong/ /ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis/ /lag sogs las? ni byed pa mo/ /dkar pos bsdigs shing rengs par byed/ /dud pas bskyod cing 'byed pa ste/ /dung gis thams cad 'gugs
125b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /pad+mas spong cing sred par byed/ /gi waM sdang? ba 'joms pa ste/ /dri ma gsum gyis ltung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pas bsod par rab tu bshad/ /sa gdugs las kun byed pa yin/ /A li zhes bya'i phyag rgya dang/ /sa bon brgyad gyi
126a1(rgyud 'grel): bskul bya ste/ /rdo rje mchog tu 'bar ba'i 'od/ /me yi sa bon steng sgor dgod/ /sa ni mig la bsam par bya/ /nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon ni/ /dkar po lce la kun tu bsam/ /sde tshan brgyad pa'i
126a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa yis/ /rtsa ba yis ni steng du brtsir/ /ra ni gsum pa nyid yin te/ /'og tu rlung sbyar bzhi pa'o/ /sgra dang bzhon nu thig le can/ /yi ge bzhi pa'i ming can te/ /chu ste gti mug mgrin par ro/ /nyon mongs pa ni nam tshong dgod/ /
126a3(rgyud 'grel): snying gar rlung gis bskyod par bya/ /lte bar me ste de bzhin phyugs/ /yi ge'i dgod pas bkod nas ni/ /sa bon las ni lha'i tshul/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste/
126a4(rgyud 'grel): gangs dang kun ba lta bu'i 'od/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa' i skyil mo krung/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ /rdo rje snying gar gzung nas ni/ /g.yon gyi dril bu dgu ru bstan/ /sku la rgyan rnams thams cad dang/ /shin tu mdzes pI na bza' 
126a5(rgyud 'grel): klubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces mdzad/ /rang gi ye shes sa bon ni/ /sgra dang thig ler yang dag bcas/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mdza' can te/ /'bum phrag gsum bzlas sngar bsnyen bya/ /
126a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad po dag /khri phrag bzhir ni bsnyen par bya/ /spos mo khro gnyer la sogs pa/ /nyi shu stong phrag lnga ru bzlas/ /phyi rol gnas kyi 'jig rten pa/ /rgyal dbang dngos grub shin tu drag /stong phrag gsum du bzlas nas
126a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /kun nas kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngon du bsnyen bas 'grub 'gyur te/ /ma bsnyen pa ni dkyil 'khor min/ /sngags dang rnal 'byor de dag gis/ /rim gyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ /sngon du bsnyen pas lha mnyes par bya
126b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga ste gnyis pa'o/ /de nas bsten dang g.yo las sogs/ /sngags bsnyen pa la 'bad pa yi/ /de ma thag tu 'bebs gyur pa/ /sngags ni yang dag bstan pa ste/ /oM badzra a be sha dza(rgyud 'grel): gal te sangs rgyas sogs 'dod na/ /'bum
126b2(rgyud 'grel): phrag gcig tu gsum gyis bsgrub par bya/ /oM hi li hi li hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub 'gyur bas/ /skyes pa la sogs mthong bas 'bebs/ /oM ma ta li hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub 'gyur te/ /'di ni thos pas
126b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs bar bya'o/ /oM ma ta li tsi ta tsI li te hUM hUM/ 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas na ni/ /sgrub pos skyes sogs rings nas 'bebs/ /oM bat+tA li bat+tA li hUM phaT/ sngon du 'bum phrag gsum du ni/ /sngags pas bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /
126b4(rgyud 'grel): ming nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang/ /gsang sngags lha kun 'bebs par 'gyur/ /oM bat+tA li bat+tA li hUM phaT/ sngags pas 'bum phrag gcig tu ni/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas 'gyur na/ /chu dang bsreg ma rdo dang ni/ /shing rnams kyang ni
126b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi slob dpon gyis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la 'bang nas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid ni/ /shin tu dul bas brtag par bya/ /lha ni mnyes par ma byas na/ /bdag nyid rnam par sun 'byin yin/ /
126b6(rgyud 'grel): lag tu rdo rje dril thog pa'o/ /rdo rje sems sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /sna tshogs rtse mor bskor ba yi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /snying gar rlung dang rlung sbyar te/ /rlung gi sa bon gyis bskyod bya/ /rdo rje rtse mor ye shes kyis/ /sa
126b7(rgyud 'grel): bon bsams te snying gar bskul/ /seng ge mo yi gzugs bsams la/ /drag po hUM gis 'phang bar bya/ /sngon gyi sngags kyis sbyor ba yis/ /chu dang bcas pa'i me tog rdeb/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma yi/ /skyes bu'i bye brag dag gis so
127a1(rgyud 'grel): oM ra ma ra ma ho ho ho a a a phaT/ rnal 'byor sngags dang dbang bskur la/ /gal te 'bebs pa gdon za na/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /de ma thag tu 'beb 'gyur te/ /de nyid 'di yis phab bdag /skyes bu dam
127a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig can zhes bya/ /sgrub po skal pa med pa yis/ /skal pa dman pa'i mi rnams ni/ /mtshan nyid brtag par bya ba la/ /de nas sman ni bshad par bya/ /sngon du sdig pa mang sbyang la/ /lha rnams dgongs par mi 'gyur na'ang/ /gsang sngags
127a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dang bdug pa yis/ /de yi mod la 'bebs par 'gyur/ /ra ni rog po'i yan lag lnga/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bzung nas ni/ /chu dang me dang rlung gi ni/ /ji bzhin gnas su bzlas nas kyang/ /snying gar ye shes sa bon ni/ /bdun pa'i bdun par
127a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar byas la/ /gu gul che dang mar nag che/ /cha ni mnyam por byas nas kyang/ /sman bdun dang ni ldan pa yi/ /bdung rtsi'i chu ni gu gul bcas/ /rdo rje'i sa bon bzlas nas su/ /mchod pa'i dus su bdug par bya/ /'di yi dri ni bsnams tsam gyis/ /
127a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi med la 'bebs par 'gyur/ /khro ti ka dang jo ti lnga/ /lcags kyu lnga dang sbyar bar bya/ /smyo byed la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /cha ni mnyam por sbyar bar bya/ /mar nag chen pos bsgos nas su/ /bdud rtsi'i chu dang bsres pa dag /lce yi dbang pos
127a6(rgyud 'grel): myangs na ni/ /de yi mod la 'bebs 'gyur zhing/ /dman dang mchog gi sems can la/ /rab tu sbyor bas chos ston 'gyur/ /shin tu brtag pa'i slob ma la/ /slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs sor zhing
127a7(rgyud 'grel): lus sogs rang bzhin dag bar ldan/ /'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang/ /snying rje la sogs phan sems ldan/ /nyan dang thos sogs lhags par dang/ /sbyin sogs dge ba'i las la dgar/ /theg pa che la mngon par brtson/ /gsang ba'i
127b1(rgyud 'grel): chos la dad par ldan/ /rtag par rgyun tu bla ma gus/ /de 'dra'i slob ma yongs su gzung/ /dbab pa thams cad kyi slob ma yongs su brtag ba'i tshag ste gsum pa'o// //de nas dngos grub kun 'grub pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/
127b2(rgyud 'grel): snying rje pham pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dang por sa gzhi yongs su bzung/ /yid ni dga' ba'i sa phyogs te/ /ma dag pa ni sbad par bya/ /dag pa'i sa phyogs gzung nas su/ /blo ldan der ni dkyil 'khor brtsams/ /bla re dag ni bres nas su/ /sna tshogs
127b3(rgyud 'grel): gos bzang sbyang bar bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas/ /gnas dang gnas su brgyan par bya/ /rgyal ba lnga sogs mchog gi ni/ /sa ni yongs su 'dzin la brtson/ /kun nas grub bzhi pa ru ni/ /dri yi chus ni byug par bya/ /dkar
127b4(rgyud 'grel): dang seng sogs phye ma yis/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris nas su/ /las kun byed pa zhes bya ba'i/ /bum pa de yi dbus su ni/ /shar gyi 'dab mar bzhag par bya/ /lho ru rdo rje bzhag bya ste/ /byang du dril bu dgod par bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi dung chos
127b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nub kyi 'dab mar dgod par bya/ /tshon sna lnga yi sa dag ni/ /mtshams dang pad+ma lte bar bzhag /rdo rje mkha' 'gror bdag bsgoms nas/ /byang chub yan lag cho ga bya/ /dri dang me tog bdug pa dang/ /lha bshos gtor mar bcas pa yis/
127b6(rgyud 'grel): der ni mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /sa ni gzung ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /nu ma'i steng du bzung nas su/ /de nas sar ni bzhugs nas kyang/ /thams cad kun tu shes par bya/ /oM gang yang rung ba gnas kyi bad
127b7(rgyud 'grel): por gyur pa rnams gzhan du dengs shig /sa'i phyogs 'dir sems can gyi don rtsom gyis/ /klu dang gnod sbyin las sogs pa dang/ dri za dang 'byung po dang/ 'byung mo dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams myur pa nying du song zhig /oM hUM phaT phaT swAhA bshas?
128a1(rgyud 'grel): sa blang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// //de nas rdo rje dril bu yi/ /ye shes 'og nas gsung mtshan nyid/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung nas kyang/ /mnyam par bzhag pas 'phang bar bya/ /bum pa'i chu las bskyed pa yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 
128a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma bsam bya/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas su/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams/ /'od zer dkar po shin tu gsal/ /rdzas rnams thams cad ldan pa yis/ /kun tu rgya cher mchod par bya/ /khu tshur gnyis ni
128a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas su/ /dkar po gi waM bsgreng bar bya/ /gnyis kyi rtse mo cung zad dgu ba/ /phyag rgya 'di ni snying khar bstan/ /oM a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje rtse mor reg gnas ni/ /bum par brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon
128a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /skud pa lnga la gsang gtor bya/ /seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/ /tshon rtsi thams cad bsang bar bya/ /oM smryuM swAhA/ gnas de nyid du rnal 'byor ma/ /sbyin min gtor ma sngon 'gro bas/ /phyogs brgyad kyi ni gnas rnams su/ /nye bar spyad
128a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /sngon gyi sngags kyis ji bzhin du/ /sa ni yongs su bzung nas su/ /tshon gyi bzo yi las byed rnams/ /dam tshig bslab pa sbyin par bya/ /thams cad kun nas bsdus nas su/ /bum sogs lho yi phyogs su bzhag /slar yang dri
128a6(rgyud 'grel): yis byags nas ni/ /thig skud dag ni bri bar bya/ /sa yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o// //tshon rtsi lnga yis bsgos pa yis/ /dgu yi bdag nyid sar pa lnga/ /thig gdab pa yi khyad par dag /slob dpon gyis ni legs
128a7(rgyud 'grel): brtags te/ /sa yi dbus dang phyogs brgyad du/ /thig le mtshan ma dgod par bya/ /slob ma byang gi cha gnas la/ /bla mas lho'i phyogs cha mnan/ /thig skud kha brgyad btab nas su/ /de yi 'og tu gru bzhi bya/ /kun nas thams cad yangs
128b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /tshe lnga nang gi cha gsum bgo /gcig ni de yi phyi rol du/ /nang la sogs pa bskor nas ni/ /phyi rol rnal 'byor ma yi gnas/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu /rdo rje ka bas nye bar brgyan/ /sna tshogs
128b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnam pa bzhi/ /snying po'i grwa bzhir bri bar bya/ /sgo ni kun nas grwa bzhi dang/ /cha lngar bgos pa'i cha chod bya/ /sgo ni bzhi char bgos pa la/ /lha mo yi ni kha khyer bya/ /sgo yi brgyad kyis cha yis ni/ /rdul tshon kun gyi gnas su bya/ /dra ba dra
128b3(rgyud 'grel): phyed ga bzhi par/ /steng du ri mo mnyam por bgye/ /snying po re'u mig dgu yi cha/ /phyogs kyi mdog tu dgang bar bya/ /rdo rje yi ni phyi rol gnan/ /tshon rtsi dmar pos dgang bar bya/ /de yi yang ni phyi rol nas/ /ra ba lngar ni dgye bar bya/ /de yi
128b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gnas rnams kyi/ /sa ni ji ltar mdzes par brtag /lha yi gnas rnams thams cad ni/ /gser bcos pa yi mdog can yin/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par klubs/ /rdo rje ka bas nye bar brgyan/ /rnams
128b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gnas rnams kyi/ /sa ni ji ltar mdzes par brtag lha yi gnas rnams thams cad ni/ /gser bcos pa yi mdog can yin/ /grub bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par klubs/ /rdo rje ka bas nye bar brgyan/ /rnams
128b6(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs bri bar bya/ /g.yer ka'i dra ba phreng ba dang/ /dra ba dra phyer tshogs pas bskor/ /mtshams bzhir zla ba phyed pa la/ /rdo rje yis ni mdzes par bya/ /sgo rnams su ni bum pa la/ /gnas pa'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya/ /shar gyi sgor ni
128b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la/ /seng+ges mtshan pa bsgreng bya ste/ /byang gi sgor ni rma bya yis/ /mtshan ma dag ni bsgreng bar bya/ /pad+ma dang pas mtshan pa yi/ /rgyal mtshan nub tu gnas par bya/ /pad+ma chu srin gyis mtshan pa/ /de bzhin lho yi phyogs su bzhag/
128b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang bcas drang po ru/ /gnas dang gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /bum pa dag ni brgyad po yang/ /phyogs brgyad dag tu bzhag par bya/ /dri yi chus ni yongs bkang zhig
129a1(rgyud 'grel): shing los kha ni brgyan pa dag /sgo yi ngos brgyad dag dang ni/ /gzhan yang grwa bzhir bzhag par bya/ /rgyal dang bkra shis shar sgo ste/ /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul byang du'o/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal nub tu dgod/ /grub dang 'jigs
129a2(rgyud 'grel): pa lho sgor ro/ /khru gang ba nas brtsams nas su/ /ji snyed bcu drug bar du bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sa mnan pa/ /zhi rgyas dbang gi don gnyer la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi nI sa yi cha/ /slob dpon gyis ni sngar bsnyen bya/ /ye shes kyi skud pa dang/ mtshon
129a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi sbyang pa dang/ bum pa bzhag pa'i cho ga ste lnga pa'o// //de nas bdag nyid kyi ni lus/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar sprul te/ /gal te 'byor na slob dpon gyis/ /sgo bzhir slob ma bzhi bzhag bya/ /ma 'byor na ni gnyis su sbyar/ /mdza' 
129a4(rgyud 'grel): mar gcig tu nyid kyis brtag /dang por 'phen pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdud la sogs pa'i sdang ba skrad/ /nyi mas rdo rje gsor nas su/ /zla bas dril bu dkrol nas kyang/ /bskor zhing bskyod pas nges par 'phang/ /shar sgor blta ba'i phyag
129a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyab bcas/ /mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dbye ba'i stabs/ /gcig bskum pa dang g.yon bskyod bya/ /rdo rje ma bdag ces bstod nas/ /hUM byed hUM gis 'jigs par byed/ /oM hUM ha na ha na mA ra ya duSh+TaM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya a a hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ byang
129a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo yi ni gnas dag tu/ /rdo rje dril bu bskyod nas kyang/ /drag mor sprul te nga yi brjod/ /hUM gi sgra yis dgang bar bya/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/ /snying ga'i phyogs su bcir bar bya/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang dang/ /sa ga dang ni
129a7(rgyud 'grel): zlum mo'i stabs/ /oM hUM a dag /ro langs gzugs su bsgoms nas kyang/ /nub kyi phyogs su 'phang bar bya/ /mtshan ma gnyis bcangs lag pa ni/ /rked pa'i phyogs su bcugs nas su/ /pus mo sbyar dang g.yon 'phan stabs/ /bsnyen
129b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas g.yon bskor seng ge stabs/ /hUM gi sgra yis bkang nas ni/ /oM hUM A phaT/ zhes brjod par bya/ lho sgo'i phyogs su gnas nas ni/ /gtum mo'i gzugs su sprul te 'phang/ /lag gnyis rdo rje dam bcings nas/ /spyi bo'i steng du gzung bar bya/ /pus
129b2(rgyud 'grel): mo'i rkang stabs ru sbal stabs/ /bskor ba dang ni bzlog stabs bya/ /hUM gi sa bon drag po ni/ /bzlas pas sgra yis dgang bar bya/ /oM hUM a phaT/ shar gyi gnas su gnas nas kyang/ /slar yang 'phen pa'i stobs kyis sbyar/ /g.yas kyis rdo rje snying gar
129b3(rgyud 'grel): gzung/ /bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro mar/ /bsgoms nas hUM zhes brjod par bya/ /g.yas brkyang 'dug dang g.yon brkyang 'dug /g.yas brkyang bskum dang g.yon brkyang 'dug /dbus dang 'og gi bgags bcom nas/ /gu bu ra ba dra ba dang/ /go chas
129b4(rgyud 'grel): yus ni bsrung bar bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag bsgoms te/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung yang dag gnas/ /lag gnyis kun tu kha sbyar te/ /sor mo brkyang ste rtse mo skrad/ /oM hUM phu phaT/ dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/ /
129b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rnam shes bsgred par bya/ /pad+ma sa gdug sbyar te brkyang/ /phyogs brgyad du ni bskor bar bya/ /oM dzam+b+ha ni hUM phaT/ ra ba chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid lag brkyang ste/ /der mi rdo rje brtags nas kyang/ /sal gnas lnga
129b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba yi/ /sa 'og bdun ni sbyang bar bya/ /'di ni snying la phur bus gdab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM hUM phuM phaT/ dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i cho ga ste drug pa'o// //de nas bsngags ba bdag nyid ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i ting nge 'dzin gnas/ /
129b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /bum pa rnams la bsang gtor bya/ /bum pa dag ni bcu bzhir bshad/ /de kho na nyid mtshan nyid gsungs/ /bum pa chu yi bkang nas su/ /gang gA'i chu ni 'gug par bya/ oM tabte tabte mahA tabte hUM swAhA/
130a1(rgyud 'grel): lan bdun du ni bzlas pa yis/ /gang+gA sngags su bsres pa yis/ /sna tshogs dri dang me tog dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bsre bar bya/ /shing lo myu gus kha brgyan nas/ /kun la stan ni sbyin par bya/ /ras zung gis ni
130a2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa ru/ /dkris par rgyu cher mdzes par bya/ /'o ma dang ni bsres nas ni/ /me tog phreng bas sbyang bar bya/ /sa gdugs rnam shes rtse sbyar te/ /lhag ma gsum ni brkyang bar bya/ /bum ba kun la reg nas ni/ /sngags 'di lan bdun par
130a3(rgyud 'grel): du bzlas/ /oM hUM suM k+ShuM yuM hUM swAhA/ bum pa bzhag pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// //shar la sogs pa'i phyogs brgyad du/ /de dag mid bzhin bzhag par bya/ /de nas slob dpon bdag gi lus/ /rdo rje nam mkha' i rang bzhin
130a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ tshon chen sogs kyi gos dang ni/ /dar la sogs pa sar pas brgyan/ /lus ni kun tu brgyan nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan bsgom/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni/ /byang chub yan lag go cha bya/ /go cha
130a5(rgyud 'grel): dag ni bsgon nas su/ /bsrung dang bcings pa dag tu bya/ /lag pa gnyis ni brkyang byas la/ /ye shes rnam shes sgrel bar bya/ /dang po'i gshog pa'i tshul bas nas/ /snying ga'i drung du bskor bar bya/ oM hUM pheM phaT/ go cha chen
130a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ /ji skad bshad pa gzung bu ste/ /de nyid gnyis kyis blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya ru/ /brkyang ba rdo rje zhes bya 'dis/ /yi ge
130a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad po thams cad dang/ /bcas pas yan lag brgyad du bsrungs/ /lce la cu yi sa bon te/ /nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la/ /sa ni mig la spyar par bya/ /de bzhin tshangs pa me 'bar ba/ /mgrin par gti mug kha lo sgyur/ /bskyod pa snying
130b1(rgyud 'grel): gar yang dag gnas/ /nyon mongs kun tu nam tshong ste/ /phyugs dag lte ba'i rtsa bar ro/ /yan lag brgyad po bsrungs nas ni/ /lha yis gzugs kyis bzlas par bya/ /me tog bdug pa dri sogs pas/ /bdag nyid kun tu mchod par bya/ /oM badzra kA yA
130b2(rgyud 'grel): ho(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra TAka a(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra h+ri da ya hUM/ oM sa b+hA ba/ shud+d+hA(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rmA swAb+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM badzri shud+d+h(rgyud 'grel): sarba dma rmA badzre shud+d+ha haM/ oM yo ga shud+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rmA yo ga shu d+d+ho haM/ rdo rje zhes bya rdo rje'i bdag /mngon par byang chub rim pa'o/ /bdag nyid mngon
130b3(rgyud 'grel): par byang chub pas/ /rol pa'i cho ga ste bdun pa'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen po brtsam/ /ri sogs rim gyis bskyed nas ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rigs bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lha kun bsgom/ /rlung dang me yi bdun bton pa/ /rdo rje ma yi
130b4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon sbyar/ /sgra dang thig les mang dag mnan/ /'byung ba bzhi po bzhag par bya/ /bdun po'i don ni sngon bzhin sbyar/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur/ /sngon gyi rdo rje'i sa bon gyis/ /ri bo kun gyi bdag por sbyar/ /sngar gyi ye shes gnas kyi ni?
130b5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi mcheg ni sprul par bya/ /gser las byung ba'i grong khyer mchog /rin chen bdun po rnams kyi spras/ /g.yer ka'i dra ba phreng ba dang/ /dra ba dra phyed tshogs pas brgyan/ /dang por khang brtsegs bsgoms nas ni/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas ye shes dang/ /rnal
130b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor dang/ /lha rnams bsgoms te sprul par bya/ /dbus su seng ge gdan la ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par/ /A li kA li'i sa bon las/ /dbu ma'i gzugs ni khyad par bskyed/ /zhal gsum dang ni phyag drug ste/
130b7(rgyud 'grel): sprin sngon 'od zer sdug par ldan/ /spyan gsum bzhang dang khro ba dang/ /sgeg pa yi ni nyams dang ldan/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/ /steng du mda' ni dgod par bya/ /gnyis pa 'khyud cing zhu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o/ /
131a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi dang por gzhu dgong de/ /bdud rtsi chu yis yongs bkang ba/ /g.yon gyi gnyis pI mtshan ma yin/ /gsum pa na ni dril bu ste/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs/ /ral pa dar gyis bcings nas su/ /thod pa'i cod pan shin tu
131a2(rgyud 'grel): bcings/ /de ltar mtshan ma rnam drug dang/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa'i sku/ /sna tshogs me dpung 'bar ba can/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor nam mkha' dgod/ /de yi stan ni shes rab ste/ /kha dog dkar zhing shin tu mdzes/ /phyag gnyis mgrin
131a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'khyud nas su/ /ma mchu choms kyi bdebs par mdzad/ /zhabs kyi tshigs kyis dkris nas su/ /rdo rje pad+mar thim par mdzad/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' sangs rgyas ni/ /dbus su sems kyis 'di 'drar bsgom/ /ye shes shar gyi re'u mig la/ /
131a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsams te/ /bdud rtsi yi ge las byung bas/ /glang chen dbang la rol pas bzhugs/ /kun da lta bur dkar ba'i 'od/ /rol ba'i tshul gyis 'phen par bcas/ /phyag gnyis skra ni rnam par grol/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis shin
131a5(rgyud 'grel): tu brgyan/ /sku la sbrul gyis brgyan pa ste/ /spyan gsum khro bo'i hUM mdzad la/ /kha TwAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /'od zer sna tshogs rab tu 'phrog /sham thabs glang po'i pags pa ste/ /mi yi phags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /me yi dkyil 'khor
131a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan par/ /shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom/ /de yi byang du lha mo ni/ /drag mo me'i sa bon byung/ /kha dog ser mo shin tu mdzes/ /ha har gzhad cing gtsigs pa'o/ /skra ni gyen du 'bar ba la/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ /rma
131a7(rgyud 'grel): bya yi ni gdan stengs na/ /skyil krung phyed pas yang dag bzhugs /sku ni sprul gyis brgyan ba ste/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni shin tu mdzes/ kha TwAM ga ni rnal 'byor snod/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing/ /sham thabs glang po'i pags pa
131b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ mi yi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /ye shes byang gi phyogs char ni/ /mkha' 'gro drag mo bsgom par bya/ /ye shes nub kyi phyogs char ni/ /ro langs drag mo'i hUM sgrogs ma/ /tsog pu yi ni 'dug stangs kyis/ /bya khyung gi ni gang nal bzhugs/ /sku mdog
131b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo shin tu mdzes/ /phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i hUM sgrogs mdzad/ /skra ni 'bar zhing rnam par grol/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis shin tu brgyan/ /kha TwAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /sku ni sbrul gyi rnam par brgyan/ /glang po'i pags pa'i sham thabs can
131b3(rgyud 'grel): mi yi bags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /thig le sgra las sngon byung ba/ /nub kyi lha mo bsgom par bya/ /ye shes lho'i phyogs char ni/ /gtum mo zhes bya'i lha mo ste/ /sku mdog sngon mo shin tu drag/ /ha har bzhad pa 'jigs su rung/ /skyil krung phyed
131b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /bka' nyan gyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /skra ni lhug pa kun tu rgyas/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis shin tu brgyan/ /phyag gnyis na ni ha har bzhad/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /kha TwAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod/ /sbrul gyi rgyan
131b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnam par klubs/ /glang po'i pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /mi yi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /thig le sgra las byung ba ru/ /gtum mo lho yi phyogs su bsgom/ /dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ni/ /rol pa yi mi dug stangs kyis/ /seng ge yi ni
131b6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la gzhugs/ /sku mdog gser zhing dkar ba ste/ /phyag gnyis khro bo'i hUM mdzad la/ /'od zer me ltar gsal zhing 'bar/ /na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes/ /sprul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par klubs/ /ral gri gyen du 'phyar ba dang/ /g.yon na sdigs
131b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzub zhags pa bsnabs/ /bdud rnams thams cad bsreg pa ru/ /sa bon las ni bsgom par bya/ /me mtshams lha mo stag mo ni/ /zlum po yi ni stang stabs kyis/ /rdo rje phag dong stan la bzhugs/ /sku mdog dkar zhing sngo ba ste/ /phyag gnyis
132a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu khro dang bcas/ /na bza' dmar bo mnabs pas mdzes/ /lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub bsnams/ /sdang pa thams cad gdan gcod par/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od can du/ /sa bon ston 'gro bsgom par
132a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ bden bral lha mo lce sbyar mo/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i stangs kyis ni/ /ma he'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste/ /sku mdog dmar zhing sdo ba la/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par mdzas/ /dgra sta zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang/ /na bza' dmar po
132a3(rgyud 'grel): mnabs pas klubs/ /me yi dkyil 'khor 'bar bcan/ /ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung/ /sa bon las byung bsgom par bya/ /rlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo/ /tsog pu yi ni bsdug stangs kyis/ /ce spyad gi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /
132a4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar zhing ser pa ste/ /dbyug pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams/ /sku la na bza' dmar po gsol/ /sa bon las byung bsgom par bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu/ sgor ni mkha' 'gro ma bzhi ste/ /shar gyi sgor
132a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' 'gro ma/ /mi ro yi ni stan la bzhugs/ /sku mdog dkar mo shin tu 'bar/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /lag gnyis kha ru bcug nas ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /gos dmar bla gos phrag par gzar
132a6(rgyud 'grel): phuM zhes bya bas bskyed de bsgom/ /byang sgor lha mo mar me ma/ /stan ni de dang 'dra ba ste/ /kha dog ser mo 'jigs chen mo/ /thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag pa dang/ /na bza' dmar pos rab mdzes par/ /pheM las byung ba bsgoms par bya/ /
132a7(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi sgor ni 'dzib byed ma/ /yi dags stan la bzhugs pa ste/ /sku mdog dmar mo cher 'bar ma/ /snyim pas khrag ni 'thud bar byed/ /sa bon phoM las byung ba ste/ /nub kyi sgo ni bsrung bar mdzad/ /'phrog byed ma ni lho sgor te/ /
132b1(rgyud 'grel): sdar bstan stan la bzhugs pa yis/ /sku mdog sdon mo cher 'bar ma/ /sku la na bza' dmar po bsnams/ /gi wang gtun shin bsnams pa ru/ /sa bon phraM las byung bar bsgom/ /bcu bzhi gnas kyi phyi rol tu/ /rnal 'byor ma ni nyi shu ste/ /
132b2(rgyud 'grel): rtabs dang ni dpral ba la/ /phyi rol gnas ni zlum po ru/ /pad+ma dang ni zla bar brten/ /oM ha ho h+rAM(rgyud 'grel): spos mo 'ju byed gtum mo che/ /bdud rtsi'i snod ni phyag na bsnams/ /byang du g+hI g+ha/ drag mo khrag gsol sha gsol ma/ /lcags kyu lnga
132b3(rgyud 'grel): yis bkang ba yi/ /pad+ma'i snod ni bsgoms nas su/ /gcig gis steng nas 'gebs par mdzad/ /nub tu ku ru/ drag shul 'bar me mi sdug ma/ /phyag na 'dam skyes gtor mas bkang/ /lhor ni bat+tAM? li hUM/ thos pa ma dang rdo rje ma/ /bum can bza' 
132b4(rgyud 'grel): btung bsnams shing 'gebs/ /hUM dbang ldan sgeg mo sgeg dang bcas/ /g.yon du 'gying dang bcas par bsgom/ /hUM sriM dung chen min dga' mo ste/ /dri yi phyag rgyas byug bar mdzad/ /hUM ho me yi mtshams su pi wang ma/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rdung
132b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyar? byed/ /sri ma me tog ma ste thal sbyar nas/ /bsdus te gyen du 'thor bar byed/ /hUM hUM bden bral du ni glu mkhan ma/ /dkar po bskyod cing glu len byed/ /oM bdug spos ma ste mkhrig ma nas/ /gzung nas gdug spos lta bur 'bul/ /hUM rlung
132b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams gar ma zhes bya ste/ /g.yon du snyems shing sum 'khyod byed/ /hUM mar me ma ste phyag 'tshal ba'i/ /thal mo snyim par sbyar ba'o/ /mchod pa'i lha mo nyi shu 'di/ /thun mong ji ltar mdzes par brtag/ ye shes kyi gdan
132b7(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga ste brgyad pa'o/ /be las mkha' dbang shar du dgod/ /mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /bya khyud gi ni gdan la gzhugs/ /ral ba'i
133a1(rgyud 'grel): thor tshugs nye bar brgyan/ /'khor lo ral gri dbyug pa dung/ /sgo dpon du ni sprul pa yin/ /de yi g.yas su laM las byung/ /dpal lha mo ni dgod bar bya/ /mdog ser skra ni ltag par bcings/ /g.yas pa
133a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jigs g.yon pad+ma/ /de yi g.yon du phag mo ni/ /yi ge baM las sprul pa ste/ /phag gi gdong can khros par ldan/ /thod phreng cod pan shin tu bcings/ /sku mdog sngon mo 'bar chen mo/ /gos ser dag la rab tu dga' / /g.yon na
133a3(rgyud 'grel): thod pa khrag dang bcas/ /g.yas pa mi yi mgo bo gsol/ /byang skor tshangs pa oM las byung/ /'od zer dmar bo shin tu 'bar/ /gdong bzhi pa la lag bzhi pa/ /cod pan gyis ni nye bar brgyan/ /dang pa'i stan la gnas pa ste/ /g.yas
133a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mchog spyin bgrang phreng thog /pad+ma ril pa'i spyi blugs dang/ /rda ma dag ni g.yon na thogs/ /de yi g.yas su baM las byung/ /changs pa mo de bdag por mtshungs/ /de yi g.yon du sam las byung/ /dbyangs can marka ta'i 'od/ /
133a5(rgyud 'grel): lus ni me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /ta ma bu ra ni brdung zhing gnas/ /nub kyi sgo ru saM las byung/ /'phrog byed dkar mo glang la zhon/ /stag lpags bla gos phrag par gzar/ /zla ba phyed pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /mig gsum mchog spyin
133a6(rgyud 'grel): rde'u chung dang/ /thod pa mdung gi lag ba brgyan/ /bkra shis sgra ni sgrogs pa dang/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu gnas/ /de yi gnas su maM las byung/ /dbang phyug chen mo gtso bor mtshungs/ /'on kyang de yi lag g.yas na/ /bgrang
133a7(rgyud 'grel): phreng dag ni thogs par bshad/ /de yi g.yon du shaM las byung/ /gadkA'i lha mo gtso bor mtshungs/ /lag na mchog sbyin pad+ma thog /sum cu gsum pas mchod pa yis/ /lho sgor aM las byung ba yis/ /brgya byin mdog ser cher
133b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba/ /g.yas na rdo rje snying gar thogs/ /g.yon gyi rin chen gdugs thogs nas/ /lha mo la ni bsnyen te gnas/ /rin po che yi tsad pan brgyan/ /de yi g.yas su i las byung/ /dbang mo zhes bya bdag por mtshungs/ /skra ser thor tshugs
133b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du bcings/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /de yi g.yon du taM las byung/ /thig le mchog ma gser bsregs 'dra/ /g.yas na thod pa lcags kyu bsnams/ /g.yon pa mchod sdong lcug dkris 'dra/ /dbang ldan i byung dbang po
133b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dza mru? nA dra'i gser bod 'dra/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par krubs/ /glang che nas srung stan la ni/ /rgyal po'i rol pas yad ngag gnas/ /g.yas kyis rdo rje snying gar 'dzin/ /g.yon pa lha mor bsnyems te gnas/ /mchod pa'i las la
133b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu brtson/ /de yi g.yas su saM las byung/ /bde sogs ma de bdag por mtshungs/ /g.yas kyis rtse gsum snying gar thogs/ /g.yon pas lcags kyu lta bur 'khyud/ /g.yon du raM las byung ba yi/ /ra mtsa pa zhes bya mrka ta 'dra/ /skra
133b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mandal yis brgyan/ /me long thogs shing rol par bcas/ /mer ni kuM las gyung ba yi/ /nor bdag ku be ra zhes bya/ /mdog ni ser skya shin tu mdzes/ /g.yas na bi tsa pu ra thogs/ /g.yon na rin chen lcags ma'i shing/ /ro langs
133b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni sten la gnas/ /de yi g.yas su paM las byung/ /nor gyi blo ma gser mdog can/ /lus ni rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs/ /lag pa gnyis kyis shin tu mdzes/ /g.yas kyis mi 'jigs sbyin par byid/ /g.yon na 'bras kyi snye ma
133b7(rgyud 'grel): thogs/ /de yi g.yon du haM las byung/ /'phrog ma ma rkang lta bu'i 'od/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus/ /mchog sbyin mya ngan med shing thog /bden bral b+hUM? byung 'byung po'i rgyal/ /mdog sngon rta yi stan la gnas/ /thod pa rin chen
134a1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan can/ /g.yas na dbyug pa thogs nas su/ /g.yon pa gi waM sdigs par byed/ /de yi g.yas su laM las byung/ /lang ka'i bdag mo zhes bya ba/ /gyen 'greng skya ni thod pas bcings/ /mdog ljang ma rka ta 'dra ba/ /
134a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na rnal 'byor mtshon cha thogs/ /g.yon na thod par khrag ni thogs/ /de yi g.yon du raM byung ba'i/ /khrag la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /mdog dmar gzi brjid chen mo ste/ /mtshan ma lang ka'i dbang mor mtshungs/ /rlung mtshams
134a3(rgyud 'grel): chu yi'i rgyal po ste/ /b+hur b+hur zhes bya bas bskyed/ /chu srin gyi ni stan la gnas/ /mdog dmar gzi brjid chen po ste/ /lag na mchog sbyin zhags pa thogs/ /cod pan dmar pos nye bar mdzes/ /de yi g.yas su b+hi las byung/ /longs spyod
134a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma byu ru'i mdog/ /spyi bor dengs kas brgyan pa ste/ /g.yas pa yis ni rda yab thogs/ /g.yon pa lha yi lus las skyes/ /rang gi nu ma blta zhing mdzes/ /g.yon du hUM las byung ba yi/ /utpal dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /mdog dkar
134a5(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid chen mo ste/ /nor bur bcas pa'i gdengs kas brgyan/ /g.yas kyis utpal thogs nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas bus mong brkyang/ /'jig rten pa yi lha yi gnas/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas shin tu bskor/ /sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs
134a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi phyag dang mdog la sogs pa'i cho ga ste dgu pa'o/ //phyi rol gnas ni zlum po la/ /dpa' bo nyi shu'i re'u mig bya/ /shar gyi re'u cha'i dbus dgod pa/ /rkeng rus 'jigs byed kaM las
134a7(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /de yi pang bar dgod bya ba/ /pad+ma 'byung ba kaM las byung/ /de yi g.yas su khaM las byung/ /kha TwAM ga yi srin po ste/ /de yi pang par dgod bya ba/ /khaM byung lha mo se na rnon ma/ /de yi g.yon du gaM las byung/ /sgra zab ces bya'i dpa' bo ste/ /
134b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi phab dgong lha mo ni/ /gaM las byung ba sgra zab ma/ /'khor lo'i byang gi dbus su ni/ /dril rna zhes bya lha las byung/ /de yi pad gnas lha mo ni/ /bum pa'i nu ma g+haM las byung/ /g.yas kyi cha la tsam las ni/ /byung ba'i gtum pa'i dbang phyag ste/ /
134b2(rgyud 'grel): de dang 'khyud pa'i lha mo ni/ /g.yon pa'i gdong can paM las byung/ /de yi g.yon du chaM byung ba'i/ /ser rga'i gdong can zhes bya ba/ /de dang 'khyud pa'i lha mo ni/ /so yis 'dral ba tshaM las byung/ /nub kyi re'u cha dbus ma la/ /dza byung mngal
134b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshon cha dga' / /de dang lhan cig gnas pa ni/ /brla mthon ma ste jaM las byung/ /g.yas kyi re'u char gnas pa yi/ /sgra 'jigs zhes bya dzA las byung/ /de dang 'khyud pa'i lha mo ni/ /sgra byed dga' mAng dz+nya las byung/ /de yi g.yon
134b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi re'u cha la/ /chu skyar za ba TaM las byung/ /de yi pang par gnas pa ni/ /thor cog gis brgyan TaM las byung/ /lho'i re'u mig dbus ma las/ /tha las byung bsgrogs pa can/ /de yi pang par gnas pa ni/ /dor thabs la dga' thaM las
134b5(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /de yi g.yas su dgod pa ni/ /cang te'u 'dul byed DaM las byung/ /de yi pang par gnas pa ni/ /DaM DaM rda sgra DaM las byung/ /g.yon gyi re'u cha gnyis pa la/ /rwa ka'i 'ur sgra DaM las byung/ /de yi pang par gnas pa ni/ /'ja' kas
134b6(rgyud 'grel): ral ma DnyaM las byung/ /dbang ldan gyi ni re'u cha la/ /rtsod la dga' ba taM las byung/ /de yi pad par gnas pa ni/ /pyin phran ma ste taM las byud/ /de'i re'u cha gnyis pa la/ /lags rings zhes bya tha las byung/ /de dang lhan cig gnas
134b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /rnam par g.yo ba thaM las byung/ /me mtshams kyi ni re'u cha la/ /che ba brtsegs pa daM las byung/ /de yi pang par gnas pa ni/ /'od rnon ma ste dam las byung/ /de yi re'u mig gnyis pa la/ /brtan bzhir 'jigs pa taM las
135a1(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /de yi pang gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /dal bus smras pa'ang taM las byung/ /bden bral gyi ni re'u mig la/ /lus rgyas zhes bya paM las byung/ /de yi pang par gnas pa ni/ /mig ser ma yang paM las byung/ /de
135a2(rgyud 'grel): yi re'u cha gnyis pa la/ /gtsub pa'i gdong can phoM las byung/ /de yi pang nas lha mo ni/ /phaM las byung ba'i mig rgyas ma/ /rlungs mtshams re'u mig gnas pa/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs can paM las byung/ /de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /
135a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i lus can baM las byung/ /de yi re'u mig gnyis pa la/ /sgru 'jigs zhes bya b+haM las byung/ /de yi yan lag la gnas pa/ /bud sgra ma ste b+haM las byung/ /nam mkha' yi ni grong khyer mchog /dpa' bo nyi shu kun gyis bskor
135a4(rgyud 'grel): rtse bran lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /gcer bu skra ni rnam par grol/ /rnal 'byor ma dang phan tshun 'khyud/ /rnal 'byor mtshon dang snod thogs nas/ /bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang/ /btung ba zhim po dag gis bkang/ /ye shes
135a5(rgyud 'grel): gdan dang gzhan gyi gdan/ /sbyor gdan 'dod pa lnga yis mchod/ /gsang ba'i gdan la dgong pa'i dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i mtshan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas 'khor lo kun bskyed de/ /ye shes
135a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bkug nas kyang/ /dam tshig 'khor lor bcug byas nas/ /gnyis med ye shes 'khor lor 'gyur/ /til dang 'bras yos nas dang gro/ dri zhi ma me tog dkar por bcas/ /chu ni 'o mar sres pas dgang/ /gser ram gzhan
135a7(rgyud 'grel): las byas pa'i snod/ /mdzes pa mdun du bzhag par bya/ /der ni me long dri med bzhag /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni sa gdugs sbyar/ /dkar po cung zad dgug par bshad/ /dam sig mchog tu dgug pa ste/ /'di
135b1(rgyud 'grel): ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'o/ /g.yon pa khu tshur bcings nas su/ /gi waM dang ni dri gsuM brkyang/ dri gsuM gyi ni tshig gsum par/ /gi waM gi ni rtse mo gzugs/ /du ba lcags kyu nyid du bya/ /
135b2(rgyud 'grel): oM a k+Sha ni hUM phaT/ 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba bsdams byas nas/ /dri ma gsum dang dud pa bsgreng/ /a rg+ha'i snod la reg nas ni/ /oM pra tI ts+tsha a rg+haM swAhA/ /zhes bdun nam nyi shu gcig bzlas la/ /arg+ha dag ni dbul
135b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /rdo rje/ bu tshur bcings nas ni/ /dkar po dang ni ye shes sbyar/ /pad+ma dung dang du ba rnams/ /rim gyis bskyong cing dgrol bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis me tog dbul/ /oM pra ba ra sa ta kA ra pra tits+tsha swAhA/ zhes bya bas so/ /sngar bstan
135b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis btab nas su/ /kha zhags bkru ba dbul bar bya/ /nye bar sbyod pa lngas mchod nas/ /hUM gi bkra shis dbyangs brang bya/ /hUM hUM hUM/ /dga' ba'i lus 'di shin tu sbral/ /rnal 'byor sa ni thams cad khyod/ /gsang ba dag ni bcings
135b5(rgyud 'grel): don du/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje shin tu bskyod/ /tshangs pas bsil yab g.yob pa dang/ /seng ge dag ni sgo dpon te/ /brkya byin gdugs ni thogs pa yis/ /'phrog byed yon tan sgrogs par byad/ /mi 'am ci dang drang srong tshogs/ /bkra shis
135b6(rgyud 'grel): glu ni len pa'o/ /bkra shis kyi klu'o/ /rtsa ba nag sogs med cing chos/ /lto yangs mgrin pa 'phyang pa ni/ /shing lo phye ma'i steng bzhag ste/ /rgya mtsho 'bab chu chu po'i chu/ /rje'i bu'i chu la sogs pa ni/ /btsags nas rab tu dgang bar bya/ /me
135b7(rgyud 'grel): tog phreng bas mgrin bcings te/ /sman lnga rin chen lnga sogs bzhugs/ /chu ni'o mar bsres par bya/ /shing lo myu gu sna tshogs dang/ /mgrin pa bgos kyis bryan bar bya/ /oM tabte ma hA ta bte zhes bya bas/ /gang+gA'i chu ni dbugs par byad
136a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam shes dang ni sa gdugs sbyar/ /lhag ma brkyang ba'i phyag rgya dang/ /reg nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod/ /oM suM k+ShuM yuM hUM phaT/ 'byor pa yod na lnga chen dang/ /dung dang gling bu sna tshogs rnga/ /dga' dang
136a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas ba'i dril bu dkrol/ /khrus kyi dus su sbyar bar bya/ /dang por dri zhim mar nag dang/ /'dag chal gyi ni byug par bya/ /de nas dri zhim chu dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi yis kyang nan tan bkru/ /dung chos chu dang 'o ma ni/ /me tog dri zhim bcas pa
136a3(rgyud 'grel): blugs/ /de nas khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /des ni gos bzung brjod nas su/ /rdo rje steng gi phyogs su ni/ /rol par bcas pas dbul bar bya/ /oM hUM swAhA zhes brjod pa ni/ /gsang sngags 'di yis na bza' dbul/ /sngon bzhin
136a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /yon chab zhabs pa sil la sogs dbul/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /dkar po gi waM sgrogs tu sgrel/ /oM badzra pA ba hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gzhug par bya'o/ /seng ge'i phyag rgya bcings
136a5(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /oM smraM zhes bya ba'i sngags/ /khro dang bcas par bzlas pa yi/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bskrad par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab ni sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni lcags sgrog phyag rgya ste/ /oM
136a6(rgyud 'grel): badzra spo Ta daM zhes yu bya bas bcing ngo/ /sgo rnams kyi las so/ /ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa dang/ /khrus kyi cho ga ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' i phyag rgya bcing/ /
136a7(rgyud 'grel): oM tiSh+Tha A sa na hUM swAhA/ zhes bya bas seng ge'i gdan sogs bstan par bya/ /phyag rgya'i lan la ngos gnyis su/ /pad+ma'i bskor ba byas nas ni/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcings/ /yi shes kyis ni pad+ma mnan/ /sa gdugs rnam
136b1(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa gcig gnyis phan tshun sgrog du sgrel/ /lhag ma ba dan gsum brkyang ste/ /dri ma gsum dang dud pa skrad/ /rdo rje rtse lnga zhes bya ba/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' de bzhin gshegs/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bla na med/ /oM badzra sa twa dra sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:
136b2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM sa ma staM? a haM/ zhes mthar bnyags pa'i/ snying sngags lan bdun brjod par bya/ /sngags ni oM hUM ha swAhA/ rdo rje bcings pa dam bcas la/ /tri ma gsum dang dud pa bsgreng/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i rgya/ sngags ni oM aM A swAhA/
136b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bste shes par kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'o/ /oM hUM ha ha swAhA bya ste/ /de dag ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i 'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa bsdams pa yi/ /nang du ye shes rnam shes sbyar/ /oM suM a swAhA/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i 'o/ /de nyid las ni ye shes
