136b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rnam shes bsgreng drag mor 'dod/ /oM k+ShuM a? swAhA/ drag mo mkha' 'gro ma'i 'o/ /de nyid pad+ma sa gdugs su/ /rtse sbyar ro langs ma yir dgong/ /oM yuM aM swAhA/ /ro langs ma'i 'o/ /de nyid dud pa dri ma gsum/ /rtse sbyar gtum
136b5(rgyud 'grel): mo'i/ yin par 'dod/ /oM hUM A(rgyud 'grel): swAhA gtum ma'i 'o/ /pad+ma sa gdugs sbyar nas ni/ /dkar po gaM waM rtse sprad pa/ /seng go la sogs rnam bzhi yi/ /dam tshig yin par thub pas gsungs/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs sgo skyong dang/ /dkyil
136b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zlum po la gnas rnams/ /bdag po yi ni phyag rgya nyid/ /sngags dang bcas pa sbyar ba dag /dam tshig phyag rgya sngags dang ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa yin/ /'jig rten las 'das pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/
136b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi cho ga ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan dag chung mar bcas pa yi/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /nyi ma'i khu tshur dam bcings nas/ /gyen du rnam par dgrol bar bya/ /oM khe sha swAhA/ seng ge'i 'o/ /rdo rje
137a1(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /rang gi snying gar bskyod par bya/ /tshangs pa yi ni dam tshig du/ /bde bar gshegs kyis mdor bsdus gsungs/ /oM oM swAhA/ chengs pa'i 'o/ /nyi me'i khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /bdan gsum
137a2(rgyud 'grel): pa kyen du bskrad/ /'di ni mdung can phyag rgya ste/ /dam tshig 'jog pa'i dam pa'o/ /oM hUM swAhA/ ru tra yi'o/ zla ba'i khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /gi wa ngag ni bsgreng bar bya/ /nyi ma'i sor mo kun brkyang nas/ /de yi steng du dag ba par bya/ /oM me
137a3(rgyud 'grel): suM hUM swAhA/ brgya byin gyi'o/ /nyi ma'i khu tshur brtan bcings la/ /dkar po dud pa bsgreng bar bya/ /dbral bar steng gi thod sor drug /dbang po yi ni dam tshig 'dod/ /oM muM muM hUM swAhA/ dbang po'i 'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas nas/ /dkar
137a4(rgyud 'grel): po dad ni gi wang bsgreng/ /rin chen lta bur sbyar nas ni/ /lus ngan la ni bstan par bya/ /oM d+ha na a gre hUM swAhA/ lus dan gyi'o/ /khu tshur bcings nas dkar po ni/ /brkyang nas gyen du bsgred bar bya/ /'byung po bdag po'i dam tshig tu/ /
137a5(rgyud 'grel): thub pa rnams kyis bshad pa yin/ /oM khA ta ni hUM phaT/ 'byung po'i bdag po yi'o/ /khu tshur de nyid bzhag nas su/ /dkar po dang ni du ba brkyang/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal ba yis/ /gdengs ka'i bdag po'i dam tshig bshad/ /oM b+hur b+hu
137a6(rgyud 'grel): ba swAhA/ /klu yi bdag po'i'o/ /de dag gi ni chung ma rnams/ /bdag po'i dam tshig yin par bshad/ /sngags ni so sor bstan par bya/ /oM la k+Sh+mi ye swAhA/ oM bA rA hI swAhA/ oM swAhA/ oM pra ha rSh+ye swAhA/ oM ma he shwa rye swAhA/
137a7(rgyud 'grel): oM gaM gA ye swAhA/ oM in dra ye swAhA/ oM ti lot+ta ma ye swAhA/ oM sa rtsi ye swAhA/ oM ri b+ha ye swAhA/ oM bsu ma ti ye swAhA/ oM ha re n+ye swAhA/ oM lang+ge shwa rye swAhA/ oM ra ka ta pri ya yi swAhA/ oM b+ha ga ba tye swAhA/ /oM utpal pri
137b1(rgyud 'grel): yA ye swAhA/ sbyor pa'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ lha rnams kyi dam tshig phyag rgya dang/ /sngags kyi cho ga ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas rdo rje thal mo ni/ /dam bcings ye shes rnam shes dang/ /nang du bcug ste bcing bar bya/ /pad+ma'i snod ces bya
137b2(rgyud 'grel): bar grags/ /keng rus 'jigs byed la sogs pa dang pad+ma'i 'byung gnas la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ de dag chung ma dang bcas pa'i sngags ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM ka raM ka b+hai ra bA ya swAhA/ oM ka ma la ka ring ye swAhA/ oM kha TwAM gA rak+Sha sA ya

138b1(rgyud 'grel): brkyang nas? su/ /kha spyad nas ni steng du bzhag /oM g+hiM b+ha swAhA/ drag mo la sogs pa yi'o/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/ /nyi ma zla ba phye ste spro/ /oM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ drag shul can ma la sogs pa'o/ /nyi ma zla ba rab brkyang nas/ /rgyab dang

138b3(rgyud 'grel): mo yi ni dam tshig 'gyur/ /oM hUM swAhA/ sgeg mo'i 'o/ /zla ba'i lag pa brkyad nas su/ /rnam shes dang ni 'jig par sbyar/ /nyi ma'i lag pa gzung bar bya/ /dri'i dud zhes bya bar grags/ /oM su gad+he hUM swAhA/ dri yi'o/ /zla ba'i thal mo gshabs

139b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas pad skor sngon 'gro ba'i/ /sgeg pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa dang/ /pi bang tshul gyis pi bang dang/ /gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang/ /sil snyan tshul gyi dkrol ba dang/ /brdab pa'i tshul gyis

139b6(rgyud 'grel): kho na yis dbul/ /nya phyis snod ni bkang nas su/ /nyi ma'i pad+mar bzhag par bya/ /rnam shes 'jig par sbyar nas su/ /de nyid thams cad rig pas dbul/ /lha gsum gyis ni bsrungs nas kyang/ /thig pa'i thor ma kun la bcu/ /

140a1(rgyud 'grel): dzraM a swAhA/ lcags kyu lha'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM hUM hUM hUM guM hUM hUM hUM/ oM phaM guM pheM guM hUM swAhA/ mnyes pa chen po'i sngags kyi mnyos par bya ba'o/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu dkrol/ /de nyid rig pas rdo rje gsor/ /rdo rje
140a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa gsor ba yis/ /sems can 'khor ba las grol zhing/ /thar pa thob par mjed pa ste/ /dga' dang bcas pas rdo rje gzung/ /rdo rje gsor ba'i de kho na nyid do/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya/ /

140a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bril bu'i sgra dang ni/ /de kho na yis mchod nas su/ /me tog dkar po bdug pa dang/ /sa lu'i zan dang zho ru bcas/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi bsres nas ni/ /dbang ldan mtshams su 'bang dam chod/ /me tog dkar sogs bdug pa dang/ /chad
140a5(rgyud 'grel): gi snod ni rgya cher bcas/ /lha bshos sna tshogs mchod pa ni/ /rlung gi mtshams su dbul bar bya/ /nya dang sha dang sran chan bcas/ /snod ni yongs su bkang nas su/ /til 'khur la sogs bca' dang bcas/ /bden bral du ni dbul bar bya/ /
140a6(rgyud 'grel): zho ngang sbrang rtsi mar du bsre/ /bza' ba zhim por bcas pa dang/ /blo dang ldan pas me mtshams su/ /khyud par du ni dbul bar bya/ /dri dang me tog rgya chen dang/ /bdug spos mar me rgya chen dang/ /gtor ma'i mchod pa rgya chen rnams/ /
140a7(rgyud 'grel): ngad dang ldan pas gnas nas dbul/ /phyi rol mtshams bzhi'i gtor ma'i mchod pa'i cho ga ste bcu drug pa'o// //mnyam nyid ye shes las bskyod pa/ /slob dpon shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /nyi mas rdo rje gsor ba dang
140b1(rgyud 'grel): zla bas dril bu gsil nas ni/ /sgeg cing rgod pa'i bzhin gyis ni/ /thams cad kun nas mchod par bya/ /hUM gi glu yi tshul gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes bya ste/ /mda' dang gzhu la sogs pa yi/ /phyag rgya dang ni ldan par bya/ /
140b2(rgyud 'grel): gang dag gang gi rgya 'ching ba/ /de dang de gzugs mtshon par bya/ /hUM gi sgra ni snyan pa yi/ /bkra shis gru yis yongs su bkab/ /sems dpa' chen po dang po mchog /dgyes chen rnams kyi dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje
140b3(rgyud 'grel): snyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag /thugs kyi sems dpa' ting 'dzin mchog /rdo rje'i rdo rje stobs po che/ /kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i mchog /bdud kyi bdud sde 'joms pa'o/ /sems can kun gyi sems byang chub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
140b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog skye mchog/ rdo rje hUM ste hUM mdzad pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor sbyin pa/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'dod dang thar pha nor che ba/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste/ /'jig rten gsum mchog khams
140b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa/ /mi rgyus ni mchog tu gsal/ /shin tu phra dang sbo a'i tshogs/ /rgyu ba rnams kyi rab mchog brnyes/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo sbyong mdzad pa/ /thog mdza' med cing gsal ba min/ /shes rab sdug la rnam par gnas/ /
140b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi phyag rgya snyoms zhugs pa/ /de nyid sems dpa' che bas che/ /rdo rje khro bo khro chen po/ /'jigs pa'i me ni 'dul bar mdzad/ /gdug pa mchog ni 'dul ba che/ /drag po'i drag mchog 'jigs byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs
140b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub che/ /chos kyi las chen 'dzin pa po/ /dam chos las ni bzang po'i lam/ /byang chub sems ni sbyor bar mdzad/ /thams cad dag tu pad+ma che/ /shes rab kyis nor che ba/ /'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin

141a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dad pas khyod la 'dud bgyid pas/ /deng bdag rdo rje sems 'grub mdzod/ /thams cad rnam par dag pa dam pa dang po'i bstod pas mchod pa'i cho ga ste

141a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas 'dud/ /te na hUM/ te na te te hUM/ glang chen mchog gi steng bzhugs shing/ /sku ni dung ltar dkar bas mdzes/ /mdza' yas dug gis brgyan pa'i sku/ /shar gtso rdo rje ma la 'dud/ /gser gyi mchog ltar mdzes pa'i

141b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i gtso la 'dud/ /'od zer dra ba sngon pos mdzes/ /seng ge 'phrog byed tshangs dbang gtso/ /bdud 'dul phyir na khro gzugs 'dzin/ /hUM mdzad lho gi lha mor 'dug /hUM hUM hUM/ sangs rgyas lnga yi mkha' 'gro ma/ /lnga lnga rnam par dag pa yis

141b4(rgyud 'grel): shig kha sbyor sbyar pa mdzad/ /dam chos snying po rgyas mdzad ma/ /dam chos thar pa'i gtso bo'i gtso/ /yang dag rgyal ba 'khor ba spangs/ /dkyil 'khor spros pas 'gro ba sgrol/ /bdud gsol seng ge ma yi sku/ /stag mos shin tu

145a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge raM gyi lcags kyu yis/ /me yi dbus su sems kyi dgug /mchod yon zhabs sil la sogs pa/ /las kyi cho ga ji bzhin dbul/ /yam shing zho can lnga yi shing/ /'o ma la sogs lnga po bsreg /zho dang sbrang rtsi bu ram dang/ /
145a6(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma sA lu'i zan du bcas/ /'bras kyi so ba la sogs 'bru/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin du bsreg /zhi ba la sogs pa yi me/ /thams cad ji bzhin dpyad par bya/ /dri dang me tog bdug pa sogs/ /mkhas pas thams cad mchod
145a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /rnal 'byor pad+ma'i me yi dbus bkod nas/ /de dbus rdo rje lha mo ni/ /lha mo ni/ /lha mo kun gyi 'byung gnas te/ /dbus kyi lha mo dgug par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /gzugs mdzes yongs su rdzogs par bsam/
145b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya kun rig pas/ /sngon bzhin thams cad mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dbus su ni/ /de nyid kun gyis mchod nas kyang/ /bsreg par bya pa'i rdzas kun gyis/ /lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /oM sarba saM sho d+ha
145b2(rgyud 'grel): ni hUM phaT /rdzas bsang ba'i sngags so/ /rnam shes sa gdugs sbyar nas ni/ /rdo rje rtse mo gsum du brtags/ /oM hUM A swAhA/ sreg blugs kyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dang po yam shing bsreg par bya/ /de yi 'og tu mar
145b3(rgyud 'grel): byin nas/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o mar bcas/ /'bru rnams thams cad bsreg pa ni/ /sbyin sreg las ni gsum pa yin/ /bzhi par 'o thug dbul bya ste/ /sA lu'i 'bras zan mar dang ni/ /'o mar bcas bsregs lnga pa yin/ /de nyid can
145b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi brgya phrag lnga 'am/ /'byor na de bas lhag kyang rung/ /ji ltar nus pa bsregs pa yi/ /lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /de 'og mar dang 'o mar bcas/ /zhal gyi nang du bsreg par bya/ /slar yang de nyid sbyar nas su/ /las
145b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbye bas bsreg par bya/ /mar dang bdud rtsi lngar bcas pa'i/ /gang ba'i sreg blugs brtag par bya/ /de nas rdo rje dril dkrol te/ /rdo rje glu yis bstod par bya/ /hUM hUM hUM/ yang dag spo dang sdud pa po/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ston
145b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /thun mong rnal 'byor bdag nyid de/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM hUM hUM/ stong pa 'di nyid la sogs pa'i/ /de nyid las ni gzugs su bstan/ /gang dag 'dod bzhin byung ba'i dngos/ /ye shes lha la phyag 'tshal
145b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /thams cad glu dang gar la sogs/ /phyi dang nang gis mchod nas kyang/ /snying po bsdus shing bsags pa yis/ /slar yang de bzhin bsreg par bya/ /rdzas kyi cho ga yongs rdzogs nas/ /bsgrub pas bdag nyid sbyor bar bya/ /
146a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi 'bras bu lo 'bra'i 'bras/ /zho dang sbrang rtsi mar gyi bsgos/ /byang chub sems kyi yam shing la/ /brgya phrag lnga ni bsreg par bya/ /de yi dbus su dbang bskur nas/ /smon lam btab ste mnyam par bzhag
146a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid nyams pa'ang sa gsum gyis/ /rgyal srid mdzes pa'ang myur du 'thob/ /'o ma sgrang rtsis sbags pa yi/ /lo ma yi ni yaM shing dag /brgya phrag lnga ru bsregs na ni/ /myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /las ni gang dang
146a3(rgyud 'grel): gang bsam pa/ /de dang de ni nges 'byung 'gyur/ /de nas sngon gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang rang gnas su lha mo brtag /me tog bdug pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mkhas pas sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bstan par bya/ /
146a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa nyi shus mchod nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bus rol par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya/ /sa gsum pad+mar sbrel nas ni/ /dkar po gi wang bsgrengs nas su/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bskyod par bya/ /
146a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra gaN+De hUM ho/ /oM badzra gaN+De ra Ni ta sarba bud+d+hA pra tsa yi te pradz+nya pA ra mi tA nA da swa b+hA be badzra d+ha ra ni h+ri daM yA a ba saM to Sha ni hUM hUM ho ho A(rgyud 'grel): swAhA// //zhes bya bas bskyod par bya ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sngags
146a6(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya'o/ /me thab kyi mtshan nyid dang/ sbyin 'sreg gi cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas lcags kyu lnga la sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma la dbul bar bya/ /lcaT kyu gzhin thams cad kyang/ /lcaT gyu lnga yi de nyid bya/ /thams cad rig
146a7(rgyud 'grel): pas phyi nang gi rnal 'byor ma kun dbul bar bya/ /khu tshur gnyis ni cibs nas su/ yis rnaM shes dkri bar bya/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM guM suM swAhA/ lcags kyu lnga'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /thams cad ro ni gcig gyur pa/ /lho nub kyi ni mtshams su bzhag /gnas ni gzhan dang

146b2(rgyud 'grel): bar spyang/ /bdan gsum pa brgyad byas nas/ /nya phyis la sogs mdun du bzhag /sngon gyi sngags sogs de nyid kyis/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni spyang bar bya/ /de yi dbus su zla ba la/ /bdud rtsa'i yi ge blta bar bya/ /oM ha ho h+ri(rgyud 'grel): g+h+ri hUM A swAhA/ zhes bya ba
146b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bdud rtsi lnga skyang ba'i sngags so/ /rnam shes dang ni 'jigs par sbyar/ /bsrung ba rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /rnal 'byor ma kun sngags rig pas/ /thigs pa'i thor ma dang por dbul/ /nya phyis la sogs snod bkang ste/ /so so'i char ni dbul
146b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /sbyin pa min pa'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pa thams cad mtshod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sgra yis ni/ /slar yang glu ni rlang bar bya/ /hUM hUM hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsam pas rol/ /thar pa la dgyes pa ltan yang/ /shin tu dbyer med brtan

147a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal gyur cig /lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa yi/ /mchod pa thams cad nges par dbul ba'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor mar bcas pa'i/ /dpa' bo'i
147a2(rgyud 'grel): sems ni mchod par bya/ /phyogs brgyad kun nas bskor ba ru/ /kun la gdan ni phus nas kyang/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gnas su/ /cig car lhan cig stan la bzhugs/ /de nyid rnal 'byor ma kun gyis/ /gnyis sprod nu ma 'dzin
147a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /sgeg cing bzhad dang bcas pa yis/ /rdo rje dril bus rol par bya/ /kun la dri ni rim bzhin dbul/ /kun la me tog sogs pas mchod/ /thams cad dri yis bdugs nas ni/ /thams cad la ni mar me dbul/ /thams cad mdun du gtor
147a4(rgyud 'grel): ma ni/ /thams cad pud las dbul bar bgyi/ lcags kyu'i rdzas ni sna tshogs te/ /khyad par du ni rnam pa lnga/ /gnyis med de nyid de yid kyi/ /rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par bya/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' i rang bzhin du/ /slob dpon lus ni nges par bya/ /bdud rtsi
147a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi dung chos las/ /nan tan du ni zla bas dbul/ /sngar bstan pa ni de nyid kyi/ /sgrub pa pos ni gsang sngags brjod/ /gnas gsum du ni gtor nas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yis kun nas dbul/ /dam tshig spyod pa thams cad la/

147b1(rgyud 'grel): spang pa/ /de nyid gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas thams cad rnal 'byor pa/ /thams cad dag pa'i rim pa yis/ /thams cad 'dod bzhin byin gyis brlab/ /bkra shis glu ni len pa dang/ /dpa' bo rnam par dag pa'o/ /A li kA li bzlas

147b3(rgyud 'grel): gzigs pa yi/ /bza' dang bza' min rnam par spangs/ /'gro ba yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rnam par rol/ /bkra shis kun gyis mchod gnas su/ /rdo rje glu yis nye bar bsrung/ /rdo rje dril bu sgrar bcas pas/ /

147b5(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod gnas ma yi dags gdong/ /gcigs byed gtum mo khrag dgyes ma/ /dam tshig srung zhing rnal 'byor 'dzin/ /ki li ki li sgra chen ma/ /pha mes nags gnas gngon gyi ni/ /tshogs bcas dbus su bzhugs gyur pa/ /gcigs

147b7(rgyud 'grel): cung zad? bkug nas su/ /kha yi grwa ru bzhag par bya/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma la dud pa'i sol ba mo zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /pha mas nags kyi mchog dang ni/ /brag dang shing gcig chu chen 'gram/ /nye bar sbyong pa lnga ldan pa'i/ /gtor
148a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin se gol gsum gtog bya/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/ //de nas rdzas ni lnga po dag /dri zhim bcas shing 'o mar bsre/ /dud gi snod ni yongs bkang ste/ /dam tshig chu yis
148a2(rgyud 'grel): gtor bar bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM a swAhA/ lan bdun bar du bzlas nas/ /dam tshig chu ru brtag par bya/ /de nas slob ma re re nas/ /sdom pa dag ni byin nas gzhug /mig ni gos kyis bkab nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas gzhug par bya/ /slob dpon

148a5(rgyud 'grel): reg bya min/ /'jigs pa kun gyi 'jigs mi bya/ /sems can byams dang snying rje sogs/ /sdom pa dang ni tshul khrims bsrung/ /oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pu dze pas+tha nA ya At+ma naM ni rya ta ya mi/ /oM A tsa rya pu dzo pas+thA nA ya At+ma naM ni rya ta ya ni/ oM sa ga

148b1(rgyud 'grel): blud par bya/ /ji bzhin bka' ni bsgos nas kyang/ /dam tshig byas te dbab par bya/ /slob ma lha yi skur bskyed la/ /snying ga rlung gis bskor ba yi/ /rlung gi sa bon gzhag par bya/ /rkad par rlung dang rlung gis ni/ /snying ga'i rlung gis sba bar bya/ /ye shes mkha' 
148b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bdag byas te/ /hUM gi ye shes drag tu bzla/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): kha khi la le hUM a/ /rdo rje dril bur sgrar bcas pas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis nga rgyal bskyed/ /rdo rje glu yis glu len cing/ /rdo rje gar gyis drag tu bskyod/ /rang 'dod gar gyis gar byed cing/ /bdag nyid
148b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra sa twa sa ma ya pra ti pa la ka hUM hUM hUM ho ho ho swAhA/ gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /de nas me tog gtor nas ni/ /gnas lnga yin lha mo yi/ /rigs kyi bye brag shes byas la/ /sngags dang phyag rgyal la sogs sbyin/ /oM dz+nyA
148b4(rgyud 'grel): na naM k+Shu hUM a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ de mig phye nas phyag byas te/ /lha yi de nyid bstan par bya/ /sum cu pa yi 'byung ba'i gnas/ /lha rnams kun gyi bdag po ste/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dngos kyi/ /shes rab pa rol phyin mas 'khyud/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' zhes bya ba/
148b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag ye shes kyis sgrul ltos/ /me long ye shes las sprul pa/ /sdad ba thams cad 'joms mdzad cing/ /glang po'i steng na yang dag bzhugs/ /shar gyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ltos/ /mnyam nyid ye shes las byung ba/ /sbrul dga' yi ni stan la bzhugs/ /

148b7(rgyud 'grel): byod? lha mo las bltog stag ser bug pa ce sbyang ste/ /snying po'i grwa bzhi dag na gnas/ /seng ge phag dang ma he dang/ /ce spyang gi ni stan la bzhugs/ /sems can don bya'i rgyu ru ni/ /thabs chen sna tshogs gzugs kyi bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro ma 'bar 'jigs byed
149a1(rgyud 'grel): ma/ 'phrog byed ma ste sgo rnams skyong/ /lha rnams thams cad 'gugs pa dang/ /'dzud cing 'ching dang mnyes byed yin/ /spos mo 'ju byed gtum mo ste/ /bdud rtsi'i snod ni phyag na bsnams/ /drag mo khrag gsog sha

149a6(rgyud 'grel): lag lnga btung de/ /a rg+ha zhabs bkru mchod sogs te/ /rang 'dod chos ni gsol ba gang ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs bcas pa'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i go 'phang las/ /phyir mi ldog par bdag 'gyur ba'i/ /rig pa gang yin deng bdag gsol/ /
149a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob mthal sbyar nas/ /sdom pa'i sngags ni brjod par bya/ /oM badzre maN+Dal mahA maN+Da la pra b+ha sha sta hI/ oM yo ga maN+Dal ma hA maN+Da ma darshi stwaM hUM/ oM g+hu hya maN+Dal ma hA maN+Dal d+hi k+Shi staM haM sa ma ya ste/ sa ma ya ho/ yang slob mas brjod du
149b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya ste/ /don dam smra ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ /sdug bsngal gcod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa/ /srid pa'i nyes dmigs skyed rtsa nyon mongs bcad nas ni/ /rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod/ /nyi ma'i khu tshur
149b2(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas su/ /dud dang ye shes sbyor bar bya/ /lha yi bdag nyid tshul gyis ni/ /gnas brgyad dag ni bsrung bar bya/ /k+ShuM ni spyi bor bsam bya ste/ /hUM ni mig gnyis dag tu dgod/ /yuM ni rna ba sna ngag la/ /lce la sum yig 'bar ba bsam/ /mgrin
149b3(rgyud 'grel): par smryuM ni brtsegs pa ste/ /nam tshongs dag la smryuM bsam/ /snying ga'i phyogs su ymryuM/ lte bar ymryuM dgod par bya/ /sa bon brgyad ni dgod par dang/ /phyag rgya rim bzhin yan lag dgod/ /oM sa ma yo ho haM/ mi ti maM/ /oM(rgyud 'grel): dz+nya no haM/ mi ti hUM bar d+ha no
149b4(rgyud 'grel): haM ho/ /oM ud+d+ha pa A a A(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM phaT/ de nyid so sor bzung ba yis/ /ye shes sku ni bdag ces brjod/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa byin nas su/ /de la dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyi go cha dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu
149b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas dbang ni bskur ba'i phyir/ /lho dang nub dang byang bu ni/ /shar phyogs kyi ni bum pa rnams/ /slob dpon gyis ni bsnyen pa bya/ /seng ge'i gdan sogs lnga la ni/ /mgo por gdugs dang bcas te bzhag /bzang
149b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'dug stengs gnas nas ni/ /me tog bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar/ /byang chub sems kyi sa bon gyi sa bon gyis/ /sems can bla med smon par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar ldan pas/ /bkra shis glu yi dgang bar bya/ /slob ma shar du bltas nas ni/ /
149b7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon nub tu blta bar bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs sbyor ba yi/ /nyi zla'i lag pa bum gzung nas/ /rdo rje bcas pa'i shing lo yis/ /bum pa'i ye shes chu blangs te/ /de ring 'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i/ /byang chub chen por dbang bskur bya/ /
150a1(rgyud 'grel): oM a phuM phoM phaT hUM swAhA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya ni/ /dkar po gi wang sgrel bar bya/ /oM badzra kA ya hUM A(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /gnas brgyad kyis ni gnas rnams su/ /bsrung ba dag ni bcing bar bya/ /nyi mar rdo rje byin nas su/ /zla bar
150a2(rgyud 'grel): dril bu sbyin par bya/ /mgo bor sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni gi waM bsgred/ /rtse mo cung zad bkug ste sprad/ /du ba dang ni dri gsum brkyang/ /oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ sangs
150a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas lnga yi cod pan gyis/ /dbang bskur sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bdag gis thams cad byin nas su/ /ming brtags rdo rje lag tu sbyin/ /brtul bzhugs gar la sogs pa rnams/ /ji ltar smos pa'i rim bzhin sbyin/ /der ni sngags dang phyag rgya bcing/ /
150a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi nges pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor nam mkha' yi/ /dbang gis di ring dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis zung/ /oM sh+rI yo ga aM ba ri twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ pa ri sa ma ya stwaM/ thog mdza' med pa'i
150a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /rdo rje'i 'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub
150a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu rgyal ba bzheng/ /srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag ba'i sems dpa' yi/ /dngos po mchog du byed par 'gyur/ /dril bu'o/ /rdo rje dril bu 'khyud nas ni/ /g.yon snyems pa dang
150a7(rgyud 'grel): skros gnon 'chang/ /gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis/ /phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rnal 'byor ldan/ /bdag po'i dbang ni bskur nas su/ /A li kA li'i sa bon gyis/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur sbyin
150b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /he sh+rI yo ga oM ba ri twaM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi nA ma a b+hi She ka ta zhes bya ba pa dpal gyi sgra dang bcas pas ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /gsang ba rdo rje'i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcas/ /rnal 'byor
150b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i brtun/ /oM sarba ta thA ga twa sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha eSha twaM d+hAra ya mi hUM hUM ha ha ha ho/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs so/ /de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnal 'byor ma dad dpa' sogs la/ /shes rab thabs kyi snyems chen gyis/ /
150b3(rgyud 'grel): gar mchod bde ba'i dga' ston gyis/ /gar ro/ sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phang/ /sangs rgyas kun sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /des ni 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ /phreng ba de yi rgyan yin no/ /phreng ba'o/ /lus can kun la dam tshig gyi/ /khyod kyis
150b4(rgyud 'grel): glu ni blang bar bya/ /des na rnal 'byor ma de dang/ /myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /glu'o/ /khyod kyi rgyal la dri phul la/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang/ /rnal 'byor ye shes mthong ba yi/ /byang chub lus can rnams la bsgros dri'o/ /rdzogs
150b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la spos phul la/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos legs tshim gyis/ /lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su/ /ye shes kyi ni tshim par 'gyur/ /spyos so/ /chos kyi me ni legs spar ba/ /pad+ma gar dbang rang nyid de/ /sems
150b6(rgyud 'grel): can ma rig ldongs byas pa/ /ye shes sgron mas snang bar gyis/ /mar me'o/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib gsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra nai tra A pa
150b7(rgyud 'grel): ha ra phaT laM h+rI/ thur ma'o/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la brnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /ngo bo med cing gnas med pa/ /rgyu dang las las kun nas 'byung/ /de ltar chos 'di shes kyis la/ /sems
151a1(rgyud 'grel): can don 'di mnyam med gyis/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor ma sras skye/ /me long do/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /bya ba spyod tshul gsang ba yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ /
151a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /'khor lo'o/ /khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par/ /yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /dri med kun tu gang bar gyis/ /dud do/ /g.yon pa'i chos gos phrag par gzar/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya dang/ /
151a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag byas te/ /'khor lo kun la rnam bzhugs te/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' lung ston bzhin/ /mgrin gcig bzhin du lung bstan bya/ /'di ni khyed la ngas lus bstan/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' de bzhin gshegs/ /ngan
151a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro srid las bton nas su/ /srid mchog gtan du dag par gyis/ /he sh+rI yo gAM pa ri nA ma ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya stAM b+hur b+hu ba swAhA/ lung bstan pa'o/ /shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/ /kun tu 'khyud de me tog rol/ /sangs rgyas lnga
151a5(rgyud 'grel): yi dngos sa bon/ /me tog nang du rtog tu rol/ /sde tshan gsum gyis rnam rol pa/ /der ni rnam par dgod par bya/ /dpa' bo sdig gi gnyen po ste/ /dpal dang ldan zhing lhun che ba/ /dpa' bos de nyid goms par bya/ /sangs rgyas
151a6(rgyud 'grel): kun bdag sbyor ba yis/ /mdun du yi ges dbang bskur la/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni bstan par bya/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur bstan par bya/ /yi ge brgyad po bsgom du gzhug /slob dpon gyi ni dbang bskur nas/ /ye shes rnam shes bstan
151a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sbyor ba yi ni dbang bskur nas/ /gsang ba thams cad mngon par brjod/ /gsang chen de dag thams cad kyis/ /dbang bskur ba ni go 'phang mchog /bzod pa'i chos ni sngon 'gro bas/ /sems can rnams ni gzir mi bya/ /
151b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig rtsub khyal pas smra min zhing/ /sems can rnams ni sun mi dbyung/ /tshul khrims sdom pa bsrung bya zhing/ /skye bo rnams la gtse mi bya/ /bdag nyid shi bar gyur kyang bla/ /sems can srog gcod de lta min/ /rab tu 'bar mer mtshungs pas
151b2(rgyud 'grel): na/ gzhan gyi nor pa re mi bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi brdzun bsrung zhing/ /phan tshun dbye ba'i las mi bya/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de la brdzun ni yod ma yin/ /spyod pa bag yod bcas pa dang/ /bza' dang longs spyod bag yod bya/ /
151b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar rol pa bag yod cing/ /gtor sogs cho ga bag yod la/ /rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod pas/ /sems can brten na 'grub par 'gyur/ /thams cad shes pa'i slob ma gang/ /sems can dga' ba'i las rnams bya/ /mnyam nyid
151b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes las bskyed nas/ /thams cad mnyam nyid blta bar bya/ /rtag tu mnyam pa'i spyod pa can/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor bsam gtan gus/ /bslab pa blangs pas sngon 'gro bas/ /dkyil 'khor gtor ma la sogs pa/ /sems can don byed
151b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims rnams/ /bu yi srog bzhin bskyang bar bya/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pas/ /sems can thams cad rim bzhin du/ /gnyis med cho ga bzhin mchod nas/ /lha la
151b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni 'tshal du gzhug /slob ma dag ni thams cad dang/ /sems can kun la de nyid bstan/ /dbang bskur ba thams cad dang/ bslab pa'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas slob ma blo ldan pas/ /bla ma'i yon
151b7(rgyud 'grel): ni dbul bar bya/ /bu dang chud ma sdug pa dang/ /gnyen dang bran po bran mor bcas/ /yul dang zhing dang khyim dang ni/ /mu tig gos dang gser dang ni/ /dngul dang zangs sogs nor rnams dang/ /'bru ni rnam pa sna tshogs dbul/ /mal stan
152a1(rgyud 'grel): dag ni thams cad dang/ /mnyes pa'i longs spyod kun phul nas/ /mthar ni bdag gis lus nyid kyang/ /slob dpon yon du brtag par bya/ /slob mar gus pa med pa yis/ /dngos grub ring bar the tshom med/ /yon dang dad
152a2(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon 'gro bas/ /dngos po kun gyi mnyes par bya/ /dri dang me tog bdug pa sogs/ /phyag rgya thams cad mchod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sgra ldan pas/ /bkra shis glu yis dgang bar bya/ /hUM hUM mgon khyod yongs su thar ba'ang khyod/ /chos
152a3(rgyud 'grel): ston pa yang khyod yin te/ /snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs/ /kye gzugs bzang mthar phyin pa yang khyod/ /kye de nyid srid pa las grol khyod/ /rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /kye thar pa'i rdo rje khyod nyid do/ /lnga pa'i dbyangs dang
152a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa yis/ /bkra shis bstong sgra nye bar bsdu/ /oM ra ma ra ma ho hi hi hUM ho A(rgyud 'grel): oM ra ma ra ma ho hUM hUM hUM ho he A/ oM ra ma ra ma phruM phruM phruM phruM hUM hUM phruM pheM a/ oM ra ma ra ma ho g+hu g+hu g+he a swAhA/ rnal 'byor ma brgyad phreng sngags
152a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ mnyes par byas nas nyi ma dang/ /zla ba dag ni kun tu sbyar/ /me tog gis ni snyim par dgang/ /sems can kun la sems chen pos/ /smon lam dag ni gdab par bya/ /ma brgal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral/ /rnal
152a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bstan bcos go 'phang gnas/ /bya ba dag ni 'bras bu brtag /rgyal dbang shis pa brjod pa dag /thams cad sngon du byin la brtag /yon bdag la sogs sems can rnams/ /thal mo sbyar te gnas par bya/ /me
152a7(rgyud 'grel): tog bcas pas dung chos chus/ /shis pa brjod pa 'bar bar bya/ /de ring khyod ni 'khor ba yi/ /rgya mtsho las ni rang brgal zhing/ /rdo rje las byung rdo rje dngos/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang dbang bskur zhing/ /myur du sems can
152b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /don byed nus pa'i sems dang ldan/ /shis pa dag ni brjod nas su/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i sbyor ba bya/ /bla ma'i yon dang slob ma'i bzod par gsol ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //
152b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje dam bcings nas/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): te hUM/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): mi hUM/ na mo na ma(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /sngags gsum rig pas phyag bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /zla ba
152b3(rgyud 'grel): snying gar bcir nas su/ /nyi ma sa la brkyang nas ni/ /brtan par sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /oM gats+tsha gats+tsha swa b+hA ba naM hUM swAhA/ 'jig rten las 'das pa gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM gats+tsha pu rA nA ga ma na ya hUM phaT
152b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ se gol gsum ni gtog par bya/ /'jig rten pa kun gshegs su gsol/ /oM g+hi li g+hi li na d+haM hUM swAhA/ tshon rtsi bsdu ba'i sngags so/ /tshon rtsi dag ni bsdus nas ni/ /chu bo chen por bskyal bar bya/ /lhag ma'i cha i gtor ma yang/ /
152b5(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am chu 'gram bskyal/ /oM hi li hi li phu li ma hA phu li phoM phoM pheM swAhA/ lhag ma'i gtor ma la bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /btung dang bza' ba la sogs lnga/ /de nas slar ni mchod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni de nyid
152b6(rgyud 'grel): du/ tshon rtsi ser po la sogs pas/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad ge sar bcas/ /lte bar ldan pa bris nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma byin gyi brlab/ /sngar gyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ /mchod pa rgya chen thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo
152b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya/ /slob mar bcas pas sngags dang ni/ /bkra shis glu blang gar yang bya/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' gang yin pa/ /de nyid rnam par snang mdzad gtso/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro gang yin pa/ /de nyid 'phags ma mA ma kI/ mkha' 'gro drag
153a1(rgyud 'grel): ma gang yin pa/ /de nyid na bza' dkar mo yin/ /mkha' 'gro ro langs ma gang yin/ /de ni 'phags ma sgrol ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro gtum mo gang yin pa/ /de nyid sangs rgyas spyan ma yin/ /grub pa'i pho nya rnam pa bzhi/ /
153a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rig pa'i lus su byed/ /sangs rgyas zhing sogs zhing rnams la/ /khyad par du ni sbyin la spyad/ /dmangs rigs stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /bram ze gtsang ma gcig dang 'dra/ /bram ze stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /dge slong gcig
153a3(rgyud 'grel): la rab tu sbyar/ /dge slong stong phrag gnyis dag ni/ /rdul med pa ni gcig dang mnyam/ /rdul med stong phrag brgyad dag ni/ /ye shes ldan pa gcig dang sbyar/ /ye shes ldan pa stong phrag gnyis/ /slob dpon gcig dang mnyam par brtag /de
153a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar sbyin pa'i zhing byas nas/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyin/ /rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i chos las ni/ /zhing bzang po la sa bon gdab/ /mtshams med pa dang sdig can yang/ /tshon rtsi mthod bas grol bar 'gyur/ /sngags kyi de nyid pheb pa yis/ /
153a5(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /sbyin bdag bzang po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rim gyis myur du byang chub 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum por sku ni rjes chags dul bar ldan/ /'od zer sngon po stong ldan nyi ma brgya stong ldan/ /rnam mang sku dang cha
153a6(rgyud 'grel): lugs rjes chags sems dpar ldan/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' mchog gi dbang gi dbang phyug gar byed rol/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun chags par bya/ /bkra shis sgra ni snyan pa yis/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste blad/
153a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gdan bzhi rgyas pa las /stong phrag bcu gnyis mdor bsdus pa/ /de la dngos po tsam bsdus pa/ /snying po mdor bsags zhes bya ste/ /sdeb sbyor dang ni tshang ma med/ /rnal 'byor sbas par gyur pa yi/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa las/ /
153b1(rgyud 'grel): don la rton pa'i de nyid bsdus/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gdan bzhi pa las/ /rnal 'byor thams cad dang gar dang/ glu'i rab tu byed pa dang/ mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs te/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs sto/ /
153b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po Arya de bas mdzad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga snying po mdor bsags pa zhes bya ba rdzogs sho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo
153b3(rgyud 'grel): tsa ba dgos khug pa lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal gdan bzhi'i zab don 'grel pa bzhugs/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtso mo lha mo thams cad bde/ de nyid thams cad rab rtsod
153b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /gru gsum pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /zla ba nyi ma me'i brgyan/ /pad+ma chen po nyer gnas te/ /yi dags chen pos gdan byas par/ /gdan skyes rnal 'byor ma bsgoms na/ /myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/ /
153b5(rgyud 'grel): lung gi don gyi rjes 'brengs te/ /shing gcig la sogs dka' 'grel ni/ /rnal 'byor grub phyir bshad par bya/ /dam tshig ma dang sgrub pa pos/ /rnal 'byor pho mo'i dkyil 'khor la/ /gtor ma'i las ni khyad par du/ /nges pa nyid ni sbyar bar bya/ /
153b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba? mar do'i tshes brgyad dang/ /bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /rang khyim rnal 'byor ma mchod nas/ /phyi nas gtor ma brtsam par bya/ /rang bzhin de bzhin phyi rol dang/ /lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams mchod/ /shing gcig la sogs gnas rnams su/
153b7(rgyud 'grel): mnyer dang btung bas yongs su mchod/ /de ltar gyur pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun mchod par bya/ /de ltar sngags kun ma shes par/ /sngags pas phyi rol spyod byed na/ /bskal ba bye ba brgya bsgrubs kyang/ /lha rnams mnyes par
154a1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag sbas pa/ /rnal 'byor rgyud 'di thams cad la/ /dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu ru ni/ /'di ni rgyas par byas pa la/ /nyon cig bzang po bdag gis bshad
154a2(rgyud 'grel): oM zhes pas ni mchod pa'i ngag/ shing gcig la sogs bdun du ni/ /rgyad grags gcig gi nang rol nas/ /shing gzhan dag ni rnaM spangs la/ /shing gcig pa ni thams cad gyis/ /bshad pas shes rab mi 'gyur phyir/ /lus ni shing zhes bya bar bshad/ /lag pa yal
154a3(rgyud 'grel): ga la sogs bya/ /rigs byed mdza' las gsungs pa dang/ /rgyud gzhan dag las de skad gsungs/ /steng gi rtsa ba yal ga'o/ /a shwad zhes gsungs mi zad pa/ /me tog 'bras bus yongs su brgyan/ /shing zhes bya bar bshad pa yin
154a4(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi dbus na a gnas pa'i/ /gsang ba'i phyir ni mi shes phyir/ /lte ba nas ni sor bzhi na/ /de la lus brten rab tu gnas/ /'di las steng 'byung yal ga gsum/ /shing gi bu gur yongs su ldan/ /lte snying smin ma'i dbus gnas
154a5(rgyud 'grel): par/ /thig le gsum ni gsungs pa dag /steng dang 'og tu 'gro ba las/ /yal ga bcu zhes bya bar bshad/ /me tog 'bras brtag tu ldan/ /'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes/ /gang tshe sna las phyir byung srog /shing gcig pa zhes bya bar
154a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /gsang ba'i shing gi shing chen po/ /gsang ba yi ni gnas na gnas/ /mu stegs nyan sogs thams cad kyis/ /shing de rnam par shes mi 'gyur/ /chos 'byung ba yi tshal chen por/ /de yi dbus su yongs gnas par/ /su
154a7(rgyud 'grel): tra rak+ta rang 'byung ba'o/ /me tog 'bras bu yongs su rgyan/ /de la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thar pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis/ /mngon sum nyid du bdag gis bshad/ /pha zhes bya ba su
154b1(rgyud 'grel): krar brjod/ /ma ni rak+tar yongs su shes/ /yi ge gnyis ni kun sbyor ba/ /dur khrod du ni rnam par grags/ /dur khrod shi ba'i tshal bu shes/ /yid dgag kyi ni gnas su bshad/ /gang yang pha yis bsdus pa yis/ /gzugs dang kha dog
154b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'o/ /ma las byung ba'i gsum gyi dngos/ /de bzhi pa las byung ba'ang gsum/ /'gyur ba drug po bsdus pa ni/ /dur khrod du ni rnam par grags/ /de phyir shi ba'i tshal bu bshad/ /lus po yis ni brten byas pa/ /dbang po bcu po la
154b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs kun/ /'dus pa dang ni khu bar 'gyur/ /sor ni dur khrod zhes byar brjod/ /rim gyis 'byung sogs ngo bo ni/ /tshogs bshad dang por gang gsungs pa/ /de lta bar ni gsang ba'i gzugs/ /shes rab pad+ma'i mkha' khams su/ /ri
154b4(rgyud 'grel): dwags 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis su/ /'byung po thams cad ltung ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod du ni yongs su brtag /ri zhes bya ba'i ri bor bshad/ /lha rnams gnas su sa 'dzin te/ /lus kyang ri zhes bya bar brjod/ /gsum 'dus par ni yang
154b5(rgyud 'grel): dag ldan/ /dbang po bya yis yongs su gang/ /ri dags la sogs sna tshogs ldan/ /lung rig gnas pa'i lha rnams ni/ /gtor dang btung bas mchod par bya/ /srog kyang ri zhes bya bar bshad/ /rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas par 'dzin/ /
154b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu shing gis kun tu gang/ /ba spu rtsi yang phreng bas gang/ /chu ni yongs su 'bab par ldan/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma bsnyen pa/ /sa zhes pa ni pad+mar bshad/ /rba zhes bya ba rdo rjes shes/ /ta zhes pa ni bde ba che/ /de phyir ri la ri
154b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod/ /gang yang ri yi phyogs gcig gnas/ /de la gnas pa'i lta rnams ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /dbang po sgo dgu'i gnas rnams ni/ /sna tshogs cho ga yi ni gnas/ /de phyir cod dod zhes su bshad/ /srog gi
155a1(rgyud 'grel): cong re cong rong ni/ /ka zhes pa ni lus kyi dngos/ /de ni srog gi rlung gis gzung/ /de phyir cong rong zhes su btags/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu 'bab pas/ /b+ha ga cong rong zhes su gsungs/ /gang yang 'dod chags zhu ba yi/ /
155a2(rgyud 'grel): khu ba yi ni gzugs su gnas/ /ka zhes pa ni myos pa'i mdog /da zhes pa ni zhu ba'i bdag /ri zhes pa ni dga' ba'i bdag /cong rong de ni de ltar bshad/ /phug ni phyi nas bshad tshul gyis/ /sgrub pa po yi gnas su gsungs/ /bye ba brgyad
155a3(rgyud 'grel): cu'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gang du gnas ni rab brtags pa/ /de ni phug zhes bya ba'i ming/ /lus kun de dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /rkang pa'i mthil nas spyi bo'i bar/ /gsang char khyab pa rlung gi gzugs/ /rtag tu rlung gi gzugs su gnas/ /phug
155a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bar bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i gsang bar gnas pa'i lha/ /de ni lha dang mi la gsang/ /rgyud dang rgyud ni thams cad las/ /sba bar gsang ba yin par bshad/ /skye bo'i gnas las grod 'dab du/ /gtor dang btung bas mchod
155a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dbang po'i grong gi kun tu gang/ /'dab ni lus la rnam par gnas/ /rang gi bdag po'i lha bsgoms la/ /nus pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /lus kyi grong khyer spyi bor gnas/ /'dab ni mdza' i rnam par gnas/ /dbang du gnas pa'i nang
155a6(rgyud 'grel): gi gang/ /grong gi 'dab zhes bya bar bshad/ /grong khyer gang la gnas pa ni/ /skye ba'i byin gyis brlabs las 'byung/ /shes rab dbyings kyi dngos po ni/ /grong khyer bya ba'i ming du gsungs/ /rtse gcig pa dang rtse gnyis pa/ /gsum po
155a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ni bzhi mdo ru/ /lha yi mchod pa sngar bshams te/ /lam du gnas te mchod par bya/ /las bcu la ni gnas pa ni/ /lam zhes pa ni lus la gnas/ /gcig pa rtogs pa las byung ba/ /gnyis po gnyis kyi khyad par gyi/ /sum
155b1(rgyud 'grel): mdo theg pa'i khyad par du/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag shes bya/ /srog ni sum mdo zhes su gsungs/ /gsher dang dmar ser skam pa yi/ /bzhi mdo ru ni shes par bya/ /skyer ba la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /steng dang 'og gi khyad par gyis/ /sum
155b2(rgyud 'grel): mdo zhes ni yongs su grags/ /steng du tshangs pa'i lam zhes bya/ /de bzhin 'og tu khyab 'jug dran/ /drag pa dbus su rnam par shes/ /lam ni gsum po dag tu bshad/ /gru bzhi yon tan kun ldan pa/ /gsang ba yi ni pad+mar gnas/ /gru
155b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum lam gsum du shes bya/ /gnyis kyi gzugs su gnyis su 'gro/ /gang tshe dngos po gcig gyur pa/ /'gro ba rnams kyi gnas kyi dngos/ /de ltar lam gcig shes bya ste/ /thar pa yi ni gzugs su gnas/ /btab pa'i lam ni yongs
155b4(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i/ /zhing brgyad du ni gnas par bya/ /shin tu dgod dang spyod pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin du ni rigs kyi ri/ /rgyal ba dang ni nye rgyal dang/ /de bzhin rab mchog chu yi gnas/ /char pa'i rtse dang de brgyad dang/ /de dag zhing zhes bya bar
155b5(rgyud 'grel): grags/ /gnas de dag tu 'dug nas kyang/ /gtor ma a yis mchod par bya/ /zhing gi 'gram na gnas pa ni/ /nye ba yi ni zhing du bstan/ /zhing brgyad dag ni gnas rnams ni/ /lus la gnas pa'i bdag gi bshad/ /zhing brgyad
155b6(rgyud 'grel): dag ni gnas rnams ni/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis/ /rim pa ci bzhin bdag gis bkrol/ /shin tu rgod pa kha la gnas/ /spyod ma'i gnas ni smin ma'i mtshams/ /rigs can rna ba dag tu brjod/ /rgyal ba sum mdo yi
155b7(rgyud 'grel): ni bdun/ /nye rgyal de bzhin snying gar gsungs/ /rab mchog sna yi rtse mo la/ /chu yi gnas ni mig tu shes/ /char pa'i rtse mo spyi bor gnas/ /san do ha ni sdom par gsungs/ /gang ba yi ni pad+mar gnas/ /ze 'bru dang ni the bar
156a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /de lta bas na brgyad du shes/ /ye shes dbang phyug ma dang ldan/ /lus ni zhing zhes bya bar gsungs/ /zhing ma shes rab tu shes bya/ /rnam pa kun gyi stong pas
156a2(rgyud 'grel): na/ khyim stong du ni rab tu bshad/ /de na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni/ /cho ga snga mas mchod par bya/ /dngos po thams cad rnam spangs pas/ /lus kyang stong pa nyid du brjod/ /khyim stong zhes pa lus la bzung/ /bsgoms pas lha
156a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsgoms nas ni/ /sna tshogs mchod pa drug tshogs/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis mchod/ /gzugs kyi stong pa de nyid ltar/ /na Ti bcu po'ang de bzhin no/ /de la gnas pa'i ye shes ni/ /yid kyi sbyor bas mchod par bya/ /
156a4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis/ /gnas gang la ni rab gnas par/ /chos 'byung zhes bya ba yi khyim/ /ye shes rnam shes dag dang ldan/ /de la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams/ /me tog chu yis mchod par bya/ /sgrub pos dngos
156a5(rgyud 'grel): grub thob pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba las kyang gsang ba ste/ /gang dang gang du gang bsnyen pas/ /de phyir bsnyen pa zhes su gsungs/ /de dag las kyang gnas rgyu ru/ /gnas nas kyang ni mchog tu 'gro/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
156a6(rgyud 'grel): brgal ba'o/ /'gram du phyin bas chu 'gram gnas/ /rab dga' la sogs sa brgyad dang/ /legs pa'i blo gros dang bcas dgu/ /zhing brgyad khyad par du brjod pa/ /zhing dgu'i bdag por shes par bya/ /'dod pa
156a7(rgyud 'grel): srog zhes bya bar shes/ /sa bon zhes bya dbang phyug go /'dod pa las byung nga rgyal ni/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /'dod pa'i spyi bor yongs gnas te/ /rkang pa nas ni spyi bor khyab/ /'dod pa sum 'dor bab pas ni/ /
156b1(rgyud 'grel): der ni 'gro ba gsum po rmongs/ /sa la sogs pa de bzhin drug /'dod pa yi ni gzugs su gnas/ /gzhan du bdud rtsi lnga yang brjod/ /dbang phyug dang sogs dngos grub brgyad/ /mi rnams gang gis sgrub byed pa/ /chu du la sogs sgrub par bstan/ /'dod
156b2(rgyud 'grel): pa lus kyi yan lag ste/ /de nas glang chen zhes su bshad/ /gnas de dag na gnas pa nyid/ /lha rnams su ni rab grags pa/ /lnga po lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi/ /sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya/ /dbang po phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid
156b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan mtshams bar du/ /g.yas dang g.yon du bskor ba yi/ /rim pa rgyas pa shes par bya/ /dang po drag nag zhes bya ba/ /rkang pa yi ni mthe bong bar/ /dus med drag po zhes grags pa/ /lha mo yi ni 'khor gyis bskor/ /gsang ba'i gnas
156b4(rgyud 'grel): su dag chen dang/ /lus kyi yan lag kun la khyab/ /lte ba'i gnas la lha byin te/ /sgyu ma yi ni gzugs kyi tshul/ /snying gar gnas pa'i nag po che/ /sgyu ma chen mo mchog gi mchog /gtsigs pa kha yi phyogs gnas te/ /rdo rje
156b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon ni mtshon chen po/ /'jigs byed mchu la brtag tu gnas/ /'bar ba'i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /mgo bor gnas pa dag pa dag pa che/ /tshangs pa bug las rnam par byung/ /sna yi bar du rtag gnas pa/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po
156b6(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo che/ /de dag mtshams su gnas pa ni/ /dbang ldan la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /tsa muN+Di ni mgo bo'i gnas/ /'ba' ti li ni shing la brten/ /A g+ho tsir ni sum mdor gnas/ /de nyid gsum po laM gsum bzhi/ /mgo zhes bya bsgra
156b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /bcu gnyis kyi ni mtshams su gnas/ /shin tu rgod pa rgod chen po/ /bgegs med kyis ni rnam par 'joms/ /pi bang tsha yis 'joms pa ste/ /snying ga yi ni pad+mar gnas/ /lha mo sgyu ma zhes su grags/ /'gro rnams smos pas
157a1(rgyud 'grel): rmongs par bshad/ /lha mo u ma glad par gnas/ /glad pas mi tshugs 'dod pa ma/ /rgyal mo lha tshogs lha mo che/ /na li yi ni gzugs su gnas/ /pus mo byin pa nag po sogs/ /bzhi po dag ni chen po yin/ /dbang mo
157a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs lha mo'i tshogs/ /snying ga yi ni pad+mar gnas/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i bye brag drug /reg bya yi ni gzugs su gnas/ /ze 'bru la ni a yi gzugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bzhugs/ /ngag 'phrog la sogs lha mo che/ /
157a3(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i ngan long bzhi por 'dod/ /ngag 'phrog ma ni gsang bar gnas/ /'bar byed ma ni spyir gnas te/ /sreg ma dang ni 'ched mar byed/ /dbang phyug chen mo me'i gzugs/ /'jigs byed ma ni rkan la gnas/ /rlung gi gzugs can dbang phyug dag
157a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi lha mo ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang 'dus pa'i tshul/ /lce yi rtsa bar gnas pa'i rtsa/ /de ni chu yi gzugs su gnas/ /'jigs byed la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /lam bzhi ru ni gnas pa yin/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs/
157a5(rgyud 'grel): de ni dgra yi gzugs su gnas/ /thod pa'i phreng gis phreng bcings pa'i/ /lha mo bzhi ni chen mo yin/ /thig le gnas na rtag 'byung ba/ /shak+ti yi ni gzugs su gnas/ /ral gri la sogs 'dzin pas brgyan/ /lag pa dang ni rkang par gzhag /

157a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku chen po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyab pa'i gtso/ /bdag nyid de ltar bsgoms nas na/ /rtag tu sngags pa yi ni mchod/ /bza' dang btung ba gos dag kyang/ /phreng ba dri dang gos la sogs/ /lus kyi de nyid la gnas te/ /rnal 'byor
157b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs pas rtag tu mchod/ /ji ltar de nyid rjes 'brangs te/ /de yi gtor las cho ga bshad/ /khrag ni rab tu mchod sbyin che/ /chu yi gnas ni de bzhin nya/ /til gyi khur ba char pa'i rtse/ /shin tu rgod pa mkhur skya ba/ /kha dog lnga pa spyod pa'i gnas/ /
157b2(rgyud 'grel): sha ni rigs kyi ri ru gsungs/ /A li de bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas/ /nye bar rgyal ba'i ba dan gsungs pa/ /zhi brgyad kyi ni mtshan pa'o/ /de nas zhing gi bdag po rnams bshad bya/ /shar phyogs su ni shin tu bkod pa las/ /zhe ba'i mig ma gser bsrogs
157b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdog lta bur/ /phyag na rdo rje bsnams shing gtam pa la gnas pa'o/ /me'i phyogs su ni spyod pa nag mo'i lha mo'i kha dog dmar mo/ /phyag na shak+ti bsnams shing ka rany+tsa la gnas pa'o/ /lho phyogs su ni ki li gi ris mtshan pa'i lha chen po kha dog nag
157b4(rgyud 'grel): po dbyug pa bsnams pa'o/ /bden bral du ni rgyal ba can te/ /shing ni mra la gnas pa/ /phyag na ral gri bsnams la du ba'i mdog can zhal 'bar ba dang/ nub phyogs su ni nye rgyal de/ /sgyu 'phrul chan mo dang/ shing a shwat+tha la gnas pa'i bshags pa

157b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni char ba'i rtse la rna po che/ /mdog dmar po rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ /shing wa ta la gnas pa'o/ /de dag ni shing gi bdag por shes par bya zhing mkha' 'gro ma lnga'i rang bzhin nyid do/ /karka ta dang ro ha ha ni sna'i steng
157b7(rgyud 'grel): du'o/ /chu srin dang po ha ha ni sna'i 'og tu'o/ /bi bA dang rtsa ba na dang/ k+ShuM dang du ba dang me'o/ /seng ge dang mig gi ri dang/ hUM dang pad+ma dang sa'o/ /bzhon nu ma dang pi tri dang/ dkar mo dang/ suM dang chu'o/ /'dod pa dang gzhu dang/ yuM dang rlung ste/
158a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag sna bug g.yas pa la'o/ /glang ku ma dang k+ShuM ro tsa na dang me'o/ /buM pa dang mo hi ta dang/ hUM dang dri med gsum dang sa'o/ /nya dang ba tra dang smryuM dang chu dang sa'i gdug so/ /'khrig pa dang chu srin dang ymryuM dang dbye ba dang rlung

158a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dngos grub 'dod par phyir gsang bar bya'o/ /dang po la ni nor btang bya/ /gnyis pa la ni nor bsdu'o/ /gsum pa las ni zhing las bya/ /bzhi pa la ni sa bon gda' / /lnga pa la ni khyim du 'jug /drug pa la ni khyim bzhi

158b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlab/ /mdzes pa'i maN+Dal steng dag tu/ /me tog tshom bu gnyis bzhag ste/ /rdo rje dril bu steng du gzhag /dang por dag pa'i khrus pa ste/ /mos pa tsam gyis lhar bskyed nas/ /'od kyis rtags gnyis
158b3(rgyud 'grel): stang bya ste/ /stod pa'i ngang las A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bskyed/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis/ /de nas dpal ldan yab yum bskyed/ /de la ye shes 'khor lo bzhug /gnyis med bstims nas dbang bskur zhing/ /byin gyis brlabs nas mchod cing bstod/ /de

158b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gzung bar bya/ /dang po thun mong bshad bya ste/ /gar skor rdo rje dril bu gnyis/ /gong bzhin 'dzin pa bca' ba ste/ /de nas dril bu lan gsum dkrol/ /de nas gnyis kas lan gsum ste/ /thams steng du bskor nas ni/ /gang bskor gong bzhin
158b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa ni/ /kun gyi sngon du 'gro ba yin/ /'dan phyir pa'i rnam pa la/ /dang por 'dzin dang dril bu 'khrol/ /rdor dril gsor gsil bcas pa la/ /gnyis pa 'dzin pa sbyor mon te/ /dkrol ba bdan g.yob pa la/ /dang po la sogs dug
158b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /ba dan mi g.yob gting ba la/ /mi dkrod mi gsor mo bu bzhag ba dan 'gugs pa'i dus dag tu/ /dran pa chu bur bzhin du dkrol/ /sems can don brtson gyur ba na/ /mdud thabs shes ni bya ba ste/ /nyon mongs tha bar 'thib
159a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul/ /dang po dril bu gsum yin te/ /g.yas su 'phang ba'i 'bigs bzhin te/ /g.yon du gnyigs byed pa yin/ /sgrib pa gnyis ni 'joms pa ste/ /lan gsum bskor ba dngos grub len/ /steng du bskor ba bstan

159a3(rgyud 'grel): la rab brtags nas/ /spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga yi/ /thang kar 'dzin cing bskor ba ni/ /sa 'og sa bla sa steng gi/ srid gsum sprul pas 'grub pa'o/ /rdo rje sems 'gugs sbyor ba la/ /dang por phar la spos pa ni/ /rang gi mchod pa

159a6(rgyud 'grel): skabs dang/ /gsang ba yi ni spyod pa dang/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa'i skabs su shes/ /gzhan yang yon tan brjod las 'das/ /bla med gsang ba'i bla na med/ /gtso bo mchog gi las sbyor ba/ /khyad par gyi ni bshad bya ste/ /dang po'i
159a7(rgyud 'grel): las dang tha ma'i las/ /gong ma bzhin te thun mong ngo/ /'khor lo 'dzin sogs lnga po dang/ /snying gar 'dzin pas shes par bya/ /mdun du spos phor 'dzin pa dang/ /gyen du me tog 'thong ba dang/ /sor mo mar me'i tshul du bsgreng/ /gengs
159b1(rgyud 'grel): pas byug pa'i tshul du gyug /mnyes pa yi ni thabs su bshad/ /zhi ba yi ni sbyor ba ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i thad gzung nas/ /gang la phog bas rda byed bsam/ /rgyas ba stong du 'phyar ba ste/ /ye shes khams gsum bcud len byed/ /dbang ni gyes
159b2(rgyud 'grel): la phyogs nas su/ /lag pa'i 'og tu 'jug tshul lo/ /drag pa gsad pa'i tsho ga ni/ /gdul bya mdun du gnas pa la/ /steng du 'phyar zhing thung du 'bugs/ /rengs pa yi ni sbyor ba ste/ /gdul bya mdun du bsam bya ste/ /gyen thur thad kar
159b3(rgyud 'grel): phyar ba yis/ /spyi bor rkang pa'i bar ngag tu/ /rdo rje'i ring bo bsgreng bar byed/ /bstab pa'i cho ga'i las byed pa/ /rdo rje gdeng po'i sbyor ba yis/ /thur bsags la ni len ba ste/ /gyen du phyar nas bteg byas nas/ /de nas mdun du bstab pa'o/
159b4(rgyud 'grel): de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba mchog /gsang ba de nyid rjes 'brangs nas/ /blo dman don du bshad pa yin/ /'di la nyes par gyur pa kun/ /'phags dang mkhas la bzod par gsol/ /bdag gis 'di brtsams bsod nams kyis/ /khams gsum
159b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bla med shog /rdo rje dril thabs kyi mchod pa'i rim pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bsgrub pa'i thabs bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /sh+rI tsa tu rwi thi sA d+ha ni no mig /blos skad
159b6(rgyud 'grel): du/ dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bsgrub pa'i thabs/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos dang dngos med dang las dpe mtshan ldan/ /de las 'gro ba'i don mdzad la btung de/ /bcu dang gsum bo ??
159b7(rgyud 'grel): du bya ba'i thabs/ /rgyud na mi gsal bsdus te bri bar bya/ /de la re zhig slob dpon bum pa dang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing/ /rigs nges pa des/ mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'jug par bya'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i ???
160a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ gnas dag tu ni rten nas su/ /bla re dag ni bri bar bya/ /sna tshogs gos ni dbyangs nas su/ /ba dan rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yer kha'i dra bas mdzes par bya/ /gnas bcu dag ni kun tu yang/ /de bzhin dri yis
160a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bya/ /mnyam med sems kyi dri yis ni/ /gru bzhi par ni byug par byaM/ lus la ste'u 'jog tsandan byug /sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/ /bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor pas/ /'bad dang ldan pas 'gram par bya/ /mnyam nyid
160a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa'i dug pa yis/ /rang bzhin dag pas bdug par bya/ /shes rab mang me'i snang ba ste/ /khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams/ /mar me 'di yis bcom nas su/ /ci ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya/ /mchod pa dgram par byas nas kyang
160a4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas su/ /oM badzra prA ka ra hUM phaT/ /lag g.yon thal mo phar bstan te/ /g.yas pa khu tshur rgyub sbyar nas/ /dbang ldan phyogs tshogs bskor bar bya/ /ra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /
160a5(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun rtse mo reg par bya/ /oM dzuM swAhA/ dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa khu tshur bcings nas su/ /mthe bong 'og tu brkyang bar bya/ /oM bruM swAhA/ phur pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnam par dag pa dang phan yon ni rgyud las
160a6(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /rang gi snying ga'i zla dbus su/ /sa bon hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /bla ma sangs rgyas snang byas la/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /bla ma'i zhabs lham la phyag 'tshal/ /mkha' 'gro ma
160a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yang 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /'od zer de las byung ba yi/ /lha mo lag na spos la sogs/ /thogs pas mchod pa byas par bsam/ /sdig pa bgyis dang bgyid du stsal/ /rjes yi rang ba so sor
160b1(rgyud 'grel): bshags/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /nyan thos rang rgyal ma lus dang/ /'jig rten dge ba'i rtsa ba la/ /kun nas bdag ni yi rang no/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'tshal/ /mya ngan mi 'da' zhugs su gsol/ /dus 'di nas ni
160b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs ma rgyas/ /bar du las ni bsnyen par bgyi/ /bdag gi lus kyang dbul bar bgyi/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /dus 'di nas gzung ji srid du/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /yang dag
160b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub nges mdzad pa/ /de bzhin bla med byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyid/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor skyes sdom pa/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /de nas brtsams te/
160b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog du gsungs/ /bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang/ /sems can don ni tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis so sor brtan par gsung/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag
160b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid du gzung bgyi zhing/ /slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis gzung/ /rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor gyis/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug du/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi stsal bar bgyi/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i
160b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam tshes rab tu gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog mthon po la/ /mchod pa ci nus bgyi ba dang/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par bgyi/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /
160b7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa de naM bskyed bgyi zhing/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa ma lus bzung bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gi dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing/ /'gro kun mya ngan 
161a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das la dgod/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms bzhi po bsam par bya/ /de nas hUM gi me lce yis/ /snod bcud thams cad stong par bsgom/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho
161a2(rgyud 'grel): haM/ mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/ /de yi dbus su bltas nas kyang/ /der ni mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /mar me'i 'od kyi zhi ba ste/ /dmar po brdul gyis rgyas pa'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba/ /chags pa la sogs
161a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur/ /mthar ni du ba nag mthong na/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/ /rlung gi mdog ltar 'khrugs pa yi/ /de yi mod las skrag bar 'gyur/ /zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer ltar/ /thams cad du ni dkar mthong na/ /
161a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor 'grub par shes par bya/ /blo ldan 'gro ba'i yang dag gnas/ /de yi nang du bsam pa ni/ /yuM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /k+ShuM las me yi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de steng suM las chu rang bzhin/ /hUM las
161a5(rgyud 'grel): gser gyis gzhi dang/ /ri rab chen po bsam par bya/ /de steng hUM las gzhal yas ni/ /khang pa brtsegs pa bsam pa ste/ /gser las byung ba'i grong khyer mchog /rin chen bdun po rnams kyis spras/ /g.yer kha'i dra ba'i
161a6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dang/ /dra ba dra phyed sogs pas brgyan/ /dbus dang phyogs bzhir seng ge'i gdan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par/ /'byung po glang po me mtshams su/ /rin chen bum pa gang ba'o/ /bden bral du ni ma
161a7(rgyud 'grel): he'i gdan/ /sngal gyi gdan ni rlung mtshams su/ /sgo bzhir yi dags gdan dgod bya/ /dbus kyi nyi ma'i gdan stengs su/ /rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i/ /oM badzra shud+d+ha sarba d+ha rmA badzra
161b1(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ho haM/ de las ye shes mkha' 'gro bskyed/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can/ /skra grol bas ni g.yogs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes par bya/ /kha dog sngon po drag chen mo/ /sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /bzhad dang khrod dang sgeg
161b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /zhal gsum po ni spyan gsum mo/ /ha har bzhad cing 'tshig pa ste/ /na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes/ /kha TwAM gyen du bsgreng ba dang/ /gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid/ /gsum pa na ni rdo rje thogs/ /g.yon pa dril bu sgra sgrogs shing/ /
161b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa na ni snod nyid de/ /gsum pa de bzhin ral gri 'phyar/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbus su mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/ /oM yo ga shud+d+ha sarba d+harma yo ga shud+d+ho haM/ ye shes kyi ni shar phyogs su/ /bdag gi chu las byung ba yi/ /
161b4(rgyud 'grel): sum las rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzos/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par klubs/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /phyag na kha TwAM rnal 'byor snod/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na
161b5(rgyud 'grel): bzas glubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o/ /ye shes kyi ni byang gi char/ /bdag gi me las byung ba yi/ /k+ShuM las byung ba'i drag mor bskyed/ /kha dog ser mo shin tu mdzes/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung bcas/ /skra grol bas ni brgyan
161b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sku la na bza' mdzes pa man bas/ /phyag gnyis kha TwAM rnal 'byor snod/ /ye shes gyi ni nub phyogs char/ /bdag gi rlung las byung ba yi/ /yuM las mkha' 'gro ro langs ma/ /phyag gnyis
161b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ /kha dog dmar po kun tu 'od/ /kha TwAM rnal 'byor snod bsnams zhing/ /sgra sgrol bas ni mdzes pa ste/ /lus kun sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar
162a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam/ /ye shes kyi ni lha yi char/ /sa yi ye shes las byung ba'i/ /hUM las mkha' 'gro gtum mo bsgom/ /sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can/ /kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes/ /kha TwAM rnal 'byor snod bsnams
162a2(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste/ /skra grol bas ni shin tu mdzes/ /ha har rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o/ /dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs kyi char/ /seng ge'i gdod ni bsam bya ba/ /kha dog
162a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar zhing ser ba ste/ /glang po yi ni stan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzubs can/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /me mtshams stag
162a4(rgyud 'grel): mo zhes bya ba/ /rin chen bdun gyi stan la bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis kha dog dkar zhing sngo/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /phyag na lcags kyu brgyan pa ste/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /'od zer sna tshogs

162a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa dang/ /sdigs mdzub kyis ni shin tu mdzes/ /sprul gyis brgyan zhing rnam par klubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /rlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo/
162a7(rgyud 'grel): kha dogs ser zhing dmar ba sta/ /klu yi stan la yang dag bzhugs/ /rgyan yang de nyid sbyar bar bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ /sdig mdzub lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /
162b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya/ /dbus kyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyi/ /phyi rol dag ni rnam bzhi la/ /shar du mkha' 'gro phu las bskyed/ /phyag gnyis kha dog dkar po ste/ /yi dags kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /sprul gyi rgyan gyi klubs pa ste/

162b4(rgyud 'grel): mo 'jigs su rung/ /yi dags kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' rgyan/ /lag gnyis snyim par sbyar byas nas/ /khrag gi rgyun ni 'thur bang mdzad/ /me ltar 'bar zhing shin tu gsal/ /'jigs byed drag mo bsgom par

162b6(rgyud 'grel): thogs/ /sems can sems ni rmongs par byed/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing drag /kun rigs pas ni thams cad bsgom/ /de nas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas/ /bsrung bar bya ste/ mgo bar ni k+ShuM ngo/ /mig tu ni hUM ngo/ /sna dang rna ba
162b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la yuM ngo/ /khar suM mo/ /mgrin par smryuM ngo/ /nam tshor ru ymruM ngo/ /snying gar hmryuM nge/ /lte bar k+Sh+mryuM ngo/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas/ /sangs rgyas la bskul bas lha mo mang po byung ste/ /dbu rgyan dang bum pa'i/
163a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /bdag gis dbugs kyi 'od zer gyis/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams spyan drangs ste/ /de dag gi ni gzugs mdun no/ /dam tshig rnams ni bstan par bya/ /khu tshur gnyis ni bcings

163a6(rgyud 'grel): bo cu ni bzhag par bya/ /byang du gnas pa'i 'bar ma la/ /phyag rgya 'di ni brtan par bya/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas su/ /kha ru bcug ste hUM zhes bya/ /nub phyogs lha mo 'jigs byed me/ /phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya/ /lag gnyis
163a7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bskor nas su/ /sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo ru/ /gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag nas kyang/ /lho phyogs 'phrog byed ma la brtan/ /bskyed pa'i dus su brkyang ma ste/ /phyag rgya'i dus su oM dang ni/ /swAhA'i bar du spel ste bzlas/
163b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig lha mo rnams la ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /g.yon pa snying khar gzhag nas su/ /g.yas pa mchan khung gzhug bya ba/ /dam tshig sems ma rnams la bstan/ /sngags ni oM hUM swAhA zhes so/ /de ltar ye shes sems

163b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /me tog gi phyag rgya las dgum bsgreng ba dang/ oM d+hU pe sh+ra ri hUM swAhA zhes pa ni bdug pa'o/ /khu tshur las mthe bo brkyang ba dang/ oM badzra tI k+Sh+Na dI pe hUM swAhA/ zhes pa mar me'i 'o/ /lag pa g.yas brkyang ba dang/ oM hUM swAhA zhes pa ni sngags
163b4(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/ /gung mo'i rtsar ra mtheb mo bskyod pa dang/ /oM ku ru ku du ma hA ba li hUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yin/ /ye shes can gyis mchod par bya/ /hUM zhes
163b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i glu blang zhing/ /rnal 'byor maM kun mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /rked pa'i mtshams su bzhag nas ni/ /yan lag gsum du hUM gis bskyod/ /pi wang tshul du bsgreng ba dang/ /gling bu'i tshul du 'bud pa dang/ /zad
163b6(rgyud 'grel): dud tshul dul bud pa dang/ /dkrol ba'i tshul du dkrol ba dang/ pa Ta ta ltar brdung ba dang/ /gar gyi tshul du bskyod pa dang/ /bsil yab tshul du g.yo ba dang/ /rgyal mtshan tshul du bskyed pa dang/ /bla re'i tshul du bre ba dang/ /ba dan tshul
163b7(rgyud 'grel): du 'phyar ba dang/ /gdugs kyi tshul du dga' pa dang/ /rdza rnga'i tshul du brdung ba dang/ /rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dang/ /'dzum pa'i tshul du bzhad pa dang/ /khro bo'i tshul du khro ba dang/ /sgeg pa'i tshul du sgeg pa dang/ /bgying ba'i tshul gyis rol
164a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /phyag 'tshal tshul du 'dud pa ste/ /mda''dren nu ma 'khyud pa dang/ /nyi shu'o/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad de nyid kyis/ /dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya/ /hUM zhes bya bar bdag sprul nas/ /hUM gis glu ni blang bar
164a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rgyud las byung ba bzhin du ni/ /bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya// /rdo rje'i de nyid dang ldan pas/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis blang bar bya/ /rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis/ /sems can rnam thar bsgral bar bya'o/ /rnam
164a3(rgyud 'grel): par cho su bya ba ste/ /rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog/ de kho na nyid dang ldan pa'i dril bu 'dis blang ngo/ /oM badzra g+haN+De hUM ho/ oM badzra g+ha N+De ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta saM pra ra Ni ta sarba bud+d+ha k+She pra tsa li te/ pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta nA tha swa b+hA be na badzra d+ha ra h+ri da ya/ /a
164a4(rgyud 'grel): ba mamto ya ni hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ a a a swAhA/ gnas brgyad dril bu'i sgra sgregs shing/ /rdo rje gsor de rang las byung ba'i lha mos bstod pa ni/ /lus can don phyir shes rab gsol btab pa/ /kun 'khyud la soD gnyis kyis gnyis sprod cing/ /
164a5(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma lta bu sbyor pas shin tu brgyan/ /srid pa las sgrol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dga' ba'i mthu dang spyan gyis gzigs/ /yi ge'i dngos po rang bzhin stong par rol/ /dngos dang dngos med las sgrol dbu mas mkhyen/ /me 'gyur
164a6(rgyud 'grel): kun bcom lhag ma sems pa'o/ /gnyis sprod kun khyud chu yi bya ba can/ /gnyis med chos brnyes par pa mnyes pa'o/ /bde ba'i 'khor mnan thar pa btang ba'o/ /thams cad dngos kyi rnal 'byor ma sngags rol/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga
164a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas de nyid mkhyen/ /gzugs ma sgyu ma sems can smin mdzad pa/ /rdo rje kun rtog chos kyi rmongs pa gcod/ /rnal ma ma rmong snying chos tshoD la 'dud/ sems can sgrol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /thams cad bdag skyes ngo bo
164b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rmongs pa gcod la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal/ /rang dgar sems can dgrol ba yi/ /rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi/ /te na hUM te na
164b2(rgyud 'grel): te te hUM/ ston ka'i zla ltar rab mdzes shing/ /dud ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ /te na hUM te na te te hUM/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ /gnyis 'khyud sbyor ba 'dzin pa'o/ /te na hUM te na te te hUM/ sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi/ /'gro ba 'dzin pa rgyu
164b3(rgyud 'grel): med dngos/ /te na hUM te na te te hUM/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan/ /'od zer rnon po stong ldan nyi ma stong 'drar ldan/ /rnam mad sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dang ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog
164b4(rgyud 'grel): rol gar mdzad pa zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing/ /glu dang bstod pas mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /khar bar du hUM gi sgra dang dril bu bsgrags la smon lam rnam pa gsum gdab par bya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/ /snying ga'i
164b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su bcir par bya/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA swa b+ha ba badzra shud+d+ho haM/ oM badzra shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho haM/ oM ye ga shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho haM/ zhes brjod la lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon sngags

169a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams kyis so/ /seng ge ma la sogs pa rnams la mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med rnams kyis so/ /rgyal dbang mo la sogs pa rnams la
169b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams kyis so/ /de'i rjes la spros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bdag la mchod cing bstod nas des nye bar bstabs ba'i bdud rtsi myangs te/ bde ba
169b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i pad+mar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa kha 'og tu phyogs pa smin ma'i dbus su 'phyar ba'i thig le dang hUM yig las bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag par bsam par bya'o/ /zhes pa'i thig le'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i mthar phra mo'i rnal 'byor
169b3(rgyud 'grel): yun ring du rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /skyon sngags bzlas par bya ste/ de la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sngags kyang/ oM badzra DA ki ni hUM phaT
169b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM gau rI hUM swAhA/ oM bet+tA lI hUM swAhA/ oM tsaN+Da lI hUM swAhA/ oM badzra si ha ni AM swAhA/ oM badzra bya g+h+ra a'i swAhA/ oM badzra jam+bu ki a'uM swAhA/ oM badzra u lu kA syArI swAhA/ oM badzra DI ba ta te dze iM swAhA/ oM badzra tsu ShI ni tsuShA sa sarba sa
169b5(rgyud 'grel): tran swAhA/ oM badzra kaM po dzi a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pa rnams bzlas pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob bo zhes pa'o/ /dpal ldan ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /sgrub thabs rab tu bsal byas pa'i/ /bsod nams kyis ni 'gro ba rnams/ /de gzugs
169b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs med myur thob shog /ces pa ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrubs thabs/ paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'di ni dpal ldan sa skya'i chos gra chen por/ dge slong rin chen
169b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan gyis/ rgya dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas pa'o/ /'di 'gro ba du ma la phan par gyur cig/ //ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes 'bum phrag gsum yang dag bar bzlas par bya'o/ /rdo rje
170a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sngags kyang bzlas par bya'o/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs lha mo rnams kyis sa bon ni/ hUM dang(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang(rgyud 'grel): A dang a'iM dang(rgyud 'grel): a'uM dang(rgyud 'grel): rIM dang(rgyud 'grel): lIM dang(rgyud 'grel): iM dang(rgyud 'grel): aauM dang(rgyud 'grel): a:
170a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams yin no// //rnal 'byor nam mkha' i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ yo gAm+ba ra no ba'i/? /bod skad/ rnal 'byor nam mkha' i sgrubs thabs/ /shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba'i btso
170a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor nam mkha' i 'gro mgon la/ /dngos bo kun gyi bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu gus pas bla ma la/ /gdan bzhi'i rim pa gsungs pa yi/ /bde ba'i sgrub thabs btus nas su/ /slob mas sngon du zhus nas ni/ /de yis bsnyen pa
170a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bshad/ /de nas gdan bzhi ba'i rgyud kyi rim pas dbang bskur ba thob pa dang/ bla ma la gus pa dang/ zab mo'i chos la mos pa dang/ sbyor ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan ba'i sgrub pa pos/ lha khang kun dga' ra ba la sogs pa bcas
170a5(rgyud 'grel): yid dga' ba'i phyogs su shin tu 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor nam mkha' i bsnyen pa bya'o/ /de la dang por re zhig nyi ma'i lag thil la ni yi ge a dmar po bsams
170a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ dkar po la sogs pa'i lag pa'i sor mo la rim pas suM k+ShuM yuM hUM a sa bon las bskyed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin zla ba'i lag mthil la yi ge soM las zla ba'i dkyil la smryuM hmryuM ymryuM k+Sh+mryuM soM sa bon de dag
170a7(rgyud 'grel): gos? sbrul ba'i gi wang la sogs pa'i lag pa'i sor mo pad+mar rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de dag ni lag pa rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas mgrin pa la yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed ba'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad lca'i 'dab
170b1(rgyud 'grel): ma la yi ge hUM gi rdo rje/ de'i bum pa la yi ge hUM bskyed cing bsgoms te/ oM badzra dzi hA saM brta ni hUM phaT/ sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de dag ni lce rnam par dag pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas nyi ma'i lag pa la dkar po dang ye shes sbyar
170b2(rgyud 'grel): nas yan lag brgyad la bkod pa'i bdag nyid du bya'o/ /spyi bo mig gnyis rna ba gnyis/ /sna lce mgrin pa dpung pa gnyis/ /snying ga lte ba oM badzra kA ya ho(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra wA ka A(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra tsit+ta hUM yan lag byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i cho ga'o
170b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu dung por la sogs pa'i mchod yon gyi snod la/ oM pra tIts+tsha a rg+haM hUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags de phyag rgya dang bcas pas bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags la gdab par bya'o/ /de'i phyag rgya'i rdo rje bcings pa las

170b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag? bsrung ba dang bgegs bsgred ba'i don du bur bu gdab pa dang dro? ba la sogs pa'i rim pa bya'o/ /zla ba nyi ma phye nas su ye shes rnam shes sbrel bar bya/ /dang po'i bshog pa'i chul byas te/ /phyir bzlog snying gar
171a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya/ /sngags ni oM hUM phaT dang bcas pas dag la go chas bsrung bar bya'o/ /bdag la bsrung ba byas nas su/ /nyi zla bcing ba byas nas su/ /dri ma gsum dang dud pa bsgreng/ /nga ro hUM gi ldan byas nas/ /

173a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can gyi don byas nas slar yang de nyid la zhugs te sngags kyi nga rgyal bya'o/ /oM bardta ma no ya ha ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /de nas mtshan kun yongs rdzogs par/ /sems can don cig dam par

173a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM suM b+ha bo baM a a A aM hUM swAhA/ de nas phyag rgya chen por gsal bar bsams te/ oM yo ga shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA yog shud+d+ho haM/ yang rdo rje gsor nas sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya'o/ /oM dz+nyA na kA ya a
173a5(rgyud 'grel): haM/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags su ldan nas snying ga dang dpral ba dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /ye shes pad+ma la sbyar te/ /saM yi gdugs dang rnam shes spyar/ /gnyig lu gu rgyud bcings te/ /ltag ma rnams ni gyen du bsgreng/ /
173a6(rgyud 'grel): dud ba dri ma gsum sprad de/ /rtse lnga rdo rje 'dzin zhes so/ /oM sarba ya hUM hUM sa ma ya traM a d+hi tiSha? zhes sdags brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor sprul nas sems can gyi don byed par bsams nas rdzogs par bya'o/ /sbyor ba dang po zhes bya ba'i ting
173a7(rgyud 'grel): nge 'dzin te de nas yuM k+ShuM suM hUM rnams kyis rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams zla ba phyed pa/ gru gsum pa/ zlum po/ gru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog rim bzhin du bsgom mo/ /de'i dbus su hUM suM hUM gis rin po che sna bdun gyi dngos po'i ri rab chen
173b1(rgyud 'grel): po bsgoms te/ oM hUM swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lag kha sdub ste rdo rje'i dngos po'i sa gzhir byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ ri rab rtse mor sngags de kho nas rnal 'byor nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal yas khang gi nang na gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi
173b2(rgyud 'grel): dang twa ra na bzhis brgyan pa ste dra pa dang dra phyed du brgyan pa'o/ /dril bu dang dra bas klubs pa'i sum rim la seng ge dang rma bya dang dang pa'i rgyal po dang chu srin rnams kyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sgo bzhi brgyan te grwa dang mtshams na zla ba rdo rjes brgyan pa'o/
173b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i nang na dbus na seng ge shar phyogs su glang po che'i gdan/ byang phyogs su rma bya'i gdan/ nub phyogs su bya khyung gi gdan/ lho phyogs su gi ka ra/ /dbang ldan mtshams su seng ge/ me'i mtshams su rdo'i gdong/ bden bral gyi mtshams su ma he/ rlung gi
173b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su spyang ki rnams kyi gdan te de ltar re mig dgu'i gdan byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /sgo bzhi la ro'i gdan no/ /de'i phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /yang de'i phyi rol tu 'khor lo zlum po de la lta kun gnas/ /pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i
173b5(rgyud 'grel): gdan du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu la yang de kho na bzhin du pad+ma'i steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la 'jigs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' las babs te seng
173b6(rgyud 'grel): ga'i gdan la gnas nas gong ma bzhin du sngags kyis sangs rgyas rnal 'byor nam mkha' bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma suM zhes bya ba'i snying pos phyung ste/ sems can thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ dkon mchog
173b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bskal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar nas bsdu ba'i tshul gyis slar bsdus te/ mdun du glang po che'i gdan la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsams te/ sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis na kha TwAM ga dang rnal 'byor ma'i
174a1(rgyud 'grel): lhung bzed 'dzin pa/ spyan gsum pa skra sil bur btang ba sangs rgyas kyi dbu la brgyan pa glang po che'i pags pas smad g.yogs shing na ra tsa rmas stod g.yogs pa/ glang po che'i gdan la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lo ral
174a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs la/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /suM badzra DA ki ni a haM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin du k+Shu zhes brjod pas drag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma spros te sems can kun la ma rig pa'i mun pa'i ye shes kyi mig
174a3(rgyud 'grel): can du byas te/ slar 'dus phrag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi mdog can sgra sgrog nas mche ba btsigs pa skya gyen du bsgril ba dang sangs rgyas dbu brgyan pa/ rma bya'i gdan la phyad kyi skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ sprul gyis brgyan pa/ kha TwAM ga dang
174a4(rgyud 'grel): lhung bzang 'dzin pa ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bzhin du stong g.yogs dang smad g.yags bsnams pa/ drag mo'i bdag nyid du bsgoms te/ k+ShuM g+ho ri DA ki ni a haM zhes byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de bzhin du yuM zhes brjod
174a5(rgyud 'grel): pag ro langs ma'i mkha' 'gro ma kun spros te/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi lam la bkor nas slar log ste gcig tu gyur nas bya khyung gi gdan la sogs pa'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug pa phyir dang 'dra ba'i mdog gzhan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
174a6(rgyud 'grel): ? 'dra bar ro langs ma'i gzugs bsams te yuM bt+tA lI a haM zhes nga rgyal bya'o/ /de lo na bzhin du hUM zhes brjod pas snying ga nas spros pa'i tshul gyis gdol pa mo'i mkha' 'gro ma spros te sems can thams cad dzi ltar 'dod don yongs su
174a7(rgyud 'grel): bskangs nas smar log ste gcig tu gyur te/ gdol pa ma'i gzugs ji ltar sprul pa las bskyed pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sku mdog nag mo dang/ skra dmar po sil bur 'dug pa/ /pus mo'i skyil krung du 'dug pa thal mo sbyar pa spyi bor
174b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste/ gzhan ni drag mo mkha' 'gro ma dang 'dra bar bsgoms te/ oM tsaN+Ta li DA ki nI a haM zhes nga rgyal pya'o/ /de bzhin du byang shar mtshams su ni smryuM gis bskyed ba'i seng ge'i mdog can sku mdog dkar po dang ser po dang gos dmar po/ phyag gnyis
174b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i g.yas pa kha TwAM ga gyen du sgreng ba/ g.yon sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ bdud thams cad skrag par byed pa/ seng ge'i mkha' 'gro ma de yu seng ge'i gdan la rol pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du shar
174b3(rgyud 'grel): lho'i mtshams na hmryuM gis bskyed pa stag mo sku mdog dkar ba dang nag mo gos dmar po g.yas pa na lcags kyu g.yon pa na zhags pa 'dzin pa/ gong nas gsungs pa'i gdan la zlum po'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs par bsgom mo/ /de bzhin du
174b4(rgyud 'grel): lho nub mtshams su sa bon ymryuM gis/ bskyed pa'i lce spyad ma spyad ki'i mgo can ma sku mdog dkar mo dang nag mo/ /gos dkar po dang phyag gnyis kyis zhags pa dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ gong du gsungs pa'i gdan la phyed kyi skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
174b5(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom mo/ /nub byang gi g.yas mtshams na sa bon k+ShaM gis bskyed pa'i 'ug pa mo sku mdog dmor ma dang ser mo gos dmar po phyag gnyis la be con dang zhags pa/ gong du gsungs pa'i gdan la 'jo ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya'o/ /shar la
