174b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgo bzhi las pon lu las mkha' 'gro ma sa pon phe las mar me ma/ a bon phroM las 'jigs byed ma/ sa bon phreM las 'phrog byed ma/ bsked de gong du gsungs pa'i gdan la go rims bzhin du gnas pa sku mdog dkar po dang ser po dang
174b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang nag po dang/ phyag gnyis kar bcug pa dang/ spri bor thal mo sprar ba dang/ /ba dang snying gar lag pa bzhag pa dang/ gtun shing 'dzin pa rnams te skra sil bur btang ba mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sgo gsungs snying gnas spros
175a1(rgyud 'grel): te bzhag par bya'o/ /rdo rje ba'i phyi rol na sa bon ha ho h+rIs bskyed pa/ /puk+ka sI dang/ khro gnyer ma dang/ btum mo bdud rtsi'i snod phyag gis 'dzin pa rnams shar du dgod do/ /sa bon g+h+riM g+ha las bskyed pa drag mo dang/ /
175a2(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung ma dang/ sha za ma rnams lcags kyu rnam pa lngas gang ba'i pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa byang du dgod do/ /sa bon ku ru ku ru las bskyed pa'i khro mo dang/ 'bar ma dang/ 'jigs ma rnam gsum gtor ma'i snod phyag gis 'dzin pa nub tu dgong
175a3(rgyud 'grel): do/ sa bon bat+ta li las bskyed pa'i thod phreng ma dang/ rdo rje ma dang/ bum pa ma dang gsum dam tshig gi zas dang btung ba'i snod phyag gis 'dzin pa lhor dgong ngo/ /dbang ldan mtshams la sogs pa'i grwa bzhi la dbang ldan mtshams su sa bon lA
175a4(rgyud 'grel): sye hUM dang/ su 'bri ya gnd+he hUM gis sgeg mo dang dri chab ma bskyed/ bkur brten pa'i phyag rgya dang dri chab kyi snod 'dzin pa'o/ /me'i mtshams su sa bon hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): dang sraM gis bskyed pa'i pi wang ma dang me tog ma bskyed de/ pi wang pa rdebs pa dang me tog
175a5(rgyud 'grel): 'thong ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'o/ /bden bral mtshams su sa bon hUM hUM hUM dang/ saM las bskyed pa dbyangs len ma dang spos ma bskyed de kha'i mdun du dkor po bskul ba dang spos por 'jin pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'o/ /rlung gi
175a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi sa bon ni hUM nri te hUM dang k+ShuM las skyes pa'i gar pyed ma dang me mar ma ste gar pyed cing sbyi bor thal mo sbyar ba dang mar me lag pas 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'o/ /de dag kun kyang dri zhim pa'i me tog phreng bas brgan pa/
175a7(rgyud 'grel): bar gyi dkyil 'khor zlum pa'i 'khor lo'i sngon du dgod par bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo nas sa bon khe zhes pas ni khyab 'jug go /byang gi phyogs su oM zhes pas sangs pa'o/ /nub sgo nas sa bon hUM zhes pos lha
175b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'o/ /lho phyogs su sa bon mu mu zhes pas brgya byin no/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sa bon mu mu zhes pas dbang ldan no/ /me'i mtshams na sa bon d+ha na a gre zhes pas nor lta ku be ra'o/ bden bral mtshams na sa bon kha ni zhes pas 'byung po'i
175b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag po'o/ /rlung gi mtshams na sa bon phu phu zhes pas chu lha ba ru Na'o/ /shar gyi snam bu la oM gruM A swAhA/ keng rus 'jigs byed do/ /oM guM a d+he swAhA kha TwAM srin po'i 'o/ /oM guM aM swAhA tshogs kyi dbang phyug go/ /oM guM yi swAhA dri la sna'o/ /
175b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni mkha' 'gro ma'i sku mdog dang mthun no/ /byang gi snam bu la oM tsu u swAhA/ gtum pa'i dbang phyug go /oM tsu u swAhA bdun pa'i lta'o/ /a dzu re A hA tsha ba'i dbang phyug go/ oM dzu re swAhA 'jigs byed do/ /de dag ni mar me sa'i
175b4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dang mthun no/ /nub kyi snam bu la oM tuM le swAhA 'dod pa'i bdag po'o/ /oM tha le swAhA tha na de'i dbang phyag go/ /oM duM ye swAhA/ cang te'u'i rnga bzhag go/ /oM tuM e swAhA rnga chen 'jigs byed do/ /de dag ni 'jigs byad ma'i sku
175b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dang mthun no/ /lha'i snam bu la oM TuM o swAhA pi wang dbang phyug go/ oM ? oM swAhA da ro chen po'o/ /oM DuM oM swAhA mcheb gtsigs pa'o/ /oM DhuM aM swAhA/ gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /de dag ni 'phrog byed ma'i sku mdog dang mthun no
175b6(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyang phyag bzhi bzhi ste kha TwAM ga dang band+ha dang lha mo la 'khyud pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa dang spyan gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ thong pa'i phreng ba bcings pa ste de dag ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la'o/ /de ltar
175b7(rgyud 'grel): lha so so'i sngags re res rdzogs pa'i skad cig gis ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon sum du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha yongs su gang bar bskyed bar bya'o/ /de yan chad ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' i khams
176a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin rdul phra rab kyi gzugs kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa la sogs pa thams cad rtsom pa rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa 'dis bya'o/ /til dang
176a2(rgyud 'grel): nas dang 'bras yos dang me tog dkar po dang dri chu dang bsres pa'o/ /'o mas gang ba 'byor ba gser la sogs pa yon chab kyi snod rang gi sa bon gyi glor bzhag ste sngags bzlas te sa bon la gnas par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings
176a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ sa gdugs dang ni dkar po sprel/ /dkar po lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi 'gugs pa'o/ /oM badzra aM ku sha(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha spyan drang ngo/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /gi wang
176a4(rgyud 'grel): dri ma gsum bsgrang nas/ /dri ma gsum gyi tshigs gsum la gi wang bskug nas gnas par bya'o/ /oM A karSha ni hUM phaT ces bya ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad dgug par bya'o/ /gong ma bzhin du mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ /
176a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ dkar po dang gi wang sprel la/ oM smryuM/ swAhA seng ge ma'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ rgya ba dang rgyab tu yang sbyar nas/ /badzra spho Ta baM zhes lcags
176a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrog gi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis sgo bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyar nas pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du bya'o/ /oM tiSh+Tha A sa na hUM swAhA sngags dang ldan pas lha thams cad gdan la bzhugs
176a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas rim pa 'dis phyag rgya bzhi bstan par bya ste/ rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams te/ oM yo g+haM pa ra dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM hoM(rgyud 'grel): ma ma ya staM sa ma ya hoM/ pad+ma ye shes sbyar bar bya/ /sa yi gdugs dang rnam shes sbyar/ /
176b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka lu gu brgyud du ni/ /lhag ma ba dan tshul du bya/ /dri ma gsum dang dung par sbyar/ /rtse mo rnga po rdo rje 'dzin/ /snying po'i sngags de rnal 'byor nam mkha' byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM hUM a swAhA rnal 'byor nam mkha' i dam tshig gi
176b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags so/ /da nas nyi ma zla ba'i snyim par byas te/ pad+ma'i tshul gyi rnam par phye bar bya ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM a swAhA/ shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /sa gdugs rnam shes sbyar nas su/ /lhag ma rdo rje bzhin du bsgring/ /oM suM
176b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ rdo rje ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid gnyis bcings te/ /gnyis ka rgyab gnyis spyar bar bya/ /oM k+ShuM swAhA drag mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis ni sbrel nas su/ /kha yi phyogs su dgrol bar bya/ /oM yu swAhA ro langs ma'i
176b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur dam por gnyis bcings te/ /dkar po gi wang bsgrengs nas su/ /rtse dang rtse mo sprad byas te/ /rin chen tshul du sbyar bar bya/ /oM hUM swAhA/ gdol pa mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /mdun du lag pa gar byas nas/ /
176b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya thams cad bcings par bya/ /rdo rje khu chur gnyis bcings te/ /dkar po gi wang sbrel bar bya/ /oM smryuM swAhA seng ge ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de yi phyag rgya dam bcings te/ /dud pa dri ma gsum bsgreng ngo/ /oM hmryuM swAhA stag mo'i sngags dang
176b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o/ /de yis phyag rgya brtan bcings te/ /sa gdugs dang ni pad+ma sprel/ /oM ymryuM swAhA ce sbyang ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /phan tshun lan gsum gdab par bya'o/ /oM k+Sh+mryuM swAhA 'ug pa'i sngags dang phyag
176b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /gang gi lha mo dgu rnams ni/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags bzhin du/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol tu/ /lha mo'i phyag rgya de bzhin no/ /zla ba'i lag pa phye nas su/ /rnam shes 'jigs pa sbyar bar bya/ /gnyis pa rtse mo kha sprad ba/ /bdud rtsi'i chu
177a1(rgyud 'grel): yi steng du'o/ /oM ha hoM hwI swAhA/ shar gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /zla ba'i lag pa phye nas su/ /steng du nyi ma bstim par bya/ /oM sh+rI g+h+raM swAhA byang phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags dang phyag
177a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo bstan bcings te/ /nyi ma zla ba rnam par phye/ /oM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ /nub phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /zla ba nyi ma phye nas su/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sprad par bya/ /rtse mo gnyis ka kha sprad de/ /lta
177a3(rgyud 'grel): mo rnal 'byor ma gsum ste/ /oM bat+tA li bat+tA li hUM swAhA lho'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /sta zur gnyis su bzhag par bya/ /oM hUM swAhA sgeg mo'i 'o/ /g.yon gyi lag pa phye nas su/ /'jigs
177a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam shes sbyang bar bya/ /nyi ma kun gyis bzung ba ni/ /dung gi phyag rgya ji bzhin no/ /oM su pri ya gand+hE swAhA dri chab kyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dbang ldan mtshams na'o/ /pi wang tshul gyis pi wang ste/ /oM hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): swAhA pi wang ma'i sngags dang
177a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo sbyar/ /bskor zhing gyen du gtor bar bya/ /oM sraM swAhA me tog ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /me'i mtshams na'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas su/ /khu tshur bcings pa dkar po ni/ /bsgrengs nas kha yi mdun
177a6(rgyud 'grel): du bskul/ /oM hUM hUM hUM swAhA dbyangs mkhan ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te/ /mkhrig ma zla bas gzung bar bya/ /oM i swAhA spos ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bden bral mtshams na'o/ /ye shes dkar po
177a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te spyi bor brkyang/ /rnam shes gi nang? sbyar te dku ru brkyad/ /oM su ni dye swAhA/ gar mkhan ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /nyi ma khu tshur bcings nas su/ /ye shes gyen du bsgreng bar bya/ /oM k+ShuM swAhA mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /
177b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi sta zung mtshams su ni/ /zla ba'i lag pa brkyang par bya/ /bsgreng nas g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams/ /oM n+ye d+he swAhA rlung mtshams su'o/ /nyi ma'i lag pa khar bcug ste/ /hA hA gad sgrogs bzhad byed pa/ /oM phuM phu swAhA mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags
177b2(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo spyi bor bzhag pa ni/ /oM pheM phu swAhA byang gi 'bar byed ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /yi dags thal mo khar bcug ste/ /oM phroM phuM swAhA nub kyi 'jigs byed ma'i'o/ /zla ba'i khu tshur dam bcings te/ /rna ba'i rtsal sbyar bar
177b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ oM pheM phu swAhA tU ltor 'phrog byed ma'i'o/ /phyag rgya thams cad so so ru/ /snying po sngags dang sbyar bar bya/ /thams cad lha mo rnal 'byor ma/ /rdo rje sgrog gis bstan par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /
177b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra spho Ta baM rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /mda' bkang pa yi tshul du ni/ /rna bar mda''dren thugs bskul lo/ /oM khruM swAhA mdren pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /'khyud dang nu ma 'dzin pa ni/ /dbag gi lag pa
177b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis gzung/ /oM su pri ya te me hUM swAhA nu ma 'dzin pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /nyi ma'i lag pa phye bas te/ /dkar po ye shes sbyar bar bya/ /de yi dud pa la sogs bsgreng/ /rdo rje phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /oM hUM swAhA rdo rje'i
177b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid zla ba sbyar byas nas/ /dril bu'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /oM aM swAhA dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /snying gar nyi ma zla ba sbyar/ /pad ma sa gdugs bskyong byas nas/ /gsang ba'i gnas su sbyang bar bya/ /A
177b7(rgyud 'grel): li'i phyag rgyad grags pa yin/ /oM a swAhA/ A li'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur byas nas oM bsgreng nas/ /oM khe swAhA shar gyi khyab 'jug gi'i 'o/ /khu tshur snying gar bskul byed cing/ /oM aM swAhA byang gi tshangs pa'i'o/ /ba dan
178a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum ni gyen bsgreng na/ /oM hUM swAhA nub kyi drag po'i'o/ /zla ba'i gi wang bsgreng pa la/ /nyi ma'i lag pa phyed nas su/ /oM mu mu swAhA lho'i gdugs 'dzin pa'i 'o/ /khu tshur bcings nas dpral ba nas/ /dud pa dkar po bshibs
178a2(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /oM mu mu hUM swAhA dbang ldan mtshams nas dbang ldan gyi'o/ /khu tshur gnyis ni gshibs nas su/ /dkar bo'i gi wang bsgreng byas nas/ /rtse dang rtse ru kha sprad de/ /rin chen tshul du sbyar bar bya/ /oM nA dA gre hUM swAhA me'i mtshams
178a3(rgyud 'grel): na ku be ra'o/ /khu tshur byas nas dkar po bsgrang/ /oM kha de ni hUM phaT bden bral gyi mtshams na 'byung po'i bdag po'i 'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /dud pa dkar po bsgreng bar bya/ /oM b+hur b+hu ba swAhA/ rlung gi mtshams na ba ru
178a4(rgyud 'grel): Na 'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /dung pa dri ma gsum bsgreng nas/ /rtse dang rtse mo kha sprad de/ /sems ma rdo rjer rab tu grags/ /phyag rgya de ni keng rus 'jigs byed la sogs pa rnams kyi thun mong du bstan pa'o/ /sngags ni rang rang
178a5(rgyud 'grel): gi sngags brjod de shes par bya'o/ /oM kuM a swAhA keng rus 'jigs byed kyi'o/ /oM khuM a swAhA kha dang srin po'i 'o/ /oM guM i swAhA chogs kyi dbang phyug gi'o/ /oM gaM i swAhA dril bu'i rna ma'i 'o/ /oM tsuM u swAhA gtum mo dbang
178a6(rgyud 'grel): phyug gi'o/ /oM cuM u swAhA/ bdun pa'i lha'i'o/ /oM dzu ri swAhA che ba'i dbang phyug go /oM dzu rI swAhA hUM sgra 'byin byed do/ /oM tuM li swAhA 'dod pa drag po'i 'o/ /oM thuM lI swAhA than le dbang phyug gi'o/ /oM duM e swAhA cang te'u'i phyi bzhag
178a7(rgyud 'grel): gi'o/ /oM thuM yai swAhA rnga chen 'jigs byed kyi'o/ /oM tuM oM swAhA pi wang dbang phyug gi'o/ /oM thuM oM swAhA nga ro chen po'i 'o/ /oM duM oM swAhA mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i 'o/ /oM duM a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA gzhu 'dzin ma'i 'o/ /de dag
178b1(rgyud 'grel): gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ni lha dang rang gi lce'i pad ma'i 'dab ma la de'i dbus su rang gi sngags kyi yi ge rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /las kyi phyag rgya ni sngon bzhin du bcing ba gong ma dang 'dra ste/ lha dang
178b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi thugs khar yi ge a las rdo rje rgya gram bsams te phyag mtshan med par 'ching ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag mchen de kho na phyag mtshan dang ldan par bya ste/ /rnal 'byor nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po yin no/ /de nas rnal 'byor nam mkha' i
178b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis rim pa bzhin du mchod de zla ba nyi ma'i lag pa phyo ste/ /dud pa dri ma gsum bsgreng ste/ /phyag rgya des ni yon chab dbul lo/ /oM argaM pra tIts+tsha arga hUM swAhA yang me tog la
178b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas mchod do/ /pra ba ra sa tkA ra pkra tIts+tsha swAhA de nas gong ma bzhin du dril sogs bas mchod de mchod pa nyi shu bas kyang rim pa 'dis mchod par bya'o/ /de la nyi shu 'di lta ste/ /so so re re gar byas nas/ /sngon du sgeg pa la sogs pa
178b5(rgyud 'grel): bcing ngo/ /de nas pi wang gi tshul dang gling bu'i tshul dang/ dung gyi tshul dang/ phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi tshul dang/ bla bre'i tshul dang/ 'phan gyi tshul dang/ gdugs gyi tshul dang/ rda brdung ba'i tshul dang/ rda pa Ta ha brdung ba'i
178b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang/ gar byed pa'i tshul dang/ rgod pa'i tshul dang/ 'gying pa'i tshul dang/ khro ba'i tshul dang/ mda''phang ba'i tshul dang/ rdo rje gsor ba'i tshul dang/ nu ma 'tshir ba'i tshul dang/ thal mo sbyor ba'i tshul lo/ /sngags ni kun la hUM sbyar bar
178b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /rdor dra'i chos su gzung bar bya'o/ /oM g+haN+Da ra Ni ta saM pra ra Ni ta sarbba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa li te pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA da swA b+hA hUM hUM hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dkrol nas de dag la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o/ /dpal ldan sku gsung thuT las
179a1(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'i zhal gsum pa/ /'gyid bag khro bo rgod pa de bzhin spyan yang gsum/ /klu dbang nor bu'i 'od mdog shin tu mdzes pa'i sku/ /phyag mtshan drug gis mchen pa'i phyag mchog drug /kha TwAM lhung bzed ral gri dgra
179a2(rgyud 'grel): sta rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /ha ha la sogs gad sgrogs dmyal ba'i lang ling gcod byod pa/ /thar par phyin pa'i srid pa'i rang bzhin skye ba'i mchog /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs gnyis phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal ldan sangs
179a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mi gzugs mdzes pa'i sku mdog dkar ba'i sku/ /byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi dam pas gang ba'i snod 'dzin pa/ /mgon med sems can kun don dkon mchog gsum skyabs mdzad/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /
179a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rin chen spyi gzugs shin tu gser mdog sku/ /kha TwAM bdud rtsi dam pas bkang ba'i lhung bzed 'dzin/ /sdug bsngal sems can mang po tshim par byed pa'i sku/ /drag mo mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan
179a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi spyi gzugs pad ma rA ga'i mdog /kha TwAM yar bsgreng drag mo'i ro can 'dzin pa po/ /kun 'gro la sogs srid pa'i 'ching ba bcod byed ma/ /ro langs mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan las kyi spyi gzugs mdog
179a6(rgyud 'grel): ljang don yod gzugs/ /kha TwAM drag po mi yi thod pa sar pa 'dzin/ /'dod pa'i nyon mongs srid pa'i 'ching byed gcod byed ma/ /gdol ba'i mkha' 'gro ma khyod zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan seng ge ma dang stag mo ce spyad 'ug mgo
179a7(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang ni dge ba'i lcags kyu dgra sta can/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gcod mdzad ma/ /sprul pa'i sku rnams khyed kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal/ /mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib byed 'phrog byed
179b1(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams ni/ /mchog tu sa rnams srung bar byed po drag po rnams/ /sdang ba gdul dka' gzhan gyi rig pa gcod pa/ /lha yi mkha' 'gro ma kun zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal/ /sgeg mo yid dga' yid 'ong phreng ba dbyangs len ma/ /gar sogs
179b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs sgrar gar gyi yan lag dgu/ sna tshogs rnam bkod me tog mchog gi spos rno pa/ /ye shes snang ba mar me dri zhim zhing/ /dbang po dbang mchog rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo ni/ /sbyor bshin tu sbyor ba chen po la/ /lus ngag yid
179b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis chags pas nan tan drag tu ni/ /dpal ldan gsang ba'i gdan mchog mchod nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan de nyid rgyal po dam pa dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi/ /dpal ldan gsang ba'i gdan mchog 'od zer rab 'bar ba/ /dpal ldan rdo rje
179b4(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dkrol spyod de bzhin nyid/ /dpal ldan ye shes brten pa'i dbang phyug longs spyod 'dud/ de ltar bstod pa byas nas dril bu dkrol bar bya'o/ /oM shud+d+ho ma ma hUM a a a oM swAhA/ de nas thams cad sbyor ba bzhi la sogs pa'i sbyor ba chen
179b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i bar du chos thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /ji srid mi skyo'i bar du'o/ /skyo bar gyur na gong ma bzhin du mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas rim pa 'dis gtor ma yang dbul bar bya'o/ /dang por dkyil 'khor
179b6(rgyud 'grel): mdun du byas nas phyag rgya 'dis dgug par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /sa gdugs pad mas dkris nas su/ /dkar po gi wang bsgreng bar bya/ /dkar po dgug nas 'dren
179b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dam pa'o/ /dgugs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'o/ /oM pat+tA li mahA bat+tA la hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ dgug pa'i dam tshig gi sngags so/ /de nas yon chab dang khrus chab dbul lo/ /dri dang me tog dang spos dang 'byor
180a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ji bzhin du brten pa zas lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa dang/ /zan dang sran ma la sogs pa dang nya skam po dang byis kyu dang ldan pa'i gtor ma'i snong la lag reg pas sngags 'di bzlas pas gtor ma sbyin no/ /oM shing gcig dang
180a2(rgyud 'grel): ni dur khrod dang/ /ri brag dang ni phyugs kyi sa/ /yul gyi mdo dang lam gyi gzhi/ /khyad par du ni khyim stong dang/ /snod dang thang dang sa steng dang/ /khyad par gdol ba'i khyim gnas dang/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lha min mnyam du brten
180a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /nag po gcigs byed 'jigs byed pa/ /dga' las 'das dang bgegs rgyal po/ /dga' byed ma dang drag mo dang/ /'dzin byed ma dang u mas bstod/ /rgyal mo rnam par rgyal dbang mo/ /thub med gzhan gyi mi thub ma/ /nag mo
180a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang byed ma dang zla ba mo/ /nag ma sdad pa'i lam pa ki/ 'phrog byed ma dang me mar ma/ /'jigs byed yul gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche
180a5(rgyud 'grel): kha gcig dang thod chen ma/ /thod phreng thod pa'i phred chen ma/ /kha TwAM rdzu 'phrul chen mo dang/ /ral gri dgra sta'i lag pa gang/ /rdo rje de bzhin chu lag dang/ /mkha' 'gro la yi de nyid che/ /las kun rjes su sgrub pa yi/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil
180a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rgya chen po/ /rdo rje dbang phyug de bzhin gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po/ /gos med sbyor ba skyed med ma/ /rdo rje dbang phyug ma yi bkas/ /thams cad thams cad 'gugs pa'o/ /oM kak+ka b+ha na babba nd+ha na spyan drang ba'i
180a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /kha kh+khaM tA na hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT raM swAhA/ spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya de nyid las dkar po dang gi wang bsgreng ba'o/ /oM bat+tA li baTtA li hUM hUM hUM ho(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /dga' bar bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /gtor ma'i snod
180b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste rdo rje bcings te ral gri dbyug pa'i tshul du byas te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarbtha d+harmA NAM Adya nutpan+na twA ta oM guM swAhA/ sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pas kyang mchod de stod pa bya zhing dril bu dkrol bar bya'o/ /sems dpa' chen
180b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang po mchog /dga' ba chen po dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /thugs kyi sems dpa' ting 'dzin mchog /rdo rje rdo rje chen po'i stobs/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i mchog /bdud dang bdud ni rab
180b3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa/ /kun gyi khro bo khro chen po/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos skyes mchog /rdo rje hUM byed hUM byed pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor bu spyin/ /chags pa chen po bde ba che/ /'dong pa thar pa nor chen po/ /srid gsum 'jig rten gsum
180b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum la/ /mi g.yo rab mchog mi gsal ba/ /shin tu phra ba rab 'dus pa/ /g.yo dang rab mchog thob pa yi/ /srid dang 'khor ba bdag byed pa/ /thog ma med pa tha med pa/ /'dod chags dag
180b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ting 'dzin mchog /sna tshogs 'dod chags dbang phyug che/ /nam mkha' i mdza' las rtag pa'i don/ /'byung ba chen po kun gyi gzhi/ /longs spyod dpal gyi rgyal po gco/ /'dod pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /phyag 'tshal bstod de phyag 'tshal bstod
180b6(rgyud 'grel): gus pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub bstod/ /bdag gis cho ga ma tshang ba rnams ni bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol/ /khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzod/ /dngos grub gsol nas ci bder gshegs/ /
180b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'dir ni gshegs su gsol/ /phyi rol lha rnams kyang se gol gsum dang sngags 'dis btang bar bya'o/ /oM gats+tsha gats+tsha hUM swAhA/ ji ltar nsprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rang gi dbugs
181a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis drangs nas/ /rang gis lus la zhugs te/ rang gi gnas la dgod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste spyi bo dang mig dang rna ba dang lce la go rims bzhin du drag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ gdol ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ /ro langs
181a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgod do/ /seng ge ma dang stag mo dang/ ce spyang ma dang/ 'ug pa mo rnams go rims bzhin du mgrin pa dang/ dpung pa gnyis dang snying ga dang/ lte ba rnams la dgod do/ /sgo ba bzhi ni
181a3(rgyud 'grel): brla g.yas g.yon dang rje dar la'o/ /puk+ka si la sogs pa go rims bzhin du lce'i thig le'i steng du puk+ka sI la sogs pa bstim par bya'o/ /brang la sogs pa'i yan lag lnga la ni drag mo la sogs pa bstim par bya'o/ /kha'i
181a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas su byin gyis brlab nas gtum mo la sogs pa bstim par bya'o/ /so'i phreng ba dang lce la yang thod phreng ma la sogs pa bstim par bya'o/ /de dag gi bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i snod ni lus la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /'jig
181a5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi lha tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la sogs pa ni pa spu'i bu ga dang rkang pa la sogs pa la go rims bzhin du thim keng rus 'jigs byed la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug ni rnal 'byor nam mkha' i dbugs dang 'od zer la thim par
181a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /snying gar sgeg mo/ /nu ma'i bar du dri chab ma'o/ /mgrin pa la dri pi wang ma'o/ /mgo bo la me tog ma'o/ /so'i phreng ba gnyis la dbyangs ma'o/ /gsang bar spos me ma'o/ /dpung pa gnyis por gar byed ma'o/ /mig
181a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la mar me ma'o/ /gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am ngo bo nyid du rnam par bsam/ dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo rnal 'byor nam mkha' bdag go /zhes nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o/ /bsrung ba dgod pa dang/ /dbang bskur ba dang/ go cha
181b1(rgyud 'grel): go ba byas nas rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa bsams nas bzhag par bya'o/ /nyal ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'greng ba dang rtag tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas lha dang bdag gi sbyor ba bsgom/ de dag ni shin tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas
181b2(rgyud 'grel): longs sbyod rnal 'byor pa bzhin du ji snyeng dam tshig gi rdzas de dag gis tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i zas rim pa mchod pa 'dis bya'o/ /yi ge k+ShuM gis dga' bar bya ba dang/ yi ge yuM gyis dag par bya ba dang/ yi ge hUM gis mkhregs par bya ba
181b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ yi ge suM gyis bdud rtsir bya/ /yi ge hUM gis ro mnyam por bya ba dang/ pad+ma'i snod la bzhag la nyi ma'i lag pa bdud rtsi'i snod bzhag nas/ zla ba'i lag pa'i mthe bo dang srin lag sa dang ri rab tu bsgom/ /oM ha ha h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gyi sku gsung thugs gzugs
181b4(rgyud 'grel): dang dri dang ro dang dpa' bo lha gsum gyi bdag nyid bzung 'dzin spangs pa'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi lha re re'i 'khor lo la mthe bong dang srin lag gis 'thor 'thung gis sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas mchod nas phyag byas te de nas rang gis lus
181b5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i lha dang 'khor lo'i lha ji ltar dga' bar tshim par bya'o/ /de kho na bzhin du tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga la yang sbyor ba la gnas nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la mchod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste dpral ba dang spyi bo dang lce'i rtse mo
181b6(rgyud 'grel): la thig le gsum byin nas ji ltar bde bar bya'o/ /de ltar mngon sum du dga' ba yul gyi mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod nas/ yongs su rdzogs pa la gong ma bzhin du me tog la sogs pas
181b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /tshigs bcad bzlas nas gtang bar bya'o/ /tshigs bcad ni 'di lta ste/ oM ba ba bat+tA li bat+tA li che/ oM ku ru ku ru bat+twa li ma hA bat+tA li swAhA/ dur khrod gnas
182a1(rgyud 'grel): mo dngos grub zhal/ /gtum mo 'jigs byed yi dags kha/ /dam tshig sring mo khrag dga' ma/ /ki li ki li sgra sgrogs ma/ /dur khrod ro yi tshal dbus su/ /tshogs dang po nya bcas pa ru/ /'jig rten gtum
182a2(rgyud 'grel): mo dung sol ma/ /gsol zhig bzhengs shig dam tshig ma/ /gnas nas dbang du mdzad du gsol/ /tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi ku ru hu hu oM phroM ha gri sa sarba du Sh+Ti b+ha k+Sha phuM phe phriM phri phaT swAhA/ rdo rje dam pa bcings nas su/ /dkar po gi wang bsgreng nas su/ /
182a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka rtse mo bkug nas ni/ /kha yi 'gram du bzhag par bya/ /lhag ma gtor ma byin gyis brlab/ /dud pa sol ba zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor nam mkha' dang ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob
182a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang po'i sdes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' i btsun mo dang 'dus las/ /dpal ldan dga' ba bzhi ston pa/ /
182a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum po bskyed pa'i mgon/ /sna tshogs gzugs can de la 'dung/ /gdan bzhi'i rim pa las 'ongs pa/ /'khor lo bzhi la yang dag gnas/ /de nyid bzhi zhes gang bshad pa/ /de ni bdag gis gsal bar bri/ /
182a6(rgyud 'grel): dag byas bde ba'i stan gi nas te/ /mdun du bder gshegs yang dag mchod/ /blo ldan ma lus stong bsgoms nas/ /rgyud las gsungs pa bsams par bya/ /lhun po'i rtse mor khang brtsegs ni/ /shin tu mdzes pa
182a7(rgyud 'grel): yid du cing/ /der ni byang chub sems nyid las/ /sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms par bya/ /rkang pa'i mthil dug nas pa yi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu/ /ji srid lte ba'i mtsho skyes su/ /rib gyis steng du
182b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ste/ de nas me yig las byung ba/ /me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum tshul/ /'di ni bdag dang kun bsregs nas/ /sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs par bsam/ /de nas sngags dang mtshan ma yi/ /cho ga rim pas lus su bsgom/ /seng ge'i stan la
182b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yi/ /ri bong can gyi 'od 'dzin 'phro/ /me dang chu yi dbus gnas pa/ /sna tshogs pad+ma yid 'ong ba/ /der ni kun tu rnam 'phro ba'o/ /sde tshan dang po bsam byas te/ /gangs dang kun nga zla 'dra ba'i/ /'od zer tshogs ni shin tu bsil/ /sangs rgyas tshoD
182b3(rgyud 'grel): chen rnams 'phro ba'o/ /sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu'i 'od/ /ye shes lha mo'i bdag nyid gsal/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dbugs kyi rlung la zhen nas su/ /'ba' san+ta yi bdud rtsi 'thung/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya dang ni chos
182b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi khams/ /gzhan yang mig dang rna ba dang/ /sna dang lce dang lus dang yid/ /rnam shes drug dang 'byung ba dang/ gcig phyag gnyis shin tu drag/ lha yi rgyan gyis shin tu ba'o/ /'gro ba thams cad de las byung/ /shar dang lus ngan phyogs su ni/ /dbyangs
182b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge dang po gnyis pa dgod/ /nub tu bcu pa'i mdza' ma ste/ /lho yi 'dab mar de yi mdza' / /mkha' 'gro ma dang drag mo'i gzugs/ /ro langs ma dang gtum mo'o/ /seng ge stag dang ces spyang mo/ /'ug pa mo ste mtshams bzhir dgod/ /dkar dang seng dang
182b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin dmar/ /sngon dang sngo bsangs bzhi ba'o/ /mchems su kha dog 'dren ma ru/ /ma ning las skyes bsam par bya/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis shin tu drag /lha yi rgyan gyis shin tu klubs/ /spyan gsum khro zhing bzhad pa ste/ kha TwAM ga dang mi thod
182b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /mtshams kyi lha mo g.yon na ni/ /sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa bsnams/ /ral gri lcags kyu dgra sta dang/ /dbyug pa rnams te phyag g.yas na'o/ /lha mo rdo rje cod pan can/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /mi yi bags pa'i
183a1(rgyud 'grel): bla gos dang/ /sgeg pa yi ni nyams kyis mdzes/ /mche ba can dang cod pan can/ /ngang pa ci bgyi phyogs kyi gdan/ /mtshams su sang ge stag gdong dang/ /'ug pa dang ni ce spyad do/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mar me ma/ /
183a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig ma 'phrog byed rang rgya can/ /ro dang nyi ma'i stan bzhugs pa/ /rang gi gnas kyi mdog bzhin bsam/ /me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog /bya grub shin tu ngag rnams las/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bskyed nas su/ /rang gi rigs kyi
183a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas gdab/ /gang zhig phyi rol dkyil 'khor dga' / /de yis de dag lus bsgoms nas/ /dbyangs yig dang po thig le'i gzugs/ /sngar bstan bzhin du lte bar bsgom/ /bdag nyid de ltar bsgoms nas su/ /dngos grub thams
183a4(rgyud 'grel): cad bsgrub par bya/ /sngags kyi bdag nyid ma bsten par/ /las rnams bya bar nus min pas/ /ji srid snang ba mthong ba'i bar/ /rnal 'byor can gyis de srid bsgom/ /mtshan ma thob na myur du ni/ /rtag tu grol ba'i dngos grub 'gro/ kha sna
183a5(rgyud 'grel): mig dang rna ba ni/ /rang gi lag pas bsnams nas su/ /ma yengs blo yis bltas nas ni/ /yang dag sbyor bas thig le mthong/ /rlung dang me dang sa dang chu/ /'khor lor sgyur pa'i thig le ste/ /de yi mtshan nyid shes byas nas/ /las
183a6(rgyud 'grel): ni ji bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po snang ma zhib pa bya/ ser zhing dmang bas rgyas pa ste/ /sngon pos nad kyi las ni bya/ /du ba'i mdog gis bskrad cing gsang/ /lag gnyis gsang bar mnyam gzhag ste/ /mchod rten 'og tu thur sel la/ /
183a7(rgyud 'grel): ka sha'i yi ge bltas nas ni/ mi gnyis sna rtser bltas nas su rlung gis lte bar gsal bar pas ma/ /gzuD na stong par bstan byas na/ /yid bcing pa yi dam pa yin/ /rnam par snang mdzad dbyangs dang po/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas lngar ldan pas/ /rang gi lha yi
183b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas ni/ /'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya/ /drod mdza' rtse drag bcas pa dang/ /de nyid dgu pas brgyan pa dang/ /me la gnas shing i yis brgyan/ /'di yis rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ bzlas pa'o/ /ha ho hwI:
183b2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): ri rI li lI/ phuM pheM phroM phriM/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sa bon no/ /rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor la/ /gnas pa yi ni thod pa la/ /lus las byung pa thams cad bsam/ /zla ba zhu ba'i tshul du 'gyur/ /de nas
183b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba bar snang 'jig /pad+ma'i dbang phyug shin tu mdog mdzes shing/ /rnam par snang mdzad dri zhim btung bar mdzod/ /phyag na rdo rje ro bro rdo rje dbang/ /rnam gsum lha gsum du ni gzung bar bya/ /lte bar me yi rang bzhin bsam bya ba/ /'od gsal
183b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dra ba'i tshogs 'phro ba/ /nyi mar gnas la dag pa'i blo yis ni/ /bsregs pa'i lha la gtor na gos mi 'gyur/ /nang gi sems las sprul pa yi/ /bdag gi gdan gyi sgom pa dang/ /sngags dang thig le'i de kho na nyid kyi dum bu ste dang
183b5(rgyud 'grel): po'o// //ye shes lus su bsgoms nas ni/ /thur sel rlung ni bsdams nas kyang/ /steng du drangs ste bsdams byas la/ /'byung dang 'jug pa'i brtan par bya/ /chu shir me tog lta bu'i rtsa/ /snying gar gnas shing 'og tu blta/ /
183b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+mas mdzes pa la/ /sa bon dag gis dgong bya ste/ /de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog /dbyugs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /gya gyur rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso/ /yan lag dam tshig rdo rje ste/
183b7(rgyud 'grel): mgon ni rin chen rgyal po yin/ /thig le sgra dang bcas pa naM/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo zhes byang grags/ /zla ba'i zer ltar dri med pa'i/ /rigs kyis khyab pa'i 'od zer 'phro/ /gal te sna tshogs bsgrub 'dod na/ /she rab can gyis 'di bsam bya/
184a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas drod kyi gsum pa dang/ /brgyad kyi mdza' dang bdun pa yi/ /dang po de bzhin drong ba'i mdza' / /sgra dang bcas pas yang dag brgyan/ /shar kyi phyogs su mkha' 'gro ma/ /de bzhin byang du drag mo bsgom/ /nub kyi phyogs
184a2(rgyud 'grel): su ro langs ma/ /lho phyogs mkha' 'gro gtu mo ste/ /sngon du bstan pa'i mdog bzhin du/ /phyogs kyi 'dab mar bsgom par bya/ /mtshams su kha dog 'dren ma ru/ /brtsegs pa'i sa bon bzhi po bsam/ /yan lag brgyad kyi go cha gang/ /
184a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags de nyid kyi rnal 'byor ldan/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs pa'i/ /sngags de dag ni blta bar bya/ /las bzhi yi ni gnas skabs la/ /rjes su mthun pa'i mi shigs bsgom/ /de bzhin las bzhi sgrub byed pas/ /lus kyang kha
184a4(rgyud 'grel): dog bzhi ru dgong/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis la sogs pa/ /zhal phyag ji snyed 'dod par bya/ /zhi ba li na zhi ba'i lus/ /rlung dang me yi steng du ni/ /nyi ma la gnas drag po bya/ /sa chu zla ba la gnas te/ /zhi ba'i las ni bsgom par bya/ /
184a5(rgyud 'grel): oM? basuM? k+ShuM yuM hUM hUM/ smryuM hmryuM ymryuM k+Sh+mryuM/ phuM pheM phreM phriM/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa bon no/ /oM h+rI Ta Ta d+ha ra hUM hUM hUM phu phu phu A A A phaT phaT phaT/ klu brgyad kyi dug dbrog pa'o/ /oM h+rAM kriM k+ShuM swAhA/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i 'o/ /oM bat+tA li rak+Sha rak+Sha
184a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phu phuM phaT/ dam tshig srung ba'i 'o/ /'khor lo 'dri bris na/ /dbung bar btags te/ srung pa/ mos/ nad pa nad las grol gyur zhing/ dus la bab bas mtho ris 'gro/ /rdo rje 'dzin mar snyom zhugs nas/ /gzhan gyi
184a7(rgyud 'grel): gdan ni bstan pa ste/ /dngos grub sna tshogs byed pa'i gdan/ dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /chos gcig sogs la rkang g.yon gyi/ /mthe bong sogs 'phel mgo bor gnas/ /de nas g.yas kyi cha la ni/ /zla ba'i rigs kyi
184b1(rgyud 'grel): 'ju bar 'gyur/ /rlung dang me dang nyi ma la/ /gnas pa'i rnag las bon blta/ /thams cad dbang bskur phyag rgya ni/ blo dang ldan bas gsang sngags kyi/ /sbyor ba 'di yis slob ma dbab/ /ra ma ra ma tu hUM badzra sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya oM AM hUM h+ri
184b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di gnas pa zhir bkod nas su/ /rdzas bcu dag ni gzung nas kyang/ /'bum du bzlas nas bsgrub par bya/ /de ni kha ru blugs tsam gyis/ /slob ma myur du babs nas ni/ /gang gis 'khor lo'i steng du ni/ /shin tu myur bar 'khor zhing gnas/
184b3(rgyud 'grel): des ni 'gro ba sgyu ma dang/ /smig rgyu lta bus mthong bar 'gyur/ /snying gar rdo rje bkod nas su/ /tiSh+Tha badzra zhes brjod la/ /zhing bar shes nas mi g.ye zhing/ /byang chub sems ni brtan par gyis/ /zhes brjod do/ /ri dwags dbang zhon rdo rje gzhu dang
184b4(rgyud 'grel): mda'/ /thogs shing rang 'od btsun mo thed pa dril/ /bsnams ba'i zhal gsum phyag drug mdog sdo ba/ /snying ka'i phyogs su rnam par bsgom byas nas/ /rdzogs ldan yi ge 'bum phrag gcig du bzlas/ /gnyis ldan dus su sngags pas
184b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag gnyis/ /gsum ldan la ni sum 'gyur bya ba ste/ /rtsod dus bye ba gsum dang 'bum phrag bzhi/ /le lo'i nyes pa phan min gdams ngag dang/ /spro ba nyams dang yul la chags pa dang/ /dang pa dang bral dge ba'i rtsa ba nyams/ /
184b6(rgyud 'grel): de dag thub pa'i ka ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /nang gi sems las sprul ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa dang bcas pa'i/ /gzhan gyi gdan gyi bsgom pa'i de kho na nyid de dum bu gnyis pa'o/ //spyor pa'i gdan la gnas
184b7(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /'dab ma bcu drug pad+ma che/ /gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo rnams/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yi dga' ma/ /yi ge'i dbang phyug dbus sa bon/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /ma mo'i tshogs dang yang dag ldan/ /ri dags
185a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i bdud rtsi 'dzin/ /shar du ma mo gsum yin te/ /de bzhin byang du rnam pa gsum/ /nub kyi phyogs su 'ang gsum yin te/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam gsum dgod/ /mtshams su ma ning sa bon rnams/ /
185a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin 'dren mar shes par bya/ /phyogs kyi 'dab ma'i sa bon rnaMs/ /phyogs kyi bder gshegs mdog tu blta/ /mchod rten rtse mo'i sgo ru ni/ /blo ldan yi ge'i dbang phyug bsam/ /de 'od bdud rtsir 'dzag pa yis/ /chos kyi dkyil
185a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bkru bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu 'bab 'gyur bas/ /sa yi bu gar thim par bya/ /bdung rtsi char pa las byung des/ /lha mo thams cad bskyangs par 'gyur/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni/ /srid pa stong nyid bsgoms
185a4(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos/ /'di ni sngon por bsgom 'gyur na/ /nad dang skra dkar 'byung mir 'gyur/ /dbang chen la gnas bsam nas ni/ /dpung rnams thams cad
185a5(rgyud 'grel): bcings par 'gyur/ /dkar po'i mdog gis ltas mkhan dang/ /dri ma med pa'i snyan ngag 'gyur/ /zla drug tsam du goms pa yis/ /dngos grub 'dir 'gyur the tshom med/ /ye shes lha mor 'dun 'khyud pa'i/ /rdo rje sems
185a6(rgyud 'grel): dpar rnam bsgoms la/ /dngos grub kun byed gdan dang ni/ /sngags kyi pha rol son shes bya/ /'di ni sbyor ba'i gdan shes bya/ /rnal 'byor thams cad yang dag 'byung/ /snying po las kyang snying po sbyor/ /sangs rgya
185a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgrub byed pa/ /thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ /gdan de 'dod pa thams cad pa'o/ /de las longs spyod spyang byas nas/ /der ni chags las khyad par 'gro/ /steng ge lam du 'bar ba dge/ /ji snyed mi gron pa'i bar du dmigs
185b1(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par 'khyud nas lha mo rnams/ /gang yang mgrin par yang dag rig /g.yas g.yon kyi ni mthe bo yis/ /steng du 'gro ba bcir bar bya/ /rgyas pa'i 'og tu spyod pa yis/ /bde ba dam pa rigs par bya/ /thog mdza' spangs pa'i
185b2(rgyud 'grel): skad cig ste/ /der ni dngos po dmigs mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni bde ba che/ /rang rig pa ni skye 'gyur ba/ /brjod las ring du song ba ste/ /mthong med gang na'ang gnas pa min/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson pa yis/ /bsod nams
185b3(rgyud 'grel): las ni rang gis rtogs/ /de lta mod kyi lus dang ni/ /bla ma'i man ngag gis mtshon bya/ /de nyid kha dog med cing mtshan nyid med/ /thub dbang 'chi ba'i gnas skabs lta bur rtogs/ /dag pa'i lus su bsgoms nas sngags kyis ni
185b4(rgyud 'grel): man ngag ji bzhin sgo rnams bsdams nas su/ /rnam shes sa bon rlung la yang dag gnas/ /tshigs dgu nas ni steng du 'pho bar bya/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs rung ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi/ /'tshe zhing rmongs par 'gro bar zhugs
185b5(rgyud 'grel): gang yin/ /nyi ma stong gis mngon shes drug ldan lus/ /bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /nang gi sems las sprul pa'i sbyor ba'i gdan gyi bsam gtan gyi de kho na nyid dang/ /bdag med ma'i mngon par byang chub pa dang/
185b6(rgyud 'grel): gong du 'pho ba ste dum bu gsum pa'o// //ri yi rtser gnas ge sar dang/ /sna tshogs 'dab ma 'jam pa la/ /de yi dbus gnas dpa' bo ni/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa/ /'byung po kun gyi gnas yin
185b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu yang yin/ /lus can kun la khyab pa ste/ /thams cad thams cad bdag nyid gnas/ /haM gyi sa bon yang dag 'byung/ /'jig rten gsum bskyed gtso bo yin/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag nyid te/
186a1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sna tshogs 'bras bu 'byung/ /mtshan ma sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgya cur bcas/ /rlung bskyod pa la zhon nas su/ /rtag tu lte bar 'gro 'ong byed/ /mgo bo mdza' na rlung dkyil 'khor
186a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhu yi dbyibs ltar gnas pa ste/ /steng dang 'og gi rlung la ni/ /'dab ma bzhi po yang dag gnas/ /lce dang rkan ni sbyar nas su/ /rtag tu sgra dang bcas byed pa/ /gcig tu gyur cing thim 'gyur ba/ /der ni phyag rgya chen por brjod/ /'jug pa'i
186a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung ni bsdams nas su/ /steng du drangs te sbyar bar bya/ /ji srid ldog par 'gyur ba du/ /rnal 'byor pa yis brtsir bar bya/ /ji ltar mar la mar blugs zhing/ /ji ltar chu la chu blugs dang/ /nam mkha' dang ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /rang gis rang ni rig
186a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /'jug dang 'byung dang gnas pa ni/ /dal zhing dal ba'i rim gyis su/ /cha med dge ba rab zhi gnas/ /rang bzhin med pa nyid du 'gro/ ye shes 'di ni rang rig ste/ /kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim
186a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni/ /de nyid rnal 'byor can zhes bya/ /kun tu dga' la sogs rim dang/ /nyer bstan la sogs bye brag dang/ /rnal 'byor la sogs rim pa yis/ /bla ma'i lung las mchog du bde/ /sa bon med cing sgom pa med/ /rang bzhin
186a6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa gnas med pa/ /ma lus bsregs par gshegs par bya/ /khyad par 'gro ba'i bde ba gang/ /gang phyir chags pa 'ang rnam rtog ste/ /chags bral de yi dri mar bcas/ /gti mug spangs pa gang yin pa/ /gnyid log sad
186a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin shes bya/ /sa 'og sa stong mtho ris su/ skad cig gcig gis sku gcig 'gyur/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi rtogs pa yi/ /bcing bar nus pa ma yin no/ /sngags kyi rjes 'brangs man ngag shin tu bstan/ /gang yin dngos
186b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams chu zla lta bur blta/ /yul la mngon zhen dag ni bzlog 'gyur zhing/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i lan ni nye bar 'gyur/ /rang gi sems nyid bdud yin pas/ /de bas sems ni dbang du bya/ /rang sems dbang du byas nas ni/ /bdud dang dgra dag
186b2(rgyud 'grel): yod ma yin/ /dper na ge sar dri zhim la/ mos pa'i bud ba pad nang du/ /nyi ma nub pas bcings nas su/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin bla ma'i lung ni nyi ma nub pa'i sems can gang/ /'khor ba rab 'jigs rab rib
186b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i zhags pas bcing gyur pa/ /de shar ba yis de kho na nyid lam ni nyer mtshon nas/ /rjes su mthun pa'i lam gyis go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dper na zas la longs spyod dang/ /'dod la mngon par zhen pa bzhin/ /de bzhin
186b4(rgyud 'grel): du ni goms byas pas/ /dngos kun stong pa nyid du mthong/ /'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa yi/ /gdan bzhi pa yi de nyid bzhi/ /dgra las rgyal ba'i slob dpon gyis/ /rang gi myong ba bzhin du bris/ /gdan bzhi pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi mngon par
186b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub gtan la phab pa ste dum bu bzhi pa'o// //dpal gdan bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid bzhi ba slob dpon dze tA ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos lha btsas kyi
186b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus ste gtan la phab pa'o// //de kho na nyid drug rnam par bzhag pa bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Sha Ta ta TA bya ba s+tha na/ bod skad du/ /de kho nyi drug rnam par gzhag pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo
186b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khyab bdag lnga yi dngos/ /ye shes mkha' gro ma btug de/ /bla ma'i bka' bzhin nyer brten te/ /de nyid drug 'di bdag gis byas/ /gsang rgyud 'phags pa gdan bzhi las/ /btus te slob ma blo zhan la/ /phan phyir dad pas 'di byas
187a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ mkhas pas dpyad cing bzod par gsol/ /rdo rje dril bu bgrang phreng dang/ /ye shes dang ni rnam bzhi la/ /bdud rtsi 'od dang mchod brten gnyis/ /bsnan te drug tu shes par bya/ /dang po rdo rje brdams pa ni/ /bkral te/
187a2(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/ /pad+ma'i lag sgor lnga byas te/ /pus mo g.yas g.yon steng du bzhag /lag mthil gnyis la bsgom pa ni/ /g.yas su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /g.yon du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag /ma dang a las bskyed/
187a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de steng rdo rje dril bzhag nas/ /hUM dang a las bskyed par bya/ /A li kA yi sbyor ba yis/ /thabs dang shes rab dngos su ni/ /rtogs te de nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'di nyid ni/ /bsgom pa'i man ngag 'di lha ??
187a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje steng gi rtse lnga la/ /rigs lnga'i lha dang sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil gyi rtse mor rnaM dang snang mdzad/ /shar gyi rtse mor mi bskyod ma/ /lho rtser rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /snang ba mdza' yas nub tu dgod/ /byang du don yod grub pa bsgom/ /de 'og
187a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab brgyud la/ /byang chub sems brgyad shes bya ste/ /pad+ma'i phyag dang byams pa dang/ /nam kha'i mdzad dang kun tu bzang/ /phyag na rdo rje 'jam dpal dang/ /grib sel dang ni sa snying po/ /lha rnams brgyad po 'di dag ni/ /ji bzhin
187a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su bsgom pa yin/ /dbus kyi sgong lta bu la/ /ye shes lnga ni bsgom par bya/ /de yi phyi rol phyogs bzhin/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnam bzhi bsgom/ /de 'og 'dab brgyad pad mar yang/ /sgeg mo la sogs brgyad bsgom pa/ /
187a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las sbas nas ma gsungs kyang/ /man ngag don gyis shes par bya/ /'og gi rtse mo rnam lnga yang/ /bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma lnga ste/ /dbus kyi ye shes mkha' gro ma/ /shar du rdo rje mkha' gro ma/ /de bzhin drag mo byang phyogs te/ /
187b1(rgyud 'grel): ro langs ma ni nub kyi rtser/ /lho ru gdol pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /rdo rje de nyid lha mod pa sgom/ /de ltar gsum cu rtsa gcig star/ /rtogs te rdo rjer bsgoms nas ni/ /hUM gi dbyangs 'di blangs byas te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya/ /hUM mdzes
187b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje gsor nas su/ /sems can thar pa la ni dgod/ /rnam par thar pa chos kyi don/ /rdo rje snying po 'dzin par bya/ /hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho des ni 'khor ba bcod 'gyur te/ /nyon mongs mun pa bsal byas nas/ /bla med byang chub thob pa dang/ /
187b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes snang ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i da nyi de mi shes na/ /byang chub dngos grub ring du spangs/ /rdo rje dag par ma gyur na/ /brgya byin mtshon cha do rje 'dra/ /de nas dril bu'i de nyid ni/ /nang gi nam kha'i khams la ni/ /byang chub snying po gnas
187b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /mtshen nyid med par spangs pa ni/ /bum pa shes rab bdud rtsi'o/ /de steng 'dab brgyad pad ma la/ /sa bon brgyad las lha mo brgyad/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste/ /na bza' dkar mo byang gi phyogs/ /nub tu ma ma ki zhes bya/ /de bzhin lho
187b5(rgyud 'grel): ru sangs rgyas spyan/ me yi mtshams su skul byed ma/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud dbang ldan/ /khro gnyer ma ni rlung mtshams su/ /bden bral mtshams su rin chen sgron/ /lha mo de brgyad dbus su yang/ /shes rab pha rol phyi ma ma ste/ /pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan
187b6(rgyud 'grel): mnga' i ?/ /gzugs rdzogs 'ong dang ldan par bsgom/ /steng gi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /sdon bzhin sgeg mo la sogs brgyad/ /rtse ldar mkha' gro ma lnga bsgom/ /dbus kyi lce ni ye shes te/ /thams cad 'du dang 'bro bar byed/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis
187b7(rgyud 'grel): lhar sbyor ka/ rnam par dag pa'i dril bu 'di/ /sngags 'di dag ni bzlas nas su/ /phyogs brgyad dag tu lan gsum dkrol/ /oM badzra dar me ra ne ta bra ra ne te sarba bud+d+ha pra za li ti pradz+nyA pa ra mi te/ na tra saM b+hA be/ hUM hUM/ hUM/ ho ho ho a swAhA/ shes
188a1(rgyud 'grel): rab chos kyi dril bu 'di/ /sangs rgyas thams cad slar byas nas/ /mi shes 'dam la bying ba yi/ /sems can sangs rgyas don du bkrol/ /de nyid sbyor ba dman na ni/ /dngos grub ring du mtshon pa ste/ /de nyid med pa'i rnal
188a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i/ /glang chen dril bu bkrol ??pra/ /de nas bgrang phreng de nyid kyi/ /yang dag cho ga shes par bya'o/ /shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang/ /dkar po la sogs gzhan yang rung/ /zhi ba'i las la khyad par gsungs/ /gser dang dngul dang
188a3(rgyud 'grel): zangs ma dang/ /pad ma'i snying po rgyas pa yin/ /gur kum la sogs dri yis ni/ /byugs pa'i ri lu dbang la smos/ /ru rag sha dang lung thang dang/ /mi rus mngon spyod zhes su gsungs/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la/ kho de ces i las kun
188a4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ de yi grangs ni 'di lta ste/ /sngags grub pa la lnga bcu dang/ /nga rang la de nyid nyi shu lnga/ /shi ba la ni brgya phrag ste/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni rgyas pa'i yin/ /mngon spyod la ni drug cu'o/ /phreng thag dgu sgril byas pa la/ /mdo 'dzin nyis rtsegs
188a5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya/ /g.yas pa'i lab /mthil nyi ma la/ /a yig dmar po bsgom par bya/ /g.yon gyi lag mthil zla ba la/ /hUM yig dmar po bsgoms nas su/ /sa bon de gnyis las bskyed pa/ /g.yas sor rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /g.yon ni pad+ma
188a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab lngar bsgom/ /phreng ba gang yin dkyil bzhag ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma snyim par sbyar/ /ri lu dgra bcom bsgoms nas su/ /phreng thag lha dgur byin gyis rlabs/ /mdo 'dzin 'og ma mchod rten te/ /gong mchos kyi sku ru bsgom/ /bgrang phreng
188a7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bsgoms nas su/ /sngags 'di yis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /oM ya te ya ma tA dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha ma hA b+ha be ta/ hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ a swAhA/ chos kyi sku dang mchod rten la/ /dgra bcom bskor ba byed bsams te/ /mchod rten grib ma'ang mi
188b1(rgyud 'grel): 'god phyir/ /bsgyur log nas nas phreng ba bgrang/ /phreng ba de rnams bgrang ba yang/ /so so'i khyad par gyis shes te/ /zhi ba'i phreng ba 'dzub la bzhag /de bzhin rgyas pa gung mo ste/ /srin lag la ni dbang du bshad/ /mngon spyod mthe chung shes par bya
188b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i lha gang dgug bsams te/ /mthe bo lcags kyus bkug pa bsgom/ /de yang lha mo g.yon pas 'dren pa yin/ /de yang lha mo g.yon pas 'dren/ /g.yas pas lha rnams 'dren pa yin/ /de ltar dag pa'i bsgrang phreng gis/ /gang 'dod
188b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'grub par byed/ /de nyid med pa'i phreng ba ni/ /bud med rgyan gyis do shal 'dra/ /de nas ye shes de nyid la/ /'di ltar yang dag shes par bya/ /chos kun ye shes gcig pa la/ /khyad par ring thung gyur nas gnas/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin
188b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dri zad dang ni lha min dang/ /nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci/ /rgyal chen dang ni gang ba bzang/ /lho 'phye dang ni grul bum dang/ /mi dang mi min mkha' gro ma/ /byol song dang ni yaM dags dang/ /dmyal bar bcas pa'i sems can dang/ /byol song gzugs
188b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi byang par dang/ /phra mo sgrong 'dzin sogs pa'i/ /de rnams g.yo ba thams cad dang/ /mi g.yo ba yi rnam pa yang/ /sa chu ma dang rlung gi khams/ /phra mo rtswa dang lo ma dang/ /rdo dang bo dang rtse mo sogs/ /thams cad ye shes snang ba yin/ /de yin
188b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dang wan pa dang/ /sems pa med pa gnyis su 'dod/ /sems dpa' dang ldan khyad par ni/ /ye shes bye brag 'di lta ste/ /rgyal chen sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ /'thab bral dang ni dga' ldan dang/ /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/
188b7(rgyud 'grel): tshang ris tshangs pa'i mdun 'don/ /tshangs chen dang ni 'od chung dang/ /dpag med 'od dang 'od gsal dang/ /dge chung dge rgyas tshad med dge/ sprin med dang ni bsod nams skyes/ /'bras bu che dang mi che ba/ /mi gdung ba dang gya nom snang/ /shin
189a1(rgyud 'grel): tu mthong dang 'og min te/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams ni/ /ye shes rags shing zab ba ni/ /nyis gyur nyis 'gyur bshes par bya/ /de yang rgyal chen ris bzhi nas/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bar du ni/ /'dod pa lnga yi ye
189a2(rgyud 'grel): shes dag /gong nas gong du bzab pa yin/ /lha min ye shes khro ba ste/ /yi dags ye shes smre ba yin/ /gti mug ye shes byol song gi/ dmyal ba'i 'jigs pas du ba yin/ /mi yi ye shes rnam lnga ste/ /glen pa dang ni 'on pa dang
189a3(rgyud 'grel): lkugs pa dang ni byis pa dang/ /ye shes can dang rnam pa lnga/ /bye drag tu ni shes par bya/ /gzhan yang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las ma gsungs kyang/ /don gyi ye shes khyad par ni/ /rnal 'byor pas ni shes par bya/ /
189a4(rgyud 'grel): de 'dra'i ye shes de nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor gang gis rtogs gyur pa/ /de ni tshe rabs sa ya stong/ /sangs rgyas shes pas bskul ba'o/ /rnal 'byor gtsug lag las byung ba'i/ /ye shes de nyid mi shes te/ /phyi yi gtsug lag shes na yang/ /
189a5(rgyud 'grel): gar mkhan cha lugs dang 'dra'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'ong de nyid/ /man ngag 'di ltar shes par bya/ /ban da 'am nya phyis la sogs pa/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i yi/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis bkar byas la/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dag
189a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /g.yas pa zla dkyil bsams pa la/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od kyi snod bzhag ste/ /g.yon pa rtse gsum phyag rgya yas/ /snod la regs nas sngags 'di brjod/ /oM ha ho h+ri swAhA/ ha yis kha dog 'phrog pa dang/ /ho yis byi yi
189a7(rgyud 'grel): dri ma gsal/ /h+ri yis mthu yang 'joms byed pa/ /rim pa de ni shes par bya/ /de ltar log pa bsal nas su/ /'di ltar yang dag sbyor ba bsgom/ /gzugs ni pad+ma'i dbang phyug ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad di chu dngos/ /ro ni rdo rje dbang
189b1(rgyud 'grel): phyug ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bsam/ /de 'og phyag rgya sngags kyis yang/ /bsrubs na bdud rtsi 'od du 'grub/ /sa bon sum las bskyed ba yi/ /g.yon pa'i mthol du zla ba bsgom/ /de dkyil bdud rtsi sa bon sum/ /bsgoms nas srin
189b2(rgyud 'grel): lag 'thab rtser sbyar/ /bdud rtsi'i dkyil du phyag rgya de/ /bzhag nas rim pa 'di ltar bsgom/ /hUM las bskyed pa'i 'the bong ni/ /dbang chen sa gzhir bsgom pa dang/ /sum las bskyed pa'i srin lag ni/ /ri rab zur bzhir bsgom par bya/ /srin
189b3(rgyud 'grel): lag rtser yang gsum bsgom te/ /bdud rtsi snying po gsum bzlas nas/ /lan gsum bdud ni sgrub par bya/ /'khor ba bdud rtsir bsgrub dmigs nas/ /lha dang rnal 'byor mkha' gro ma/ /so sor rtogs nas mnyes par bya/ /lce dang dbral ba
189b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo la/ /bdud rtsi'i thig le bzhag nas su/ /yi dam lha yang mchod bya zhing/ /dam tshig tsam du btung bar grags/ /gang tshe rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i tshe/ /dbyangs 'di blangs nas gzhan la dbul/ /gzigs shing mdzes pa dam pa'i chis/ /
189b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di la the tshom byar mi rung/ /bram ze khyi dang gdo la pa dag /rang bzhin gcig tu bsgoms nas gsol/ /rnal 'byor gzhan gyis blang ba yang/ /dbyangs dang phyag rgyas shes bya ste/ /g.yas pa pad+ma'i gdan bsgom nas/ /g.yon gyi rtse gsum
189b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas blangs/ /bde bar gshegs shing chos kyi mchog /dri ma med pa'i nas 'di la/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol ba/ /de bzhin nyid de phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar man ngag rtogs nas su/ /bdud rtse'i 'od la sten byas na/ /'khor ba'i sdug
189b7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bcom nas su/ /thar pa rtsi ru 'grub pa yin/ /de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /mdangs dang stobs dang long spyod phyir/ /srid pa'i sgo nas thung byed no/ /sems can phal ba'i btung ba 'dra/ /de nas mchod rten de nyid kyang/ /
190a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par ni bsam par bya/ /rang bzhin nam mkha' dang 'dra bar/ /dngos kun stong pa nyid du bsgom/ /rang gi sems dang dbyer med pa'i/ /gdan bcas hUM yig 'dus par sgom/ /de yis khams gsum
190a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten ni/ /mchod rten gnas su bsgom par bya/ /sa yi khri 'phang zung bcu gnyis/ /dgu pa'i phyogs brgyad gling yin te/ /baM rim bdun du bsam pa ni/ /gser gyi ri bdun shes par bya/ /dril bu dbyibs su bum pa ni/ /lha gnas
190a3(rgyud 'grel): ri rab bsgom bya ste/ /bu mo rten 'khro ba gdung bu'i dbyibs/ /klu yi rgyal po nor rgyas pa yin/ /kha khyer rim pa drug ldan pa/ /'dod rig lha gnas drug tu btags/ /dbus su sos shing yar bsgreng ba/ /bdag med chos nyid zad med bsgom/ /
190a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bcu bdun gyis brgyan pa/ /gzugs khams gnas bcu bdun du btags/ /chos kyi dbyig pa yar 'phag pa/ /gzugs med khams bzhing shes par bya/ /de yi steng gi sgo nga'i dbyibs/ /de rang gi sems ni sku ru bsgom/ /
190a5(rgyud 'grel): de la de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rang gi slob dpon yi dam lha/ /bzhugs par dmigs nas rang sems dang/ /dbyer med bsgoms nas phyag byas nas/ /mchod dang bstong dngul byas na/ /
190a6(rgyud 'grel): ? med pa'i go 'phang thog/ /gzhan du gung 'dzin ma spangs par/ /dngos su rtogs nas phyag byas na/ /'khor ba las bsgral mi 'grub ste/ /mu stegs phyed/ /gnas lha rten 'dra/ /de nyid drug gi rim pa 'di/ /phyi nang gang du sbyor na yang/ /
190a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gal ba med cing dngos grub ster/ /ston pas thun mongs bstan phyir ro/ /smi te dz+nyA na kI ra na ti yi slob mas cus pa'i dbyas pa'i/ /dge ba thob pa gang yin pa/ /de yis sems can sangs rgyas shog/ /de kho na nyid drug rnam par bzhag
190b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po smi ti dz+nyA na kI ra tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /pa nTi ta de nyid kyi bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal sgyu 'phrul chen po'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mA pA tan+ta
190b2(rgyud 'grel): sya pa ny+dza kA mA yA wa tI nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel sgyu ma can zhes bya ba rdo rje mkha' grol phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs la ci mi bsrun med/ /'gro bas rgyal bar rab tu bsrungs/ /mi gtsang ba yi rnam rtog rnams
190b3(rgyud 'grel): sdong po dang ni tshang tshed rnams/ /bsregs pa'i me 'dra bcom byas te/ /'gro ba'i don ni bya ba'i phyir/ /rtag tu rtse mo byed pa yin/ /las las phyir ldog gyur pa'o/ /sgyu 'phrul gzungs mi'i theg pa las/ /rgyal ba'i bla ma rgyal gyur cig /don rnams
190b4(rgyud 'grel): ci ltar gnas pa bzhin/ /mig gnyis gsal bar ni snyon yang/ /don rnams ji ltar gnas bzhin yin/ /ji lha ji ltar gsungs pa yi/ /tshig las mi 'gal zla ba yis/ /byas pa'i rgyud kyi dka' 'grel ni/ /sgyu ma can 'di rgyas gyur cig /sgyu ma chen
190b5(rgyud 'grel): mo rnam bshad kyi/ /tshig bshad rnams la btho bar ni/ /bdag ni rab tu gsung mi bya/ /kye legs pa po nyid tshig 'di la/ /yongs su zhugs par bya ba min/ /don nyid snying por gzung bar bya/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang/ /gsang ba'i dbang
190b6(rgyud 'grel): phyug ma rnams kyi/ /yan dag gsang ba'i rgyud nyid ni/ /bdag gis rab tu bshad la sogs/ /'di dag gi ni tshig gnyis kyis/ /dbu nyid bag ni 'dir ma byung/ /de nas yang ni tshig sgra gnyis/ /dbu ni stong pa ma lus sbyor/ /de ltar 'gal bar
190b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis po/ /yongs bshad yong su bshad pa ni/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gang gi gsungs pa/ /sngags 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u/ /bcu pa nyid las des par phul/ /rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'phros pa ste/ /yang na le'u nyid bcu gcig pa/ /de phyir
191a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i don gyi don/ /de du lha mo rgyud nyid 'di/ /de phyir gang nas byung ba bstan/ /rdo rje zhes bya mi shigs te /sems de nyid ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa ni/ /sems ni nam mkha' yang
191a2(rgyud 'grel): dag bshad/ /skabs ni thams cad sbyin pa'i phyir/ /de sems nam mkha' la ni 'phur/ /yang na yang dag 'gro ba ste/ /bskal ba'i dus bzhi ma byung las/ /lung dang bstan pa mi rtag go /byang chub sems ni rdo rje nyid/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes gsungs
191a3(rgyud 'grel): so/ de mthun rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /sems nyid nam mkha' spyod par 'gro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer can/ /de yi 'jig rten khams nyid la/ /rdo rje ma lus gsungs pa zhes/ /bya ka ra Na yod par
191a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /de nas sgra nyid 'di ltar sgyur/ /nam mkha' 'gro la rje zhes la/ /dbyings ni de nas btags pa ste/ /nam mkha' la spyod grub thams cad/ /DA ki nI zhes bya bar grags/ /de dag gang na grags ce na/ /'byung la sogs pa'i dbyangs las
191a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba yi/ /de dag nyid gyi bshad pa rdzogs/ /de nas bshad pa 'di nyid ni/ /ma rig ri ni rnam par 'joms/ /rdo rje ye shes la sogs gsungs/ /nA zhes bya ba gsungs pa ni/ /mtshon pa'i skad la TA nyid
191a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /skyes bu ngag ni thams cad grags/ /bde ba nyid ni thams cad rig /shes rab ma nyid stong nyid bstan/ /de bas 'di ni snying rje stong/ /de dag nyid ni gnyis su med/ /byang chub sems nyid yongs su gsungs/ gtan tshigs
191a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pas gang nyid rigs/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams nyi shu bzhi/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /don nyid bshad pa'i grub pa'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi/ /gsang ba rnams dang
191b1(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs/ /'khor lo gzugs kyis rnam par gnas/ /de nas dbang phyug la rnams gsum/ /gsang pa'i dbang phyug rje dpon ma/ /de dag gsang ba'i dbang phyug ma/ /yang dag gsang ba zhes bya ste/ /sa la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga/ /
191b2(rgyud 'grel): de dag gsang ba mchog nyid de/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga rnam par dag /gsang ba'i mchog ni rnam par gsungs/ /sa yi khams ni ltung byed bshad/ /chu khams gsod byed mar ni grags/ /me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma/ /rlung khams
191b3(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ /nam mkha' i khams ni rab tu gsungs/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po dpang phyug tshe/ /de rnams rnal 'byor ma lnga bstan/ /sgra yi sde nyid rgyud dngos te/ /sgra rgyud gnyis su med pa la/ /de dag yang dag gsang ba'i mchog /de
191b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'di ni rab tu gsal/ /de phyir 'khor lo gsum pa las/ /dam tshig mchog ni bzhi pa'o/ /ye shes pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /mkha' 'gro ma lnga smra ba pa/ /yang dag gsang ba'i rgyud nyid rab/ /de don 'gugs pa rab tu bstan/ /de ltar rgyud 'di dag
191b5(rgyud 'grel): gis bshad/ /spros par bshad par bya ba'i don/ /yang rna spyi yang gsang ba'i phyir/ /lha mo thams cad mi mnyam ste/ /'o na kyang gtso bo gzhan dang dbye/ /gtso bo dbang mo nyid bya sa la/ /rje dpon ma nyid so sor bstan/ /ma lus changs pa'i sgro
191b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid khyab/ /g.yo ba dang ni mi g.yong/ /khyab ces bya ba nyi tsher byas/ /ma lus zhes bya ji snyed do/ /tshangs pa'i sgo nyid khams yin to/ /'dod khams rgyal po chen po bzhi/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed man chad du/ /tshangs pa'i khams sogs
191b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu bdun te/ /gzugs gyi khams la skal par bya/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched dang/ /'du shes med pa'i skye med pa'i skye mched dang/ /yod min med min skye mtshad dang/ /tshangs pa'i khams nyid de bzhin te/ /g.yod mi g.yo ldan pa ste/ /g.yo
192a1(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya 'gro drug nyid/ /mi g.yo zhes bya mi 'gul rnams/ /de dang ldan bar spyod pa ste/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo tshangs pa'i khams/ /gzhan gyi lta ba nyid la grags/ /mdzod khams bshad pa'i rim pa yis/ /
192a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi phung po rim pa bzhin/ /yang kun 'gro dang rnam par 'gro/ /yang dag 'gro ba rab tu 'gro/ /so sor 'gro dang yongs 'gro rdzogs/ /de steng dbang phyug bdun rnams gnas/ /rig pa'i bden bral dbang phyug dang/ /tshangs pa'i gnas
192a3(rgyud 'grel): dang tshangs pa'i zhi/ /dus kun zhi ba mthu yi sku/ /spyang sku nyid dang bdun pa rdzogs/ /de steng rlung me chu dang sa/ /de ltar thams cad grub byas la/ /gti mug ngar gyi blo gros dang/ /yon tan 'dod chags rig pa ste/ /sgrib pa sgyu ma mthar
192a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin te/ /sgrib pa bcu gsum de la gnas/ /de yi steng du brag bzang ste/ /de yi steng du tshangs pa'i khams/ /gang dag gis ni thams cad khyab/ /gang gis sde dpon mar gyur te/ /a la la ste khams gsum khyab/ /bcom ldan
192a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das ma chen mo nyid/ /ya mtshan che yang ya mtshan che/ /lha mo kun mkhyen rgyu la sogs/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu spyod pa las/ /skye ba'i rgyu ni skye ba nyid/ /dngos po rnams kyi skye ba 'am/ /'di nyid las ni skye ba'i rgyud/ /don mang gzung ba dbang po
192a6(rgyud 'grel): las/ /'di ltar dbang gsungs shes par bya/ /lta mo thams cad gang nyid de/ /ltung byed la sogs lha mo bzhi drag mo la sogs nyi shu bzhi/ /kha da'i zhal ma la sogs brgyad/ /de rnams thams cad lha mo nyid/ /lha mo rnams nyid
192a7(rgyud 'grel): sum cu drug/ lta mo kun bzhi zhes su bshad/ /tshangs pa la sogs zhes bya gang/ /chang pa zhes bya rnam par snang/ /sku yi rdo rje 'phro ba las/ /stobs chen la sogs rdo rje sems/ /tshangs pa zhes bya dpa' bo brgyad/ /de rnams kyi
192b1(rgyud 'grel): ni gang nyid lnga/ /spyan mi sdug la sogs pha yi/ /thod pa dum sogs yan cang du/ /sku gsung thugs la 'phro ba rnams/ /dpa' bo rnams ni bcu dang drug /tshangs pa dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi/ /de rnams snang mdzad rim pa yin/ /tshangs pa
192b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi rgyu ba'i rgyu/ /de nyid las ni byung ba'i don/ /ci ste chen mo mthu ldan nyid/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ma che/ /mtsham ni de yang bstan par bya/ /'di ltar the tshom mkhyen byas la/ /'di nyid sgyu 'phrul chen mo gsungs/ /
192b3(rgyud 'grel): mi srid yon tan brtan pa mo/ /gang bshad rgyu ni 'phrin las bzhi/ /don phyir gzugs ni spangs byas la/ /'di rnams gzugs bzhin ldan pa ste/ /lhu ba byed ma ni sgyu 'phrul bzhi/ /'di rnams las che sgyu rgyu che/ /'di rnams las ni 'di nyid
192b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang/ /de nyid chen mor phyin gsungs pa/ /de 'di nyid ni gsang ba ste/ /de rnams 'byung ba'i bdag nyid gcig /lhung byed la sogs 'di bzhi yin/ /'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid ma/ /gsang ba chen mo de phyir yin/ /de phyir sgyu 'phrul chen mo
192b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung/ /'byung ba rang bzhin yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje rje dpon ma nyid gsungs/ /rdo rje 'bras bu rdo rje mtshan/ /rje dpon ma ni sgyu 'phrul che/ /dbang phyug la sogs yon tan ldan/ /gzhan las de nyid dbang phyug ma/ /de nyid chen mo dbang
192b6(rgyud 'grel): phyug che/ /yon tan ldan pa gcig pu min/ /bcom ldan sgyu 'phrul chen mo can/ /lha mo kun dang chengs srogs kyi/ /skyed byed min bstan par gsungs/ /sgyu 'phrul drag chen la sogs na/ /de nyid bcom ldan sgyu 'phrul che/ /drag chen drag
192b7(rgyud 'grel): pa las byed ma/ /lha mo rnams kyi bskyed ba'i rgyu/ /sgyu phyir de nyid brag mo min/ /'di nyid yang ni drag por go/ ci ste 'di nyid 'dir ltar bsgyur/ /'byung po nyid kyi sdud byed ma/ /'byung po zhes bya srogs chags nyid/ /khams nyid dag ni 'dus/
193a1(rgyud 'grel): byed de/ /byed pa'i rang bzhin ga la yod/ /de phyir 'byung po sdud byed ma/ /de phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /skye ba dang ni rab tu brlag /gtan tshigs nyid ni bstan pa la/ /stong nyid snying rje gnyis su med/ /yan
193a2(rgyud 'grel): lag gnyis ni so sor bstan/ /lha mo mang pos khyang par can/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes par grags/ /de phyir the tshom za byas la/ /de ma thag tu tshigs su bcas/ /gnyis pa dran phyir de nyid gsungs/ /gang gis ma lus khyab la sogs/ /
193a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das mas 'di dag khyab/ /de dag nyid 'di sgyu 'phrul che/ /gang de nyid ni sgyu 'phrul chi/ /de nyid srid par yang dag khyab/ /'di yi ye shes sku gcig khyab/ /gzhan yang byed pa gal te gsungs/ /'di rnams de nyid kyis ni bsdu/ /
193a4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das bde chen po yi/ /khams gsum nyid ni yang dag bsdu/ /skyed byed ma phyir de nyid kyi/ /de nyid kyis ni yang dag go /gsang ba rnams kyi gzung ma 'di/ /gsar ba po rnams sangs rgyas lnga/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs nyid/ /
193a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag rnams ni yum nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi skyed byed ma/ /dri ma'i snying po las gyi phyag /de dag nyid ni spang par gsungs/ /ye shes phyag rgya ma rab rtogs/ /bla med byang chub rgyu yi phyir/ /rgyal 'gro skyed byed ma ni bsgoms/ /legs ldan phyag
193a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya ma sogs nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phrul che/ /legs ldan phyag rgya ma nyid don/ /gsang ba bo rnams dang ni srid/ /gsum las 'das pa rnams kyi ste/ /ci ste 'di nyid yum du 'gyur/ /the tshom za phyir/ /'di ltar gsungs/ /sgyu ma'i
193a7(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma rnams grags sogs/ /bye brag 'di sgo gang nyid kyis/ /kun gyis bskur nyid rnam par grags/ /mtshan gyi gtan tshigs med ma yin/ /ba dang glang ma de ltar don/ /khyad par nyid ni da ltar gsungs/ /'dus pa dad ni rgya chen nyid/ /byang chub
193b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rim pa gnyis/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya gsungs/ /rgyal ba skyed byed mthu dang ldan/ /de phyir rgyal ba rnams kyi yum/ /yum 'di nyid ni rigs yin te/ /'on kyang byang chub sems nyid 'di/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ste/ /gang phyir don
193b2(rgyud 'grel): des 'di ltar yin/ /de nyid rab tu bstan pa'i khyir/ /bshad pa'i rgyud las bstan pa nyid/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde gnyis gsungs/ /a ra li nyid khu bar bsgyur/ /shes rab ma nyid bde chen gsungs/ /a ra li dang rnal 'byor ni/ /sgyu 'phrul
193b3(rgyud 'grel): chen mo de nyid gsungs/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das ma 'di/ /gsang ba rnams kyang skyed byed ma/ /lhas byin la sogs ma gyur te/ /rgya che 'di nyid skyon du 'gyur/ /the tshom mthor byas lan gnyis gsungs/ /rig ma 'jig rten gsum nyid de/ /
193b4(rgyud 'grel): lus dag yid dang sku gsung thugs/ /'jig rten gsum nyid gang gis grub/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni ma lus sbyor/ /'jig rten gsum grub ye shes dngos/ /ci snyed chos nyid 'gro byed dngos/ /'dod pa thams cad gzugs sgra rnams/ /'dod pa
193b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab sbyin ma/ /bzlas brjod bsgom sogs nyon mongs pas/ /'dod pa thams cad byin byed ma/ /'di nyid mang pos 'bras bu gcig /de phyir nyon mongs shes rnams kyis/ /de ltar sbyin pa nyid ni bstan/ /gang gis rnam par shes
193b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam sogs/ /gang gis zhes gzhan med ces gsungs/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo rnam par shes/ /rnam par khyad par shes tsam gyis/ /yang na ci ltar 'di nyid de/ /the tshom go byas 'di ltar gsungs/ /rig ma ye shes phyag rgya ma/ /
193b7(rgyud 'grel): grub byed dbang phyug ma zhes bya/ /grub ba po ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbang phyug ma nyid he ru shes/ /'di ltar shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /grub pa po la bcom ldan grub/ /nyon mongs ma byas thams cad grub/ /grub pa po la rab tu bstan/ /rnal 'byor
194a1(rgyud 'grel): ma mo la sogs gang/ /'khor lo gsum spyod rnal 'byor ma/ /sgo la gnas dang grwa la gnas/ /srung ma rnal 'byor ma mo brgyad/ /'jig rten khams gsum gang nyid de/ /yul lus sa bcu nyi shu bzhi/ /de rnams
194a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni 'dus byas la/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'khor lo gsum/ /khams gsum zhes bya rab tu bshad/ /ci snyed ma lus grub la sogs/ /ci snying ces bya phung po khams/ /skye mched chos ni ji snyed do/ /de rnams ma lus ci yang
194a3(rgyud 'grel): grub/ /lta yi rnam pas grub par 'gyur/ /ci ste grub 'di gal te bzla/ /thams cad sgyu ma sprul pa yin/ /thams cad ces bya bar med gsungs/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sngar gsung mtshan/ /
194a4(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul chen mo nyid kyis te/ /grub pa po nyid las ni spro/ /dngos ni ci ste grub mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma byed gang/ /sa yi khams la sogs pa dbang/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni thams cad tsam/ /dbang phyug byed pa'i
194a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin nyid/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed pa mo/ /de ltar sgyu 'phrul byed pa yi/ /sngon ma mthong ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gzhan gyi pho phrang la sogs sogs/ /mi snang ba rnams gang nyid de/ /gzhan gyi pho brang gzhan gyi lus/ /thog me'i
194a6(rgyud 'grel): lus ni mi bzung ba/ /mi snang zhes bya gzhan mi mthong/ /'di ltar bstan pa le'u las ni/ /seng ge rnam par rol la sogs/ /de dag bdag gis bshad par bya/ /yang na ci ste ming tsam gyis/ /las rnam byed par dga' ba gang/ /gang te
194a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang ni bzla bar bya/ /rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul rig pa sogs/ /rnal 'byor de dag yi ge nyid/ /skya 'phrul zhes bya sdags gzugs rig/ /de nyid rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul rig /yi ge dang ni sdags gzugs kyis/ /las rnams 'di ni
194b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar gsungs/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu grub/ /bag zhad rkang pa mi rkos bstan/ /A li rnal 'byor te/ /de nyid kyis mi mthong ba myong/ /nyid kyi yon tan bstan pa ste/ /de nyid kyi ni sgyu 'phrul ltar/ /de yi rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul te/ /
194b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyi ni go bar byed/ /rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul rig /yi ge zhes ba mi 'gyur te/ /sdags kyi gzugs nyid rab tugs la/ /yi ge sdags kyi rang bzhin 'di/ /rnal 'byor rdzu 'phrul rig pa yis/ /yi ge sdags kyi gzuD kyi spyo/ /spro
194b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba sngon dang 'brel/ /ci ltar de nyid rnal 'byor rnams/ /gang phyir 'di ltar spro bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar the tshom go byas gsungs/ /klog dang bsam par byed pa dang/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom rnams sogs/ /'di lta mngor nag bar
194b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rig pa klog pa byed ces bya/ /rnal 'byor sgyu 'phrul rig pa nyid/ /sngon bsungs las kyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /gang rig grub par brten byas la/ /klog pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /grub pa po nyid bsnyen sogs te/ /dka' bar mthong byas mi
194b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod ste/ /'di ltar the tshom go byas gsungs/ /bsnyen gnas dang ni brtul zhugs dang/ /nyon mongs mi dgos la sogs te/ /'di ltar las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ltar the tshom go byas gsung/ /bde dang dga' rnams la sogs te/ /
194b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab ma/ /de nyid kyis ni sgyu 'phrul che/ /thabs bcom ldan nyid he ru ka/ thog ma de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ shes rab thabs la sos rnams kyis/ /thabs dang shes rab sgrub thabs la/ /lung 'bogs bdag gis
194b7(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya/ /mdo la rnal 'byor nyid ni khyod/ /de ltar nyid ni bstan par gsungs/ /lte dkyil dpa' bo gnas la sogs/ /lte ba'i dkyil na zhes bya gang/ /lte dkyil sprul pa'i 'khor lo nyid/ /de nyid sprul ba'i 'khor lo la/ /dpa' bo bcom
195a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan a ra li/ /thams cad la ni de nyid med/ /'on kyang gang phyir phyogs na bstan/ /ze'u 'bru spyod yul la zhes bya/ /ze'u 'bru 'dab ma drug cu bzhi/ /snying po bar gyi yan lag nyid/ /gsang ba mtshor ye nyid de/ /de
195a2(rgyud 'grel): yi spyod yul de dag la/ /ze'u 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul la/ /dus kun 'gro don mdzad ldan nyid/ /a ra li ni zhugs par 'gyur/ /'di ltar the tshom go byas gsung/ /sems dang sems min sems dngos la/ /thog med sems dngos
195a3(rgyud 'grel): don phyir sems/ /dge ba nyid la yang dag dga' / /nyon mongs gnas skabs dbye ba'i phyir/ /bskul ba'i bdag nyid bsam pa yis/ /yang dag rab 'byor min pa las/ /bskul ba med phyir skyes lta bur/ /sems dngos min par sgyur la
195a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /the tshom go byas 'di nyid gsungs/ /sems dngos zhes bya bsam rig go /'di ltar dngos nyid 'di yis te/ /sems nyid rang gsal rang bzhin te/ /shes dang shes bya'i rang bzhin gang/ /go phyir ye shes thabs nyid de/ /snying
195a5(rgyud 'grel): rje shes rab rang bzhin te/ /shes par bya ba bde mchog stong/ /'di dag gnyis ni gcig tu bsgyur/ /shes dang shes bya rang bzhin te/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya nyid/ /gang na ci ste 'di ltar ni/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid shes par bya/ /
195a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar the tshom go byas gsung/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa zab pa ste/ /de dag bdag gis bstan par bya/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyis ni/ /rab med phyir na zab nyid te/ /sangs rgyas rnams zhes sku gsung thugs/ /de rnams gang na bstan
195a7(rgyud 'grel): par byad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa nyid/ /bar na gsungs pa'i 'og gi gdan/ /ci ste stan byed gal te gang/ /A li kA li mnyam byed ces/ /A li zhes bya a la sogs/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug nyid/ /kA li zhes bya ka la
195b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /nga nya gnyis ni dri mi rgyud/ /de nyid spang phyir sum cu gnyis/ /'di ltar phreng gnyis kA lI zhes/ /A li phyogs gnyis de nyid spyod/ /kA li phreng ba gnyis sbyor mnyam/ /grangs ni bcu drug rnam par bzhag /A li kA li mnyam byas la/ /de na
195b2(rgyud 'grel): shar bu 'byor bya zhes/ /gnas na sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /pad+ma'i steng du zla mtshan phyed/ /ya 'byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhon/ /ri las byung ba phreng gsum gyi/ /shar bu shes rab ma nyid gsung/ /'di dngos rang 'byung ma nyid gsungs/ /shes
195b3(rgyud 'grel): rab ma gnas de las 'byung/ /de nyid kyi ni gzugs can ma/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la/ /las kyi rlung gis bskul bar 'bar/ /thams cad las ni grub byed ma/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes byar grags/ /skra rtse stong phrag yan lag ma/ /glog
195b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phro mnyam pa'i 'od byed ma/ /lha sku rnal 'byor rnam nyid la/ /ba spu rtse mo bu ga rnams/ /lha dang lha min 'jigs byas la/ /phyogs nyid thams cad ma la byung/ /long spyod rdzoD pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /de dag nyid la song bar bya/ /g.yas pa'i sna spubs byung bar bya/ /mdzod sbu
195b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'gro bu ga la/ /phyogs bcu la gnas sangs rgyas rnams/ /de dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /g.yon sna sbubs la zhugs byas la/ /spyi bar 'khor lo dag bsregs byas/ /rnam par ma lus dbyung bar bya/ /sdar gsungs bu ga yis ni yang/ / u spyi bol ni rab tu 'jug /'di ltar sangs rgyas bsregs pa yi/ /phyogs kyi de phyir dga' bar 'gyur/ /lto la dkyil 'khor 'od byas la/ /snga ma lta bu mi 'gul ste/ /shar du steng du 'bar zhes bya/ /gsungs pa'i rim pas shar bu gzugs/ /steng
195b6(rgyud 'grel): du zhu 'gro gtam tshig 'di/ /shes rab ces bya gang phyir 'gyur/ /khu ba'i gzugs kyis zhu 'gyur sogs/ /ci tsam du nyid de ltar gzung/ /bdud rtsi thigs pa'i gzugs can nyid/ /che dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni/ /skye ba dang ni 'dug pa dang/ /grol
196a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir na bdud rtsi yin/ /thigs pa rnam? shes kun gyi ni/ /yi ge bcu drug yang dag gsungs/ /bcu drug sgyu 'phrul chen mo ste/ /thigs pa lta bu yongs su bstan/ /dbyangs yig sgyu 'phrul chen mo nyid/ /de nyid go phyir yang na
196a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /'di rnams sgyu 'phrul chen mo gnas/ /de'i thigs pa rnam shes ci/ /khams kye don rnams bcu drug ni/ /de dag gzugs nyid thigs pa'i gzugs/ /khams kyi nor rnams bshad pa yin/ /yang ni bdag gis bshad
196a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /lha mo khyod kyis mod la nyon/ /thigs pa'i gzugs ni 'di la yod/ /de phyir thigs pa'i gzugs shes bya/ /dbyangs dang 'dra bar dbyung phyir thigs/ /gang gsungs smra 'don bshad pa'i rgyud/ /gsang tshig rnam par
196a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa la/ /ra zhes par k+ta'i khams la sogs /gi ri dzin/ ga sha d+ha ba tra/ twa ga na d+ha/ ku suM tra ma ri Na/ a ri na/ pi sid+da ra/ gundu ra/ gat+taM ni de'i la/ daM sa ga ra tsa/ swa g+ha re dze ma/ 'di rnams snying po ga bur 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul chen
196a5(rgyud 'grel): mo khams bcu drug /thigs pa'i rigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chu klung ne rany+dza na nyid/ /snyan dngags kyi ni rigs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bstan pa la/ /dpa' bo gtam rgyud skabs 'di nyid/ /de nyid spangs bya thigs pa
196a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /thigs don rnam par shes ma byas/ /bcom ldan de phyir thogs pa gsungs/ /de yi mtshan nyid dpa' bos bshad/ /shes rab yang dag sbyor la sogs/ /nyid mgo thigs gzugs zhung 'gyur/ /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang nyid
196a7(rgyud 'grel): de/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje can/ /dri ma'i phyir gzhan khyad par med/ /dug bzhi rnams ni 'dra bar gtam/ /'di ltar the tshom go byas gsung/ /gang dbang po lam 'di nyid sogs/ /gang gang zhes bya 'dod pa yis/ /mig la sogs nyid
196b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid dbang por 'dus/ /de sgo dbang po mas nyid de/ /gang dbang pos de nyid la ma'i 'gro/ /de yi mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis/ /byang chub sems nyid rang bzhin gyis/ /yang dag 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes/ /yang da bces bya thiD gzuD can/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /'dod pa zhes
196b2(rgyud 'grel): bya gzugs kyis ni/ /de nyid kyis ni yang dag bshad/ /de nyid 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid tshe gang/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba/ /rnam snang mdzad sogs nyid dag ste/ /de rnams bya ba byas pas ni/ /sangs rgyas
196b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam par 'gyur/ /rang dang gzhan dang de bzhin gshegs snga/ /nyid kyi phyir na mnyam pa'i don/ /ci ste dri ma sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /thams cad go byas gal te bzlas/ /dam tshig chen po grub pa dang/ /ri lu chen po grub la sogs/ /goms
196b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' o bas dang mngon sum byed/ /de phyir 'di nyid dam tshig rnams/ /de nyid chen po rnam tshig che/ /de ltar dam tshig chen po rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnam nyid rnam pa lnga/ /grub pa dam tshig chen po nyid/ /ri lu chen pho 'grub par bya/ /gang dag ri lu chen po
196b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /de dag grub pa nyid kyis ni/ /dam tshig chen po grub par 'gyur/ /gang ? dam tshig chen po 'grub/ /ji ltar de nyid ri lu yin/ /'grub pa de yi zhes bya gang/ /rnam par bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs/ /sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga bur ldan/ /
196b6(rgyud 'grel): khrag dang can dan 'byor par bya/ /chogs kyi dkyil na rab tu bzhag /thams cad las ni de nyid mchog /ra sa ya na zhes bya ste/ /dam tshig chen po 'grub rgyu yin/ /rnal 'byor ri bu grub 'di nyid/ /ji ltar bya ba gal te bzlas/ /sgyu 'phrul chen
196b7(rgyud 'grel): mor rab sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa byed la sogs/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya gang/ /de rnams dbyangs yig bcu drug yin/ /de nyid 'di nas rab tu sbyor/ /so sor dam tshig sku gsung thugs/ /de dag nyid kyi rnal 'byor rnams/ /sgyu
197a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul chen mor rab sbyor gyis/ /rnal 'byor 'byor nyid longs spyod yin/ /dam tshig rnal 'byor sdom pa nyid/ /ci ste byed ces gal ter bzlas/ /yo byad rnam lnga ldan zhes bya/ /spyod yul gang nyid yo byad yin/ /me
197a2(rgyud 'grel): tog spos la sogs rnam lnga/ /'dod pa lnga nyid gzugs sgra sogs/ /de rnams kyis ni yang dag ldan/ /yo byad rnam pa lnga dag dang/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan/ /'do rnams ci ltar rnyed pa bzhin/ /de ltar de rnams shin tu spyod/ /mi
197a3(rgyud 'grel): spang ba ni de nyid don/ /'di ltar bsdoms pas ci 'gyur te/ /'di ltar the tshom go byas te/ /grub pa'i dbang po shes bya sogs/ /yang dag rtag pa'i bya ba nyid/ /rnal 'byor dbang pos shes par bya/ /bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid grub pa ste/ /dam
