268b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab po/ /de bzhin du sa la yang gdab bo/ /de nas yang me'i mtshams su song ste/ /dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa dang/ shar phyogs kyi thig btab la/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang sbyar sa thig
268b6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bzhas pa de bzhin du nam mkha' dang sa la yang gdab po/ /de nas oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas ye shes kyi skud pa gshegs su gsol/ /de nas tshon bri ste gsor la sogs pa'i tshon rtsi lnga 'am? /ma 'byor na/ 'bras phyel
268b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i phye ma zhib tu brtags te dri zhim po bdugs la so sor thod pa'i snod du gzhag ste/ thig gi skabs dang 'dra bar 'bar ba'i lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug la/ kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du bstim te/ oM
269a1(rgyud 'grel): badzra caM tras ma ye hUM/ ces brjod cing mdon par bsngags la/ chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag /sems can khams ni sgrol byed pa'i/ /he ru ka dpal rgya chen gyis/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bri bar bya zhes brjod nas/
269a2(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyi tshan rtsi rnams so sor gzung la/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams te/ ri mo phan tshun du ma 'byar ba dang/ ya yo med par g.yas bskor du bri'o/ /de'i rim pa ni nang rol du nag po'o/ /de'i phyi rol
269a3(rgyud 'grel): du dkar po'o/ /de'i 'og ser po'o/ /de nas dmar po'o/ /tha mar ljang khu'o/ /de nas ri mo lnga po cung zad gcig bris nas kham phor la sogs pas bkab la/ phyi nas mtshan ma brtag pa'o/ /phyi nas slob ma rnams kyis ci bder bri'o/ /de
269a4(rgyud 'grel): nas rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni dkar po la/ de'i phyi rol gyi 'dab ma brgyad ni dmar po'o/ /de'i rdo rje'i phreng ba ni nag po'o/ /de'i phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad do/ /de yi phyi rol rdo rje rab dang/ me 'od 'bar ba
269a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'o/ /dbus kyi snying po'i phro brang la/ /nyi ma la gnas pa'i thod pa'am/ kha TwAM ga bri'o/ /shar du nyi ma'i steng du rdo rje'o/ /lhor ru nyi ma'i steng du rin po che'i lcug ma'o/ /nub tu nyi ma'i steng du pad+ma'o/ /byang du nyi ma'i
269a6(rgyud 'grel): steng du ral gri'o/ /phyi rol gyi dur khrod brgyad rnams ni shing lo la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong gi gdan gyi mgo bri'o/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba dang/ me 'od ni ci rigs par bri'o/ /de nas bgegs bsal te/ bdag nyid khro bo las tham cad
269a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skur bsgoms la/ rdo rje gsor/ dril bu gsil te/ lan gsum bskor la hUM zhes brjod cing/ g.yas brkyang la sogs pa'i lus kyi sbyor ba dang/ khro bo'i phreng sngags bzlas pa'i dag gi sbyor ba dang/ stong pa nyid
269b1(rgyud 'grel): du bsgoms pa'i sems kyis sbyor bas bgegs bsal lo/ /de nas bum pa gzhung dang mthun pa rtsa ba gnag pa la sogs pa'i skyon med pa'i bum pa lnga lha so so'i mtshan ma bris nas gong du smos pa'i cho gas byin gyis brlabs la/ dbus kyi bum par
269b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka yab yum bskyed/ /sa bon 'ong kyis ye shes kyi lha bkug ste/ me tog la sogs pas mchod cing bstod nas/ rdo rje kha rgyan gyis steng du gzhag la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru gsum dang bcas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de nas yab
269b3(rgyud 'grel): yum 'ong du zhu ste/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chur gyur par bsam mo/ /de bzhin du bum pa bzhi yang rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzhan yang yon chab la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams/ /'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ gdan dang gos
269b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis dgab pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du ba'i lci bas byugs la me tog sil ma bkram nas bla re dang/ rgyal mtshan la sogs pa bri bum pa kun nas so sor gzhag ste/ rnam par rgyal
269b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbus su bum pa gzhag pa 'am/ yang na shar phyogs kyi sgo'i nang du gzhag go /bum pa kun las chu cung zad bsdus te/ pad+ma'i snod du blugs la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du gzhag go /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid khrus byas te
269b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyan chas dang ldan par byas la nang du zhugs nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rim pa 'dis dkyil 'khor sdrul bar bya ste/ lo bcu gnyis pa la sogs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i bu mo'am/ yang na 'od kyi rig ma snying kha nas phyung la/ yab
269b7(rgyud 'grel): yum gnyis lha'i skur bsgoms nas gsang gnas gnyis byin ba rlabs te/ snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba'i sgras/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste/ de dag la bcug nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo tshul du nam mkha' la khyab
270a1(rgyud 'grel): par spros nas slar bsdus te/ ye shes kyi lha dang 'dres nas so sor bzhugs pa'am/ yang na stong pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i ngang las hUM gi snang ba las ra ba dang/ dra ba dang/ sa gzhi yang bsgoms la de'i
270a2(rgyud 'grel): nang du tshogs pad+ma bsam ste/ de'i rjes la dbus dang/ phyogs bzhir nyi ma'i steng du thig le phra mo re re bsgom/ /de nas shar phyogs kyi thig le las rdo rje'i rigs dpag tu med pa spros te/ ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rigs thams
270a3(rgyud 'grel): cad bsdus nas shar phyogs kyi thig ler thim pas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar bskyed ngo/ /de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma gsum yang bskyed do/ /de nas dbus kyi thig le las rigs lnga char gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa
270a4(rgyud 'grel): spros/ /slar bsdus te dbus kyi thig le la thim pas/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i dpal he ru kar bskyed la/ de yang yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba'i ngo bor 'du zhu ste/ 'od kyi gong bur gnas pa la/
270a5(rgyud 'grel): phyags bzhi'i lha mo bzhi'i glus bskul bas/ yab yum dus gcig tu skur bzhengs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor sprul nas/ de nas phyi'i mchod pa yon chab la sogs
270a6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol mo'i bar gyis mchod do/ /nang gi mchod pa ni bdud rtsi myang pa nas tshogs kyi mchod pa'o/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa ni dbang po gnyis kyis bde pa'o/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa ni gnyis su med pa'i bsgom pa'o/ /de nas
270a7(rgyud 'grel): sngar smos pa'i stod bas bstong nas/ lha rnams kyi sngags 'bru gsum dang spel ba ci nus pa bzlas la/ yang phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod nas/ de nas phyi rol tu gtor ma rgya chen po btang ngo/ /de nas nang du zhugs te/ bdag nyid dkyil
270b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du 'jug cing dbang nod pa'i phyir/ byang chub rdo rje/ sangs rgyas la/ mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slang du/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /zhes lha la gsol ba btab la/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag pos bdag la
270b2(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba byin nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas rjes su gnang ba'i bar du dbang bskur bar bsgom mo/ /de nas dam tshig gis glus bstod de/ oM nam mkha' las byung mtshan ma med phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' i rdo rje
270b3(rgyud 'grel): che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgrubs shig /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag bsgrubs shig /nyes pa med la rtag pa ste/ /'dod chags
270b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rjes su chags/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid bdag bsgrubs shig /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems su bdag
270b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs shig /dngos grub chen po mchog gi mchog /dbang phyug chen po rgyal bas/ rgyal/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstong pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i bdag po'i bdag /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi yab nyid de/
270b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog /ces bya ba'i dam tshig gi glus bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di brjod de/ /shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bden pa'i byin rlabs gang yin pa/ /bden
270b7(rgyud 'grel): pa de yis mgon khyod kyis/ /bdag gi 'dod bskongs byed shog /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung ba med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las byung ba dang/ /de bzhin kho na las byung
271a1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor ni/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar sems can dri med thams cad mthong bar shog /ces brjod do/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ /slob ma khrus byas te gos sar pa
271a2(rgyud 'grel): gyon la/ /dar dmar pos gdong g.yogs te/ yol ba'i phyi rol du gzhag la/ las kyi bum pa'i chus gtor te me tog zung nas gnas pa la slob dpon gyis/ 'dod pa'i dga' pa khyod su yin zhes dri'o/ /des kyang bdag
271a3(rgyud 'grel): ni skal bzang bde chen po zhes smra'o/ /yang slob dpon gyis /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /rab tu 'jug par khyod spro 'am/ /zhes bya'o/ /slob mas/ thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal lags so/ /
271a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gdab po/ de nas oM sarbba yo gcit+ta utpa tA ya mi/ zhes byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ /de nas sdom pa gzung ste/ thog med dus na 'khor ba nas/ /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis dang/ /bgyid stsal gang lags 'di ring
271a5(rgyud 'grel): bshags/ /gtso la slar yang sdom par 'tshal/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams dang/ /'gro gzhan dge ba gang bgyis pa/ /de dag kun la yi rang ste/ /byang chub tu ni bdag gis bsngo/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /di ring
271a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bcas pa dang/ /dge ba rnams ni spel ba'i phyir/ /byang chub sems gnyis bskyed nas su/ /'gro rnams bdag gis 'gron du gnyer/ /sangs rgyas gyur nas 'gro ba rnams/ /ma
271a7(rgyud 'grel): lus srid mtsho las bsgral bgyi/ /de nas me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying khar gzhag la/ oM su ra te/ sa ma ya stwAM ho sid d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM zhes bzlas so/ /de'i rjes la/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
271b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ye shes kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur gyis/ /gsang chen dam pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing/ ma dang pa rnams la 'ang ma yin no zhes bsgo/ a khaM bI
271b2(rgyud 'grel): ra hUM zhes pas yol ba'i nang du bcug la/ /de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs te/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos
271b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ de lta bu'i ye shes de yis bskyed par bya yis/ /khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ma? mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje gzhag la/ 'di ni dam tshig gi rdo rje ste/ gal te
271b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'di su yang rung pa la smras na khyod dam tshig rdo rje 'das mgo 'gas par byed do zhes brjod la/ slar yang rdo rje snying khar gzhag /oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la de ring yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/
271b5(rgyud 'grel): nga ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas mna' bsgags te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng gi pad+ma'i snod kyi chu la oM a mri te ud ces pa mngon par bzlas la/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /daM tshig 'das na bsreg par byed/ /
271b6(rgyud 'grel): daM tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /ces brjod do/ /de ring phyin chad khyod kyi rdo rje sems dpa' nga yin gyis/ ngas gang bsgo ba rnams bu khyod kyis bya dgos la/ nga brnyas par yang ma byed cig/ byas na yang ba ma spangs
271b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas slob mas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis slobs la/ dpal he ru ka bdag la dbab par gsol zhes/
272a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba btab la/ de nas slob ma'i snying khar dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa la hUM/ mgrin par chu'i dkyil 'khor bum pas mtshan pa la baM/ spyi bor rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan gyis mtshan
272a2(rgyud 'grel): ba la ha/ rkang mthil du rlung dang/ me yis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor la dzhi dmar po bsgoms la/ rdo rje gsor te/ dril bu dkrol zhing bsgyings pa dang bcas pas/ oM a be sha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ ra ra ra tsal ya/ tsa la ya hUM a ha dzha'u
272a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan brgya bzlas la 'bab po/ /babs na lce la a dmar po bsams la/ zung shig rdo rje dge mi dge zhes dris nas legs nyes gang yin bston par 'gyur te/ de yang thugs babs na yongs su shes pa skye'o/ /gsung babs na
272a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags smra'o/ /sku babs na nam mkha' la gnas so/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pas babs pa brtan par bya'o/ /'di ni babs pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob mas maN+Dal byas te/ /me tog bkram la lha dang/ /bla ma la/ /yon phul nas/ byang chub
272a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas slob dpon gyis/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /lha yi rigs kyi rim pa bzhin/ /bsod nams gang yin de
272a6(rgyud 'grel): dag shog /'dis ni dngos grub gang 'grub dang/ /rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur/ /'di yis bsod nams ci yod las/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog /ces bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod la/ de nas mig slar snang ba'i 'od
272a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi kha dog dri'o/ /des kyang smra ste/ dkar po la sogs pa la gang mthong ba las gang grub pa'i ltas brtag go /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la sngar smos pa'i bstod pas bstod la me tog dor bar bya ste/ bde gshegs snying po'i
272b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du/ /rig pa'i me tog 'di bor bas/ sngon tshe ye shes bsnyen pa'i lha/ /gang yin de la babs gyur cig /ces brjod nas pra tIts+tsha ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas me tog dor bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog gang dang gang du ltung ba de las de dang mthun pa'i lha
272b2(rgyud 'grel): dbog par bya ste/ de yang rin chen la sogs pa'i/ /gang la babs pa'i rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bor rigs de bsgoms nas ni/ /dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med/ /ces brjod nas me tog blangs te slob ma'i mgo la bcid do/ /de nas slob ma'i mig
272b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su/ /a bsgoms la/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /phyed bas thams cad mthong 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med ces brjod de gdong g.yogs dgrol/ /thar ba chen po'i grong khyer
272b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog /ltos shig ltos shigs ?? dpa' che/ /me tog gang du lhung gyur pa/ /de ni khyod kyi lha yin no/ /zhes brjod la/ dkyil 'khor ltar bcug la sgo bsrungs nas yang rim pas gtso bo'i bar du ming brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas bstan
272b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'o/ /de nas dbang bskur te/ de yang dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan/ /gzhan du na ni dngos grub dag/ shin tu ring bar 'gyur ro zhes/ rdo rje 'dzin pas de skad gsungs/ de bas na dngos grub kyi phyir rjes su
272b6(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i yon bla ma la phul nas gsol ba btab la phyag bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis de la dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu snying po'i dkyil 'khor phyed tsam gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa la dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa
272b7(rgyud 'grel): ge sar dang bcas pa lho ru lha mo bzhi'i mtshan ma spangs la der slob ma gzhag ste shis pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de yang yungs kar la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ lag pa g.yon kyi khu tshur gyis gzung nas lag gnyis su bskor nas kham phor gyi
273a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i nang du gas so/ /de bzhin du lan gsum bya'o/ /de yang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs la nye reg bya ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i dri snying khar me tog mgo la mar me mig sngar mar dang/ sa rdzas sa bsreg pa'i bdug pas
273a2(rgyud 'grel): bdugs te shis ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de nas he ru ka dmigs la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs/ steng du bla re g.yas phyogs su hUM bzlas pa'i gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can gzung ngo/ /g.yon du rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng la/ zangs
273a3(rgyud 'grel): dung dang/ dung gi bud pa la sogs pa rol mo'i sgras nam mkha' gang bar bsams la/ rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol te/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' pa gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas
273a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rgyas pa 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis dang po yin/ /de yi nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum du grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
273a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa yin/ /dge 'dun dri ba chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi sbyin pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge
273a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bkra shis gsum pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyi glu blangs dbang bskur te/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs kun sku khrus gsol/ /lha yi chu ni dag ba yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus
273a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ta thA ga ta sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM zhes brjod cing/ /dang por rnam rgyal gyi bum pa'i chus gtor/ de nas nas lha mo rnams kyi bum pas so/ /de nang gi dbang bskur te/ snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo
273b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la bkug la/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis/ /'di la dbang bskur rab tu gsol/ /zhes yid gyi dbang bskur nas/ /de dag rang gi 'od las byung ba'i dbang bskur bar bsams la/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad gyi/ /gsang
273b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /dbang bskur gsang ba chen po sbyin/ /badzra a b+hi Sh+ny+tsi hUM zhes brjod cing bkru'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs dang bcas pa de dag slob ma'i bu gang btsud de/
273b3(rgyud 'grel): lus thams cad la de'i rang bzhin du byas nas mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi sbyor bas gnas par bsams te/ mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi chu'i dbang ngo/ /de nas gser la sogs pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin las byas pa'am/ ma 'byor na
273b4(rgyud 'grel): dar dang ras la sogs pa'i cod pan bcings la/ /nam mkha' gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ rin chen dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis der bzhugs par bsams te/ bdag po'i rtags kyis mtshan ma yi/ /rtags kyi
273b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa tsad phan gyis/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas/ /'gro ba'i mgon skyabs byed par shog/ /oM rad na mu bra a b+hiShiny+tsa ces pas dbang bskur te/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin cod pan gyis dbang ngo/ /de nas rdo rje rtse lnga
273b6(rgyud 'grel): ba blangs te/ slob ma'i gnas gsum du gtugs la/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rab sgrub phyir ni rdo rje gzung/ /ma hA badzra hUM zhes pas/ lag pa g.yas su
273b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje byin te/ snang ba mdza' yas kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbang ngo/ /de nas khag pa g.yon du dril bu byin la/ /shes rab dril bu'i dbang bskur ba/ /de ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /shes rab chos
274a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings shes gsungs/ mahA badzra b+haN+Da a ces pas g.yon par dril bu byin la/ g.yas g.yon bsnol te 'khyud pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /'di ni dam tshig rdo rje'i rang bzhin bdag po'i rang bzhin gyi dbang ngo/ /
274a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje dang dril bu slob ma'i spyi bor gzung la/ gang gang snang ba de dang de/ /hE ru ka dpal bdag nyid gtso/ /gang chos rnams ni rnam dag pas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rang bzhin nyid/ /oM badzra satwA twaM/ a b+hi Shits+tshi? mi/ badzra nA ma/ a b+hi
274a3(rgyud 'grel): Sheka ta ces pas ming gi dbang bskur te/ /kye dpal che ge mo zhes rigs dang mthun pa'i ming las gang 'dod pa sbyin no/ /'di ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi mig gi dbang ngo/ /de dag ni go rims bzhin du me long lta bu dang/ mnyam pa nyid dang/
274a4(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog pa dang/ bya ba grub pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /dbang bskur ba rnam pa lnga po dag gis ni/ /rgyud la sogs pa mnyam pa dang/ bshad pa dang/ sgrub pa'i snod
274a5(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni /spyan la sogs pa rig pa lnga'i las yin pa dang/ ma rig pa bzlog pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo/ /de nas slob dpon gyi dbang bskur te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur/ /thugs rje
274a6(rgyud 'grel): can khyod bka' drin gyis/ /de ring bdag la stsal du gsol/ /zhes gsol ba btab pa dang/ rdo rje che dang dril bu che/ /zung cig rdo rjer byin gyis rlobs/ /de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur/ /slob ma'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar gyis shes slob
274a7(rgyud 'grel): ma la dbang bskur la/ de'i rjes la di tshigs gsum po 'dzin du gzhug ste/ hUM gi rdo rje bsgoms la/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /rtag tu khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /phyag na rdo rje'i
274b1(rgyud 'grel): brtul bzhugs brtan/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta/ sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ye/ tiSh+Tha e Sha stwaM d+ha ra ya mi/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes pas rdo rje gtad de gzung la/ de kho na nyid 'di brjod do/ /thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de
274b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snying po bdag nyid gtso/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /de nas a las bskyed pa'i dril bu byin la/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab
274b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /ces pas dril bu byin la/ /srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i sems
274b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yis/ /srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed/ /oM badzra paN+Da ra Ni pra ra Ni/ saM pra ra Ni sarba bud d+ha k+She tra pra tsa li te pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta/ nA da swa b+hA be badzra d+ha ra h+re da ya/ a pra ti ha ta sa shA nA/ hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ ces pas bkrol bar
274b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ste dril bu'i brtul zhugs so/ /de nas phyag rgya'i brtul zhugs sbyin te/ de la shes rab lo grangs bcu gnyis kun tu khyud byas te/ /rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba yis/ /slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod ces gsungs so/ /de bas na
274b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lha'i phyag rgyar byin gyis brlab po/ /de yang yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rab tu grags/ /rang gi lus kun brtag byed pa/ /de ni phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /shes pas rang gi lha'i mngon par rnaM par rtoT pa bskyed
274b7(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs pas kun nas mchod cing bstod pa bya ste/ de yang bsnyems pa dang bcas pas/ /me tog gcig slob ma'i mgo la dor la/ /de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sras dang bcas pa rnams rol cing/ /rdo rje
275a1(rgyud 'grel): snyems pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dga' ston bde ba'i mchod pa gyis/ /hUM/ sgeg dang bcas pas phred ba 'phad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /des ni bcom ldan 'bral mi 'gyur/ /phreng ba de yis rgyan yin
275a2(rgyud 'grel): no/ /oM lus can rnams la dam chos kyi/ /khyod kyis glu ni blar bar bya/ /de yis bde bshegs dngos grub ni/ /myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ h+ri/ de nyid thal mo'i gar gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad chags par byos/ /sangs
275a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'dul ba'i phrin las kyis/ /gar mkhan tshul du bsgyur bar gyis/ /ho/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos phul bas/ /brtul zhugs bzad pos legs tshim gyis/ /lus can bder gshegs cha lugs su/ /ye shes kyis ni tshim par
275a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /a(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la me tog gtor/ /byang chub yan lag chogs 'gyur pas/ /mtshan dang dpe byang ldan pa yi/ /bder gshegs sku ni thob par 'gyur/ /b+huM/ chos kyi me ni legs spar bas/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra ba ru/
275a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can ma rig ldongs pa la/ /ye shes sgron mas 'bar bar gyis/ /pra/ rgyal ba rnams la dri phul bas/ /tshul khrims de bzhin shes rab dang/ /rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yi/ /byang chub lus can rnams la bsgos/ /gar? de'i
275a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes la gser gyi thur ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis gsal/ /oM badzra
275a7(rgyud 'grel): nai trA ya/ a pa ha ra phaT laM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): de nas me long bstan te/ gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa/ /de ltar chos rnams shes byas
275b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang rgyal ba'i sras su skye/ /de nas ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas mda' gzhu byin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags par byos shing ces bsgo la/ /phyogs bzhir mnga' de
275b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phang ba dang/ /'og tu yang mda''phen du gzhug go /de nas badzra he tu kruM zhes bya bas/ 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar du gzhag /yang/ oM b+ha Sha ra zhes bya bas lag ba g.yas su dung gtad nas/ /yon par mahA mA yA'i bu ti byin te
275b3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu yang dkrol zhing/ deng nas btsams te sems bskyed pa/ /tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par/ /yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis su/ /chos kyi dud ni bla med pa/ /dri med kun tu gang
275b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis/ /sngags spyod tshul gyis cho ga rnams/ /skye bo rnams la rtag tu shod/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang/ /khyod la rtag tu bsrung ba mdzad/ /ces brjod do/ /
275b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas so so'i 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i chas lugs su byas te/ sems can kun la phan ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de bzhin du
275b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang/ /rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ las kyi tshig bcug tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba byin la de nas yang/ zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa dang/ dgug skrag bcing dang bskrad pa dang/ /dbye dang gnas
275b7(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa'i/ /las de thams cad 'grub par gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang/ /mchil lham de bzhin ril bu ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yis dngos grub rnams de dag ci dgar bsgrub par gyis/ /ces bya bas rjes su gnang ba'o//
276a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid langs te/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su dmigs nas/ g.yon pa snying khar chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ltar byas te/ rdo rje mid gi dbang bskur bas lung stan
276a2(rgyud 'grel): te oM 'dir ni khyod la ngas lung bstan/ /rdo sems dpa' de bzhin gsheT/ srid pa bshin tu rang pas na/ /srid pa ngan 'gro dag las bton/ /he badzra nA ma(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta b+hur b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): gang la tshul 'di dang phyag rgya chen po mchog tu bsad pa'i cho ga 'dis lung bstan pa
276a3(rgyud 'grel): de la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams mgrin gcig tu/ bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por lung ston par mdzad de/ sngags 'di dang phyag rgya 'di'i mthu yin no zhes bya bas dad pa
276a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrag ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin no/ /mahA mA yA ha na hUM/ de nas slob ma'i spyi bor/
276a5(rgyud 'grel): gdugs gzung la/ /gdugs dang bcas par bskor ba byas te/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi drung du gdugs dang bcas pas spyi bo gtugs la/ /sngags rnams 'dzin par gyur pa yi/ /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /shes brjod la
276a6(rgyud 'grel): gdugs gzhang la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /di ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur/ sngags dang rgyud rnams 'dzin 'gyur bar/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /sems can kun
276a7(rgyud 'grel): la rjes brtse bas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris/ /khyod kyis nan tan bskyed nas su/ /sgrub pa po rnams sngags la sbyor/ /de nas dbugs phyung ste/ gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /zhugs pa dang ni mthong ba yis/ /
276b1(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa kun las rnam grol te/ /de ring khyod ni dge bar gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /phyin chad 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi thub gnod pa yod min pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag pas na/ /srid pa
276b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdug bsngal las 'das so/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya dang/ /byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis kyang/ /sangs rgyas nyis 'gyur the chom med/ /dam pa'i chos kyang smad mi bya/ /nam yang dor bar yod mi bya
276b3(rgyud 'grel): mi shes pa'am rmongs pa la/ /de nyid bstan par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu mi spang zhing/ /slob dpon nam yang smad mi bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pas na/ /de la smod byed gang yin pa/ /des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob/ /rang
276b4(rgyud 'grel): dag yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya/ /ji ltar bde bar bder gnas nas/ /'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /khyod ni de ring 'bras bu yod/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang
276b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs par/ /rtag tu khyod rnams grol bar 'gyur/ /dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de nas slob mas phyag byas te/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi/ /zhes khas blad do/ /'di ni slob dpon gyis
276b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur sa phyogs dben par bya ste/ yol bas bar bcad nas/ rgyud nas gsungs pa'i lo ni bcu gnyis ma la sogs pa'i/ dam tshig can bla ma la phul la/ kye bcom ldan 'das byang chub zhi ba
276b7(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba che/ /rdo rje sbyor bas yang dag byung/ /mi phyed phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje skyor ba ci la gus/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod ji bzhin/ /gtso bos bdag ni mdzad du gsol/ /'khor ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtsho ru/ /bying ba skyabs med bdag
277a1(rgyud 'grel): la skyobs/ /ces gsol btab pa dang/ de nas dpal ldan slob dpon ni/ rjes su brtse dang ldan pa yis/ /snying rje slob ma la bskyed de/ /rdo rje 'dzin par mdzad pa la/ /sha chang bza' btung yid du 'ong/ /me tog/
277a2(rgyud 'grel): bdug spos dril sogs/ /rgyal mtshan dril bur bcas pa yis/ /slob mas rdo rje can la mchod/ /de nas phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ /phyag rgya khu ba dang ldan pa de srid du bsten la/ snyoms par zhugs pa las byung
277a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ slob ma dang/ phyag rgya gnyis mig bkab la/ slob ma la dbang bskur te/ ji ltar bder gshegs thub chen gyis/ /byang chub sras la dbang bskur ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur bas/ bdag gis sems rgyun
277a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis bkru/ /bo b+hi tsit+ta a bi Shi ny+tsa/ ces brjod la slob mas kyang/ a ho su kha ces brjod do/ /bde ba rdzogs par gzhug go /shes rab kyis kyang de ltar bya ste/ thabs dang shes rab kyi gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de'i rjes la
277a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur te/ slob mas snga ma ltar gsol ba btab nas/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes rab ma byin gyis brlabs te gtad la/ mgo bor lag pa gzhag pa ste/ /dga' ster gnas te bu mo 'di/ /sna tshogs gzugs
277a6(rgyud 'grel): can yid 'od ba/ /zung shig zung shig sems dpa' che/ /gzung nas mchod pa rab tu bya/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs ma rgyas/ /'gro ba gsum po 'di yis dag /de bas khyod kyis nam yang ni/ /'di dang bral bar mi bya ste/ /'di ni
277a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /blun po gang zhig 'di sgong ba/ /de la mchog gi dngos grub med/ ces brjod la sbyin no/ /des kyang 'di skad brjod do/ /bshad gci khrag dang khu ba dang/ /sha chen la
277b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bza' ba dang/ /bud med rnams la rtag gus dang/ /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o byed pa/ /bu khyod spro bar byed nus sam/ /ces brjod do/ /rtsa mchog des kyang lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro/ /khu khrag la sogs bza' ba dang/ /bud med rnams la rtag
277b2(rgyud 'grel): gus shing/ /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o bgyi'o/ /zhes brjod do/ yang shes rab kyis/ e ma'o bdag gi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan/ /bde chen phyag rgya chen po ni/ /'di nyid du ni rtag tu gnas/ /blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba/ /de
277b3(rgyud 'grel): la mchog gi dngos grub med/ /ces brjod do/ /de'i rjes la ji skad du bshad pa'i ka ra na byas la snyoms par zhugs te/ man ngag gis de'i skad cig mtshon par bya'o/ /dbang bzhi pa bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen
277b4(rgyud 'grel): mo'i sgrug gzhung la/ /dad cing 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ /bla ma'i lugs bzhin sdebs te bris/ /dge rtsa phyi rabs rnams la sngo/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dngos grub brnyes pa ku ku ris mdzod pa rdzogs so// /
277b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po na wi ko Ta dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los bsgyur/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed
277b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun tu rtog pa 'ching gcod cing/ /'jig rten bya ba rab 'jug ma/ /de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis med ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /lhan gcig skyes pa'i ro snyoms shing/ /bdag med ngo bo phyag rgya
277b7(rgyud 'grel): che/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byang chub sems mchog rnam par dag /'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i dbyings/ /mi skyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchog sbyin ma ni bde ba che/ /mi zad rdo rje nor bu
278a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings/ /bla na med pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dri med chos ni rnam par dag/ sku gsung thugs ni mtshan ma bral/ /dri med ye shes che bsnyems pa/ /pad+ma? mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal lo/ /
278a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las ni thogs pa med/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'gro ba'i mgon/ /nan tan ye shes che bsnyems pa/ /las kyi mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal mahA mA yA'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po ku ku ri pas zhal gziT
278a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshe bstod pa'o/ /dge legs 'phel// //rgya gar skad du/ ta ta twa u pa de sha/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi snying khar pad+ma kha sbyar
278a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas gsal/ /phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa/ /khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba/ /gsal ba'i chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dbang po g.yo ba'i rta kun nang du nges sbyar
278a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur ba/ /khams gsum bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid du ni nyer 'gro ba/ /mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra ba dri med dpal du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis/ /chos ni rjes su dran par bsgom/ /
278a6(rgyud 'grel): chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi skur ni rang nyid 'gyur/ /dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes/ /ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyis/ /shin tu bsgom pa goms pa las/ /'bar ba 'di ni the tshom med/ /snyid la rtag tu
278a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yi/ /thig le gcig pu yi ge med/ /skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na/ /ye shes skye bar 'gyur ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs rjes can/ /'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems/ /
278b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas/ /'di nyid mchod pa gnyis kyis ni/ /mchod 'od thams cad mchod pa yin/ /gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba/ /de ni rgyal pos mchod par bzhed/ /nang gi sbyor ba'i rdo rje yis/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod/
278b2(rgyud 'grel): de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis/ /yid 'dod rnams kyi lus la mchod/ /mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag /de ni phyi rol gzhan du 'dod/ /dngos med gzhi la dgod pa yis/ /
278b3(rgyud 'grel): lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa yi/ /mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i/ /rgyud 'di don dam ma yin te/ /don dam yang dag skyes pas na/ /ston pa med cing
278b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa med/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir che ba yi/ /gnas sogs de nyid la gnas te/ /de bas de kun 'khor ba nyid/ /skyo bya de nyid can gyis min /gal te de nyid med gyur na/ /de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya/ /'on te de nyid ldan gyur na/ /
278b5(rgyud 'grel): de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs rnams/ /brten pas dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yang na mi nus bag med pa'i/ /mi yis gnas ni bsgrags par bya/ /nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ /sems can bsam pa'i
278b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis te/ /bsam gtan las gzhan bde med phyir/ /de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor/ /de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur/ /de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni/ /rnal 'byor rol pas gnas
278b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can/ /rnam dag ye shes sbyan gyis ni/ /thugs rje thugs gdung ring po nas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor can rnams gzigs/ /de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog /ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur/ /des
279a1(rgyud 'grel): ni rjes btsun ye shes kyang/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ /sna tshogs spyod pas yang dag ldan/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad pa yi/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spangs la/ /de nyid brtul zhugs
279a2(rgyud 'grel): la dga' bya/ /gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas la/ /rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can/ /bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol gyur pas/ /smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis/ /gcer bu 'am yang na gcer bu min/ /gang rung
279a3(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ji lta bur/ /rang gis lhag pa'i lhar dmigs la/ /de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam/ /lkugs pa'i dngos por thal 'gyur bas/ /zla drug tsam gyis des par ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis nyer brten na/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'di gsal
279a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /ye shes sgron ma mchog mthong na/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' la dang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no/ /mig 'phrul mkhan ldan 'jig rten du/ /'gro don kun ni byed pa'o/ /
279a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin bar ni/ /mdor 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /spyod dang 'di la nges par ni/ /ji skad bshad par der 'gyur bas/ /sems ni dag par gyis shig ces/ /sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs/ /gang
279a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir shin tu gsad ba na/ /de nyid bdag gis gsal ma byas/ /des na bla ma yang dag par/ /mnyes byas yang dag 'dod pas blang/ /dge la dmigs pas nye bar bsags te 'phel ba yin/ /blo gros brtan rnams mngon
279a7(rgyud 'grel): dga' i dngos grub gnas su 'gro/ /'gro ba'i spyod pa de ltar snying la yongs bsgoms la/ /dge la mngon par dga' bar skad cig re re gyis/ /de nyid brtan pa legs bris las/ /bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa/ /des
279b1(rgyud 'grel): ni sems can ma lus kun de nyid rin chen rab gsal shog /de kho nyid kyi man ngag legs par bris pa slob dpon blo bzang snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kA mA la gupta dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba rin chen bzang
279b2(rgyud 'grel): pos bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o// //ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tu n+te ShA n+ta thA ga to hya ba bata te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI mahA sh+ra ma Na:// //de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gi 'brel pa bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /ta ta twa u pa de sha bri
279b3(rgyud 'grel): ta ti/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gi 'brel pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang du snying gi pad+ma kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal/ /phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa/ khams gsum
279b4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba/ gal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal zhes pa la/ gang du zhes bya ba ni chos dbyings ...... zhes bya ba dang sbyar te/ 'di ni gnas bzhi ste bdun pa yin la/ /gang dang de
279b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni rtag tu 'brel ba yin pa'i phyir/ /de la phyag 'tshal ba yin no/ /de la chos zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid de yang dag pa'i mdza' o/ /de 'dzin par chos kyi dbyings te/ d+hA tu ni bstun zhes bya ba dbye ba'i tshig gis ni glang du chos kyi dbyings
279b6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa de ni khams gsum pa nye bar 'gro zhing sod ba yin pas de la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /gang du zhes na/ snying gi pad+ma kha sbyar dbus gnas zhes bya ba smos te/ snying gi ni snying ngo/ /pad+ma ni chus skyed ste/ 'dab ma bzhi pa/ kha dog dmang
279b7(rgyud 'grel): po 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin no/ /de la lte ba'i dbus gnas kha sbyar gsal zhes bya ba zla ba dang/ nyi ma gnyis las yongs su grub pa ste/ 'di gnyis ka yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do/ /de la zla ba nis dang chu'i rang bzhin no
280a1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma ni me dang rlung gi rang bzhin te/ kha sbyar de'i dbus gnas pa'i dang tshul 'di la yod pas na kha sbyar gyi dbus na gnas pa'o/ /de la 'di'i don ni 'di yin te/ yon tan brgyad gyi phreng ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i ngo bo nyid kyi
280a2(rgyud 'grel): dbus na bzhugs pa de ni bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings te/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o/ /gsal zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba ste/ gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis snang bar byed pa'o/ /ji ltar zhe na spra ba lta ba zhes bya ba
280a3(rgyud 'grel): smos te/ phra ba ni bcom ldan 'das yin la/ /de ni phra ba rnams las kyang phra rab tu gyur par rdo rje nam mkha' i khams dang mnyam du 'jug pa'o/ /de la myong ba ni nye bar 'gro ba'o/ /de ltar ba ni rnam par/ lta ba ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i snal ma shin
280a4(rgyud 'grel): tu phra ba'i bu ga la mi yengs par/ lta ba'o/ /yang na phra ba yang yin la/ lta ba yang de nyid yin pas na phra bar/ lta ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /de'i rang byung ba ni rgyun gyis 'bab bas rab tu 'jug pa'o/ /de la myong ba ni ring po ma yin
280a5(rgyud 'grel): pas bar mchad par nye bar 'gro ba'o/ /sems kyis 'jug pa ni sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/ rgyu de'i phyir ro/ /de yang gang zhe na/ khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ khams gsum ni 'dod khams
280a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gzugs khams dang/ gzugs med pa ste/ de rnams gcig tu bsdus pa ni khams gsum mo/ /bsdus pa'i don gyi khams gsum pa ste/ khams gsum gyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum pa'o/ /ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni lhag
280a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'o/ /gnyis su med par nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni song ba ste/ bsdus pa'i tshul gyis so sor snang zhing 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' i gzugs su yongs su gyur pa'o/ /zhes pa'i don to/ /ji skad du der 'gro yid kyi gong bu ltar/
280b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs gcig tu ni sgom par byed ces bshad pa dang/ gzhan yang 'gro ba rnams kyi de nyid gcig nyi gces bshad pas so/ /ji ltar na gnyis su med par 'gro ba yin zhe na/ cung zad tsam yang mi gsal ba ma yin gyi/ rlog pa med pa la
280b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar gyur pa yin te/ de lta bur gyur pa'i mcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /chos kyi da byings kyi ye shes de la phyag 'tshal 'tshal nas ci zhig bya zhe na/ dbang po g.yo ba'i rta kun nang du nges
280b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'i/ /ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa/ /khyams gsum skye ba'i rgyu nyid du ni nyer 'gro ba/ /mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra ba dri med dpal du 'gyur/ /zhes smos te/ 'phel pa dang 'grib pa bshad par bya ste/ ye shes ni
280b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i mdza' o/ /mthong ba ni so sor rtog par byed pa ste/ /de lta bu'i rnal 'byor 'di ni dri ma med pa'i dpal du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro de lta na ni bzlog par dga' ba'i dbang po 'di dag ni rta lta bu yin na rnal 'byor pa 'di ji ltar
280b5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhe na/ dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ dbang po'i tshogs drug po ni g.yo zhing mi srun la/ rang gi yul rnams la 'phyan zhing brkam pas rta dang 'dra ba'i phyir na rta ste/ de lta bu'i rnam par g.yeng bar byed
280b6(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad nang du sems kyis yang dag par bsdu ba la nges par sbyar zhing/ g.yo ba ma lus pa nges par brtags pa'o/ /de ltar ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni phyi nas dri /ma med par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes de yang
280b7(rgyud 'grel): ji lta bu zhe na/ ye shes rgyal ba ma lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ rgyal ba ni sdig pa thams cad las rgyal pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya'o/ /ma lus shes bya ba ni phyis 'byung de dang dang mtshams sbyar ba'o/ /
281a1(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi 'dus pa ni yang dag par 'du bar mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i snod dang gnas su gyur pa yin no/ /'di skad du ston par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni ye shes las skyes pa yin la/
281a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba mchog gcig pu de las 'khrungs par ma zad kyi/ /khams gsum po de yang de las skyes pa yin te/ khams gsum bskyed ba'i rgyur gyur pa ni khams gsum ma lus pa ye shes kyi rnam pa can no/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /
281a3(rgyud 'grel): de lta bur gyur ba'i phra ba'i rdo rje mthong bar gyur pa'i bsgom pa ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gyur pa yin te/ nam mkha' ni go 'byed pa'o/ /de dang 'dra ba'i dri ma med pa'i ye shes dpal gyis mdzes pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o
281a4(rgyud 'grel): de la rnam par rtog pa'i gdon gyis zin pas 'gro ba rnams la gnyis su snang ba yin te/ ji skad du rnam rtog gti mug chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin/ /mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas na/ /mkha' bzhin dri ma med
281a5(rgyud 'grel): pa snang/ /zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na bcom ldan 'das 'di ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis/ /chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi skur ni rang nyid 'gyur/ /
281a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes smos te/ 'dir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa rtsa ba nas bton pa la bya bar bshad la/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bzhi ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te/ /'di rnams kyi dbus na bcom ldan 'das
281a7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings de dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/ /sbyor ba des ci zhig bya zhe na/ chos ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ chos ni zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor gyi nang na gzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das yin la/ de yang snga ma bzhin
281b1(rgyud 'grel): du bsgoms pas phyis chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par skye zhing/ nam mkhar snang bar nye bar 'gro ste/ rnal 'byor ba rang nyid chos kyi skur 'gyur ro/ /de'i don ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur pa de yin te/ pad+ma'i steng du thig le bzhi las lha mo bzhir
281b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la/ lte ba'i thig le las bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa ni rang gis bdag por bya ste/ de'i thugs ka'i pad+ma kha sbyar gyi dbus na ni chos kyi dbyings so/ /ji lta zhe na/ gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa 'gro ba dang 'od ba dang gnas pa'i rim gyis
281b3(rgyud 'grel): dal bu dal bus skad cig re re la slob par byed pas de'i tshe zhi pa nyid la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /zhi bar gyur nas ni rtsa dbus gnyis 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis 'gags nas kyang dngos po med pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /ji
281b4(rgyud 'grel): skad du 'gro ba dang 'od dang gnas pa nyid/ dal gyis dal ba'i rim gyis ni/ /de nas dngos po med 'gyur te/ /zhi ba gcig pu mngon phyogs nas/ /zhes bshad pa ni man ngag go /ye shes de bsgoms pa las khyad par ci zhig skye zhe na
281b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes/ /ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyi/ /shin tu bsgoms pa gmos pa las/ /'bar ba 'di la the tsom med/ /ces bya ba la/ dbus kyi gsal bar byed pa ni/ /dbus na gsal bar byed pa'o/
281b6(rgyud 'grel): nye bar snang bar byed pa'i ye shes te/ dbus na gsal bar byed pa dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni sems la bya ste/ ji skad du sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba rnam grangs
281b7(rgyud 'grel): su gshad pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i dbus su gsal bar byed pa'i ye shes na snying gi pad+ma kha sbyar gyi nang du chud pa'i mi g.yo bas/ lta bar byed pa'i ye shes te chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa'o/ de gang zhig ces na mchog gi ye shes
282a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi zhes bya ba smos te/ de kho na nyid mthong ba rnams kyi'o/ /gyi 'da' tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhe na/ shin tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ shin tu yang rgyun mi 'chad par sbyor bas bsgom
282a2(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ sems pas rgyun mi 'chad par goms shing bslab pa'i tshul gyis rnam par lta ba'i rgyu des na/ 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'di ni ste/ snying la gsal zhing snang bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do/ /'di'i don ni 'di yin te/ ting nge
282a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis gnas skabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni skad cig tsam gyis ye shes kyi snang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji skad du srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas ni/ /bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ /zhes bshad
282a4(rgyud 'grel): bas na mom nyi mi bya'o/ /don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /snying la rtag tu gnas pa yis/ /thig le gcig pu yi ge med/ /skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na/ /ye shes skye bar 'gyur ba mchog /ces bya ba la snying la zhes
282a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ /pad+ma kha sbyar la bya ba ste/ der thig le zhes bya ba la/ rdo rje phra mo'i ngo bo nyid gnas shing dus thams cad du 'dug ba'o/ ci 'di dngos po yin nam/ 'on te ma yin zhe na/ yi ge med ces bya ba smos te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
282a6(rgyud 'grel): bo ting kun bzhi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin khyab par snang ba'o/ /de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgom pa las ni ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ci nyan thos la sogs pa dang 'dra 'am 'on te ma yin zhe na/ mchog ces bya ba smos te de bzhin
282a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /de ltar phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag bshad nas/ da ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa g.yeng ba dgag par bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje
282b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro thugs rje can/ /'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems/ /'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ snying kha'i pad+ma'i kha sbyar ba'i dbus 'di nyid du bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnam
282b2(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa'i dra ba rnam par gsal ba'i thugs rje chen pos 'khrigs pa bzhugs te/ de rnams ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni nam mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can du bshad do/ /de gang la
282b3(rgyud 'grel): yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni byams pa la sogs pa'o/ /byang chub ces bya ba rnam par mi rtog
282b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes la sems dpa' ste/ dgongs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /de skad du/ gzung dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid las/ byang chub ces bya 'ga' yang med/ rtog pa'i shes pa las grol ba'i/ sems ni byang chub
282b5(rgyud 'grel): yin zhes bshad/ ces bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ 'gro ba gsum pa dag kyang gnas pa'o/ /'o na 'di ltar 'gro ba gsum po dag kyang 'di nyid du gnas so zhes bya ba ni tshig ci rigs pa yin zhe
282b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya ste/ gang gi phyir khams gsum po 'di dag thams cad ni sems kyi rnam pa yongs su gyur ba yin gyi/ phyi rol na yod pa ma yin te/ bems po'i bdag nyid can rnams ni snang bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes bya bar
282b7(rgyud 'grel): dgongs te/ ji skad du/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum po 'di dag ni sems tsam mo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na phyi rol la stos pa med na/ bang gis ji ltar mchod ce na/ /'di nyid mchod pa nyid kyi ni/ mchod 'od thams cad mchod pa yin/ gang zhig 'di la rtag
283a1(rgyud 'grel): lta ba/ /de ni rgyal ba mchod par bzhed ces bya ba smos te/ 'di nyid ces bya ba ni thig le'i rgyal po dngos po dngos po med pa de la mchod pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dus thams cad
283a2(rgyud 'grel): du mchod pa nyid yin no/ /gal te de rnams la mchod pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi mchod pa lnga la ltos na ni/ des rnal 'byor ba rnam par g.yeng bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ bcom ldan 'das phra ba'i rdo rje
283a3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po 'di la rtag tu lta zhing gnyis su med pa nyid kyis skad cig re re la de nyid mi chod pa yin te/ phyi rol gyi mchod pa rnam par g.yang bar byed po rnams kyis ci zhig bya/ 'o na de lta na ni mchod pa zhes bya ba med de/ des na 'di ni
283a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gal ba nyid du shes so zhe na/ nang gi sbyor ba'i rdo rje yis/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod/ /de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis/ /yid 'dod rnams kyis lus la mchod ces bya ba smos te/ bdag nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'i rnal 'byor
283a5(rgyud 'grel): ni nang gi sbyor ba'o/ /de yang rnal 'byor ni ldan pa ste/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /de yang ji skad du/ shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug pa/ rnal 'byor zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /ces gsungs pa'i phyir de nyid
283a6(rgyud 'grel): ni mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje dang 'dra bas na rdo rje'o/ /rgyu de'i phyir rnal 'byor ba nyid rdo rje can yin par 'dod ces gsungs pa'o/ /de bas zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba bshad pa yin te/ rgyu de'i phyir na rdo rje'i mchod pa yis zhes bya ba mi
283a7(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa'i mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas ying la rnal 'byor 'dod pa rnams kyi lus mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar na bcom ldan 'dis thams cad zlog par mdzad pa yin te/ rgyal ba rnams kyi mchod pa 'di dag nyid rgyud
283b1(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs pa ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod pa lnga'i sbyor ba yis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /gang 'di rgyud las gsungs ba dag /de ni phyi rol gzhan du 'dod/ /ces bya ba smos te/ mchod pa ni dbul bar bya ste/ me tog la soT
283b2(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga po 'di dag phyi nang gi bdag nyid can rnams yin la/ des myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yin te de ltar yin du zin kyang/ gang 'di rgyud rnams las gsungs pa/ de ni phyi rol ba nyid yin la/ phyi'i rtsom
283b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs kyis rnal 'byor pa thams cad rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yin du zin na ni mchod pa zhes bya ba med de chad bar lta ba dang mtshungs so zhe na/ dngos med zhi la bkod pa yis/ /lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni/ /mnyam nyid
283b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ dngos po med pa'i bzhi ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gnas te/ dngos po dang bcas pa'o/ /de med pas na dngos po/
283b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa ste/ dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de la bkod pa'i yang dag par dmigs pa ste/ rgyu des rang gi lhag pa'i lhar ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'o/ /de nyid ni mchod pa chen por 'dod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus
283b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par byed par 'dod pa yin na/ rnam par g.yeng bar byed pa'i phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya/ gal te gzhung du yang dag par dgong pa'i bar gnyid can gyis dgongs pa dang 'gal bar
283b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /zhe na/ bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i/ /rgyud ni don dam ma yin te/ /don dam yang dag bskyed pas na/ /ston pa med cing bstan pa med/ /ces bya ba smos te/ bstan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gdul bar bya
284a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don du gsungs ba yin la/ yang dag skyeng pas na/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems las ye shes 'byung ba'o/ /ston pa med cing zhes bya ba ni ston par byed pa med pa'o/ /bstan pa med ces bya ba ni gzhung gi
284a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyang med pa ste/ rnam par mi rtog pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi rol du g.yeng ba'i blo can rnams kyi gnas la sogs par 'khor bar byed pa dang ldan pa rnams dgag par bya ba'i phyir nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yi/ /gnas sogs
284a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid la gnas te/ /de bas de kun 'khor ba nyid/ /skyo bya de nyid can gyis min zhes bya ba smos te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba'i zhes pa ni/ rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bzhir bsres shing bgrangs ba ste/ de la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas zhes bya ba
284a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro rgyu des na gnas kyi rdo rje la sogs rnams kyang sems kyi rdo rje la gnas so/ /de bas zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdu ba smra ba yin te/ de rnams su 'khor ba nyid kyis khams zad bar byed pa yin pas skyo zhing zhum
284a5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid mi bya'o/ /gang gis she na/ de nyid can gyis min zhes pa smos so/ /rnal 'byor pa chen po rnams kyi mi bya'o/ /'o na phyi rol tu zhen pa skyon yin na/ /gtso bor bya ba gang yin zhe na/ gal te de nyid med gyur na/ de yi 'khrus
284a6(rgyud 'grel): pas ci zhig bya/ /yang na de nyid ldan 'gyur na/ /de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod/ /ces bya ba smos te 'di ni go sla'o/ /'on te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gnas pa la sogs pa bgrod pas dri ma med pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de bas na rang
284a7(rgyud 'grel): gi gzhung nyid dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs rnams/ /brten pas dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yang na mi nus bag med pa'i/ /mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya/ zhes bya ba smos te/ gnas dang nye ba'i
284b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas la sogs pa la brten cing/ bsnyen bkur bya bas rnal 'byor pa dri ma med par 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni/ srid de rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ 'gron po dang bcas pa'i gnas su bgrong cing mchod pas bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes
284b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa ni ngo mtshar med de/ yang na la la zhig bgrong par mi nus pa'am/ /bag med cing bya ba mang pos g.yangs pa ste/ de gnyis kyis kyang gnas la sogs pa'i ming bsgrags pas dag pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang
284b3(rgyud 'grel): ci don dam pa nyid du bsten pa yin nam zhe na ma yin te/ nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te/ /bsam gtan las gzhan bde med phyir/ /de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhos bya zhes bya ba smos te/ gang bdag
284b4(rgyud 'grel): cag rnams kyis de skad du smras pa de ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang du byas pa yin te/ gang gnas bgrod pas dri ma med pa nyid du 'dod pa de'i phyir bstan pa yin gyi/ de yang don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de'i phyir bsam
284b5(rgyud 'grel): gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ bsam gtan zhes bya ba ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la/ 'di nyid las bde ba zhes pa gzhan med de/ de bas na nyin mtshan rtag tu bsam gtam kho na mchog tu bsten
284b6(rgyud 'grel): cing de la gzhol bar bya'o/ /'o na phyi rol mngon par zhen cing/ /btsal ba la skyon ci yod ce na rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor/ de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur/ /de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni/ /rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par
284b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ zhes smos te/ phyi rol byi sbyor ba la mngon par dga' i rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyi khams rnams yongs su bskams par 'gyur te/ de bas na phyi rol gyi bya ba rnams yongs su spangs la/ rnal 'byor rol pa ste/ rnal 'byor
285a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnam par rtse bas de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba la gnas par bya'o/ /'o na khyad par can dag bzhugs pa'i gnas la bgrod pas dgos pa 'grub bam zhe na/ dpal ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can/ /rnam dag ye shes
285a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan gyis ni/ /thugs rje thugs gdung ring po nas/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can rnams gzigs shes bya ba smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi ye shes dri ma med pa'i spyan gyi/ thugs rje'i dbang gis ring po nyid nas kyang bsam
285a3(rgyud 'grel): gtan la rnam par gzigs te/ /de bas na gnas bgrod pa la sogs pa mi bya'o/ /'o na de dag gis gzigs pas ci 'gyur zhe na/ de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog /ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur/ /nges ni rje btsun
285a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyang/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can dgyes par gyur nas thugs rje'i dbang gis/ dngos grub gyi mchog gi ye shes stsol bar 'gyur zhing bsten par
285a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa dang/ gzhan yang ral gri'i dngos grub la sogs pa ji ltar mngon par dga' ba bzhin du/ rnal 'byor pa rnams la stsol bar mdzad do/ /de bas na ye shes gyi de kho na nyid rnam pa thams cad du 'bad pas bsgrub
285a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhing mnyes par bya'o/ /ci rje btsun ye shes mnyes par byed pas sbyod pa dang/ brtsul zhugs rnams la ltos par bya 'am zhes/ sna tshogs spyod par yang dag ldan/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad pa rnams/ /spyod
285a7(rgyud 'grel): dang brtul zhugs 'dir spangs la/ /de nyid brtul zhugs la dga' bya/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa du ma spyod pa dang/ brtul zhugs rnams rgyud de dang do las gsungs pa rnams kyis lus sems rnam
285b1(rgyud 'grel): par g.yeng bar 'gyur te/ nge bas na nge spangs shing nor la rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis/ rjes su mthun pa'i de kho na nyid kyi brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam pa'i dbang gi spyod pa dang/ brtul zhugs
285b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yin na zhes bya bar gsungs so/ /ci bya ba'i rgyud rnams las kha zas ji lta bur gnas par gsungs pa de lta bu'i kha zas kyis gnas par bya 'am/ 'o na te ma yin zhe na/ gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa/ rnam pa de
285b3(rgyud 'grel): byas brtul zhugs can/ bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas/ smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis zhes bya ba smos te/ kha zas gsod pa rnams sam/ gsod pa ma yin pa'am/ bsangs pa'am/ bslangs pa
285b4(rgyud 'grel): rtags pa'am/ brtags pa ma yin pa'am/ gang yang rung ba'i zas la longs spyod cing gnas pa ni zas kyis gnas pa'o/ /brtul zhing zhugs pa'i phyir brtul zhugs te/ lung las bshad pa'i sngom pa'o/ /de lta bu'i brtul
285b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs dang/ zas la ma ltos par bsam gtan nyid zas dang 'dra bas na zas so/ /zas de la mchog tu gyur pas sus kyang rjes su rtogs par mi 'gyur bar smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/ gzhan du skye bo
285b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang nye bar 'dre bas kun du gces par 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor pa gos la sogs pa slong ba la sogs pas brtul zhugs can g.yengs par 'gyur na dge ba ji ltar byed ce na/ gcer bu 'am yang na gcer bu min/ /gang du
285b7(rgyud 'grel): ji lta de lta bur/ /rang gis lhag pa'i star dmigs la/ /de nyid ah+gcig pu rnam par bsam/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ gcer pu 'am yang na gcer bu min/ /zhes bya ba ni go sla'o/ /bya ba'i gyud la sogs pa nas gnas kyi nges par bshad
286a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dir yang de bzhin du bya 'am zhe na/ gang yang rung ba zhes bya ba smos te/ lam gyi bzhi mdo la sogs pa'i nges pa med do/ /'o na skyil mo krung bcas nas thog thag bzlas brjod bya ba'i spyod pas ni lus la

286a3(rgyud 'grel): ram zhe na/ zla drug tsam gyis nges pa ni/ zhes bya ba smos te/ nges par zla ba drug gis 'di 'tshang rgya ba nyid kyang nges par 'grub pa ni/ ci skye bo rnams dang 'dres shing g.yangs pas sam zhe na lkugs pa'i dngos por thal 'gyur pas/ /zla
286a4(rgyud 'grel): drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis nges bsten na/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'di gsal 'gyur zhes bya ba smos te/ lkugs pa'i dngos por thal 'gyur pas/ /zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'i dbang gis mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs la
286a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i yang nyes pa med do/ /de bas na rnal 'byor chen po 'di yang gsal zhing 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /nye bar brtse bar 'gyur ro/ /'o na 'di nyid kun gyis bkur ba dang/ bsnyen pa'i dus su 'gyur ram
286a6(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ ye shes sgron ma mchog mthong na/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' la/ /ngang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no zhes bya ba la/ ye shes ni rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa gsal ba'i ngo bo
286a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid do/ /de'i sgron ma ni snang ba'o/ /des mchog tu gyur pa ni dam pa ste/ de lta bas na lha mo rnams yang dag par nye bar sdud do/ /ji lta bu zhen dper na pad+ma'i 'byung gnas kyi mtsho pad+mas khyab par gnas la ngang pa'i tshogs rnams 'bab
286b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o/ /ji ltar 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /rig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du/ /'gro kun don ni byed pa'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni/ /mngon 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces smos te/ 'di dag ni go sla'o/ /gzhung
286b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsom par byed pas bskul bar bya ba'i phyir/ spyod pa 'dis ni nges par ni/ /ji skad ba shad pa der 'gyur bas/ sems ni dag par gyis shig ces/ /sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs/ /zhes bya ba smos te/ 'di ni go sla'o/ /

286b4(rgyud 'grel): bar ma bshad de/ de bas na kye sems can rnams bla ma yang dag par mnyes shing mgu bar byas nas de blang zhing gzung bar bya'o/ /de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gyi 'grel pa/ slob dpon blo bzang snying po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

286b7(rgyud 'grel): gang ltar/ /thugs rje'i stobs can dga' ba can/ /sgyu mas rnam rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal gsum gdungs bdag nyid khams gsum pa/ /gang las byung ba'i bde ba chen po yod/ /thugs rje chen po'i rig pa rtogs chen po'i/
287a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rnam brgyan bla ma bzang la 'dud/ /sgyu ma chen mo'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /snying rje'i stobs can rdo rje yi/ /gang zhig sgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams so/ /snying kha'i nang du
287a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba la/ /zla dkyil rang gi sa bon bsam/ /de yid 'od kyis lus reg pas/ /lus kyi dran pa nyer gzhag pa/ /de gyur pa las lus rnams dang/ /'jig rten srid pa snang ba la/ /mdun na lha dang sangs rgyas rnams/ /gus pas

287a5(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /zur bzhi dang ni ldan pas gnas/ /rgyud rnams kun nas 'byung ba bzhin/ /phyi yi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su/ /dur khrod kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /de yi ming dang mtshan nyid ni/ /ji bzhin lung gis bshad

287b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gtso bo'i zhal dang mtshungs/ /shar gyi zhal ni thams cad kyang/ /rigs kyi gtso bo dang mthun pa/ /g.yon pa dril bu kha TwAM ga /slar yang lha mo g.yas pa la/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa bsnams/ /gnyis pa lho yi 'dab
287b7(rgyud 'grel): ma la/ /ser mo zhal gyi kha dog ni/ /ser dang sngo dang dkar dang ljang/ /kha dog ldan pas rnam par bzhugs/ /phyag ni g.yon pa brla stong na/ /thod dang lco spyang bsnams pa ste/ /g.yas ni rin chen mdung dag dang/ /chu khams riT
288a1(rgyud 'grel): chen mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /gsum pa nub kyi 'dab ma la/ /me yi khams kyi rang bzhin can/ /dkar dmar mdangs kyi 'od gsal ba/ /rnal 'byor pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /dkar dang sngo dang shin tu ser/ /ljang

289a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI bud+d+ha DA kI swad+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

289a3(rgyud 'grel): la de 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul nas/ bar snang la bsams la/ mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste/ bdag gis

289a6(rgyud 'grel): khrod dang bcas pa bsgom bar bya'o/ /der pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa bsam la/ de'i lte bar oM dang bcas pa'i thig le bltas la/ de las phyogs bzhir nyi ma'i steng du thig le gzhi spros ba las/ lha mo bzhi bskyed par bya
289a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ shar phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ sku mdog sngon mo zhal bzhi pa ste sngon mo dang ser ba dang dkar ba dang ljang khu'o/ /phyag bzhi ba ste/ rdo rje dang kha TwAM ga/ dril bu dang thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyoT kyi lha mo ni/ sku mdog ser mo/ ser
289b1(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ sngo ba dang dkar ba dang/ ljang khu'i zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa ste rin po che dang/ tri shU la don dang bcas pa dang/ thod pa dang lce sbyang bsnams pa'o/ /nub kyi lha mo ni/ sku mdog dkar mo/ dkar ba dang ser ba dang/ sngo ba dang ljang khu'i zhal bzhi ba'o/ /
289b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa ste/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang mda' dang/ thod pa dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /byang gi lha mo ni/ sku mdog ljang khu/ ljang khu dang/ ser ba dang/ dkar ba dang sngon po'i zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa ste/ ral gri dang/ cang te dang/ thod pa dang/ zhaT pa bsnams
289b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /lha mo thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/ mche ba gcigs pa/ skra khams gyen du 'phar ba/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ sgog pa la sogs ba'i nyams dang ldan pa/ mi mgo lnga bcus brgyan pa nyi mal skyil krung phyed pas brgyan pa
289b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o/ /de nas lha mo bzhi'i glus bskul bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dmar mo/ dmar ba dang/ ser ba dang/ dkar ba dang/ ljang khu'i zhal bzhi/ phyag bzhi pa ste/ mda' dang thod pa dang/ gzhu dang kha TwA ga
289b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o/ /de nas skye mched byin gyis brlabs dang/ /sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs la/ /snying kha'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ bgegs bkrad la mchod pa rnams phul ste/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:
289b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du byas te dbyer med par bya'o/ /de nas sa bon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs la/ mchod de gsol ba btab pas dbang bskur te/ rang gi rigs kyi
289b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag po bsam par bya ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa la go rims bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsam par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /de nas
290a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas bzhir 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa dang/ de la yi ge rnams dgod pa dang/ gtum mo sbyar ba dang/ rang gi 'khor lo bsreg pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi bzhu btul bya ba dang/
290a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gnas bzhir bde ba 'pho ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas zlas ba bya ste/ oM bud d+ha DA kI nI A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la mchod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor bsdu ba byas la/ spyod lam
290a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad bya'o/ /bza' ba thams cad las sa bon lngas spyang ba dang/ khrus byed tsam na lha dbang bskur ltar bya'o/ /nyi ma phye dang rgod ka'i dus su dbang bskur ba la sogs pa cho ga thams
290a4(rgyud 'grel): cad bya'o/ /de nas langs nas spyod lam gyi ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad bya'o/ /nam phyed kyi dus su yang dag par mchod pa dang/ ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol ba dang/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
290a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sa bon ya bsdus te/ snang stong dbyer med byang chub kyi sems su mos bar byas la nyal bar bya'o/ /de ltar nyin dang mtshan du dngos grub gyi mtshan ma nye bar ma thob pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/ /sgyu 'phrul

290b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i tshul gnas slob dpon gyis/ de yi dag po 'bum bzlas shing/ /lhag ma rnams la khri khri'o/ /de nas de yi gnang ba 'am/ /mtshan ma bzang ngang ldan gyur na/ /de ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /dben pa'i gnas sam dur khrod dam

290b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dgug la kyo sogs la/ /dgug sogs byas te dbang bskur la/ /mchod stod rdzogs byas bdag nyid kyis/ /de la sogs pa gdab par bya/ /bdeng gshegs thams cad bdag la dgongs/ /khyeng rnams mchod pa'i phyir dang ni/ /slob ma rnams la
291a1(rgyud 'grel): phan phyir du/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya yi/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar 'tshal/ /bdag la byin brlabs gnang par mdzod/ /de skad lan gsum gsol btab la/ /de nas bdag nyid he ru ka'i/ /gzugs su bdag nyid

291a4(rgyud 'grel): mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod rjes la/ /dga' ba'i mdabs kyis lha mo

294b1(rgyud 'grel): des kyang seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis/ /ku sha'i stan la nyal nas su/ /nang par bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig /sang gi nang par khyod kyis ni/ /thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /grong khyer dam pa mthong zhes brjod/ /de nas nang par dus su ni/ /rmi
294b2(rgyud 'grel): lam mtshan ma dri bar bya/ /des kyang mtshan ma mthong ba rnams/ /slob dpon mdun du bsdod par bya/ /mtshan ma bzang dang ldan smra ba/ /de yi dngos grub bstan par bya/ /ngan pa mthong na bsrung ba dang/ /mi yi las kyi rtogs pa gsal/ /lhag par
294b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa byas 'og tu/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ /rnal 'byor byas te nang bar sngar/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor nam khar bteg nas ni/ /de nas thig le'i las bya'o/ /
294b4(rgyud 'grel): na ra'i skra'am su tas/ /byang ma yang na ngas pal la/ /khrag chen du ni spags pa la/ /shes nas dkyil 'khor gyi nyid 'gyur/ /tshad byas kha dog lngar byas te/ /pad+ma'i snod gzhag dag mos pas/ /rgyu las byung ba'i bde gshegs lnga/ /
294b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de ye shes spyan drang ba/ /rab tu myur bar g.yo ba'i mig /mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni/ /'bar ba'i lta ba dam pa ste/ /'dis ni ye shes thig dgug go /dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab phyir/ /rdo rje thig ni bdag la gsol/ /mchod pa
294b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni byas nas su/ /oM a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarbba d+harmmA /pa ra spar a nu ga ta sarba d+harmmA/ a dyan ta a nu bri baSh+Tha sarbba d+harmmA/ zhes brjod thig de bsgril nas su/ /mi 'chi lnga la spangs pa dang/ /cho ga shes shing blo ldan pas/ /ye shes
294b7(rgyud 'grel): thig ni de gdab po/ /dzdza dzja'i sgra ni btang nas su/ /des kyang rgyab nas 'gro bar bya/ /lte bar rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /nub dang shar nas dang po ste/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ lho dang byang nas de bzhin te/ /nam mkha' yi ni
295a1(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab po/ /'og gi thig kyang de bzhin te/ /de tshe 'jig rten khams kun gyi/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro don du/ /khyed kyis don ni bya dus yin/ /slob dpon me dang rlung gnas te/ /slob ma dbang ldan bden
295a2(rgyud 'grel): bral du/ /'dug la shar dang nub gdab bo/ /de nyid gnas dang byang gi thig/ byin za srin por gnas pas lho/ /de nyid gnas dang bden bral dang/ /slob ma rlung dang dbang ldan du/ /gnas pas tshams kyi thig gnyis so/ /bstan bcos
295a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong dang sgo khyud du/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan pa'i/ /nang du chu skyes brgyad pa la/ /rdo rje phreng ba dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor lo'i brgyad cha sko yin te/ /sgo khyud sgo dang 'drar shes bya/ /de yi khyams kyi tshad yin te/ /mtshon sna lnga yang de
295a4(rgyud 'grel): nang dang sgo khyud du/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan pa'i/ /nang du chu skyes brgyad pa la/ /rdo rje phreng ba dang ldan pa'o/ /'khor lo'i brgyad cha sko yin te/ /sgo khyud sgo dang 'drar shes bya/ /de yi khyams kyi tshad yin te/ /mtshon sna lnga yang de

295b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po che/ /tshon gyi las ni yang dag brtsan/ /brtan pa'i sems kyis mnyam bzhag ste/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bya/ /dang po rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas bri bar bya/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang/ /sngon po 'di

299a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pas gsang ba yi/ /dbang mchog snod gyur slob ma la/ /slob dpon mdun du slob ma de/ /pad+ma zla ba bzhugs bsams la/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyir gsol pa gdab/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur chen po la/ /gtso bo
299a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba bdag la gsol/ /de ltar brjod rjes slob dpon gyis/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /sngon zhing chu la sogs pa yi/ dbang rnams rdzogs nas slob dpon gyis/ /gsang ba'i go 'phang 'di brjod do/ /dam tshig phyag rgya
299b1(rgyud 'grel): rab gsungs pa/ /yid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /gang gi lus kun brtan byed pa/ /sa yi phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /de skad slob ma la smras nas/ /rang dang rig ma lhan cig tu/ /yid dang rjes mthun bza' dang bca' / /btung ba la sogs rjes su
299b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ kha la sogs la ga bur gyis/ /dri zhim mchog tu bsgos pa dang/ /yid 'phrog pa yi dga' ba dang/ /sgeg dang rol sogs sngar byas te/ /kye ma gnyen mchog sogs pa yis/ /lta mos bdag la bskul ba dang/ /dang po gnyis ni snyoms
299b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug bya/ /dga' ba'i bde ba 'byung ba dang/ /nam mkha' gnas pa'i bder gshegs rnams/ /bkra shis glu la sogs pa yis/ /yid la yang dag bskul bsams te/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /
299b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags gnas las byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa yin/ /de skad brjod nas nor bu dbyung/ /mthe bong srin lag gnyis kyi khar/ /bder gshegs zhu ba'i rang bzhin gyi/ /byang chub sems de slob dpon gyis/ /dre dang
299b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i slob ma sbyin/ /des kyang a ho su kha zhes/ /brjod de dga' bas de btung do/ /khams gsum thabs dang shes rab gcig/ bde chen gnyis med ye shes gsal/ /gsal byas slob ma nus ldan 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i slob
299b6(rgyud 'grel): dpon dbang bskur ro/ /de nas cho ga'i rim pa 'dis/ /rjes gnang dbang bskur sbyin bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor pha rol tu/ /sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas te/ /de dbus slob dpon rang nyid ni/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i ting
299b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gnas/ /slob ma bzang pos slob dpon la/ /gus pas yon phul mchod byas la/ /phyag rgyas dbang po gnyis sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor gyis ni 'khor lo kun/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul bstan la/ /dbang bskur 'dod phyir
300a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab/ /rang bzhin slob dpon go 'phang che/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi dbang bskur ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa/ /de ni sems can dpag med don/ /brtul zhugs mchog ni khyod
300a2(rgyud 'grel): drin gyis/ /ji ltar 'dul bzhin bdag bgyid do/ /de ltar gsol ba btab rjes la/ /rdo rje slob dpon dam pa la/ /snyoms 'jug ti nge 'dzin btang nas ni/ /slob ma 'dod lha'i ngo bor bskyed/ /rang lus 'khor lo rnam spros nas/ /
300a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa/ /lag pa'i loms bum pa ni/ /bdud rtsi'i chu dang bkra shis glus/ /dbang ni bskur bar bsams par bya/ /rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs pas/ /sngon bzhin chu la sogs pa nas/ /gsang ba'i dbang
300a4(rgyud 'grel): gis bar dag gis /cho ga rdzogs rjes shes rab la/ /brten pa'i ye shes sbyin bya ste/ sngon bzhin slob ma rang la bstan/ /gzhag ste gus bcas 'di brjod do/ /mdzes pa 'di ni gzung ba dang/ /brten par bde gshegs kun
300a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brtag /'di ni gzungs ma yid dga' ma/ /khyod kyis rtag tu brjod par bya/ /de skad smras la slob dpon gyis/ /phyag rgya dam pa byin brlabs te/ /slob ma de la gtang par bya/ /de ni dngos po thams cad kyi/ /slob dpon nyid
300a6(rgyud 'grel): du de 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob ma stan de la/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa'i/ /bsam gtan gnas dang phyi rang nang/ /gsang la sogs pas mchod bya ste/ /mchod pa gzugs dang sgra sogs kun/ /dmigs med
300a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa rang bzhin no/ /mnyam pa nyid du mos par bya'o/ /de nas gser gyi thur ma yis/ /mig sman byug pa'i tshul du ni/ /mig ni dbye bar bya ba'o/ /oM badzra ne trA pa har paT laM h+rI:/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig
300b1(rgyud 'grel): rten rab rib gsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /de nas me long bstar rjes la/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya'o/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs /ngag cing gsal la
300b2(rgyud 'grel): rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang 'bras las thams cad 'byung/ de skad brjod la chos rnams kun/ /rnam dag sbyor ba gsal ba las/ /ho yis slob ma'i lag pa ru/ /mda' dang gzhu byin nges kyang ni/ /bskyod de
300b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhir 'phen tshul bya/ /steng 'og dbus su de nyid kyis/ /bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal bya/ /de nas yi ge hUM gis ni/ /'khor lo byin la 'di skad brjod/ /deng nas gzung ste 'jig rten la/ /skyod pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /
300b4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pas/ /kun tu sdig med dri med pa'o/ /de tshe lag tu dung byin te/ /khyod kyis the tshom dags med pa/ /sems ni yid gnyis med pa yis/ /chos dung bla na med pa ni/ /dri me med bas kun dga' yis/ /
300b5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi de nyid bsten ba dang/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug ba dang/ /sdad byed bsong byed bskrad pa dang/ /gang gang bshad pa de de rnams/ /yang na dang po'i dbang du kun/ /bsrung dang bza' sogs sdom par bcas/ /cho ga der yang
300b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par 'dod/ /de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /zhugs nas sngon bzhin 'chi med dang/ /bza' btud la sogs kun spyang la/ /lung bstan 'di ni sbyin bya ste/ /lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur
300b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyis/ chos gos tha ma snying khar gzung/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs tshul gyi gnas/ /de nas tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /'di ni das khyod lung bstan yin/ /he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa kun tu sgrub pa yis/ /srid
301a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngan 'gro rnams la bton/ /ha sh+rA a mu ka badzra ta thA ga ta sid d+ha ye/ ho sh+rI a mu ka badzra ta thA ga ta sid d+ha sa ma ya staM/ de tshe he ru ka dpal dang/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang slob dpon bcas/ /mgrin
301a2(rgyud 'grel): cig lung bston bsam par bya/ /de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin bya ba/ /gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /mthong ba dang na bcug pa yi/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur bar/ /khyod ni shin tu di ring nas/ /slob dpon brnyas/
301a3(rgyud 'grel): par mi bya zhing/ /gus pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'ang/ /yongs su btang bar mi bya'o/ /dam tshig sdom pa bsrung phya ste/ /rnam par rtog pas gos med pa/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor gnas pa yis/ /'dod pa'i
301a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan bstan par bya/ /khyod rang sangs rgyas kun rigs skye sa/ /'di ni slob ma dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de nas slob ma dang ldan pas/ /rta dang glang po shing rta dang/ /srog nor rin chen sna tshogs dang/ /nor bu me tog rgyan/
301a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ /phyag byas bla ma dam pa la/ /ma zhen pa yi sems kyis dbul/ /slob dpon mnyes byas de rjes la/ slob mas rdo rje dril gzung la/ /slob dpon dam pas slob ma'i mgor/ /gdugs gzung bkra shis spyod ldan pas
301a6(rgyud 'grel): slob mas dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor/ /de yis rjas la shar phyogs nas/ /phyag byas langs la der gnas la/ rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /bza' btung la sogs dga' ba yi/ /rol mo phul la smon lam
301a7(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /de nas ci bder gshegs su gsol/ /de nas tho rangs dus su ni/ /tshon rtsi la sogs thams cad kun/ /bsdus te gser gyi bum bcug ste/ /chu bo chen por ngor bar bya/ bum pa gzhan rnams ma lus kun/ /
301b1(rgyud 'grel): chu bo chen por bkru bar bya/ /de nas mi 'chi bcu phyed dang/ /ba yi rnam lnga tsan dan dang/ /gur kum sbyar ba'i tshon gyis ni/ /thig mi mngon par dbyi bar bya'o/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sregs ni/ /mi yi las las 'byung ba las/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa/
301b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /sdig pa zhi phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /bum pa ma gsal mtshan med gos skabs med mod kyang/ /rgyud chung dam par slob ma'i mig lam gsal med nas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ma mthong de don gsal ba dang/ /cung zad bla ma'i gdams dag
301b3(rgyud 'grel): la brten rims pa gsal/ /de lam gsal bla ma dam pas bzod par gsol/ /ces pa bsdus pa'i rgyud dag tu/ /rim pa gsal ba ma mthong nas/ /rim pa gsal zhes bya ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor chog
301b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba las/ /de yi bsod nams gang thob pa/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kun/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rim pa gsal ba zhes bya ba nag po spyod pa bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
301b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po karmma badzra dang/ /lo tsa ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las dang po ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /byang chub tu sems brtan
301b6(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pas/ /byang chub bsgrub pa'i lam ma nor ba'i sgo 'jug pa'i thabs/ lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba las bzlog nas/ dge ba'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i rim pa ni dang por gnas yid du 'od bar/ srog chags bsal
