301b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sa la 'jim ba byas la/ maN+Dal gzhung bzhin du byas te/ /oM badzra re khe h+ri zhes brjod cing/ ba'i rdzas 'og ma yang bya'o/ /de ltar maN+Dal byed pa'i dus su phan yon yang brjod par bya ste/ chur bcas lci ba sbyin yin te/
302a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyad nul bya ba tshul khrims yin/ grog mo sogs bsal bzod pa yin/ /bya ba brtson pa brtson 'grus yin/ de rtse gcig pa bsam gtan te/ /ri mo snyoms par shes rab yin/ /thub pa'i maN+Dal byas pas
302a2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin drug 'di dag rnyed par 'gyur/ /lha mi khyad par can skye zla ltar gzi 'phags shing/ /nas kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor bas gang bar skye/ /de nas ni lha
302a3(rgyud 'grel): mi mchog gi khyim du lus bya zhes brjod cing maN+Dal bya'o/ /des na me tog dgram/ mchod pa dang gtor ma bsham/ /lus kyi sgo dag par byas la/ /stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ bdag nyid ltag pa'i lha gang yin du bsgoms la/
302a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlabs la/ pad+ma'i bskor ba dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu blangs te/ brla stengs gnyis su gzhag nas/ hUM dang a(rgyud 'grel): sa rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlabs la/ de kho na nyid 'di? brjod de/ /hUM/ thog mdza' med
302a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po gtso/ /zhes brjod la rdo rje gsor zhing/ /oM mahA badzra hUM/ zhes brjod do/ /dril bu'i de kho na nyid
302a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjod do/ /a srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dod nas dag /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed/ /ces brjod la/ dril bu gsil zhing/ oM badzra g+haDN+Da a(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod
302a7(rgyud 'grel): do/ /de nas oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa rnams kyi steng du hUM dkar po re re bsams la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes brjod pas hUM 'od du zhu nas/ bdud rtsi ru byin gyis brlabs la/
302b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid kyi lha gang yin pa'i snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas/ lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bla ma dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ mchod pa
302b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos su 'byor na dbul te/ oM badzra argaM pra tIts+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes pas yon chab dbul/ /oM pra tyaM pra tItshtsa A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul/ /oM any+tsa mA naM pra tIts+tsha(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /zhes pas zhabs bsil dbal/ oM
302b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ka ma la pra tItshtsa A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ gdan gya'i/ /oM badzra maN+Da la pra tIts+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ maN+Dal gyi'o/ /oM badzra d+hU pa pra tits+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /oM badzra puShpe pra tIts+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra A la ke pra tIts+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra gan d+he pra tIts+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/
302b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ni bi tye pra tIts+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra gI tra pra tIts+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes pas mchod pa rnams phul la/ de nas yan lag bdun pa rnams bya ste/ na mo sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bla ma dam pa dang
302b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag gi 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe/ skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dag tu/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i yas ci bgyis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshegs par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub
302b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang/ so so'i skye bo khyad par can gyi dge ba thams cad la yi rang zhing spro bar bgyid do/ /bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi sangs rgyas dang thig pa
302b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ ji srid du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba bsgrub
303a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i slad du ji srid du mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa de srid du sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag gi theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags bla na med pa'i lam brten bar bgyi'o/ /bdag gi rnam
303a2(rgyud 'grel): par smin pa'i lus kyi dngos po 'di yang zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas mchod par bgyi'o/ /na mo bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por bsdo par bgyi'o/ /de nas bstod pa bya ste/ /sangs rgyas
303a3(rgyud 'grel): gtso la yon tan mchog mnga' ba/ /che dgus mchod cing yon tan sprin tshogs 'dus/ /go 'phangs mchog brnyes ston pa chos char 'bebs/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /skyob ba'i chos la legs pa'i tshoT
303a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i/ /shin tu phan dang bde ba des mdzad gsung/ /'khor brtag bde mya ngan mi 'da' ba' i/ /dam chos dkon mchog de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /dge 'dun tshal mthu rtsa la rmad mda' ba' i/ /bslab gzhi legs bcas
303a5(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bdag gzhan don phyir bsgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa'i/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ de nas gsang sdags dang gzung sdags bzlas/ /de nas mdo gdon/ /bskor
303a6(rgyud 'grel): ba bya/ /gtor ma gtang smon lam gdab po/ /de nas spyan drangs ba'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol te/ /mi dmigs par bsgom mo/ /mdo rgyud rtogs ba'i dgongs pa'i 'grel mdzad cing/ /nyin mongs mi mthun phyogs
303a7(rgyud 'grel): speng thabs bstan nas/ /yon tan mchog rnams rgyud la sbyor mdzad pa/ /dus gsum bla ma rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ /skye zhing skye ba dag ni thams cad du/ /blo ldan rigs bzang nga rgyal med pa dang/ snying rje che zhing
303b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la dad cing/ /rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig la gnas nas/ /mchog dang mthun mong dngos grub myur thob nas/ /'gro ba sems can rnams kyi don byed shog /spyi'i chos spyod slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //oM rje btsun he ru
303b2(rgyud 'grel): ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /thugs rjes sku sprul 'gro don mdzad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug gtso/ /he ru ka la phyag 'tshal stod/ /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum mdzos/ /zhabs gnyis phyed krung gar tshul gyis
303b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /bud d+ha mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod/ /rnam par snad mdzad rab tu dag /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin
303b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni 'od gsal mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /dngos gnyis dag pas gos pa med/ /ratna mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod/ /rdo rje mi 'ching 'dod chags che/ /rnam rtog
303b5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dong chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod/ /rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod/ /
303b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga mkha' 'gro'i bsdod pa rdzogs so// //rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mdog sdon po cher 'bar ba'i/ /'jig rten mche ba gtsigs pa po/ /g.yas ser g.yon ljad rgyab zhal dkar/ /mnyam med sku la phyag
303b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag /rigs btsun rigs pa 'gul nas 'khyud/ /dbu la rigs kyi bdag po bzhugs/ /bde chen sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgeg dang dpa' byad 'jigs su rung/ /drag rgod dang 'jigs
304a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi pa la/ /nyams dgu yon tan khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' i 'od kyis khebs mdzad cing/ /'jigs pa po yang 'jigs par mjed/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /bder gshegs
304a2(rgyud 'grel): sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yas g.yon dang po mda' dang gzhu/ /lhag mthong ba kha TwAM 'dzin/ /mgo phreng brgya phyed do shal byas/ /mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbu skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng/ /ka pA la lngas dbul brgyan/ na ra
304a3(rgyud 'grel): stod g.yogs stag wags bsnams/ /'jigs dung khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin kun gyi mchog /sku la mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs/ /'gro ba'i don ni mdza pa po/ /sku gsum bdag nyid khyod la 'dud/ /khyod
304a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi ye shes spyan zur gyis/ /mi mthun phyogs rnams skrag mdzad cing/ /rgyal mtshan dril bus slar gso mdzad/ /thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga bdag nyid/ /bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso/ /
304a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po/ /stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang/ /de nyid brtan par g.yo bcas pa/ /khams gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod la 'dud/ /'gro ba'i
304a6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal sel byed cing/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun ster ba/ /byang chub lam ni ston pa po/ /ye shes sku khyod phyag 'tshal stod/ /bsam med dpe dang bral bas brjod du med/ /bde chen sku ste mi 'gyur bdus ma byas/ /dngos dang dngos
304a7(rgyud 'grel): med rnam spangs dmigs pa med/ /bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stong/ /shar phyogs lha mo rdo rje'i rigs/ /byams pa'i bdag nyid sku mdog sto/ /sa khams me long ye shes bdag /rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
304b1(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs lha me rin chen rigs/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid sku mdog ser/ /chu khams mnyam nyid ye shes bdag /rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod/ /nub phyogs lha mo pad+ma'i rigs/ /dga' ba'i bdag nyid sku mdog dkar/ /me khams so sor rtog
304b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byang phyogs lha mo las kyi rigs/ /btang snyoms rang bzhin sku mdog ljang/ /rlung khams bya ba grub rang bzhin/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stod/ /thams cad bzhi phyag bzhi ma/ /phyag na
304b3(rgyud 'grel): rang rang mchen ma 'dzin/ /mtshan dang dpe byang sku la rdzogs/ /rigs lda'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal stod/ /sku la 'ong kyi phreng ba 'phro/ /mi mgo khrag 'jig do shal byas/ /zhabs gnyis nyi la phyred krung bzhugs/ /'khor gyi lha mo phyag 'tshal stong/
304b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rnam pa lnga dang ldan/ /klu s? la wa? thar du la brgyan/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /lha mo'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rje btsun 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bdag gis bstod ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /sems can kun gyis sdes
304b5(rgyud 'grel): btsun gyi/ /go 'phangs bla med thob par shog /rje btsun dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so// //gang zhig che 'phos te bdun tshigs kyi dus su dge rtsa byed na/ /ming byang dam gos la sos pa'i mtshan ma cig la
304b6(rgyud 'grel): brten bcas la/ de nas maN+Dal bya ba dang/ mchod pa dang gtor ma gzhung bzhin du bshams te/ de nas bdag lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsgoms la/ /mchod pa'i khyad
304b7(rgyud 'grel): par rnams kyis mchod/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma bsdos la/ /de nas bstod pa dang 'dod pa'i don gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi snying kha'i sa bon gyi 'od zer sbros te/ cho 'das kyi sems yi ge a thung du'i gzugs
305a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyi lcags kyus bkug la/ rten gang yin bde la bstims te/ rnam smin gyi lus de nyid du bsams te/ bdag gi snying kha'i sa bon gyis 'od zer spros te/ bsgrub bya'i snying khar thim pas/ /las dang nyon mongs
305a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bags chags kyi sgrib pa sbyangs nas/ lus shel dag pa dad 'dra ba bsam mo/ /de nas nam mkha' bsgroms pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rigs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag na bsnams pa'i bum pa'i bdud btsi'i chu rgyun rnams
305a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbang bskur te bskur te bkrus pas/ /sgrib pa thams cad byang bar bsam/ /de nas bzlas pa bya ste/ bdag gi snying kha'i sa bon gyi yi ge las/ bzlas pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba la sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du bskor bar bsams la/ de nas phred sngags
305a4(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa'i bzlas pa byes pas/ sngags kyi phreng pa la 'od zer phros pas/ bsgrub bya'i snying khar thim nas lus ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad sbyangs par bsam zhing bzlas pa'o/ /de nas smon lam gdab cing
305a5(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo/ /de nas bsgrub bya'i shes pa a thung du de yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bteg nas/ nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i gtso bo'i thugs dkar thim par bsam ste/ /gnas bstab pa'o/ /gal te brten med par gyur na/
305a6(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa'i rnam smin gyi lus de nyid mngon sum dang 'dra bar bsams la/ bsam rgyud gong ma bzhin du bya'o/ /de ltar bdun ba thams cad la bya'o/ /slob dpon chen po nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //tshtsha gang ba ba'i man ngag
305a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dang po 'dzim pa byas nas mdun du bzhag ste rang nyid ltag pa'i ltar bsams la/ /chad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas chos nyid rnams par dag pa'i sdags kyis 'dzim pa mid migs par bsgoms la/ /cho ga gsum gyi
305b1(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka yab yum gyi bskyed do/ /de nas snying kha'i h+ri(rgyud 'grel): 'am hUM gi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bkug la/ he ru ka yab yum la bstim par bya/ /de nas yab yum stoms par zhugs pa las 'od du zhu ste/ byang
305b2(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems su gnas pa las he ru ka'i snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig gis byin gyis brlabs te/ yang de nyid kyis gdab par bya'o/ /sa tsha re re yang he ru ka re rer bsam la/ de re re las he ru ka mang po spro ba dang/ bsdu ba byas pa las/ bdag dang gzhan
305b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi don rdzogs par bsam mo/ /de nas rten 'brel gyi sdags kyis 'jug bsdu ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mA yA oM ta kra ma/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rdzog pa'i rim pa/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la
305b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyu na badzra swa b+hA Ata ma ko haM/ zhes brjod pas dngos po thams cad rnam par dag nas/ so sor rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid thig le yungs kar tsam zhig tu gsal bar bsgom/ /de nas thig le de las 'od zer 'phros
305b5(rgyud 'grel): pas sems can thams cad kyi lus dang dag dang yid kyi rnam rtog thams cad bsregs nas/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i bskur gsal par byas te/ de nas slar 'dus te thig le la thim nas thig le de yang 'ong du zhubs rdo rje gur dang dur khrong brgyad dang/
305b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang dang/ lha mo bzhi dang ldan pa sgyu 'phrul chen mo bskyed do de nas de dag kyang sgyu 'phrul chen mo la bsdu ste/ rdo grur ni dur khrod la tim dur khrod brgyad gzhal yas khang la thim/ gzhal yas khang lha mo bzhi la thim/ lha mo bzhi rig ma'i zhal bzhir
305b7(rgyud 'grel): thim/ yig ma thabs la tham pa dang/ de nas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i snying kha'i pad+ma'i nang na gnas pa'i mi ge A'i gzugs de pad+ma dmar po'i 'dab ma bzhi par bsams par bya'o/ /de yi lte ba gsang ba na gnas pa'i rlung dang/ snying kha na gnas
306a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chu'i rlung rnam par dag pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsams te/ de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang rin chen mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyi rang bzhin no/ /de'i steng du rang gi rig pa'i ngo bo nyid sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i 'od kyi thig le yungs
306a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru tsam 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa gcig bsam mo/ /de'i steng du mgrin pa na gnas pa'i me'i rlung dang/ spyi bor gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis rnam par dag pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsams la/ de ni pad+ma mkha' 'gro dang/
306a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i rang bzhin no/ /de ltar bskyed nas nyi zla gnyis kyi bar na/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid thig le de 'od zer lnga dang ldan par dmigs par bsams mo/ /de ltar yang dang yang du 'dris par
306a4(rgyud 'grel): bsams pas gyen du rgyu ba dang thur du rgyu ba'i rlung rim pa ji ltar 'gog pa de bzhin du mtshan ma rigs kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i sa snying kha na gnas pa'i chu la thim pas ni/ /kun mnyam pa'i blos zag pa med pa'i lam
306a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi ye shes dang po skye'o/ chu me la thim pas ni sems la dbang thob ste du ba dang 'dra bar mthong ngo/ /me rlung la thim pas ni ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig dang ldan te glog gi rnam pa lta bur mthong ngo/ /rlung rnam par rig pa la thim pas 'dod pa thams cad
306a6(rgyud 'grel): bral te mar me lta bur mthong/ /rnam par rig pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bde ba la thim pas thams cad snang ba rang rig pa nam mkha' lta bur mthong ngo/ /rang rig pa sprin med pa'i nam mkha' lta bus smon lam dang snying rje chen po'i dbang gis 'gro
306a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don du gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis su snang bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du'o/ /slob dpon chos kyi zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rdzogs pa'i rims pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //
306b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po zhi ba bzang po dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mA yA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sgyu
306b2(rgyud 'grel): ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi sku/ /phyogs bzhi po na gzhen rnams la/ /sgyu 'phrul che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid/ /snying rjes
306b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i rnam pa can/ /sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya yi/ /sgrub thabs legs pa bshad par bya/ /'dir bsgom pa'i dbang du byas te/ /lha mo bzhi'i glu bzhis bskul nas rnam par sad pa'i sngags pas nang par sngar langs te/ rang gi snying kha'i nyi
306b4(rgyud 'grel): ma la gnas pa/ hUM yig ge 'od zer rnams kyis bdag sbyad ba dang/ kha dag pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /hUM phaT zhes bya bas gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba bya ste/ bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs la/ hUM yig gis yon chab la bzlas zhing
306b5(rgyud 'grel): stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bltas la/ snying kha'i sngags kyi 'od zer las byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad lnga yis yang dag par mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste/
306b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa dang/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bdag gi dge ba thams cad kyang bla na med pa
306b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang/ byang chub kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ba ni/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos dkon mchog dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog la'o/ /e ma'o sems can thams
307a1(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi don phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shin tu mthar phyin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ bla na med pa'i de bzhin gsheT
307a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes 'di dag ni sems nyid de/ med pa nyid rnam pa dang des snang ba'o/ /'di lta ste/ rmi lam lta bur mos pa byas la/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' lta bu snad ba med
307a3(rgyud 'grel): pa mdza' yas pa gsal ba tsam du blta ste/ oM shU n+ya tA dzA na badzra swa b+hA ba ata ma kohaM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la mdun gyi nam mkhar hUM yig gis sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la/ de'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'phrod
307a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis 'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang/ phyogs su rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ steng du rdo rje'i gur dang/ nang du mi'i rus pa'i dur khrod bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su gzhal yas khang khyams gcig pa rin po che thams cad kyi bdag nyid can
307a5(rgyud 'grel): blta'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa'o/ /dra ba la sogs lha mo bzhis/ /stegs bu bzhir ni brgyan pa'o/ /de'i dbus su pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams te/ de'i lte bar thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i
307a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i thig le mu tig 'bras bu ltar bsal bar bya'o/ /de ltar na 'di ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /dbus kyi thig le de nyid las phyogs rnams su thig le rnams spros pas/ sa bon gyi rnam pa yongs su gyur par
307a7(rgyud 'grel): blta ba ni/ go rims bzhin du hUM dang swa dang a dang/ ha zhes bya'o/ /de dag las go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang nor bu dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs can dang/ de'i rigs rnams yang dag par spro ba dang/ yang de nyid la bsdus nas
307b1(rgyud 'grel): de yongs su gyur pa las rnal 'byor ma bzhi blta ste/ shar gyi 'dab ma la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog sngon mo zhal sngo ba dang ser ba dang dkar po dang ljang khu/ rdo rje dang thod pa dang dril bu dang dbyug to 'dzin ma'o/ /lho'i 'dab ma la rin chen mkha' 'gro
307b2(rgyud 'grel): ma sku mdog ser mo/ /zhal ser ba dang sngo ba dang dkar po dang kdzaM bu rin chen sna tshogs dang rtse gsum dang mgrin pa bsdams ba'i lce sbyang dang pa dan 'dzin ma'o/ /nub kyi 'dab ma la pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog dkar mo/ /zhal dkar ba dang ser ba dang sngo
307b3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ ljang khu sna tshogs pad+ma dang mda' dang thod pa dang gzhu 'dzin ma'o/ /byang gi 'dab ma la sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma sku mdog ljang khu/ zhal ljang khu ser ba dang dkar ba dang sngo ba'o/ /ral gri dang cad ti'u dang zhags pa dang thod pa 'dzin
307b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /thams cad zla ba'i gdan dang 'od/ /lhag ma 'di yi gtso bo bzhin/ /rdo rje 'di yis ni glu 'di yis/ /de rnams mgon po bzhengs byed yin/ ha le sa hi b+ha i i a ka ma lu ba b+ho hi u badzdze/ a la la la la ho ma hU su he Na/
307b5(rgyud 'grel): A rA hi u Ne d+he/ ra bi ki ra Ni Na bi phu l+li u ka ma lu ma hA su he Na/ a la la la la ho/ /mahA su he Na/ A rA hi u Ne t+taM/ de nas glu blangs pa'i nus pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi thig le'i gzugs de bor nas sa bon gnyis
307b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis rnam par 'gyur te/ oM dang hUM ngo/ de nas oM yig las rnam par snang mdzad dang/ de'i rigs spro ba dang bsdu ba'o/ /hUM yig las rgyal ba lnga dang/ de'i rigs rnams kyang do/ /de nas oM yig las byung ba'i sangs rgyas mkha' 
307b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma dang/ lhan cig pa bcom ldan 'das he ru ka hUM yig las bskyed par bya'o/ /thal bas byugs shing sku mdog gnag /nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od kyis mdzes/ /dbugs skra khams pa gyen du brdzes/ /thod pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa
308a1(rgyud 'grel): sngo dang ser dang dkar ba che/ ljang khu'i zhal dang bzhi pa'o/ /thod pa mda' dang khaTwAM ga dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste bzhi'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan can/ /lag gdub dang ni ske rags
308a2(rgyud 'grel): so/ mi yi lpags pa'i na bza' 'dzin/ /bcu gnyis sbyan te dmar ba'o/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrugs pas khro/ /mchog tu dga' bas mjes pa yin/ /skyil krungs phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /gar dgu yi ni nyams dang ldan/ /'od
308a3(rgyud 'grel): zer mdza' yas las byung ba'i/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis 'gro don byas/ /bdag po dang mtshungs mtshon cha dmar/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dmar/ /ser dang dkar dang ljang khu'i zhal/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur ri khrod ma/ /
308a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar dgyes pa'i rdo rjer gsungs/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma/ /he ru ka dang yang dag ldan/ /'dir dmar sangs rgyas sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas sku yis mchod pa'i phyir/ /chos dag pa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /gsung gi
308a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag po dkar po nyid/ /'dir lha thams cad kyang ro'i snying kha mnan pa'o/ /de'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das kyi mig gi dbang po la oM yig dmar po/ rna ba'i dbang po la hUM yig sngon po/ /sna'i dbang po la ci yig ser po/ /lce'i dbang po
308a6(rgyud 'grel): la a yig dkar po/ /gtsug tor gyi gnas su re pa ljang khu/ /yid la khe yig dkar po bsam bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ste/ dbang po drug tu yi ge drug bkod pa ni go cha 'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba ni/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs
308a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ go rims bzhin du mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang snying kha ro/ /nu ma'i par du nyi ma la gnas pa'i rang gi lha'i sa bon ye shes kyi rang bzhin blta ste/ de'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la hUM yig gis
308b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad cing yon chab dbul lo/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM paM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dgug pa dang bzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba'o/ /de dang lhan cig tu 'dres par gyur ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor blta'o/ /de nas ye shes kyi sa bon gyi 'od
308b2(rgyud 'grel): zer rnams bskul bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis btang ba'i rnal 'byor ma lnga 'ongs te/ ye shes lnga'i chu yis bkang ba'i rin po che'i bum pas bcom ldan 'das dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur bas
308b3(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bskyed par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin du rtag pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rin chen bdag po dang gsung gi bdag po dang don yong grub pa'o/ /
308b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas ye shes kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi sgo nas yo byad lnga dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i mchod pa rnams kyis bcom ldan dang bcom ldan 'das ma mchod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo'i zhal nas bstod pa/ mche ba gtsigs shing
308b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs chen po/ /sgyu ma'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste/ /sha chen po ni gsol bar mdzad/ /he ru ka dpal bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de nas kyi lha mo rnams spros pa'i sbyor bar sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mar nub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di'i mgo po dang
308b6(rgyud 'grel): snying kha dang/ lte ba dang gsang ba dang/ brla dag tu ro rims bzhin du/ /oM hUM swa A(rgyud 'grel): hA zhes pa de rnams rnam par bsgom mo/ /de rnams gcig la gcig spros pas/ 'di'i lus mngon par khyab par byas pa des/ h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig las
308b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dmar po/ /A(rgyud 'grel): yi ge las skyes pa mu tig lta bu'i ze 'bru dang/ de bzhin du hUM yid las skyes pa'i nor bu dang/ a nu rwa ga ya mi zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dga' ba rab tu bsam mo/ /de nas nor bu gnyis kyis 'od zer bskul bas/ /
309a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon nas khar rab tu zhugs te/ zhu zhing pad+ma'i nang du lhung ba de ni ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi ste/ lce rtser zil pas len par byed par bsam zhes bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba
309a2(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bskal pa'i sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa lnga dang/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi sku'i sprin spros pa rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ni go rims bzhin du me long lta bu'i ye
309a3(rgyud 'grel): shes dang/ shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang/ bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i go 'phang thob pa bskyed cing/ rang gi sku'i sprin rnams
309a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i sku ru bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o/ /gang gi tshe yang rnal 'byor pa/ sems brtan par byed par 'dod pas/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad myur du rdzogs par byed pa de'i tshe/ mdor bsdus nas ting nge 'dzin gsum po
309a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bar bya'o/ /lte ba'i pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru la zla ba dang nyi ma'i kha sbyor mdza' skor mtshams med bar bsam ste/ de'i dbus su yungs kar phra mo tsam la dkar zhing gsal ba ye shes kyi thig le'i gzugs bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dpa' bo/
309a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'od zer gyi ri mo pad+ma'i skud pa lta bu zla ba'i dbus nas byung bas kha sbyor gyi ngos gnyis lan gsum dkris shing bcings te gnas par blta'o/ /zla ba'i steng du gnas pa dkris pa gsum gyi phyed la so sor
309a7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bcu drug gis brgyus pa blta'o/ /dpal sngo mi pa bla ma las gsungs pa/ ka yig la sogs nga yi mthar/ /da nya spangs te dgod par bya/ /d+ha yi la sogs k+Sha'i mthar phreng ba gnyis po mnyam par bri/ /dbus su a yi phreng ba ste/
309b1(rgyud 'grel): dgong bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhes bya'o/ /'dir yang gsungs pa/ bzang po yi ge'i phreng ba yid zhes bya ba'o/ /de ltar lte ba'i pad+ma ze'u 'brul/ /nyi ma dang zla ba kha sbyar gyi nang du dpa' bo bsgom par bya'o/ /bsgoms pa yongs su smin par mos par bya
309b2(rgyud 'grel): ba de'i phyir/ gnyis pa nyid de 'od zer phra mo'i ri mo 'bar zhing gcig gyen du 'bar ba'i gnas skabs blta'o/ /de'i 'od gyis 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsis gang ba thob pa'i dpa' bo dang 'od zer de yang 'dra ba'o/ /de nas dpa' bo nges par byas pas ji srid sems
309b3(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa thob pa'i mtshan ma nye bar mtshon pa de srid du bsta'o/ /nye bar mtshon pa brtan pa bde ba'i tshe/ 'od zer gyi ri mo gsal bar snang bas sna tshogs pa snang bar bsam ste/ thams cad lag mthil gyi skyu ru ra bzhin du blta'o/ /ting nge 'dzin
309b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad myur du rdzogs bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ thig le'i rnal 'byor ro/ /rig pa bzlas pa'i dngos grub ces pas bzlas pa brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin du lha drug gi 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ lte bar pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru la gnas
309b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyi ma dang zla ba kha sbyar gyi nang du dpa' bo bsam par bya'o/ /de nyid kyi 'od zer gyi ri mo la yi ge'i phreng ba gsum gyis brgyud pa de la kha sbyor dkris shing bcings par sngags kyis bzlas par bya'o/ /rgyud 'dir sngags kyi yi ge gsum ste/ de la
309b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags ni oM hUM hUM ngo/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin du oM oM hUM ngo/ oM hUM hUM ngo/ /oM swA hUM oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ngo/ /oM hA hUM ngo/ /ji ltar bzlas pa bya zhe na/ kha sbyar gyi nang du bzlas par bya ste/ sa bon gyi yi ge
309b7(rgyud 'grel): bkod la/ de'i mgo bor dpa' bo blang bar bya'o/ /oM yig brjod pa ni/ dpa' bo las 'od zer gyi ri mo dbugs 'byung ba'i rlung dang lhan ci ka steng du song ba des snang bar byas nas/ 'gro ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid du bya'o/ /sa bon gyi
310a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge hUM brjod pa na/ sangs rgyas de thams cad rang gi lha'i rang bzhin du mos par bya'o/ /tha ma'i hUM yig brjod pa na/ dbugs rdub pa'i rlung dang lhan cig 'gug pa sangs rgyas kyis bdag nyid 'gro bde rnams dpa' bo
310a2(rgyud 'grel): la bsdu bar bya'o/ /de ltar ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du yang dang yang du bya'o/ /skye na ngal bso te/ dge ba 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi ched du yongs su bsngo'o/ /snga ma
310a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du mchod pa bya ste/ rang gi snying kha'i yi ge la dkyil 'khor nub par bya'o/ /de nas langs nas/ rang gi lha'i ngo bor bdag nyid mos par bya zhing/ byed pa thams cad dang bza' ba thams cad sa bon lnga ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid du bya
310a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rang gi snying khar lha'i 'khor lor mos par bsam par bya'o/ /lce'i hoM gzar las 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi bsreg par bya'o/ /khrus byed pa na lha'i dbang bskur ba'i cho gar mos par bya'o/ /nyi ma phyed dang rgongs ka'i dus su dkyil 'khor
310a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi khang par zhugs shing/ rang gi snying kha'i 'od zer gyis rten gyi dkyil 'khor sprul par bya'o/ /de nas sa bon de nyid las rnal 'byor ma bzhi po rims kyis spros te/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /snga ma bzhin du dbang la
310a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa cho ga thams cad rjes su bsgrub pa dang dkyil 'khor nub par bya'o/ /de nas langs pa na snga ma bzhin du mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor bya'o/ /nam phyed kyi dus su khyad par 'di yin te/ yang dag par mchod pa dang
310a7(rgyud 'grel): yon chab phul te/ oM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba dang/ rang gi ye shes kyis bon la dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor nub pa dang/ snang ba med pa'i byang chub kyi sems su mos par byas pas nyal lo
310b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar nyi ma gzhan la yang lha mo'i glus bskul nas ldang ba dang thams cad snga ma bzhin bya'o/ /de ltar nyin re bzhin du ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ma rnyed pa de srid du'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags 'bum bzlas pas 'grub po/ /
310b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma ni khra bzlas pas 'grub po/ /phreng ba'i sngags ni rgyud gzhan las blang bar bya'o/ /de thams cad rang gi snying khar nyi ma 'am zla ba la ci rigs par zlum por byas la/ mar me'i phreng ba bzhin 'bar ba sems kyis mngon par bris shing/
310b3(rgyud 'grel): yig kyi brjod pa bzhin bzlas pa bya'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs/ bdag gis smras las gang skyes pa'i/ /dge ba des bdag sangs rgyas sna tshogs don grub dbang ldan shog /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal rin chen 'byung gnas
310b4(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Ti ta chen po zhi ba bzang po dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dgos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cid zhus te gtan la phab ba'o// /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /
310b5(rgyud 'grel): shI he ru ka ma hA badzra a ts+tsha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ sarba DA kINShi naM/ h+ri(rgyud 'grel): da ya hUM phaT/ oM bud d+ha DA kI nI pra tI ts+tsha maM ba laM hUM oM/ oM badzra DA kI nI pratIts+tsha maM thaM li hUM hUM/ oM ratana Da kI nI pra tits+tsha
310b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ba la hUM a pad+ma DA kA nI pra tIts+tsha maM ba la hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM bi sha DA kI nI pratIts+tsha maM ba la hUM ha(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba DA kI nI yo gi ni pra tIts+tsha maM ba liM hUM ha ha ha ha h+rAM(rgyud 'grel): de ltar na gtor ma'i tshig ga'o// //sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil
310b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi chog bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mA yA swa d+ha na maN+Da la baDhi/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
311a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig dus chu yi mdog can brgyad phyed zhal/ phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis bdud kyi snying khar mnan/ /rang rig 'od kyis 'khril cing bde gang yin/ /bder gshegs kun 'bod rdo rje
311a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la 'dud/ /skye bo rtog pa'i dba' rlabs g.yengs pa yis/ /so so'i gzhung mangs blta bar mi nus phyir/ /lung dang man ngag rig pas gzhung bkod de /mdor bsdus dran pa tsam gyis dri bar bya/ /de ltar re zhig dang por slob ma
311a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i snod dang skal par ldan pa ni/ /de yang 'jam zhing snyan smra snying rjer ldan/ /dge ba'i las la mngon par brtson/ /theg pa che la lhag par dang/ /rgyun du bla ma la gus shing/ /sbyin dang gtong la mngon dga' ba/ /slob ma de ni
311a4(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gzung/ /de bsan mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan pa'i slob mas dbang nod pa'i 'os su gyur ba'i bla ma la gsol pa gdab par bya ste/ de yang brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang zhid g.yo rgyu med/ /gsang sngags rgyud
311a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyor la mkhas/ /des ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de bas na de lta bu dang ldan pa'i slob dpon la lan gnyis nas gsum gyis bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis gal te khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas dang/
311a6(rgyud 'grel): yo byad 'di dang 'di la sogs pa 'byor rab mi 'byor zhes dri bar bya'o/ /de nas de dag 'byor par khas len na/ de'i tshe gnang ba byin la slob ma sbyang zhing bsrung ba bya ste/ slob ma'i rkang mthil du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gsang bar
311a7(rgyud 'grel): ri las me'i dkyil 'khor/ snying khar las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig pa'i do bo pa'am/ ka nag po gcig bsams la/ de nas rlung gis me spar ba snying kha'i ka bsregs te/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba thams cad sbyangs
311b1(rgyud 'grel): par bsams la/ /slob ma'i gnas gsum du 'bru gsum bkod la/ 'khor lo can gyi sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa bzlas te bsrung ba bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis bsnyen pa la 'jug ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa dang gtor ma la sogs
311b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bshams/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bltas la/ mchod pa la sogs pa bya/ de nas lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas bzlas pa bya ste/ 'khor lo brta? gyis 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas la/ lha mo rnams kyi khri khrag phrag re re
311b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas so/ /de nas yang sa mchod la sogs pa byas la/ grogs bzang po dag dang bcas pas sa brtag cing sbyang bar bya ste/ de yang gtsug lag khang dang tshong 'dus dang/ ldum ra grong dam grong khyer gyi/ /shar dang byang gi sa yi char/ /mnyam
311b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gzhag cing gzung bar bya/ /de bas na/ de dag tu brtags pa 'am/ yang na dur khrod dang nags tshal la sogs pa gang dang gang yid du 'ong ba'i gnas der sa byang bar bya ste/ de la 'ang gnyis te/ phyi sbyang ba dang/ nang gi sbyang ba'o/ /
311b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi la yang gnyis te/ las kyis sbyang ba ni bzhi pa'i thab khung du mi rung gi bye ma la sogs pas sbyin sregs byas la/ nye bar zhi bar byas la/ bya bas sbyang ba ni de yang bus nub tsam du brkos nas ni/ sa de nyid kyis dgang bar byas/ /
311b6(rgyud 'grel): gal te lhag par gyur na ni/ /dngos grub yod par 'dod pa yin/ /de bas na pus nub tsam du brkos la sa'i skyon rnams bsal nas/ de nyid kyis legs par bkang ste gzhung dang mthun par byas la/ de nas chu'i ltas bstan par bya ste/ de
311b7(rgyud 'grel): yang/ mtho gang zlum por brkos nas ni/ /ba yis byugs la chu yis dgang/ /ma yengs sems kyis shar phyin la/ /slar log ltas ni brtag par bya/ /de bas na chu'i ltas rab 'bring gsum brtags la/ de nas dri zhim po dang bcas
312a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sas khung bu legs par bkang nas/ rin po che lnga dang 'bru lngas sa'i dbus su bcug la legs par bcags te/ ba'i rdzas lngas byug cing nye 'khor du me tog sril ma bkram pa dang/ phyogs
312a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su bdan dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa btsugs la/ las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gtor ba ni bya bas sbyang ba'o/ /nang gi sbyang ba ni nang la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos nyid kyi sngags bzlas te stong
312a3(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid du bsgoms la/ de'i dang las yi ge hUM las rdo rje'i sa bzhir bsgoms la/ oM me di ni badzri b+ha ba ban d+ha hUM zhes pas byin brlab pa'o/ /de nas sa bslang ste/ mchod pa bshams la sa'i dbus su lha'i ting de 'dzin la gnas pa
312a4(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po dmigs te/ lag pa g.yas pas la brdabs pas sa gas pa'i ser gnas/ sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo/ zhi ba'i bzhin can phyag gnyis kyis bum pa 'dzin pa cig byung bar bsams la/ mchod sa dang gtor ma phul te/
312a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru kas mchod cing sna tshogs rin chen 'dzin/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ sa 'dir dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /zhes sa blangs la/ de nas gsol ba gdab ste/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis
312a6(rgyud 'grel): sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi stobs bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gi bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri zhes brjod la de nyid du thim par bsam
312a7(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /sa gzung pa ni slob dpon sa'i dbus su 'dug ste/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ cod ban la sogs pas brgyan te/ rdo rje dril bu gzung ste dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la slob ma bzhis rgyan cha dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas
312b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhir bsgoms la/ phyogs bzhi nas gsol ba gdab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo bshad du gsol/ /
312b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid thams cad yag dag rdzogs/ /mtshan med thams cad yang dag spangs/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzang po
312b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /de nas bdag lha'i nga rgyal bsgyings pa
312b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas mig g.yas par a las zla ba g.yon par Ta las nyi ma bsams te/ rkang pa'i mthil du hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje gdangs pa bsgoms la /dbang ldan du song la rdo rje gsor te/ hUM ring po brjod la/ ding slob dpon sa phyogs 'dir
312b5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i don du las 'di btsam gyis/ /'di na gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang dri za dang sha za dang srin po la sogs pa gang dag gnas pa'i sa'i bdag po rnams myur dengs shig /'di ltar dpal he ru ka'i bka' thos nas myur ba
312b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid du song shig /gang bdag mi 'gro ba de dag la nga'i rdo rje dang bcas pa'i kha TAM ga 'dis mgo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par bya'o zhes bya ba lan gsum du brjod nas de nas yang rdo rje gsor nas/ hUM lus ngag sems dang ldan pa'i/ /bgegs kyi tshoD
312b7(rgyud 'grel): kun nga la nyon/ /nga ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i kha TAM gas/ /sku gsum las byung dags par bya/ /gal te bdag tshig las 'das na/ /zhig 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /g.yas brkyang
313a1(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon brkyang la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis kun tu bskor zhing bcags la/ seng lder gi phur pa sor brgyad pa la tsan dan dmar po bskus te/ me tog dmar po btags pa dgu /dbus dang phyogs mtshams
313a2(rgyud 'grel): su dgu btab la/ lha la phyag bya'o/ /sa bsrung ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su gnas la bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ rab dang dra ba dang sa gzhi la sogs pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms la/ snying kha nas bgegs
313a3(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed/ stong khro bo/ smad phur bu'i dbyibs can du 'byung ste/ oM g+ha g+ha/ g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba du Sh+Ta phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pa paM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha rod A dz+nya pa yA ti/ kA ya ba gtsi t+ta badzra kI
313a4(rgyud 'grel): la ya hUM hUM phaT zhes pas bgegs rnams phur bu btab ste/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pa dang 'bru gsum bzlas pas bya'o/ /de nas lha sta gon la gnas pa'i bdung rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim po'i chus dbus su sor bcu pa gru
313a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhir byugs la/ phyogs bzhir lha mo rnams kyi gnas su ni sor drug pa'i zlum por byas la/ so sor me tog re re gzhag ste/ snying kha'i sa bon gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lon mkha' la bkug la mchod pa'i khyad par gyis mchod de/
313a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la bstod pa bya ste/ mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che/ /sngags kyi me tog 'phreng bas rgyan/ /sha chen rtag tu gsol mdzed pa'i/ /he ru ka la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /
313a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal stong/ /mi bskyod pa yi ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bstod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' i
313b1(rgyud 'grel): dri ma med/ /dngos nyid dag pas gos med pa'i/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje dag
313b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gdon mi za/ /bsam pa thams cad rab rdzogs byed/ /sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod ces pas bstod la/ de nas bskor ba byas la bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i bdug spos lag tu thogs te/ bus mo
313b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs la/ 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab ste/ he ru ka dpal dpa' bo'i mchog /rig pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /khyed rnams la ni mchod pa dang/ /slob ma rnams la brtse bya'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs
313b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdag nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni bsgrub par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnang bar mdzad par 'os/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo'i don mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan dang byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcoM
313b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sngags kyi lha gzhan gang lags dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gar yang 'byung po mthu chen dang/ /gang dag rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol/ /rdo rje che ge/?
313b6(rgyud 'grel): mong dag gis/ /he ru ka 'byung dkyil 'khor mchog /yo byad ci 'byor ba bdag gis/ /'gro ba dag phyir bdag sgrub na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs rje thugs dpag mdzad nas kyang/ /dkyil 'khor par bcas thams cad kyis/ /byin
313b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab pa ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /de nas las kyi bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i bum pa mtshan dang ldan pa gcig dri zhim pos byugs te/ las thams cad pa'i mtshan
314a1(rgyud 'grel): ma bris la/ de nyid kyi sngags kyi nyungs kar gyi brdeg go /gu gul gyis gdugs la der chu dang 'bru dang sman dang rin po che rnams rtsal te/ kha rgyan dang mgul mchings dang phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan la/ de nas
314a2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid du bsgom/ de'i ngang las paM las pad+ma/ baM las bum pa/ de'i nang du pad+ma la gnas pa'i khro bo bskyed la snying kha'i sa bon gyis ye shes kyi khro bo bkug ste bcug nas/ mchod pa dang gtong ma gtang pa dang/ kha brgyan gyi
314a3(rgyud 'grel): steng du rdo rje gzhag ste/ las thams cad pa'i sngags 'bru gsum dang sbel ba bzlas la/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal pos/ /bdag cag gi las 'di ma grub kyis bar du bgegs thams cad zlog cig ces brjod la sgo phyogs su
314a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhag go /slob ma sta gon la gnas pa ni sngar bstan pa ltar shin brtags pa'i slob ma khrus byas la gos gsar pa bgos nas maN+Dal byas te/ lan na me tog dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor gyi drung du gzhag te/ bus mo btsugs
314a5(rgyud 'grel): ste thal mo sbyar nas gnas pa la/ slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod de/ sngags kyi dngos grub don de gang/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/ /bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan/ /gang dag 'jig rten pha rol gnyer/ /dad pa
314a6(rgyud 'grel): chen por ldan pa dag /'jig rten pha rol la dmigs la/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor gzhug bya ste/ /'di yi 'bras bu gnyer mi bya/ /gal te 'di 'bras don gnyer na/ /'jig rten pha rol 'grub mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol la dmigs
314a7(rgyud 'grel): na/ 'bad pa med par 'di 'bras 'grub ces bya ba bsgrags la/ de nas slob mas 'di skad gsol ba gdab ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yongs 'khyung ba'i/ /dpa' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste/ /slob dpon chen po dgongs su gsol/
314b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /bdag la byang chub sems gi gnon/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i
314b2(rgyud 'grel): grod mchog du/ /mgon po bdag ni bzhug tu gsol/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la 'di skad brjod do/ /bu tshur shog cig theg chen gyi/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin pa/ /sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga rnams/ /khyod la yang dag
314b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa kun/ /de dag gi ni gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga yis ni 'di bsgoms nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams
314b4(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa mchen med brnyes/ /shA kyi seng gi sbo mchog gis/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pas/ /drag po chen po bdud kyi ste/ /dpung chen dag kyang nges bcom nas/ 'jig rten mthun par gshegs nas su/ /'khor lo bskor
314b5(rgyud 'grel): nas myang ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yi blo gros 'di byos shig ces brjod la/ de nas slob mas sems bskyed cing/ sdom pa gzung ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshaT
314b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i dge la yi rangs te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ /de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying kha rnams su/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas khu tshur g.yas pas rdo rje
314b7(rgyud 'grel): gzungs la/ tsan dan gyi chu dang bcas pas spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas gsum du yi ge 'bru gsum brjod cing nye reg bya'o/ /de nas sngags dang bcas pas spyi bor me tog mdun du smos mig sngar mar me byin la/ de nas so shing a shwa t+tha la
315a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa las byung ba gas chag med cing drang ba sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la rtse mo'i phyogs su me tog dang bcas pa la rtsa ba'i sngags mngon par bzlas te byin la rtse mo me tog dang bcas pa mchos te/ ba lang gi
315a2(rgyud 'grel): ko ba tsam gyis maN+Dal byugs la/ kha shar du bltas te drang por dor ro/ /rtse mo phyogs gang du bltas pa las/ las dang dngos grub gyi ltas brtag par bya'o/ /de nas dri'i chul oM h+ri bi shud+d+ha sarba d+ha rmma sarba pA pa ni cE se shed+ha ya sarba bi
315a3(rgyud 'grel): ka la pa na a pa na ya hUM zhes pas mngon par bsngags la lan gsum blung do/ /de nas yi ge d+hi(rgyud 'grel): zhes bzlas pa'i ku sha sngas su byin la/ ha bzlas pa ni stan du sbyin no/ /de nas A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa'i sku 'de pas mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa
315a4(rgyud 'grel): dpung par gdags so/ /de nas spro ba bskyed cing chos bshad de/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag/ u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni ma'i byung srid/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung
315a5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis sems can mnyam med don/ /bla med byed par nus pa bzhin/ /bskal ba bye ba du ma ru/ /sngon du sdig pa byas pa gang/ /dkyil 'khor 'dra ba mthong ma thag /de dag zad par 'gyur yin na/ /
315a6(rgyud 'grel): grags pa mdza' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos/ /skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang gis spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu dri med na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad
315a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba yi/ /ngan 'gro de mis gtsang par 'gyur/ /bag nyid chen po khyad rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras pa cas pa'i/ /bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyi/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /
315b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gzung ste skye bzhin pas/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen du/ /legs pa nying du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /rang 'byung bskal ba chen po pa/ /
315b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur zhes brjod la de'i rjes la slob ma rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsrungs la/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces/ sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug go /mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang bskur la/
315b3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po bdag la stsal nas kyang/ /'khor lo lha'i de nyid dang/ /slob dpon yongs su phrin las dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa bla med gsungs zhes so/ /de nas rmi lam ci mthong ba ngal smros shig/
315b4(rgyud 'grel): ces sko la/ rang rang gi gnas su gtad ste/ /lha la lhag par mos pas nyal la rmi ltas brtag go /de nas slob dpon gyi nad du zhugs te/ slob ma bsrung ba'i phyir/ 'khor lo can gyi sngags bzlas nas gtor ma gtang ngo/ /nang
315b5(rgyud 'grel): par slob ma bod nas rmi ltas dris la/ mi dge ba'i ltas mthong na rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas la bsrung ngo/ /slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /de nas thig bri zhing gang ba ste/ de yang ras bal la soT leT bkal ba'i/ /gsar zhing spo phra
315b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jur mdung med/ /dkyil 'khor nyid 'gyur tshad kyis ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i skung pas dkyil 'khor ji la ba bzhin thig gdab ste/ de yang dang por tshangs thig gnyis btab
315b7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /de 'og mtshams kyi thig gnyis bris/ /de nas dkyil 'khor tshad dang ni/ /mthun par gru bzhir gdab par bya/ /phyogs dang mtshams dang thig gi bar/ /mnyam por cha snyoms gdab par bya/ /de nas slob dpon dbus
316a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dug la/ /dbus su phur pa btab nas ni/ /thigs skud nyis lta ba phur la gdags/ /de 'og snying po pho brang ni/ /ji tsam rig par zlum pod bskor/ /de nas dang ldan phyogs nas ni/ /slob ma rim par gnyis bskor nas/
316a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i ra ba me ri bcas/ /zlum por gnyis su bskor byas pas/ /dbus su sna tshogs par 'dab brgyad/ /rdo rje phreng ba bcas par 'gyur/ /de nas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bzhin gyi mtshon sna la kha dog bsgyur ba'i skud pa snod so sor
316a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhag la bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang/ mig gnyis su Ta dang ma las nyi ma dang zla ba bsams la/ 'bar ba'i lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' la bkug ste/ der dgug pa
316a4(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas nas bdud rtsi lngas gtor ro/ /de yang rab phyung myur bar bskul ba'i mig /mig gi rdzi mas 'gugs byed ba'i/ /'bar ba'i lta ba zhes bya ste/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed
316a5(rgyud 'grel): ces so/ /de nas oM a b+ha ga b+han shar shwa swa te sU traM pra yats+tsha swa tsa kra sU tra nA ya hUM zhes pas nam mkha' la gzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor las/ ye shes kyi skud pa bslang te/ de yang phan tshun rjes su rtogs pa ste/ /chos kun phan tshun
316a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'gro /chos rnams thams cad rjes su yang/ 'gro ba phan tshun rjes su brjod ces brjod la/ /slob ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar bsgoms pa dang gnyis kyis lhan cig du bsgril te/ oM n+yo n+yo a nu ga ta sarba d+ha rma pa ra spa ra sarba dta rmA/
316a7(rgyud 'grel): a tyan ta a nu pra biShtha sarba d+ha rmA hUM/ zhes brjod cing gcig tu bsgril lo/ /de nas bdag nyid nub phyogs su gnas la/ /rdo rje la dkris pa'i skud ba khu tshur g.yon pas gzung ste/ shar phyogs na gnas pa'i slob ma la/ dza dza dza zhes
316b1(rgyud 'grel): gtang la tshangs thig dang po gdab ste/ oM badzra sU tra sa ma ya ma ti gra ma hUM/ sems can don byed dus su ni/ /nam mkha' bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /de dag 'dir ni gshegs bya'i phyir/ /thig skud sgra yis bskul bar bya/ /zhes brjod/
316b2(rgyud 'grel): la gdab po/ /de ltar nam mkha' la thig thebs pa ni thig skud gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul te byon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bskor ba'i phyogs su song ste/ gshin rje'i phyogs su gnas pas byang phyogs na gnas pa'i slob ma dang
316b3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab po/ /de bzhin sa la yang gdab po/ /de nas me mtshams su song ste/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams na gnas pa dang shar phyogs kyi thig gdab bo/ /de bzhin du bskor phyogs dang sbyar las thig ji ltar gas pa de bzhin du/
316b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dang sa la yang gang ba po/ /de nas oM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas ye shes kyi skud pa gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas tshon bris ste/ gser la sogs pa'i tshon rtsi lnga 'am/ ma 'byor na 'bras phye la sogs pa'i phye ma zhib tu btags te/
316b5(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim pos bdugs te/ thod pa'i snod du gzhag nas thig gi skabs dang 'dra bar ba'i lha'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug la/ kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du bstims te/ oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes brjod cing mdon par
316b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngags la chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag/ sems can khams rnams sgrol byed pa'i/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal chen gyi/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bri bar bya zhes brjod nas lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi rnams so sor gzud
316b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te ri mo phan tshun ma 'byar ba dang/ ya yo med par g.yas skor du pri/ /de'i rim pa la ni nang ro la du nag po'o/ /de'i phyir dkar po'o/ /de'i phyi rol ser po/ /de nas dmar po/ tha mar ljang khu'o/ /
317a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ri mo lnga po cung zad cig bris nas/ kham phor la sogs pas bkab la phyin nas mtshan ma brtag go/ phyi nas slob ma rnams ci bder bris te/ rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni
317a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar bo'o/ /de'i phyir rol gyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad ni dmar po'o/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba ni nag po'o/ /de'i phyi rol du nag po la dur khrod brgyad do/ /de'i phyi rol du rdo rje'i ra ba'i me 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /dbus kyi snying po pho brang la/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i
317a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thod pa'am/ kha TwAM ga bri'o/ /shar du nyi ma'i steng du rdo rje'o/ /lhor nyi ma'i steng du rin po che'i lcug ma'o/ /nub tu nyi ma'i steng du pad+ma'o/ /byang du nyi ma'i steng du ral gri'o/ /phyi rol dur phrod rnams ni shing lo la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong gi gdan gyi mgo/ /rdo rje'i phred
317a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang me 'od ci rigs par bri'o/ /de nas bgegs bsal ba ni bdag nyid khro bo las thams cad ba'i skur bsgoms/ rdo rje dril bu gsor zhing lan gsum du bskor la/ hUM zhes brjod cing g.yas brkyang la sogs pa lus kyi sbyor ba
317a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ khro bo'i phreng sngags bzlas pa'i dag gi sbyor ba dang/ stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i sems kyi sbyor bas bgegs bsal lo/ /de nas bum ba gzhung dang mthun par tsa ba nag po la sogs pa'i skyon med pa lnga la/ lha so so'i
317a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma bris nas/ gong du smos pa'i cho gas byin gyis brlabs la/ dbus kyi bum par dpal he ru ka yab yum bskyed nas sa bon gyi 'od kyis ye shes kyi lha bkug nas bstims te/ me tog la sogs bas mchod
317a7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ rdo rje kha brgyan gyi steng du gzhag ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru gsum dang bcas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de nas yab yum 'od du zhu ste/ ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chur gyur par bsams mo/ /de bzhin du bum pa bzhi la yang
317b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya'o/ /gzhan yang yon chab la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la gdan dang gos kyis dgab pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du ba'i lci bas
317b2(rgyud 'grel): byugs la/ me tog sil ma bkram/ bla bre dang/ rgyal mtshan la sogs pa bre/ bum pa kun gnas so sor gzhag ste/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gzhag pa'am yang na shar phyogs kyi sgo'i nang du gzhag go /las thams cad pa'i bum
317b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir sgo'i g.yas phyogs su gzhag go/ bum pa kun las chu nyung zad bsdus la pad+ma'i snod du blugs te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du gzhag go /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid khrus byas te/ rgyan chas ldan
317b4(rgyud 'grel): par byas la nang du zhugs te/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas rim pa 'di gnyis kyis dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ste/ lo bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bu mo'am/ yang na 'od kyi rigs ma snying kha nas phyung la/ yab
317b5(rgyud 'grel): yum gnyis lha'i skur bsgoms nas/ gsang gnas gnyis byin gyis brlabs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas bde ba'i sgras/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste/ bdag la 'khor lo'i tshul du nam mkha' la khyab par spros nas
317b6(rgyud 'grel): slar bsdus te/ ye shes kyi lha dang 'dres nas so sor zhugs pa'am/ yang na stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'i ngang las hUM gi snang ba las ra ba dang dra ba dang sa gzhi bsgoms la/ de'i nang du sna tshogs pad+ma bsams te/ de'i rjes la dbus dang
317b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi char la/ nyi ma la thig le phra mo re re bsgoms/ de nas shar phyogs kyi thig le las rdo rje'i rigs dpag tu med pa spros te/ ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bsdus nas/ shar phyogs kyi thig le la thim pas rdo rje mkha' 
318a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro mar bskyed do/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma gsum yang bskyed do/ /dbus kyi thig le las rigs lnga char gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa spros te/ slar 'dus te dbus kyi thig le
318a2(rgyud 'grel): la thim pas sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i dpal rdo rje he ru ka bskyed la/ de nas yang yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde rdo rje ngo bor 'od du zhu ste 'od du zhu ste 'od kyi gong bur gnas pa la/ phyogs bzhi'i lha mo bzhis glu yis bskul bas
318a3(rgyud 'grel): yab yum dus gcig du bskur bzhengs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha'i 'khor lo sprul nas/ de nas phyi'i mchod pa yon chab la sogs pa rol mo'i bar gyis mchod pa'o/ /nang gi mchod
318a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni bdud rtsi myang ba nas nang gi tshogs kyi mchod pa'o/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa ni dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba'o/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa ni gnyis su med pa'i bsgom pa'o/ /de nas sngar smos pa'i bstod pas bstod nas lha rnams
318a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis sngags 'bru gsum dang spel ba ci nus pas bzlas la yang phyi nang gis mchod pas mchod nas/ de nas gtor ma rgya chen po gtad ngo/ /de nas nang du zhugs te bdag nyid dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang nod pa'i phyir/ /byang chub
318a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du/ /nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la gsol zhes lha la gsol ba btab la/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag pos bdag la snang ba byin nas dkyil 'khor
318a7(rgyud 'grel): du zhugs ba nas rjes su gnang ba'i bar du rdzogs par bskur bar bsgom mo/ /de nas dam tshig gis glus bstod de/ oM nam mkha' las byung mtshan med phyir/ thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje cher ba bzhin/ /
318b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin par bdag bsgrub shig /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag bsgrubs shig/ nyes pa med pa rtag pa ste/ /'dod chags kun tu rjes su chags/ /
318b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid bdag bsgrubs shig/ dngos grub chen po mchog gis mchog ces pa'i dam tshig gi glus bstod do/ /dbang phyug chen po rgyal bas rgyal/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje snyems
318b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bdag po'i bdag /sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi yab nyid de/ /'dod chags mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog /ces pa'i dam tshig gi glus bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas bden
318b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di brjod do/ /shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bden pa'i byin rlabs gang yin pa/ /bden pa de yis mgon khyod kyis/ /bdag gi 'dod pa skor byed shog /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ gsal
318b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing dag la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las la byung ba dang/ /de bzhin kho na nyid las byung/ /bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor ni/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar sems can rnams/ /dri med thams cad thob
318b6(rgyud 'grel): par shog ces so/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ /slob ma khrus byas te gos gsar pa bgos la dar dmar pos gdong g.yogs te/ yol ba'i phyi rol du gzhags la las kyi bum kyi bum pa'i chu gtor te/ me tog gzung ste gnas pa las
318b7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis/ 'dod pa dga' ba khyod su yin zhes dri'o/ /des kyang bdag ni skal bzang bde chen mos zhes smra'o/ /yang slob dpon gyis/ thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /rab tu 'jug par khyod spro 'am/ /slob mas thar pa chen po'i
319a1(rgyud 'grel): grong mchog tu/ /bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal lags so zhes lan gdab po/ /de nas oM sarba yo ga tsitat uta pA da ya mi zhes pas byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ de nas sdom ba gzung ste/ thog med dus nas 'khor
319a2(rgyud 'grel): ba nas/ /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis dang/ /bgyid stsal gang lags di ring bshags/ /gtso la slang yang sdom par 'tshal/ /rgyal bsras bcas rnams dang ni/ /'gro gzhan dge ba gang bgyid pa/ /de dag kun la yi rangs te/ /byang
319a3(rgyud 'grel): chub tu ni bdag gis sngo/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /di ring bdag nyid skyabs su mchi/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcod pa dang/ /dge ba rnams ni spel ba'i phyir/ /byang chub sems gnyis bskyed nas su/ /'gro rnams
319a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis mgron du gnyer/ /sangs rgyas gyur nas 'gro ba rnams/ /ma lus srid mtsho las bsgral bgyis/ /de nas me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying khar gzhag la/ oM su ra te sa ma ya staM/ ho sid d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM zhes lan
319a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum du brjod do/ /de'i rjes la/ dir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur gyis/ gsang chen dam pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs
319a6(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing/ ma dad pa rnams la yang ma yin no zhes bsgo la/ a kham bI ra hUM zhes pas yol ba'i nang du bcug la/ di ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs te/ ye shes gang gis de
319a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes das bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ khyod dam
319b1(rgyud 'grel): chig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje gzhag la/ /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste/ gal te tshul 'di gang su yang rung ba la smras na khyod dam tshig gi rdo rje 'dis mgo 'gas par byed do zhes brjod la/ slar yang rdo rje snying khar
319b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhag la/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khyod kyi/ /snying la de ring yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs zhes so/ /de nas mna' bsgags te/ rnam rgyal bum pa'i steng gi pad+ma'i snod kyi chu la/ oM
319b3(rgyud 'grel): badzra a mri ta ung ka Tha hUM zhes mngon par bzlas la/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das ni sreg par byed/ /dam tshig srungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub ces brjod de blus la/ /de ring tshun chad khyod kyi rdo
319b4(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' da yin gyis/ /ngas gang bsgo ba rnams bu khyod kyis bya ba gos la/ /nga la brnyas pa yang ma byed cig /byas na ya dab ma sbyangs par shi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen por b+hung bar gyur ta re zhes smos te/ de
319b5(rgyud 'grel): nas slob mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs la dpal he ru ka bdag la dbab du gsol /zhes pas gsol ba btab la/ de nas slob ma'i snying khar dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan pa hUM/
319b6(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par chu'i dkyil 'khor bum pas mtshan pa la baM/ spyi bor rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan gyis mtshan pa la haM/ rkang mthil du rlung sems mtshan pa la dkyil 'khor dmar po bsgoms la/ rdo rje dril bu gsal zhing bsgyings bag
319b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas/ /oM a be sha ya stwaM sham/ ra ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya/ hUM ma hA dzhaM u zhes lan brgya bzlas la dbab po/ /babs nas lce la a dmar po bsams la/ gsungs shig rdo rje dge mi dge ces dris pas legs nyes
320a1(rgyud 'grel): gang yin pa ltas ston par 'gyur te/ de yang thugs babs na yongs su shes pa skye'o/ /gsung babs na sngags smra ba'o/ /sku babs na nam mkha' la gnas so/ /de nas oM tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pas/ babs pa brtan par bya'o/
320a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dbab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob mas maN+Dal bya ste me tog bkram la lha dang bla ma la yon phul nas/ byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la zhes pa la soT ba gsol ba gdab bo/ de nas slob dpon gyis snying bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/
320a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /lha yi rigs kyi rim pa bzhin/ /bsod nams gang yin de bzhin shog/ 'di ni dngos grub gang 'grub dang/ /rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur/ /'di yi bsod nams ci yod la/ /dkyil 'khor du
320a4(rgyud 'grel): ni de bzhin shog /ces bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod la/ /de nas mig sngar snang ba'i 'od kyi bye brag dri'o/ /des kyang smras te/ dkar po la sogs pa gang ba thong ba las gang 'grub ba'i lha'i ltes brtag go/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
320a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha rnams la sngar smos pa'i bstod pas bstod la me tog dor bar bya ste/ bde gshegs snying bo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rig pa'i me tog 'di dor bas/ /sngon tshe ye shes bsnyen ba'i lha/ /gang yin de la 'bab gyur
320a6(rgyud 'grel): cig/ pra tits+tsha ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas me tog dor bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog gang du lhung ba de las de dang mthun ba'i lha dbab bar bya ste/ de yang me tog rin chen la sogs pa/ /gang la babs par rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bor rigs de bsgom
320a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med/ /ces brjod nas me tog de slob ma'i mgo la cing ngo/ /de nas slob ma'i mig gnyis su oM bsgoms la oM rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni nan tan byed/ /phye
320b1(rgyud 'grel): bas thams cad mthong gyur pas/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ ces brjod de gdong g.yogs bkrol/ thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /ltos shig ltos shig sems dpa' che/ /me tog gang du lhung gyur ba/ /de ni khyod kyi lha yin no zhes brjod
320b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ dkyil 'khor ltar bcug la sgo bsrungs nas yar gtso bo'i bar du ming brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas bstan par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug go/ de na dbang bskur te de yang dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan/ gzhan du na ni dngos grub
320b3(rgyud 'grel): dag /shin tu ring ba nyid 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas de skad gsungs /de bas na dngos grub kyi phyir rjes su mthun pa'i yon bla ma la phul nas/ gsol ba btab la phyag bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis de la dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i dkyil
320b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi phyi rol tu snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed tsam gyi dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa la dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad ge sar dang bcas pa sgo ru lha mo bzhi yi mtshan ma bris la der slob ma bzhag ste shis ba'i cho ga'o/ /de yang nyungs kar
320b5(rgyud 'grel): la bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi khu tshur gyis gzung nas lan gnyis su bskor nas kham phor gyi me'i nang du blugs so/ /de bzhin du lan gsum du bya'o/ /de ltar chu shis pa yang rtsa ba'i
320b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi bsrungs la nye reg bya ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i dri snying khar/ me tog mgo la/ mar ma mig sngar mar dang rang bsregs de'i bdug pas bdugs te/ shis pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas he ru kar dmigs la mig la sogs
320b7(rgyud 'grel): pa byin gyis brlabs la/ steng du bla re bre/ g.yas phyogs su hUM bzlas ba'i gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu bcan gzung ngo/ /g.yon du rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng la zangs dang dung gis bud pa la sogs pa'i rol mo'i
321a1(rgyud 'grel): sgras nam mkha' gang bar bsams la/ rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol to/ /phun sum tshogs ba mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa 'dab 'dra'i sbyan
321a2(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis dang po yin/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i dam chos mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum du grags shing lha dang mi yis mchod/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dbu rnams la zhi byed pa/ de ni 'jig
321a3(rgyud 'grel): rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa yin/ /dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi sbyin pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi rab mchog ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi bzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i
321a4(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gsum pa yin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa bkra shis kyi glu blangs la dbang bskur te/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis
321a5(rgyud 'grel): khrus bya'o/ /ta thA ga ta sa ma ya sh'ri ye hUM zhes brjod pa'i dang por rnam rgyal gyi bum pa'i chus gtor/ /de nas lha mo rnams kyi bum pas so/ /de nas nang gi dbang bskur te/ snying kha'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu'i ye
321a6(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la bkug la/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin can rnams kyis/ /'di la dbang bskur rab tu gsol/ /zhes yid kyis dbang bskur nas/ de dag rang gi 'od las byung ba'i dbang bskur bar bsams la/ sangs rgyas
321a7(rgyud 'grel): dag ni thams cad kyi/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /khams gsum gnas las byung ba yi/ /khams gsum kun gyi phyag byas pa/ /dbang bskur gnang ba chen po sbyin/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsu hUM zhes brjod cing bkru'o/ /de nas
321b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rig ma dang bcas pa de dag slob ma'i bu gar btsud de/ lus thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin du byas nas/ mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyis sbyor bas bsams te/ mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin gyi chu'i dbang ngo/ /de nas
321b2(rgyud 'grel): gser la sogs pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin las byas pa'am/ ma 'byor na dar dang ras la sogs pa las byas pa'i cod pan bcings la/ /nam mkha' gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs kyis
321b3(rgyud 'grel): der zhugs par bsams te/ bdag po rtags kyis mtshan pa yi/ /rtags kyi dam pa cod pan gyis/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas/ /'gro ba'i mgon skyabs byed par shog/ oM ratna mu ku Ta a b+hi Shi ny+tsa zhes pas dbang bskur te
321b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan gyis rang bzhin gyi cod pan kyi dbang do/ de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs te/ slob ma'i gnas gsum du gtugs la/ sangs rgyas kyi ni rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rab
321b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bsgrubs phyir rdo rje gzung/ /ma hA badzra hUM zhes pas lag pa g.yas su rdo rje sbyin/ /snang ba mdza' yas kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbang ngo/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon par rdo rje dril bu byin la/ shes rab dril bu'i dbang
321b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba/ /de ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /'di nge sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab chos kyi dbyings shes gsungs/ /mahA badzra g+haN+Da a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas g.yon par dril bu byin la/ g.yas g.yon bsnol te 'khyud pa'i tshul du bya ste/
321b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag po'i dbang ngo/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu slob ma'i dbang por gzung la/ gang dang gang snang de dang de/ /he ru ka dbal rang nyid gtso/ /gang phyir chos rnams rnam dag pas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes
322a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin nyid oM badzras twa haM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM badzra a b+hi She ka ta zhes pas ming gi dbang bskur te/ kye dpal che ge mo zhes rigs dang mthun pa'i ming las gang 'dod pa sbyin no/ /'di ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin gyi
322a2(rgyud 'grel): ming gi dbang ngo/ /de dag go rims bzhin du/ me long lta bu dang/ mnyam bnyid dang/ so sor rtog pa'i dang bya ba grub pa'i dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /dbang bskur ba lnga po de dag
322a3(rgyud 'grel): gis rgyud la sogs pa nyan pa dang/ bshad pa dang bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis ni spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa lnga'i las yin pa dang/ ma rigs pa bzlog pas rig pa'i dbang lnga'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyi dbang bskur te
322a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba/ /thugs rje can khyod bka' drin gyis/ /di ring bdag la stsal du gsol zhes gsol ba btab la/ rdo rje che dang dril bu che/ /zung cig rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs
322a5(rgyud 'grel): de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur/ /slob ma'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar gyis shes slob ma la bskur la/ /de'i rjes la dam tshigs gsum po 'dzin du gzhug ste/ hUM gis rdo rje bsgoms la/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/
322a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ /rtag tu khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bstan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa di d+hi badzra sa ma ye ti Sh+Tha e Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi/ /hi hi hi hi hUM zhes rdo rje gtad te gzung bas
322a7(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid 'di brjod de/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snying po bdag nyid gtso/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes
322b1(rgyud 'grel): bu'o/ /de nas A(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa'i dril bu byin la/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /shes rab thabs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed ces bas dril bu byin la/ srid pa rang bzhin
322b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /srid pa dam pa'i mchog tu byed/ /oM badzra g+haN+Ta ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta saM pra ra Ni ta sarba bud d+ha k+She tra pra za le pradz+nya par mi ta/ nA da swa b+ha ba/ badzra d+ha ra h+ri da ya/
322b3(rgyud 'grel): a ba teSha ni hUM hUM hU phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pas dkrol bar bya ste/ dril bu'i brtul zhugs so/ /de nas phyag rgya'i brtul zhugs sbyin te/ de yang shes rab lo grangs bcu gnyis 'am/ /lag gnyis kun tu 'khyud byas te/ /rdo rje dril bu'i
322b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis/ /slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod ces so/ /de bas na rang gi lha'i phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de yang yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ gang gis lus kun brtan byed pa/ /de ni phyag rgyar
322b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu grags shes pas rad gi lha'i rnam par mngon par rtogs pa bskyed la/ de nas me tog la sogs pas kun nas mchod cing bstod pa bya ste/ de yang snyems pa dang bcas pas me tog gcig slob ma'i mgo la dor la/ ding nas brtsams
322b6(rgyud 'grel): te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ sras dang bcas rnams rnams rol cig /rdo rje snyems pa'i rab sbyor gyis/ /dga' ston bde ba'i mchod pa gyis/ /a/ sgeg dang bcas pa'i phreng ba 'phang/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /des ni bcom ldan
322b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bral mi 'gyur/ /phreng ba de yi rgyan yin no/ /oM lus can rnams la dam chos kyi/ /khyod kyis glu ni blang bar bya/ /de yis bde gshegs dngos grub ni/ /myur du bde bar myong bar 'gyur/ /de nyid thal mo gar gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas
323a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad chags par mos/ /sangs rgyas 'dul bya'i phrin las kyis/ /gar mkhan tshul tu bsgyur bar gyis/ /ho/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la sogs brtul la/ /brtul shugs bzang pos legs chim gyis/
323a2(rgyud 'grel): lus can bde gshegs cha lugs su/ /ye shes kyis ni chim par gyis/ /a/ sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dor/ /byang chub yan lag tshogs gyur pas/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi bder gshegs sku ni thob par
323a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ b+hUM/ /chos kyi me ni legs spar bas/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra ba ru/ /sems can ma rig ldongs pa la/ /ye shes sgron mas spar bar gyis/ /rgyal ba rnams la dri phul bas/ /tshul khrims de bzhin gshegs rab dang
323a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yis/ /byang chub lus can rnams la bsgom/ /ga/ de'i rjes la gser gyi thur ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog
323a5(rgyud 'grel): bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis gsal/ /oM badzra ne tA ya a ba har pa tra li h+rI(rgyud 'grel): de nas me long bstan de/ chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu ste/ gsal zhid dag la rnyog pa
323a6(rgyud 'grel): med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung/ /rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa/ /de ltar chos rnams shes byas nas/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang rgyal ba'i sras su skye/ /de nas ho zhes
323a7(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags par byos shig ces bsgo la phyogs bzhir mda' re 'phang ba dang/ lteng 'og tu yang mda' re 'phen du gzhug go/ /de nas oM badzra he tu kruM zhes bya bas/
323b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar du gzhag la/ yang oM badzra b+haSha ra zhes byas pas/ lag pas g.yas su dung gtad nas g.yon par mahA mA yA'i bo ti byin te/ dril bu yang dkrol zhing/ de nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa/ /tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo
323b2(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par/ /yid nyid med pa'i sems kyis su/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /dri med kun tu gang bar gyis/ /sngags kyi spyod tshul cho ga rnams/ /skye bo rnams la rtag tu shod/ /de ltar byas na sangs
323b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la/ /phan 'dog drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang/ /khyod la rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad/ /ces brjod la/ de nas so so'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs su bya ste/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten
323b4(rgyud 'grel): khams ni thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de bzhin du chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang las kyi tshig bcug la/ tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba byin la
323b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas yang zhi rgyas dbang dang gsad pa dang/ /dgug dang skrag dang bskrad pa dang/ /dbye dang mnan pa la sogs pa'i/ /las de thams cad sgrub par gyis/ /ral gri ma gi sman sa 'og dang/ mchil lham de bzhin ri lu ste/ /rnal 'byor ma
323b6(rgyud 'grel): yi dngos grub rnams/ /de dag ci dgar bsgrub par gyis/ /zhes bya ba rjes su gnang ba'o/ /de nas bdag nyid langs te/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dmigs la/ g.yon pa snying khar chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ /g.yas
323b7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ltar byas te/ rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas lung bstan pa'o/ /'di ni khyod la ngas lung bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa shin tu dag pas na/ /srid pa'i dan 'gro dag las bton/ /
324a1(rgyud 'grel): he badzra nA ma ta thA ga ta b+hur b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): gang la lam tshul 'di dang phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga 'dis lung bstan pa de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams
324a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por lung ston par mdzad/ sngags 'di dang phyag rgya 'di'i mthu yin no zhes pas dad pa bskyed pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ khams gsum
324a3(rgyud 'grel): na ni med pa ste/ de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin no/ /ma hA sa ma ya ha na hUM/ de nas slob ma'i spyi bor gzugs gzung la/ gdugs dang bcas par bskor ba lan gsum byas la/ de nas dkyil 'khor
324a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgo ru gdugs dang bcas par spyi bos gtugs la/ sngags rnams 'dzin par gyur ba yis/ /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags shes brjod la/ gdugs gzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /di ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /sngags
324a5(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyud rnams 'dzin par gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris/ /khyod kyis nan tan bskyed nas su/ /sgrub pa po
324a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams sngags la sbyor/ /de nas dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /bcug pa dang ni mthong ba yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol te/ /de ring khyod ni dge bar gnas/ /bde chen theg pa
324a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di la ni/ phyin chad 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi thub gnod pa yod min la/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag bas na/ /srid dang sdug bsngal las 'das so/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya dang/ /byang
324b1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems ni spad mi bya/ /gang zhig skyes pa tsam gyis kyang/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tsom med/ /dam pa'i chos kyang smad mi bya/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya ste/ /mi shes pa'am rmongs pa la/ /de ni bstan par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu
324b2(rgyud 'grel): mi spang zhing/ slob dpon nam yang dmad mi bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pas na/ de la smod byed gang yin pa/ /de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob/ /da bdag yongs su sdangs nas su/ /dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya/ /ji ltar bde bar
324b3(rgyud 'grel): bde gnas na/ /'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /khyod nyon de ring 'bras bu yod/ /lha ngang bcas pa mnyam 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ngang mtshungs par/ /rtag tu khyod rnams 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de nas
