355b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gsum ni 'di lta ste/ /ha dang ra dang ka dang gsum/ /he zhes chos rnams gyu med pa/ /ta zhes chos rnam skye 'gag med/ /e zhes chos rnams sgra brjod bral/ /ru zhes chos rnams bra cha 'dra/ /rang bzhin yi ge gsum po 'di nan tan gyis ni
355b2(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams ni rtog brtan/ /kA zhes chos rnams gnas med pa'o/ /ka zhes chos rnams bden dang ldan/ /a las chos rnams skye med brtan/ /rang gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi/ /rang bzhin yi ge gsum po 'di nan tan gyis ni
355b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bsgom/ /oM shu n+ya d+hA? dz+nyA na badzra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ stong nyid sems ni brtan byas nas/ /de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyur/ /de steng hUM nag bsam bya ste/ /de gyur rdo rjer bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje bum par hUM nag bsam/ /de las 'od zer
355b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'phros/ /gru bzhi rdo rje rtsig byas te/ /steng du rdo rje gzeb ni bsam/ /'og ni rdo rje sa gzhi ste/ /rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol tu/ /lam gyur sa gzhi gru bzhi ste/ /rdo rje rtse gsum gyis ni mtshan/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor gyi rol tu/ /baM gyu chu yi
355b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor zlum/ /de dbus bum bdag ni bsam/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu/ /yi gyur rlung dkyil gzhu lta bur/ /g.yas g.yon ba dan mtshan par bya/ /yang na de yi phyi rol tu/ /raM gyur me dkyil sru gsum bsam?/ /rdo rje ra
355b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nang du na/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi dag la ni/ /dur khrod brgyad ni bsam par bya/ /paM gyur pad+ma dmar po bsam/ /pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i steng du ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams par bya/ /dbus su mthing nag hUM ni bsam/ /hUM las 'od
355b7(rgyud 'grel): zer dang spros pas/ /phyogs bcu bde gshegs rnams bkug nas/ /hUM la thiM nas zhu bar gyur/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhi la ni/ /lha mo bzhi ni bskyed bar bya/ /ched med bzhi yi rang bzhin las/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs bzhis/ /'di
356a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i rdo rje glu yis ni/ /mnyam nyid la gnas bskul bar bya/ /dpal rdo rje glu'i dam pa'i srid pa shin tu sgrub byed pa/ kye ma gnyen mchog rdo rje'i 'od kyis pad+ma rab phye shig /a la la la la ho bde ba chen po rab tu
356a2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig /nyi ma'i 'od kyis pad+ma'i kha rab phye ba bzhin/ /a la la la la ho bde ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig /rdo rje'i spu? ni blang nas su/ /gong bu de nyid hU du gyur/ /de la 'od zer rab spros pas/ /phyogs bcu bde
356a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs kun bkug nas/ /hUM nyid la ni thim par bsam/ /snying rje'i stobs kyi rdo rjer gyur/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag bzhi dag gis rab tu mdzes/ /dbus zhal sku mthing nag ste/ g.yas kyi zhal seng g.yon gyi zhal ljang/ /
356a4(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma'i zhal ni dkar po'o/ /g.yas gnyis ka pA la dang mda'/ /g.yon gnyis kha TwAM gzhu ni 'dzin/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gdan la gzhugs/ zhal bzhi spyan ni gsum gsum ste/ /mi mgo sar pa'i do shal la/ /rgyu ma rlon pa'i thag pas brgyus/ /thong
356a5(rgyud 'grel): skam phreng bas dbu la brgyan/ /dus chen rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /dga' bzhad zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs/ /dbu skra dmangs gyen du 'bar/ /de nas gdan drug byin gyis brlabs/ /dpral ba'i mtshams su tsa ser bsam/ /mig gnyis la ni
356a6(rgyud 'grel): oM skar po/ /rna ba gnyis la A(rgyud 'grel): dmar bsam/ /sna gnyis la ni khe dkar po/ /mgrin par a dmar bsam par bya/ /snying khar de dmar bsams par bya/ /gnas drug yang dag byin brlabs nas/ /yab yum sku ni dus gcig rdzogs
356a7(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid la ni shin tu 'khyud/ /gnyis med sku la 'od zer 'phros/ /'jig rten khams gsal byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas dbu ni brgyan/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab/ /chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag ni/ /de yi ngo bdag
356b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni/ /shar gyi pad+ma 'dab ma la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni bsam/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhal bzhi ma/ /g.yas ser g.yon ldang sku yi zhal/ /lhag pa'i zhal ni dkar po ste/ /g.yon gnyis kha TwAM dril bu la/ /g.yas gnyis ka pA la rdo rje 'dzin
356b2(rgyud 'grel): sa khams me long rang bzhin no/ /mdog ser rin chen mkha' 'gro ma/ /lho yi pad 'dab bsam par bya/ /g.yas nag g.yon ni ljang sku zhal/ /lhag pa'i zhal ni dkar po st/e /g.yon gnyis ba dan lce spyang ste/ /g.yas gnyis rtse gsum
356b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'dzin/ /chu khams mnyam nyid rang bzhin no/ /mdog dkar pad ma mkha' 'gro ma/ /nub kyi pad 'dab bsam par bya/ /g.yas ser g.yon ni ljang pa'i zhal/ /lhag pa'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /g.yon gnyis gzhung ka pA la 'dzin/ /g.yas
356b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mda' dang sna tshogs pad/ /me khams saur rtog pa'i rang bzhin/ /ljang mdog sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang gi pad 'dab bsam par bya/ /g.yas ser g.yon ni sngo ba'i zhal/ /lhag pa'i zhal ni dkar po'o/ /g.yon gnyis zhabs
356b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ka pA la 'dzin/ /g.yas gnyis ral gri cang te'u 'dzin/ /rlung khams nan tan rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs bzhi/ /ti ma'i gdan la rab tu gnas/ /ka pA la sogs rgyan rnams ni/ /gtso bo rgyan dang ma thun
356b6(rgyud 'grel): par bshad/ /spyan ni gtso bo nyid dang mthun/ /cung zad zhal gdangs mche gtsigs la/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar/ /thams cad kyi ni sku rnams la/ /ma dpung 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phros/ /snying rje'i stobs kyi rdo rje la/ /lha mo
356b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di bzhis mdzes bskor bsgom/ /ji ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni/ /slob dpon dag la dri bar bya/ /spyi bor lrung gi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /snying khar sa yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /lte bar chu yi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /gsang bar me yi
357a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te/ ma ning gis ni bsgom par bya/ /oM A hUM(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa ni ngal bso'i phyir/ sngags kyi 'dzab ni bzlas
357a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /oM A h+rI hUM phaT/ ting nge 'dzin las langs nas ni/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis su med par bsgom par bya/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan
357a3(rgyud 'grel): po sku med rdo rjes mdzad pa sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thab rdzogs so/ /sarba mang+gA laM/ /
